Akane Tendo was fresh from the bath when she saw Ranma's shrunken form on the floor. At first she thought it was some sort of bug, but when she got a closer look, she realized that was impossible, because no bug she knew of walked upright on two legs.

Akane's bright brown eyes were locked on his form, and Ranma knew that this could be either good or bad. What made him even more nervous was that he could not tell exactly what the girl was thinking. She had neither the angry scowl she would use when he said something stupid, or that twinkle in her eyes when she was genuinely happy. Her facial expression was neutral, and gave no clue to the inner workings of her mind at that moment.

Finally, his Tendo fiancee made a move, and, very slowly, reached a hand out and picked up the martial artist between her fingers. Ranma offered no resistance, he did not wish to arouse the wrath of this girl who was now many times his size.

Akane wasn't quite sure of what to make of this. She held in her hands a miniature Ranma, the boy who came into her life and flipped it upside down. He had, single handed, proven to her the existence of magic, and curses specifically, as well as completely destroying her perspective of what the human body was capable of. Now he had done so again, by shrinking to a size that could fit in her palm easily.

Timidly, at first, the youngest Tendo daughter began to examine the boy to make sure this was all real, and not just a hallucination brought on by any number of different things. When she was sure that this was indeed real, the next thing that came to mind was a question: was Ranma shrunk by someone else, or did the little pervert shrink himself so he could peek at her while she was drying off and changing.

"He certainly won't be a threat to Ranma now," Ukyo said.

"Actually, he could still be," Nabiki said, pointing to Kasumi.

"Ranma, Ukyo's here," Kasumi said, covering her lover.

"Oh, he is so tiny too," Ukyo said, as she continued to rub Nabiki's shoulders.

"Don't worry Kasumi. I gave Ukyo the same treatment you gave Sasuke," Nabiki said. "She sees Ranma only as a friend."

"Yes. Ranma is only a friend. Is Kasumi who he is with now, mistress?"

"Yes he is," Nabiki said.

"Then I will keep that secret too," Ukyo said.

Akane picked up the tiny Ryoga and put him in her breasts.

"Akane, what are you going to do with Ryoga?" Kasumi asked.

"Keep him with Kuno. I don't know what after that," Akane said.

"If this keeps up, we should get a hamster cage for them," Nabiki mused.

"Nabiki, really," Kasumi said.

"I mean it. We have one more serving of this potion," Nabiki said. Akane put the rest of the potion in a bottle and wrote on the label. Ukyo tracked where she put it and saw the other bottle of strange liquid.

===========

The taxi ride has been a safe one for the four American teens. Hinako had thankfully gotten one that safely fit all of them and their luggage. She showed them around her modest home and Ron took advantage of the floor bedding to crash after the long trip.

The girls were similarly feeling fatigued and started to unpack. Hinako went to order some food for their dinner.

"Damn, that woman is stacked," Monique said once they were alone.

"Do you think it's surgery?" Bonnie asked.

"It has to be. Have you ever heard of a woman with knockers that big who grew them naturally?" Monique replied.

"Look, it's not our place to ask," Kim said, though she too was interested.

"Did you notice Ron eying them while she rode up front?" Bonnie asked. Kim glared at her classmate. "He might want something bigger for you too."

-------

With the food ordered, Hinako felt a familiar feeling. Her body began to shrink once more to her child-size. She also felt the need of nature and started to her bathroom.

1151.content:
After trekking through many miles of the backwoods of China, Genma Saotome and his son, and heir to his school, had finally come to the infamous training ground of Jusenkyo. It was just another stop on the trip that Genma had dragged his son on when he was just a toddler. Each location and training method had been weirder and more dangerous than the last, but this spot looked like a normal spot to the young man.

“Why are we here, old man?” Ranma remarked smarmily, “This just looks like any old training ground to me. Why did you drag me all the way to China to come here?” The young man’s father wasn’t going to put up with his smartass mouth.

“Shut up, boy! I know what I’m doing! This is supposed to be a legendary training ground where only the most gifted and fearless of martial artists train. It has that reputation for a reason, and I mean to prove it to you.”

Before they could leap onto the bamboo poles that stuck out of the pools of water like spears, a chubby Chinese man in a tour guide uniform called to them.

“Sirs must not do that!” he cried in broken Japanese, having heard them speak from a distance, “Is very dangerous to be near springs!”

The two either didn’t hear the guide’s warning, or they didn’t care. They each jumped into the training area, and took up fighting stances.

“Are you ready to learn why you should speak to me with respect boy?” The bespectacled man asked his son.

“I’m ready to kick your ass, Pop!” the teenage boy barked back before his father launched himself at him.

“Sirs! Please listen, and come down!” the guide pleaded desperately. “This place very cursed, and very bad if you fall in pools!”

“Whatever! I ain’t afraid of some stupid legend. How ‘bout you, Pops? Want to call it quits now, before I can deck you in the face?”

Genma only grunted as he launched yet another attack at his son. They continued to fight until Ranma managed to get him off balance and sent him into the water below. When he emerged again, it was not as himself. Genma Saotome was now a giant panda.

“WHAT THE HELL?!” the son screamed as his transformed father began to attack him once more.

“Poor sir fall into spring of drowned panda. Very tragic tale of panda who drowned in pool very long ago.”

Ranma tried to stall his father’s attack, wanting to get away from the water before the same thing happened to him.

“Stop attacking me, you idiot! Haven’t you noticed what happened to you?!”

In that moment, Genma found an opening and sent his son flying into a pool with a kick. There was a splash of water, and then nothing.

“Oh no, oh no, oh no! Sir has made big, BIG mistake! Young sir fall into spring of drowned three inch tall man!”

“Growf?” Genma asked, and then he finally noticed his current form.

“Is spring where man shrunk by witch drowned years ago. Now whoever fall in shrink to three inch version of themselves.”

Sure enough, on closer inspection, a tiny Ranma Saotome could be seen pulling himself out of a pool of water that looked more like a lake compared to him.

11512.content:
The citizens of Nerima were going about their daily lives, going jogging, taking care of chores, and all was as it should be. The last thing they had expected to encounter that day was a giant panda walking down the road, with what sounded like a pissed off chipmunk chattering somewhere in the large beast's paws. Each person lost focus on whatever they were doing as the panda passed them, causing many to run into street signs or trip over nothing.

The giant panda, however, paid little attention to those around it. It had somewhere to be, and nothing would dissuade it from getting their today, even the struggling annoyance in its front claw. It was only when a small crowd had gathered to follow the bear that it reacted, with several annoyed roars. The gathering people quickly dispersed.

And so, the giant panda continued on its way, giving the other people no more attention. After all, it had an appointment to keep with an old friend.

*****

Soun Tendo once again reread the letter with tears in his eyes. It was finally time for he and his most dear friend to fulfill their promise from many years ago. In his excitement, he called out for his precious daughters to join him.

"Kasumi! Nabiki! Akane! Please join me in the living room!"

The mustachioed man dashed through the house, in search of his daughters, calling their names after he entered each room. Eventually finding two of his three beautiful daughters, only needing to find his youngest to have the full set.

"Now where is Akane?" the middle-aged martial artist asked.

"I think she's out for a run, father." Kasumi said politely.

All three of them were seated around a small table in the living room, a cup of hot tea prepared lovingly by his eldest daughter was placed before each of them, with a fourth cup placed at a vacancy, waiting for the last person to arrive.

*****

Like every day around this time, Akane Tendo was making her return trip back to her home, sweat glistening on her face, and her breath slightly labored from the long run. She was greeted by her neighbors as she passed, each of them giving her a friendly smile and sending the girl on her way. She had just entered the final stretch of her jog, having turned onto her street a block away from the Tendo house.

Entering the yard, Akane made her way to the entrance, intending on getting a couple hours practice in the dojo. After entering the household, the girl quickly removed her sneakers, and moved to change in her room, but she was stopped from doing so by her elder sister's voice.

"Oh, Akane, your home," Kasumi said as she caught sight of her youngest sibling, "Father wishes to speak to us in here." The motherly sister said, her hand gesturing towards the room where their father waited for them. Curious, but seeing nothing that was overly strange with the request, Akane followed her sister in, and saw her father sitting formally at the head of the table, with a piece of paper clutched in his hand.

"Now that Akane's here, we can begin," Soun said and began to explain to his dutiful daughters. He went over the agreement he had made with his friend, getting varied reactions from his daughters, such as Kasumi speaking about how she hoped the boy wasn't too young, and Akane's almost violent refusal to partake in such a thing. Either way, by the time the explanations were over, there was a silent tension in the house, one that would certainly break the moment Genma and his son arrived, or so Soun hoped.

*****

Thirty minutes after Soun gave his very controversial announcement, there was a knock at the front door, and the father of three almost cheered with joy, for this was almost certainly his dear friend and training partner, Genma. Like the proper young woman that she was, Kasumi went to answer the door and let the father/son duo inside.

"Oh my!"

Whatever Soun had been expecting his daughter to say in greeting, that certainly wasn't it. Wanting to see what had elicited such a response, the Tendo patriarch stood from his spot at the table, and headed for the door to investigate.

"Kasumi, have our honored guests arri..." Soun began, but his mind froze at the sight before him. Just outside his front door was a giant panda with a pair of camping bags slung over a shoulder, and what was even more strange was that it held up a sign which said 'Hot water please.'

The absolute absurdity of the situation caused a mental crash in Soun's brain, and the father fainted dead away.

*****

When he came to, Soun could hear the voice of his wonderful daughter, Kasumi.

"Here you are, Mr Panda, some hot water," she said with her typical gentleness. By now, Soun's vision had cleared, and just in thime to see the young woman hand a steaming teapot over to the paws of the strange bear. Next to the bear were the two backpacks that it had arrived with.

"I don''t understand what a panda needs our hot water for," Nabiki said with an almost bored tone.

"Why is it even in our house?!" Akane said loudly.

"Growf," the panda said in thanks, before upending the pot and dumping the water over its head. Where once an endangered, and cuddly bear stood, a pot-bellied, bandana wearing, bald man with glasses had taken its place. His was a face that Soun recognized immediately.

"GENMA!!! My old friend!" he said with tears in his eyes as he bolted up from the floor.

"SOUN!!!" the Saotome said with equal enthusiasm.

Kasumi just sat there in a mild state of surprise, having just seen a panda becoming a man with a splash of water. Nabiki had a look of mild amusement, and Akane couldn't stop herself from quietly babbling.

"It has been far too long my friend," Soun said in welcome, "but tell me, where is your son?"

After that, Genma's face became troubled, as if he was in deep thought over a grave matter.

"Well, Soun...that's a bit of a problem."

Reaching into one of the bags, Genma seemed to fight to grab something, before removing his now full hand. Bringing it before him, he opened his lightly clenched fingers to reveal a tiny form.

"This is my son, Ranma," Genma introduced, everyone now seeing that the tiny thing was a young man, and he looked rather mad. With a little prodding by his father, the shrunkin martial artist bowed in greeting.

"I'm Ranma, sorry about this..." he said, scratching the back of his pigtail.

*****

It took a great deal of explaining on the Saotome men's part, but by the end of it, Soun was once again laughing at his friend and his son's arrival at his home.

"Well, that's not such a big deal is it," he said happily, "So why don't we leave these four to get better acquainted, and afterwards you can take a well deserved bath."

11512211.content:
Their trip through China since they had acquired their respective curses had been problematic. Especially with everything that happened after had made thing such a pain in the ass for the older Saotome. However, the hardest part was ahead, and he knew that there was no way of escaping what was to come; bringing Ranma home to his mother and her family.

There was only one other person who instilled as much fear in him as Nodoka's father, and that was Genma's old master. It was only through careful negotiations that he was able to get them to agree to Ranma going on the training journey, and now with them arriving later than promised, the father was dreading what was waiting when he arrived. He could only hope that this wouldn't interfere with his plans to marry Ranma to one of Soun's daughters. The sneaky martial artist had already sent a postcard ahead to his old buddy inviting him to visit so that they could discuss the engagement, but that would have to wait later.

After they had got off the bus, and it was a long walk to promised meeting spot from the station. Ranma's tension that had been building for over a month since he had received the curse was somewhat lessened by the familiar, and comforting rural atmosphere of his home country. Though there was some small amount of excitement due to the promise of him finally meeting his mother after so many years. While he didn't remember much of her, the young man still was looking forward to seeing her, and his grandfather was just a bonus, considering how much his old man shivered at the very mention of him.

"So how far are we going, Pops? We've been walking for a while." Ranma asked impatiently. Rain clouds were beginning to gather overhead, and he didn't want to deal with that just then.

"Our destination is in a very secluded area, boy. Just keep walking, we'll be there soon."

They neared their destination and turned onto a winding staircase leading up into the hills above. The sounds of the town soon faded and were replaced by the chirping of birds and buzzing of insects. It wasn't long before a roof came into view. They kept climbing until the father and son stood before the gate of a traditional shrine, and there were two people to greet them.

"Well, Genma you've certainly took your time in returning, didn't you?" asked a woman wearing a beautiful kimono. Her hair was done up in a bun, and bangs that fluttered in the breeze.

"I'm sorry, dear. There were some complications on the final leg of our journey that delayed us." Genma said, cowed beneath her gaze. "Ranma, come say hello to your mother."

The pigtailed youth came forward and bowed politely. He had to make a good impression on her so every single bit of etiquette he had picked up over his life was being used in this moment.

"Hello, mother. It's nice t...to see you again," he said nervously.

"Ranma! It's so good to see you again!" Nodoka cried happily, her personality doing a 180. She flung her arms around him and pulled the teenager into a tight hug that practically crushed his ribs.

"N...nice to see you too, m...mom..." he grunted out through painfully clenched teeth.

"I'm happy to see you are in good health, grandson," said the bespectacled priest that had been standing beside his mother when they arrived. His straight, gray hair was pulled into a low ponytail and a distinguished mustache above his lip. "I am Katsuhito Masaki, your grandfather, and it's very good to see you again. Why don't you follow us to the main building and we can catch up, and Genma can explain why he is so late in bringing you two back."

"A...an explanation I will be all to happy to give once we settle in. Trust me, there is a perfectly good reason for this!" Genma said defensively, his mind racing as to how he was to explain that he turned into a panda. The fact that Ranma shrunk to a few inches tall would be even more ridiculous effort.

The group followed the old priest when something caught Ranma's attention. A ways up a nearby hill he could make out the entrance to a cave that appeared to have been sealed off by the old priest.

"What's over there?" he asked his grandfather, his finger pointing to the rocky tunnel.

"That is the cave where your ancestor sealed a powerful demon over 700 years ago. It's a story I'd be happy to share over your mother's tea."

Ranma paused in his tracks as a part of himself felt attracted to the dingy subterranean hole. It was like something there was calling to him.

115122112.content:
They arrived at the sitting room in the shrine's residential building, where his mother left them to brew some tea while his grandfather helped them settle in as they waited.

"Now that we are comfortable, I can tell you the story of our ancestor and his battle with a powerful demon that now lies sealed in the cave you saw. The story begins over 700 years ago, when a great demon descended from the heavens on the back of another. They caused great destruction and chaos until your ancestor, Yosho, thwarted the demon and sealed it in the cave with the very blade that defeated it. A sword that is said to be able to split stone with ease, and now rests in the hills above, keeping the terrible demon at bay."

Ranma absorbed the words of his grandfather, accepting a hot cup of tea from his mother as his elder finished the tale.

"Do you think I could see this so called demon," Ranma asked curiously.

"I am afraid that is something I cannot allow, Ranma. It is the ancient law of this shrine that no one may enter that cave, for fear of the demon being released. It is blocked off and the I possess the only key." Katsuhito pulled a key ring from his robes, almost teasing Ranma, daring him to try and take them from him. "So if you really want to see inside, you'll have to take these from me."

"Now father, don't taunt him like that. Ignore him, Ranma, father just likes to tease people for his own amusement when he gets bored. Why don't you and you're father tell us what you did on your trip."

Genma swallowed hard, Nodoka had wasted no time in cutting to the quick and he could see from the look in her eyes that he wasn't about to be getting out of this one. He would have to explain whether he wanted to or not, or face her wrath. Something he knew from experience he would not want to have directed towards himself. He had to explain what had happened tactfully if he wanted to get out of this with all his limbs attached, and that the boy had to be sent away for the moment.

"Ranma, why don't you go explore the shrine while your mother and I talk. It seems like the rain was just a drizzle and you shouldn't need an umbrella."

The young man didn't know what, exactly his father was planning, but judging by the atmosphere between his parents, this was probably for the best anyway. He shook his grandfather's hand and sped out of the room.

"YES"! She thought to herself, "With this ultimate mix I hall finally rid the world of Akane Tendo, that Chinese amazon, that gender-confused chef and the red-haired harlot. All shall fall! Oh Ranma-sama will finally be free! And together we shall be as well! Happily wed!"

121121.content:
With her specially brewed poisons, Kodachi swooped into the room, clad in her school uniform; the poisons placed into disguised containers.

Her timing proved off though, as at that moment, Ranma was having the usual confrontation with the teacher, Hinako. Just as she was about to drain him with her Chi coin technique, Ranma dodged and her technique absorbed the essence of the poisons which had an unexpected effect on Hinako, as opposed to killing her.

Instead of her usual transformation into adult form that normally took place, Hinako's body began a gradual shifting in front of the whole class.

She squirmed as her legs lengthened and her arms stretched. The catch was, she was still in her young child form and the transition was painful. Frantic, she dispersed the energy, hoping it would do away with the discomfort.
The exiting energy hit everything and everyone in the room, including the posions, thus re-coding their functions.

Afterwards, Hinako fainted, worn out.

Seizing the students' shock and awe, distracted by the current chaos, Kodachi took advantage and splashed Ukyo on the back with one of her toxins, it would seep into her skin later.

She then grappled Akane with her ribbon and poured another mix down her throat. With a triumphant cackle, she bounded out the room, determined to get rid of the other competition.

Ranma hurried over to Akane who ha passed out from the liquid's intake, but she wasn't dead.
Suddenly her eyes fluttered open and a wave of feeling soon surged over her.

She began to grow..

Akane ran from the classroom as the sound of bursting seems and tearing fabric filled the school. Outgrowing her shoes was the worst part. The school's required footwear was incredibly durable and held firm as her foot swelled in it, making it look like an overstuffed sausage casing. By the time made it out and into the courtyard of the school the pain was tremendous, until the shoes could take no more, and popped like overinflated tires.

All of Akane's clothes had been shredded by the sudden growth explosion. She stood in the middle of the courtyard wearing nothing, and she was still growing. Soon she was over 25 feet in height, and showing no signs of stopping. The rest of the school had turned out to watch the unbelievable occurrence as it happened. 1211211.title: She grows and bursts her clothes

12112111.content:
A loud, deep growl filled the school. Akane was pissed, and she was going to make her displeasure known to the little bitch who made her a giant. Her hand shot forward at the gymnast, only to close around empty air. Kodachi had dodged into the air, and took off running when she landed. The force of her hand cracked the ground, sending gravel flying into the crowd. The other students screamed in fear, before they ran away from the giant girl. Kodachi was left exposed as they all seemed to move away from her at the same time.

The Kuno girl broke into a sprint, terror fueled her legs as she looked for a way to escape the titan that chased her. Years of gymnastics were put to the test as she dodged and weaved around the hands of her rage driven pursuer. She knew that her only hope was to make it into one of the nearby buildings where the giantess' hands could not fit.

Akane chased the little pest of a girl, each step she took shaking the schoolyard. The little bitch darted around like a cockroach, but she wouldn't escape her wrath. The women of the Chinese amazon tribe were not given the name for nothing. They were indeed amazons, in both fighting ability and physical build. There was a great difference in size between the women of the tribe, and the men, or the rest of humanity for that matter. The shortest among them topped out at 6 foot 6 inches, and the tallest could stand over 8 feet tall.

The amazon women not only had height, but muscle as well. Each of them boasted enough strength to crush stone in their hand. They were huge everywhere, with arms that were bigger than the average man’s torso and legs that wouldn’t fit in a pant leg that was big enough for a size 38 waist.

Shampoo herself was at the larger end of the spectrum, standing nearly 8 feet tall, with muscles of incredible size. She was one of the most sought after girls in the village, with a lineage of many strong amazons in her family. She was expected to do very well in their annual tournament, if not win the entire thing. She had no idea that this tournament would change everything.

The day of the tournament, a pair of travelers entered the village, a red-haired girl and a panda with large travel bags. Shampoo was on the challenge log at the time, dodging the attacks of her fellow amazon, blocking the spiked club with her maces. With a final uppercut with her mace, Shampoo sent her opponent flying, winning the tourney.

The purple-haired muscle warrior leapt down from the log with a smile of triumph, ready and eager to indulge in her victory feast. Too bad the red-haired girl and the panda had already done so, with their guide frantically yelling warnings in fractured Japanese. Shampoo jumped high in the air, with her weapon held high, and brought it down in a brutal swing.

The feast table exploded into splinters of wood and bits of food, and the ground beneath cratered from the blow. The outsider and her panda managed to dodge, only being hit by small pieces of food. Shampoo began to yell at them in Chinese, and the guide stood behind them, and began to explain.

“You there! Woman and panda! Why you steal my prize?! She say” the Jusenkyo guide translated.

The redhead looked back at the Chinese man with a questioning gaze.

“’Every year on this day is martial arts tournament. I am now champion.’ She say” the guide continued.

“So I just have to defeat this over muscled girl, and there is no problem, right?” the outsider girl concluded before jumping onto the challenge log and took up a stance. Her opponent followed, landing on the other end, and, with a nod from the judge, the fight was joined.

The Jusenkyo guide sweated nervously, “Oh no! Young sir does not know of the rule concerning outsiders!”

The panda held up a sign which questioned ‘Rule?’

“Yes, sir. Rule that says…”

"Kuno-sempai, don't try this again," Akane said softly before moving past the young man. Shampoo set him down and walked to Ranma.

"What did you say to him?" Ranma asked Shampoo.

"He is lucky we aren't in my village," Shampoo said. Ranma nodded as they entered the school. Shampoo had a spark of excitement in her eyes.
14422212122122121211122212.title: Off to School

choices: The rest of the day passes without incident
A new perverted horde confronts them, and they are interested in Shampoo
144222121221221212111222121.content:
Ranma and Shampoo stood before their new classmates as the teacher made introductions. Ranma wore his regular outfit of red and black silks and a pair of slippers. Shampoo also wore her own clothing. It would take the school some time to procure an uniform that would properly fit her without tearing. She wore also wore silk pants and a top that matched her hair color.

"It seems we have some new students today. I know it is on short notice, but please be considerate and help them adjust to their new school. Now if you two would please introduce yourselves."

The Saotome boy went first, presenting himself before the class.

"My name is Ranma Saotome. I have just returned from China on a 10 year training trip with my father. I hope that we all can get along."

The class erupted with questions, and nearly gang rushed the boy when asking them.

"Is it true that you're Akane's fiance?"

"Did you really beat up Kuno's horde in less than a minute?"

"When did you propose to Akane?"

It took the teacher nearly five minutes to get the class back into their seats so that their other new student could give her own intro.

The bulky girl stood before the class, bowed respectfully, and gave them a cute smile.

"My name Shampoo. I come from China, very isolated region. I come to Japan with Ranma and his father and now stay at Tendo house with Ranma and his father. I is still learning Japanese, so please be patient if I no understand right away. Shampoo hope we can be friends."

The class' reaction to her was even bigger than what Ranma got. The class actually left their desks and circled around the new muscle girl. The girls looked at her in awe, and the boys stared with lustful eyes.

"You're almost as big as Akane! What's your secret?" one boy asked.

:What are you're measurements?" a second boy asked.

"Do you have a boyfriend?" another boy asked.

"Do you want a girlfriend?" a girl asked with a blush.

Shampoo did not like the direction the questions were headed, and decided to nip it all in the bud.

"Shampoo not looking for boyfriend right now. I is already pledged to another. Please sit down, you is interrupting class." Shampoo said authoritatively, crossing her arms beneath her breasts and gave the class a glare that said "don't argue with me."

Reluctantly, the students made their way back to their desks. Having dealt with Akane and Nabiki over the years, the students of Furinkan knew better than to anger a girl with that much muscle. The teacher bowed in thanks, and showed the two to their desks.
144222121221221212111222121.title: Follow their school day.

choices: Follow Ranma and Akane as they talk.
Follow Shampoo.  What does Kuno have planned?
1442221212212212121112221212.content:
The morning classes passed without too much issue. Shampoo sat in the back with Akane, as their broad shoulders would have blocked anyone who tried sitting behind them. Shampoo did her best to keep up with the instructions and occassionally glanced at Akane's notes to see what she thought was important.

It was a frustrating few hours as while she could speak Japanese at a passing level, reading was still a bit hard for her.

After lunch, with Akane pulling out meals for her housemates, gym was up. As she lacked a change of clothes, Shampoo was permitted to use her current set. They were playing soccer and her class was very happy. Akane the most. Because of her size and strength, it was considered an unfair advantage to have her play no matter the position. With Shampoo, there would be a fair balance.

Each monstrous girl stood before their goals.

All the while, Shampoo's fighting instincts told her she was being watched. It was distracting her from watching the ball and her teammates.

----

On the male side of things, Ranma felt glares as well from his classmates. A pair came up to him while he was stretching. "So, you live with the Tendos and Shampoo?" one guy asked. Ranma nodded.

"Yeah. Sorry I didn't catch your name earlier," Ranma said.

"Hiroshi," the boy said.

"And I'm Daisuke," the other said. "You have some pretty good luck."

"Why do you say that?" Ranma asked, though certainly feeling it.

"Because you have two really hot women who came to school with you and one is your fiance," Daisuke said.

"So you like Akane's muscles?" Ranma asked. Both guys shook their heads.

"No. Not really. Her breasts," Hiroshi said.

"Oh, those are some nice boobs," Daisuke said. The teacher called them over and they started doing track work.

------

Neither girl team was able to score and Shampoo found she enjoyed this simple game. The concept of playing not for honor was still strange but she could adapt to this new way of things. As she and Akane were last to enter the locker room, a horde of guys came around them. The mammoth women stood back to back.

"You guys want me to call Ranma over?" Akane asked as she cracked her own knuckles.

"Um, we aren't here for you Tendo," one boy on the swim team said. "Miss Shampoo, will you go out with me?"

"No me!" another said. Soon all were clamoring and pushing against each other.

"Everyone, back off!" came a commanding voice. Rolling up between them, Tatewaki Kuno looked up at the massive girl. SHampoo looked down at him. "I understand you have a strict code of honor." Shampoo nodded.

"Correct," she said.

"Then, it is only proper any suitors must face you one-on-one," Kuno said. "And since you defeated Tendo-san in single combat, I would advise any challenger to consider that before fighting her."

"Shampoo already pledged," Shampoo said, not liking her wishes ignored.

"And who is the name of this one?" Kuno asked.

"None of your concern," Shampoo said. Kuno nodded.

"Then have a pleasant day," Kuno said before rolling away.

"So, one-on-one against her?" one guy said.

"Did she beat you Tendo?" another asked.

"Without breaking a sweat," Akane said. Worry fell over the group, overpowering their collective lusts. They moved on.

-----

Kuno came to a set of stairs and heavy steps came from behind him. "You did as I asked?" Kuno asked as the chair was lifted up.

"You paid me to put the note in her desk. I did it," Nabiki said before walking.

"She does seem different than your sister. That video showed her true grace and an elegance I rarely see," Kuno said as they went up the stairs.

"You're forgetting exotic too," Nabiki said. "Glad you liked my sample of her selection." Kuno nodded.

"I do," Kuno said.

-----

Back in the classroom, Shampoo looked at the small enevlope on her desk. "Ranma, would you open this?" Her master nodded.

"It's in kanji. You want me . . " Shampoo nodded.

         To the Lavender Warrior,

I seek to meet you under the cherry tree at 5 this evening. I await you and you alone. I too shall be alone. I shall combat you with a weapon I suspect you rarely face.

I will wait to see if you have the courage to accept this challenge.

Sincerely

A Warrior of Love.

Shampoo's eyes narrowed. Someone is challenging her to a fight? It wasn't Akane. She knew that, so this warrior would likely be unable to harm her. Unless they used guns. She hadn't tested her strength against those machines.

Perhaps that is what this one meant.

Still, what remained of her honor and duty was at stake now.

"Akane, where is this tree?" Shampoo asked.

"It's that biggest one you can see from the soccer field," Akane said. "Do you want us to come with you?"

"No. The letter said come alone. I must honor that," Shampoo said. She gulped and looked at Akane. Her eyes were tender now. "Would you do me a favor?" Shampoo asked in a soft voice.

"What?" Akane asked.

"Protect Ranma while I handle this issue," Shampoo said. "I would not feel right leaving him in weak hands."

"I don't mind. We can wait at the school entrance," Ranma said. Akane nodded as the teacher came in and class resumed.

------

The final bell rang and Ranma felt strange as Shampoo walked off without him to meet the challenger. He stayed by his "fiance."

14422212122122121211122212122.content:
Shampoo strode towards the location that the letter's author had mentioned. The tree itself was quiet beautiful, with bright green leaves that swayed in the breeze, and a strong, thick trunk. It was the ideal spot for a martial arts challenge if she had ever saw one. The tower of female muscle leaned against the tree and waited for her foe, thou she may have looked relaxed, the Chinese girl never dropped her guard.

It was a minute before the meeting time, and there was no sign of the mystery challenger. Shampoo was on edge, the absence of the unknown fighter could mean anything. She had heard that Japan was home to certain styles of fighting that used stealth and surprise to win an advantage. If that was the case, she would have to be careful, it would be a very effective style against a fighter of her size.

The school clock rang boldly, signaling that the time had arrived. After the peel wound down, the squeak of wheels could be heard from her side. Falling into a ready stance, Shampoo saw the annoying Kuno boy moving towards her. Stopping less than a foot away from her, his gaze scaled her body, drinking her form in like a man in the desert.

"It is good to see that you received my note, my lovely muscle girl. I was unsure whether or not my delivery service was reliable or not, but here you are. A vision of loveliness and power that rivals that of Akane Tendo," Kuno remarked as he stared at the amazon before him.

"What strange boy want with Shampoo?"

"Why, to engage in the most glorious form of combat in human history." Reaching behind the back of his chair, Kuno grabbed something and swung it forward. Shampoo set herself to dodge or block whatever was coming her way, only to be met with a bouquet of roses. Kuno held them at just before her face, with a smile that he no doubt thought was charming.

"I would date you, oh lovely Shampoo. If you would have me."

"What weird boy talking about? Shampoo thought he want said he want combat, not lovey-dovey stuff."

"Why, my dear Shampoo, it is combat of sorts. Is it not said that love is a battlefield? So, will you date me?"

"Shampoo thought she tell weird boy she already have someone. Go away and leave me alone, you like annoying half-blind boy Shampoo knew in China."

"Ah, so I must prove that I am more worthy than he to whom you are sworn. Very well, I shall prove my valiance and worth by defeating you in friendly combat!" Kuno declared, once again jumping to a conclusion that wasn't even logical, and pulled a wooden sword stored in his chair.

"Weird boy crazy! Shampoo no have time for this. Just leave Shampoo alone."

"My dear, I swear that I will prove myself to you. Ever since I saw your graceful movements in your fight with Akane, I have loved thee." That caused Shampoo to pause.

"How Kuno boy see fight between Akane and Shampoo?" The fact he had seen the fight was worrying.

"From that swindler, Nabiki Tendo. While I hate just about everything else about her, I cannot deny her skill with a camera. The pictures of you were superb, and the video of your fight was awe inspiring."

Shampoo would have to meet with the middle Tendo girl, and speak to her about who it was okay to sell her photos to. This boy was too obsessive and photos of her would only fuel his delusions.

"Shampoo say this once more, leave me be and look for love with different person." Having said her final peace, she turned, and walked back to the school entrance to meet up with Akane and her master. When she arrived, only Akane was there to greet her.

"Akane, where Ranma?" was the first thing she said to the bigger girl.

"He went off with my sister. She asked for his help with something, and he agreed."

"Who Ranma helping?"

"Very good Ranma. Here's the money, and just remember that I expect repayment to be prompt."

"Shampoo, I won't sell all of myself to Nabiki to get out of this debt. I won't go that far," Ranma said.

"How far?" came a voice. The pair turned and saw the short Kasumi standing there. She was in a robe, dripping wet still. Her sleeves were bulging with her muscles. "I heard from Akane Nabiki tricked you into a loan."

"Yeah. I didn't think I would be paying it back by a photo shoot." Ranma said.

"And then she wanted you to do something else," Kasumi said softly. She looked at the light layer of sweat on both women. Ranma nodded.

"Um . . ." Ranma said "Yeah." Her muscled pumped up as she clenched.

"How much did she loan you?" Kasumi asked. Ranma told her.

"Why you ask?" Shampoo asked.

"I don't normally put my nose in Nabiki's business. She always kept it away from home. To do this to Ranma," Kasumi said softly. Her eyes changed. They became stronger, harder. Like finding the pit in the first peach. "Shampoo, would you be willing to part with Ranma for a time?"

"What? Why?" Shampoo asked.

"I have a job. Nothing shameful, but I would be willing to pay for it," Kasumi said.

"No strings? Not a loan?" Ranma asked cautiously. Kasumi nodded.

"Yes. I would like someone of your skills in particular," Kasumi said.

"Shampoo wants to go too," Shampoo said. Kasumi shook her head.

"The job requires subtlety. You stick out like a sore thumb," Kasumi said. Shampoo's face grew angry.

"After what mercenary Tendo do . . ."

"I am not my sister. I would greatly appreciate this," Kasumi said.

"Kasumi, you don't have a job, right? How are you paying me?" Ranma asked.

"I kept some of my winnings from lifting in stocks and banks Ranma. I have a small fund I dip into when the house needs it but otherwise it just collects interest," Kasumi said.

There was an aura of honesty about Kasumi. It wasn't like the mask Ranma now associated with Nabiki.

"Okay. When do I start?" Ranma asked.

"Once I get dressed," Kasumi said. "Would you please change to your male form?"

"Let's get some water Shampoo," Ranma said. Shampoo slowly nodded.

"You sure about this?" Shampoo asked again as they went down stairs. Akane was sitting at the table doing some homework.

"Akane," Ranma called. The mammoth girl turned.

"Yes?" she asked. "Oh. Nabiki was making you pay, right?" There was no sympathy in her voice.

"Yeah. Can Kasumi be trusted? She offered me a job to get some money. She isn't like Nabiki, is she?"

"No. Kasumi is not like Nabiki. If she is offering you an honest job, it will be honest," Akane said. She frowned. "What could she need your help on?"

"You don't know?" Ranma asked. Akane shook her head.

"She is good at losing a trail when Nabiki tried to follow a few times," Akane said.

"I'll keep that in mind," Ranma said. Akane smirked.

"Thanks for listening to me this time," Akane said. Ranma looked away.

"Let's get the water," Ranma said. Shampoo nodded and they went to the kitchen.

-------

Ten minutes later, Kasumi was wearing a long coat walking next to Ranma-kun down the street.

"So, what do you need me to do?" Ranma asked.

"Security. I need your protection," Kasumi said. Ranma looked up at the tiny titaness.

"You need my protection? During what?" Ranma asked. Kasumi blushed.

14422212122122121211122212122122222.content:
"I like to model for various businesses in Tokyo. They say I am perfect for the job because of my statuesque figure, and a body that stands out from every other model out there. Also, please keep this a secret from my family, I don't want them to know that I have a job like this, mostly because I don't think father could deal with it."

This little bit of information shocked Ranma. He had never thought that Kasumi would have a job as a model. Though, now that he gave her a good look, he could totally see how she got the job in the first place. She was tall, had a lovely face, and was fit, with the body that looked like it was carved from marble. Not to mention she was well endowed up top and underneath.

"You're a model?! How long have you been doing this for Kasumi?"

The eldest Tendo girl gave the boy an amused look, leaned in, and whispered her answer into his ear.

"To tell the truth Ranma, I've been doing this since I was in my first year of high school." She said, giggling as she pulled away from him.

"THAT LONG?!" Ranma shouted in his surprise, before immediately covering his mouth, remembering the secrecy of the job he was given. They continued to walk in silence for a while after.

Ranma followed closely behind the muscular girl who had asked for his protection. Which was strange. Why would a woman of Kasumi's size and strength need his protection at all? If he had to guess, there wasn't anyone besides the girls he was currently living with who could pose a threat to the towering amazon he was walking with. If he was going to protect her, he had to know why.

"Kasumi. Why exactly do you need me to protect you? I mean, isn't this just a modeling job? How dangerous could it be that you need my help? I would think that you could protect yourself from anyone in Japan."

They walked for another minute in silence before Kasumi answered his question.

"The reason I need your protection, is that one of the girls who I work with has it out for me. They seem to think that I am sabotaging them because I always get picked for the bigger clients."

"Why would they think that you're trying to sabotage them?"

"Honestly, I don't think she is entirely stable. If what Akane tells me about her brother is true, I would have to say delusions run in the family."

"Wait, Akane knows her brother? What's her name?" Ranma was really curious now. If this girl was related to someone Akane knew, he had to know who it was.

"Kodachi Kuno. I believe you know her older brother Tatewaki Kuno from school."

"The one who caused Akane and Shampoo all that trouble this morning? He has a sister as crazy as him?"

"Now, now Ranma, it's not nice to call someone crazy, even if they are a little bit...eccentric."

"Yeah, eccentric. So what, has she been doing something to your clothes or something?

"No, it is more like she is trying to force me to quit, and is using her family's money to get me fired. I can explain more later, but we have arrived, and we need to head inside so I can get ready."

As they walked through the well lit building, Ranma glanced around at all the girls inside. They all were tall, pretty, and had great figures. Glancing around, Ranma looked for the girl who was targeting Kasumi.

"Which one is it?" Ranma asked.

"She is over there." Kasumi pointed out to him.

144222121221221212111222121221222222.content:
Ranma looked at her and was taken back. The woman's long black dress was clinging tightly to her exquisitely sculpted body. Her evening gloves looked constricting on her meaty hands. She could have passed for a body double of Akane with her body. Only the face and black hair were the difference. She turned to the smaller Kasumi and seemed to tense up with anger. A darkness was in her eyes, though different from Nabiki, warned Ranma this woman was dangerous.

"Is she . . . Is she of Amazon blood too?" Ranma asked. Kasumi shook her head.

"No. I don't believe so. She only became that size two weeks ago. Before then, she was an average teenage girl who practiced gymnastics," Kasumi said. Ranma gulped as he followed Kasumi to a counter where she signed in.

"Your dress is in your locker,' the receptionist said to Kasumi. "Boyfriends are not allowed."

"He is my bodyguard," Kasumi aid. The woman looked at Ranma and then Kasumi.

"Okay. He signs in too then," she said. Ranma signed in.

"So, how do you think she got so big?" Ranma asked.

"About four weeks ago, when Kuno-san was leading an attack on Akane, someone was able to cut a small loch of her hair. I think Kodachi took it and used magic. Some of the other girls she worked with in other agencies fell ill from poisons, so she knows something about that art,"

"I can see ow that could make her dangerous," Ranma said.

"That is the least dangerous thing about her now," Kasumi said. She looked at Ranma with both eyes. "Ranma, my sisters and I grew up without strength. We know how to use it and how not to hurt people. Even with her lacking total control, Akane rarely hurts someone unintentionally. Kodachi is still getting used to her strength. She is a danger to herself and others."

An ear-grating laugh came from behind them. Rama turned on instinct and looked up at the massive breasts above him.

"Thou thinks you can best me tonight Tendo? We are wearing formal wear of elegance and grace. A commoner like yourself could not know such things. Give up and the pain will be swift and short," Kodachi said.

"Kuno-chan, I hope you have a wonderful evening. Thank you for your opinion," Kasumi said in her soft tone. "Ranma, please don't peek at me." She smiled a smile that was as radiant at the sun.

The thunderous growl akin to a thunderstorm rumbled next to Kodachi.

"She thinks she can best me?" Kodachi growled.

Ranma watched something he had seen on Shampoo: When angry or focused enough, her body could literally swell. Like his lavender servant, Kodachi did grow out a half an inch, making an already imposing feature look even more terrifying.

And even to a lover of muscles like Ranma, he stepped back in fear.

Then he heard a soft noise. It was the sound of something restrained breaking free of its fabric bindings.

"Kodachi!" came a cold voice. Ranma turned and looked at a pale young man. He was unearthly pale and holding a camera in hand. "You just ruined your dress!"

"What?" Kodachi yelled. She turned about and on her back, Ranma could see the rips over the back. "Tendo! You caused this!" She turned her sights on Ranma. "You caused this to happen as well." Her fist clenched up The gloves ripped now.

“Whoa! I didn’t do anything!” Ranma yelled. Kodachi raised her hand to strike when the cameraman came over.

“You strike him and you won’t work under me again,” the cameraman said. Kodachi’s eyes narrowed.

“Gosunkugi-san, you wouldn’t,” Kodachi said.

“You damaged a custom designed dress and are about to hit a guy who did nothing. Not very model-like behavior. Calm down and we might be able to fix this. Get your ass to the sewing section and see if they can fix the tears.” The scrawny man stared down the muscle-bound woman and left. Once she was out of sight, the young man collapsed at the knees. Ranma caught him.

“That was either very brave or very dangerous,” Ranma said.

“Dangerous. Definitely dangerous,” Gosunkugi said. “She was bad enough before the muscles.”

“Ranma, is everything alright?” came Kasumi’s voice. Ranma turned and quickly pulled the cameraman in front of him.

Stunning didn’t describe Kasumi as she stood there in 3 inch heels wearing a slimming black dress that accentuated all her curves. Her hair was put up in a dignified braid. The lipstick and make-up applied sparingly.

If Ranma didn’t know it was her, he wouldn’t have guessed it could be possible. where Kodachi showed dominance and force with her outfit, Kasumi was a sublime elegance. She was a proper lady with an aura of warmth and love but a protectiveness about those she cares about.

“Do I look ugly?” Kasumi asked.

“No. Definitely not,” Ranma said.

“H-h-hey Tendo-chan,” Gosunkugi said. His face was red with blush. His hands shook slightly.

1442221212212212121112221212212222221.content:
The photo shoot started out very similar to any other as far as Ranma could tell. The poses they took were both elegant and refined. They were carefully chosen to accentuate the dresses they wore. It was a lovely sight to behold, both Kasumi, and, though he was loathe to admit it, Kodachi were visions of absolute beauty. His attraction to a muscular female's body was overriding his distaste for the girl for a moment.

It was when they switched over to a different sort of posing that Ranma had to sit down and cross his legs to hid a certain early riser in his pants. Rather than continuing with the more traditional model poses, Kasumi and her aggressive rival began to do poses more often seen in bodybuilding competitions. Each pose served to show their fantastic muscles.

The sight of bulging biceps and diamond hard legs was driving Ranma mad. It took all of his control to not just jump in the shot and worship their amazonian bodies. With a surge of willpower, he fought down his arousal, and get back to the matter at hand, making sure nothing happened to Kasumi. He casually scanned the room for any signs of an attack, looking at every conceivable place that it could come from.

If he hadn't been searching around the room, Ranma would not of noticed the sound of tearing wire and rubber in time. Looking up, he noticed the frayed cable of a very heavy stage light getting ready to snap. He could tell he only had seconds, and leaped to push both girls out of harms way. Even if the girls were like armored tanks, a heavy blow to the head would hurt even them, and Ranma wouldn't allow a girl to be hurt under his watch.

Though a normal person wouldn't be able to move the two behemoths without their consent, Ranma was a highly trained martial artist, and knew exactly how to shift their center of gravity so they would move with his flow. Both girls moved when he needed them to, and they were out of harms way a fraction of a second before the light smashed itself on the floor.

Slowly, Ranma got up, helping the Tendo girl up as he did so, though she did not need the assistance.

"Are you alright, Kasumi?" he asked with concern.

"Don't worry about me Ranma. It would take more than a little fall like that to hurt me. Thank you for your concern though." Kasumi beamed a smile at him as she shooed away his worry.

Turning to the other girl he pushed away from injury, Ranma held out a helping hand to her. When she looked up at him, Ranma saw something in her eyes that set him on edge.

14422212122122121211122212122122222212.content:
Kodachi's eyes had a darkness about them. A hatred and rage contained. "You saved us," she growled.

"Uhh, yeah," Ranma said, backing away.

"You saved her," she continued. Kasumi reached and pulled Ranma close. "I will remember this." Kodachi rose and turned from them.

The scrawny Gosunkugi came up to the three.

"Thank you. That was amazing!" the cameraman said.

"It was nothing really," Ranma said.

"Well, with that down, I'll have to deal with what I got. I'm not continuing until everything is checked out and the inspectors tell me why this one fell," Gosunkugi said.

"What? Was there not supposed to be a solo shoot after this for the best of us?" Kodachi asked.

"Yes. But I don't know if any more lights will fall. It could be really dangerous and your savior might not make it in time then," the cameraman said.

"As you wish Gosunkugi-sama," Kasumi said. She rose to her feet. Gosunkugi walked back to his bag and pulled out several envelopes.

"Since the shoot was mostly over, I'll just pay you all. You'll be contacted when our next shoot is," he said. The other models came over and accepted their envelopes. Kasumi took hers, leaving Kodachi's. The mammoth woman rose and continued to glare at Ranma.

"I will not forget this insult," she said. She accepted her money and left the stage.

Kasumi walked back to the locker room and changed back to her old clothes.

A few minutes and the pair was back in the evening air. "You think she tried dropping it on me," Kasumi said after a moment of silence.

"Yeah. She's dangerous Kasumi. Shampoo told me a strong strike to the head could even hurt her," Ranma said.

"Well, I was anticipating only to avoid being pushed or tripped. You truly saved me," Kasumi said before stopping. "I want to reward you."

"I don't need anything beside the night's pay," Ranma said. Kasumi looked at Ranma leaned down. She placed a kiss on his lip.

The younger boy shuddered as he tasted her soft lips. The warmth behind this action.

When she broke away, Kasumi was blushing as well. Ranma was smiling couldn't believe his luck. It was then he noticed something in his hands. Kasumi's pay was sitting in his hand.

"Whoa, ain't this a bit much?" Ranma asked.

"Not at all. You did your job and then some," Kasumi said with a smile. She turned and started walking. Ranma opened the envelope and counted the money.

"Kasumi," Ranma said as he raced to her side. "This is . . ."

"A day's pay to me. I get jobs once every week or two. I have more than enough in a private bank account," Kasumi said. And to Ranma, it was enough to pay back the rest of the debt and still have some left over. His face grew worried.

"Won't this make Nabiki look into you now?" Ranma asked. "She might try to find out what you're doing."

"Let me handle my sister and those consequences Ranma. Nabiki may not look like it, but she has a heart hidden deep. You just need to dig very deep into her," Kasumi said as they took a different path home.

A rumble of thunder echoed overhead.

"We best hurry up Ranma," Kasumi said. Ranma nodded and they started jogging.

--------

Kodachi pulled the door off the hinges, again. Tatewaki was reading the newspaper when he looked at his sister. "Were you not selected for the special shoot?" he asked in a calm voice.

"It was postponed! My plot was stopped by her bringing in a bodyguard!" Kodachi yelled.

"Considering her sister's mind, I would not have suspected Kasumi Tendo to be ignorant," Tatewaki said.

"I do not need this now. I must find a way to best him before going after Tendo once more," she said.

-------

Ranma and Kasumi reached the house just as the downpour started.

"Ranma," came Shampoo's relieved voice. "You're back." Ranma looked at his servant.

Shampoo engulfed her master in a hug, lifting his whole body off the ground and giving him a squeeze just short of painful. She pressed her breasts into Ranma's much smaller chest, letting her nipples poke him through their clothes, The amazon held him there for a full minute before letting him down.

Once more on the ground, Ranma began to scratch the base of his pigtail nervously, laughing as he did so. It was then that Shampoo saw something that she did not expect. Right on her master's lips, was a shade of lipstick that was not her own. She looked to Kasumi to ask what had happened, only to see the color of the older girl's lips matched the lipstick on Ranma's.

Shampoo was not a jealous creature in nature, and she could tell after looking Ranma over that nothing had been forced on him. Instead, she just went with the only conclusion she could come up with.

"Ranma decide to have fun with Kasumi too?" She asked with a teasing look.

"Wha...no of course not!" was the boy's response.

"No. Is good he try to have fun with Kasumi. Need to know whether you compatible or not. This is good way to find out," the Chinese girl said supportively. Shampoo would go with whatever her master decided, as long as she could be by his side.

Seeing a possible embarrassing situation about to unfold if one of her sisters walked in, Kasumi decided she needed to clear the air quickly.

"Oh my! Ranma and I were not doing anything like that Shampoo. He saved me from something about to hit my head, and that was my way of thanking him," she said, leaving out just enough information so she didn't give away her secret job.

"Oh. Shampoo misunderstand then. Objects hitting head bad even for amazons. Ranma really is good man to understand this. Is late now, though, so he should wash face and go to bed. We have school tomorrow."

"Thank you for understanding, Shampoo. I'll let you two head upstairs then. I'll see you in the morning. Good night."

Just as Kasumi was about to leave, she felt Shampoo's hand on her shoulder. The younger girl leaned in close, and whispered to her.

"If Kasumi want to join Ranma and Shampoo's fun, she just need to ask." the purple-haired amazon said, before turning around and following her master to their room.

Kasumi didn't stop blushing, even after she fell asleep.

1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
A little over a week had past for the residents of the Tendo Dojo since their newest house guests arrived. While none of the Tendo daughters had consummated a relationship with Ranma Saotome, they each had grown close in one way or another.

Akane's growing friendship with Ranma and Shampoo, learning to better control her strength and listening to Ranma's critiques about form and keeping cool. Shampoo was learning to read more and more Japanese, as well as getting caught up on things a person in a Japanese High School should know.

While Nabiki was shocked from Ranma repaying the loan so quickly, she did not press how he got the funds. When Kuno saw the photos, including ones with the beautiful red haired girl, he bought the lot. Seeing a cash venture, Nabiki tried to make a deal with Ranma and Shampoo for more photos. Neither were completely interested in that.

Kasumi had another job that week and once again, she and Ranma were out alone for a few hours. They were modeling bikinis that night and the suntan lotion pretty girls could use. Kodachi tried some revenge by using a hair ribbon to slice the back string of Kasumi's strained top piece but Ranma was able to sneak up and hold the strings together without disturbing the shots. He had to cling to Kasumi's expansive back like holding to a rock face. For her work that night, Kasumi was given a special contract for a shoot a few nights away. Elated at this, she kissed Ranma once more and gave him much of her pay for the night.

Kodachi was furious and would swear her revenge on both.

Kuno-san had not given up on Shampoo and would follow shower her with chocolates and flowers each morning. The sweet dessert was an uncommon thing to the Chinese Amazon and she didn't want to accept the gifts freely as she didn't share his feelings but he refused to take them back, so Shampoo regifted them to her hosts for the Tendos and Ranma to share.

It was a mostly peaceful life and chaotic order they lived in.

Until that day.

--------

Ranma and Akane were walking through the park with Shampoo a short distance away. While something felt off, SHampoo saw no real danger and enjoyed the moment of rest, The three were eating ice cream from a park vendor with Ranma paying for the treat. Each one had finished their homework and wanted a nice break. Ranma was laughing at a joke AKane made when a figure came out of nowhere and slammed into Ranma.

"Master!" Shampoo yelled before rushing the mystrious boy who hit her Ranma. Akane dropped her ice cream and caught Ranma. SHampoo slammed her hand into the boy's gut and felt the hard abs tighten. Her eyes widened as while the boy flew back, the damage had been minimal.

He had used a technique to survive the strike of an Amazon. Shampoo looked around and saw her. A muscular woman. She was wearing a straw hat, sunglasses, silver-white dress that matched her hair, in one hand a bowl of ice cream and next to her a tall, thick walking stick that could support her muscular frame. She waved a little wave at Shampoo as the boy rushed to attack Ranma once more.

He pulled out a bandana and wielded it like a sword. Shampoo rushed to stop him as Akane, still holding Ranma, ducked the bladed cloth. Her long hair hovered for a moment, just long enough for it to be lobbed off. The freed hair scattered in the wind.

"You bastard!" Akane roared, taking one arm away from Ranma and launching up, her palm slamming into the boy's face. He flew back and Shampoo moved before him, jumping up and spiking the boy into the ground. He groaned and was having a hard time getting up.

Clapping was heard. Shampoo looked back to the mysterious woman..

"Why are you here?" Shampoo demanded as the shorter woman.

"Most impressive boy. You did well," she said. He smiled and collapsed. The woman looked to the angry and crying Akane.

"You said . . . You said . . . ." Akane kept whispering as tears flowed.

"Akane. Akane. You still look good, alright? This short hair still looks good on you," Ranma said. Akane nodded. Ranma turned and felt the shock at seeing the old woman. "You here to take Shampoo back?" he asked defensively.

"Wouldn't dream of such a thing. No. I'm here helping that boy exact revenge on you," Cologne said.

"And what he to you?" Shampoo asked.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: A Week Later

choices: Ranma, Akane and Shampoo return home to get ready for the fight
Cologne and Ryoga take care of their errands.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
"He's my new slave. The bullheaded fool attacked because of a perceived slight, so I put him in his place and claimed him as mine." Cologne explained in Chinese to her concerned great granddaughter. She spoke in their native language to better explain to Shampoo, and keep the people around them from misunderstanding the situation.

"But what does this boy have against Ranma?" Shampoo asked intently. Cologne chuckled at her granddaughter and shook her head.

"It would seem this boy has a terrible habit of swearing vengeance against others. It would seem that he and Ranma have a bit of history together, and it started over a small bread feud that would have ended with a duel. After hearing the boy's story, and sorting out the truth from the exaggeration, I concluded that they were to fight in a lot behind Ryoga's house, but it took the boy four days to get to the agreed meeting place. It would seem he has a seriously bad sense of direction. He chased Ranma all the way to China, got into a little bit of trouble, and eventually ran into me."

"If he really is as vengeful as you say, why are you so comfortable keeping him with you? Why are you helping him get revenge on my master?" While she was no longer technically part of the tribe, she still worried about them, especially when it was someone as prominent in her life as Cologne had been.

Once more, Cologne laughed, a great big guffaw that boomed in their ears. It was a short, but boisterous bout of laughter that soon died down.

"Do not worry, Shampoo. I have this boy well trained as a slave. He wouldn't hurt me, he doesn't have it in him to do so. As to why I am helping him, I just wanted to make sure my great granddaughter was okay, and to assure that her master could take good care of her. It also seemed like more fun than staying in the village."

Ranma and Akane simply watched as the two exchanged words in Chinese. Ranma could understand some of the conversation, having been learning from Shampoo over their time together. Akane, on the other hand, was completely lost. None of what was said made any sense to her other than the names. After the two stopped speaking, Shampoo explained the situation to her friend and her master.

"This is Cologne, matriarch of tribe Shampoo is from," Shampoo said in Japanese, She is Shampoo's great grandmother. She here to help boy with fight against Ranma. Says she want to make sure Ranma is strong and good fighter. Boy is Ryoga, he is great grandmother's servant and he want to fight Ranma."

After hearing the explanation, Ranma couldn't help but feel that he knew the boy. Thinking back to before what he considered the most important day of his life so far, Ranma recalled his time at an all boys school, and a boy he beat out for bread every day at lunch.

"Ryoga? Ryoga Hibiki? Is that you Ryoga? Man what happened to you? I haven't seen you since before I left for China. How are you doing man?"

Ranma's questions angered the already furious boy even more. A deep, rolling growl built in his throat as he exploded at his much hated rival.

"HOW AM I DOING?! I AM HERE TO TAKE MY VENGEANCE ON YOU, RANMA SAOTOME!!! AFTER YOU RAN OUT ON OUR FIGHT, I FOLLOWED YOU ALL THROUGH CHINA! BECAUSE OF YOU I HAVE SEEN TRUE HELL!!!"

"What do you mean I ran out. I waited for three days, Ryoga. At am abandoned lot behind your house!"

"Yes, but on the fourth day I arrived and you were gone! So I tracked you down through every location you had been to. Now, because of you, I am with this old amazon!"

It took Ranma a while to process the information, before it dawned on him on what he had just heard meant.

"You followed us everywhere we went? Ryoga, did you go to Jusenkyo?" the pig-tailed boy asked.

"SHUT UP AND DIE!!!" The fanged boy screamed, and swung down his umbrella, destroying a nearby fountain as Ranma dodged.

The water blasted out like a geyser, splashing Ranma. Ryoga managed to duck behind his umbrella in time to keep from getting wet. As the water subsided, where Ranma had stood there was now a short, bust red-head with the same hairstyle.

"Well Ryoga, I guess you know now. Now you see the form I have been cursed with."

"You call that form a curse?" Ryoga laughed at him, "You think turning into a cute girl can be considered a curse Ranma?! YOU KNOW NOTHING OF WHAT A TRUE CURSE IS?!"

Ryoga jumped once more at the boy, only for a hand to catch his leg in an iron grip, causing the boy to fall flat on his face.

"Now, now Ryoga. We were only here to introduce ourselves to these people, and a public park is not the proper place for a duel. The polite thing to do is to set a challenge time and location with them, and to fight somewhere no one will care if we damage it at all. Anyway, we have more pressing matters to attend to, such as securing lodgings, and a few more things before we can continue this fight."

Throwing the struggling boy over her shoulder like he was a child throwing a tantrum, she said her goodbyes and left the three to continue their day.
