choices: Follow Ranma, Shampoo, and Akane.
Back to Ryoga and Cologne.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Cologne had walked about five blocks before Ryoga finally settled down. "Good. I'm glad I didn't need to discipline you," Cologne said.

"I want his head on a plate," Ryoga grumbled from the shoulder.

"I don't," Cologne said with an icy tone. "My child cannot return if her master is killed." She pulled Ryoga off her shoulder and glared at him. "Do I make myself clear?" Ryoga nodded.

"Yes Master," Ryoga said. Cologne smiled.

"Well, at least the training I put you through paid off or you would have been taken out by Shampoo's attack. You defended well against that. You . . . deserve a reward," Cologne said. Ryoga smiled.

"A night off?"

"Not that much of a reward," Cologne said as they came to a vacant shop. Cologne opened the door and saw a man in a business suit. "Ah Takagi-san."

"Cologne-sama," the man said before bowing. "Good to see you again. I received your letter and hope this place serves your purposes."

"It is up to the local health standards?" Cologne asked. The man nodded and glanced at the silent Ryoga.

"If I may, is he an heir, ally, or slave?" Takagi asked.

"Slave," Cologne said. Takagi looked at him as Cologne looked about.

"Don't worry boy. Cologne is a good Master. You might one day earn your life back," Takagi said.

"You . . . You were taken as well?" Ryoga asked. Takagi nodded.

"Yes. In a foolish action. I did earn my life back but have remained close to the lovely ladies," Takagi said.

"You have out done yourself," Cologne said with pride. "This place is perfect."

"Then I will finalize the purchase and and other forms," Takagi said. "Do you have need of more visas for others?"

"I might have another come to help work. I will contact you ahead of time," Cologne said. Takagi nodded. He picked up his briefcase and left some papers.

"Just sign here, here, and here," he said. Cologne did as asked. The man smiled and left promptly.

"Now, Ryoga, let's get cooking," Cologne said.

---------

"Seriously Ranma, you have rotten luck," Akane said as Shampoo carried her.

After getting through the fight unscathed, Ranma took a bad step and twisted her ankle. They were headed to Tofu's clinic for him to fix it up.

As they entered the little place, both Shampoo and Akane had to bend over.

"Ah, what's the trouble?" came the friendly voice of Tofu. He put a piece of paper in his coat pocket.

"Twisted my ankle," Ranma said.

"Yes. That could be troublesome. I'll see you in exam one. Ladies, for the sake of space, would you please wait out here?" Akane and Shampoo looked at each other and nodded.

Helping the hobbling Ranma into the exam room, Ranma hopped onto the table. Tofu took her shoe off and touched the ankle. "How bad doc?" Ranma asked.

"Just fine. Hold your breath. There could be some discomfort," Tofu said. Ranma nodded. A quick action by the doctor, a spike of pain causing Ranma to jerk her leg and knocking the good doctor back, followed by her ankle feeling fine.

"Damn. That's good," Ranma said with approval. She noticed some paper had slipped out of the doctor's pocket when he was kicked. Hopping down, she reached for it, unaware of the panic the Doctor now felt. Ranma picked the paper and realized it was a magazine clipping. A pretty woman in a black dress that seemed familiar. Getting to hte head, Rama saw Kasumi's beautiful smile.

Before she could look more, the paper was snatched back. "I think I won't charge you this time Ranma," Tofu said. Ranma nodded and walked back. she considered what she just learned.

Now, Ranma liked Kasumi. She was kind and generous, but did he like her more than a close friend? What should he do with this development? No one seemed to know. At least, Akane never made mention of it to him before. Kasumi certainly didn't realize or she just didn't see him that way. Nabiki might know but he would rather not open that can of worms again.

Of course, with Shampoo at his command, he could ask her to investigate and remain silent on it.

So focused on his thoughts, he bumped into Shampoo's leg. "You better Ranma?" Shampoo asked.

"Yeah. so, what should I expect from Ryoga? Any techniques the old crone might have taught him?" Ranma asked. Shampoo considered, since her great-grandmother did have a glow about her, there were techniques she taught him in bed but that wasn't what Ranma meant.

"Endurance training," Shampoo said. "Makes the body tougher to withstand Amazon punches."

"How to overcome that?" Ranma muttered.

"You could use his curse against him," Akane suggested. "He seemed keen to avoid being splashed. Maybe his curse isn't as strong as your curses."

"Would that be allowed in the challenge?" Ranma asked Shampoo.

"Depends on limits of challenge," Shampoo said.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Starting Up

choices: He performed 100 great deeds in his master's name
Every night for ten years, he served my sexual needs
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Cologne and Ryoga were standing in a dining area that would soon be filled with hungry customers and the smell of food. Takagi had done a wonderful job with the place, furnishing it with tables and chairs to Cologne's liking. The seating arrangement was perfectly laid out to allow an intimate experience for customers, and enough room for servers to move around the room without disturbing their patrons.

Ryoga could not believe that that man had managed all of this in such a short amount of time. They had only been in town for three days, and already he had gotten most of the preparations for the grand opening done.

"Takagi really was a great servant in his day. He knew just how to get things done, quick and neatly without to much trouble. Maybe someday you will become just as good. For now though, I need you to wait out back. Our first delivery of meat should be coming in soon, and I need you to move it to the kitchen's meat locker so it doesn't spoil."

Following her instructions, and a carefully detailed map of the place, Ryoga wasn't allowed to leave the premises without Cologne as an escort, he found the loading dock behind the building and waited for the truck to arrive. While waiting, he thought on what Takagi had said earlier about Cologne freeing him from his enslavement, and made it a point to ask how that was accomplished.

The delivery arrived promptly at the scheduled time, the matriarch made sure to get the company that was the most punctual, and after signing the delivery sheet, Ranma's enslaved rival began to unload.

The driver watched as Ryoga picked up the meat, not by the package, but by the pallet. He lifted hundreds of pounds of meat overhead, and walked it into the restaurant. The strength and endurance training from Cologne had really paid off, and in less then twenty minutes, the truck was empty.

"Thank you for your patronage, sir!" the driver called before he sealed the back door on his truck and sped away. Ryoga locked the rear door, and went to report back to Cologne. The matriarch herself was busy checking to make sure the kitchen was fully stocked and they had every plate, bowl, and utensil they needed.

"I just finished unloading the meat, master," he stated, standing at attention and awaited her response.

"Very good, boy. I don't have anymore need of you today. Go bath and get some sleep, we have a big tomorrow. It is our grand opening after all."

Rather than doing as she suggested, Ryoga stayed at attention, one question burning in his mind that needed to be answered.

"Why are you still here, boy? I said I have no more need of your service right now. Go to bed."

"I will master, but I want to ask you a question first," Ryoga insisted.

"Very well. I shall humor you this once. Ask your question Ryoga."

"Well, Takagi said that he was a former slave of yours. I was wondering, what exactly did he do to earn his freedom?"

"Hm-hm" Cologne chuckled, "I should have expected this question from you. Well, if you really want to know, I shall tell you."
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Back to Ryoga and Cologne.

choices: Follow the events at the dojo.
Follow Ryoga and Cologne or skip to morning.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
"Every night for ten years, he served my sexual needs," Cologne said. "Well, not every night. I had some nights when I had other business to handle. But ten years of good service."

"Does that mean I am on my way?" Ranma asked. Cologne shook her head.

"I said 'good'. You have been adequate. You need to work harder. If Ranma has kept up what he did to Shampoo their first time, then he has beaten you there as well," Cologne said. Ryoga growled. "I take it you want to prove me wrong?"

"I do, Master," Ryoga said.

"The bathe first. I'll be up soon," Cologne said. Ryoga nodded and turned, stopping to look at the map, and then continuing.

----

Ranma was thankful the good Doctor gave him a glass of hot water before leaving. They entered the house and found Kasumi sweeping up.

"Oh. Akane, your hair!" Kasumi said in a shocked tone. "What happened?"

"A crazy friend of Ranma's attacked us and my hair got in the way," Akane said.

"Let me fix that up," Kasumi said.

"Shampoo, I want to work in the dojo to talk more about Cologne's plot," Ranma said. Shampoo nodded and they went through the house.

Ranma sat on the weight beench as Shampoo sat on the floor. "Ryoga, he's like you, isn't he?" Ranma asked for confirmation. Shampoo nodded.

"Great-grandmother meet him night we were first together," Shampoo said. Ranma sighed.

"So not only is he a slave to Cologne, he is pissed at me for everything wrong in his life. And the old battle ox is training him personally," Ranma said. Shampoo nodded. "Akane is right. I might have to use the curse against him. I just wish I knew what it was."

"Shampoo can train you stronger Master. Make you resistant to strikes," Shampoo said. Ranma nodded.

"That would be useful. With you and Akane working me, it should be easy," Ranma said. "Shampoo, is there anyway I could free Ryoga?"

"Defeat his master in duel. Claim his master and all the master's slaves as your own," Shampoo said.

"Beat the old hag?" Ranma chuckled nervously. "She isn't as strong as you, is she?"

"Shampoo have greater basic strength but she has greater power. She not remain highest elder for nothing," Shampoo said.

------

"So, this Ryoga lobbed off some of your hair. Would you believe someone actually bet your next haircut would come from some crazy person close to Ranma?" Nabiki asked as Kasumi was fixing up the hair.

"Shut up," Akane growled.

"So, this Cologne was the one giving orders to Ryoga?" Soun asked. Genma's face was pale. "Saotome, what can you say about her? Is she a dangerous person?"

"She is a woman of her word but she is still a dangerous force. Her eyes . . . they reminded me of . . ." Genma's voice died down to a whisper. "Bras and panties." A flash of lightning came over the dojo as a crack of thunder shook the house. Soun glared at Genma for his stupidity.

"That wasn't ominous at all. What are you two invoking?" Nabiki asked.

"Nothing Nabiki. Please leave it," Soun said. The middle daughter was about to press the matter when she looked at his form and relented. He was very serious about this. That was a rare thing. He'd given up direct orders for a while. He treated them with great respect and thanks to that and their love for him, they generally followed through on his requests.

Nabiki nodded. "Okay daddy," Nabiki said. The fathers moved away from the daughters, their voices still low.

"Now, Akane, do you know what will happen with this challenge?" Kasumi asked.

"No. Nothing has been set yet," Akane said. "I don't know what it might cost Ranma if he loses."

"You don't think we might lose Ranma, do you?" Kasumi asked in a hushed voice. all three girls went silent for a moment.

"I don't want that to happen," Akane said.

"Neither do I," Kasumi said.

"Me either," Nabiki thought but did not speak. No school tomorrow. Perhaps she could look into Cologne and Ryoga. Find anything that will help Ranma win.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: 10 Years A Slave

choices: Follow the two couples nights
Opening day at the newly named Nekohanten
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Ranma listened intently to Shampoo as she explained what could be done to train him for his next fight with Ryoga. There were many ways to go about it, but the amazon thought that the simplest way was best, and the simplest way was to turn everything Ranma did with her into training for his endurance, and speed. She knew that Ranma's style focused more on adaptability and quick, precise strikes, which would work on just about any other opponent he would face. Ryoga, however, had undergone some major training for his strength and endurance, so that meant Ranma needed to be fast enough to dodge, and resilient enough to do it over a long period of time. The only way to beat an opponent like the lost boy was to whittle him down a little at a time.

"Shampoo thinks master needs to up his training with her. When we together, we must always train. Walking to school, Ranma must carry Shampoo to strengthen leg muscles. While eating, he must find hole in Shampoo's guard to get food. Even sex must become endurance training. Must go for hours without rest. So we start now, since it time for weekly night session."

Ranma swallowed a lump of apprehension. Though he was certain Shampoo would do nothing to seriously hurt him, his legs would go numb after their regular sexual encounters, and now she wanted him to go longer and harder than ever. He could tell that this night was going to be a long one.

Meanwhile, the Tendo girls were busy talking about what was to come. Their reactions were very different.

"I should make sure that our first aid kit is fully stocked so I can help if either of them is hurt. I should probably prepare a meal as well. We don't want Ranma fighting on an empty stomach." was Kasumi's response.

Nabiki was busy planning for the fight as well. She would have to make sure that her little betting ring was ready to move at a moments notice. When this fight took place, she stood to make a ton of cash no matter who won. The thought of all that money was almost enough to make her swoon, but she remained composed and silently plotted just how to promote the fight.

Akane was more interested in the actual fight than her two sisters. Being the only martial artist of the three sisters, she was excited to see how a match between two on Ranma and Ryoga's level would play out. Seeing their brief exchange earlier that day was humbling, as there were some moves she couldn't even follow as the two traded blows. The upcoming battle would be a major learning experience for her, and teach her just how far apart they were in actual skill.

The two fathers just sat and drank their sake, trying to drown the memories of their time with the dreaded master that had reemerged earlier.

Meanwhile, at the soon to be open Chinese restaurant, Ryoga stood in nothing but a pair of boxer shorts beside a king sized bed with a reinforced steel frame. Before him stood the amazonian matriarch, dressed in a black silk negligee. She sauntered over to him, and swept him into her muscular arms. Placing him on the bed, she whispered.

"This is the first night of ten fun filled years."
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Planning for the next battle

choices: Follow Ranma's training or what Kasumi thinks of to help.
Nabiki gets her water and "accidentially" spills it.  Does Ryoga get wet?
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Ryoga bowed to the customers at the table. A nice young pair of girls named Yuka and Sayuri. Table 7. He wrote down their order and went to the drop station. Ryoga moved a bit odd this morning as he truly went all out on his master, and she, in turn, rode him hard. His hips were a bit sensitive but from the humming in the kitchen, he knew he had done more than adequate with her. Looking about, Table 6 just finished and he moved to clear the table.

A 500 yen note lay on the table and Ryoga smiled. He wasn't getting paid. As a slave, he wasn't a worker. But Cologne did say any gratuity given could be kept. He thanked her and then asked what gratuity was.

This was Ryoga's morning. A constant but slow flow of patrons in and out. Each table had a number on it so to help the lost boy.

Cologne was impressed with how quickly he was learning the system. As she prepped another plate, she wondered how Shampoo was doing this morning.

"Five's up boy!" Cologne called and hitting the bell. Ryoga came back and picked up the order.

-----

Akane and her sisters stared at Ranma. He was barely awake and had bags under his eyes.

"I know they went a while last night but damn," Nabiki muttered.

"Ranma, are you alright?" she asked.

"Great," he yawned as Kasumi and Shampoo brought out breakfast. Ranma had a slightly larger than normal amount on his plate. Raising his sticks, he reached down went for some vegetables but quick as a finch, Shampoo snatched it up.

"Hey!" Akane yelled. "What's the deal Shampoo?!"

"Master agreed to me training him. He need to build up endurance and speed. So we train all the time now. Work endurance at night. Speed now. Endurance in short time." Akane shook her head.

"He won't do you any good if he doesn't have anything in his stomach," Akane replied.

"Ranma want this. Right?" Ranma blinked a few times before nodding.

"This is wrong," Akane said.

"Only way for Ranma to win," Shampoo said. "Must get stronger because Ryoga not going to get weaker or stay still."

"Shampoo, what if he is allowed breakfast but then you work him at the other meals?" Kasumi asked.

"Unless you don't want him to win," Nabiki said. "You push him so hard he can't fight when the day comes and even a preschooler could knock him over."

"Shampoo want him to win," she growled.

"Then use your brains and think," Nabiki said coldly. "Even I wouldn't push Ranma this far when he was in my debt. He's no good if he can't work." Shampoo was about to say something when Ranma fell forward into his morning rice and vegetables and started snoring.

"Perhaps truth to your words," Shampoo said. Kasumi poured a cup of tea and passed it to Shampoo. She put it before Ranma and the scent woke him. Taking the caffeinated drink, he downed it and looked at the food with hungry eyes. "Go on. Shampoo no take food now." He smiled and filled his empty belly.

Nabiki smiled a satisfied smirk and rose from her seat. "I have business to do. I'll see you this evening," Nabiki said before leaving.

A few minutes later, and Ranma was smiling as well. "Thanks," Ranma said.

"Don't thank me. Tendo sisters convince Shampoo she push you too hard . . like how Ryoga would be pushed," Shampoo said. Ranma nodded and looked at Akane.

"Akane, I would like your help with my training," Ranma said.

"I'll do most anything," Akane said.

"I just want to practice dodging. And I have a crazy idea," Ranma said.

-----

Standing in the training area, Akane shook her head. "This might be too crazy," Akane said.

"Ranma say he wants this with no pressure from Shampoo," the slave said. She lifted up an engine block from an old car. It weighed about as much as a softball to a normal-sized girl. She threw it at Ranma and the man dodged before Shampoo threw another piece of scrap at him.

Left. Right. Jump. Duck. Roght. Right. Ranma moved with amazing fluidity around the speeding pieces of scrap knowing one hit could seriously harm him

After a minute, Akane joined in so Shampoo could collect more scrap.

This went on for ten minutes.

------

Nabiki walked into the Nekohanten with a smile. She wore tight shorts and a tanktop that revealed more skin than it would normally, but then again, it was meant for Kasumi's size. She took a seat and watched as the yellow bandana boy came to her. She pressed her breasts up and saw him blush.

"Miss, what would you like?" he asked after a minute.

"Oh, just a tall glass of cold water. I need a cool down," she said with a seductive smile. When the one is used to a master who only smiled when she is hungry or laughs at his failures, such a kind act flustered Ryoga greatly.

"Right. Right away," Ryoga said before setting off.

-------

Ranma winced as he caught the engine block. After finishing dodging, they used the heavy metal cube as a medicine ball, but not as soft. Catching it at his abs would help build up his endurance another way.

"Good. Keep it up," Shampoo said as Ranma threw the block back.

"What will you do next Ranma?" Akane asked as she watched with both excitement and fear.

"Try- br-" The block came in a bit faster but he caught it. Though he was knocked back a bit. "bruising your legs with my punches and kicks." He threw the block and Shampoo caught it effortlessly. "If you don't mind."

"Not at all," Akane said before Shampoo threw it again.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Square Legs and Filling Bellies

choices: The massage leads to something much more sensual between the two
The day of the fight
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
It was time for Ranma to build up his endurance and pain tolerance, and the training would be much different from the earlier ones. This time both Akane and Shampoo were going to help him. It was simple they would through punches at random intervals while he would hit their fully flexed muscles to condition his hands and reflexes. There was no need to worry about hurting either of them, because, when tthey flexed as hard as they could, their muscles were more durable than a two foot thick steel door.

Ranma tried to focus on the exercise, but seeing two of the biggest, most muscular girls he had ever met flexing their muscles as big as they could get was getting to him. More than one time he had to drop to the ground just to avoid being beaned by one of their meaty fists. It was incredibly dangerous, because he had, a few times, goosed Akane on the breast, each time earning him a particularly vicious punch. It was still worth it to see two world class muscle ladies posing for him.

As his fists impacted their tight, steely abs, their inner strength would cause some damage to it. Every blow caused a new bruise to swell up, until finally, at the end of the training, his hands looked like they had been caught under a falling anvil. He had been trained to the point of exhaustion, and now, cradled in Shampoo's arms, he was being carried home.

"Shampoo think that Ranma done for day," the burly Chinese girl commented. Ranma hung exhausted in her hands, no heavier than a doll to her. It was an enjoyable experience for both of them. The close physical contact with Shampoo's well developed arms and chest was intoxicating, and brought him back to the night before when there was nor buffer between their naked flesh.

When they arrived home, Kasumi was waiting on the porch, a breezy sundress stretched over her muscular form. At her side was a fully stocked and first aid kit, opened and ready to clean, disinfect and bandage her family's guest. Ranma was set down at her feet and the beautiful caregiver got to work.

"What happened to your hands, Ranma?" she asked, hoping that the injury wasn't too severe.

"Oh, they just slammed into Akane and Shampoo's muscles while they were flexing."

"Oh my! That was very foolish, Ranma. Akane is able to snap heavy chains when she flexes her arms. Trying to hit anything like that would only hurt you," Kasumi reprimanded.

"Well, that was kind of the point of the whole thing. I was building my endurance and dodging ability by throwing punches until my arms gave out while dodging their attacks. It may have hurt, but it was a necessary step in my training," was Ranma's explanation.

"Well, I hope it will pay off for you, because we finally received a letter from Ryoga. He said that the challenge would take place one week from now at the same construction site Akane and Shampoo fought in a couple of weeks ago."

Kasumi, while still unsure about the whole thing, accepted the excuse and told Shampoo and Akane to head inside while she fixed Ranma up. After she cleaned and bandaged the tender hands, the eldest Tendo daughter palmed Ranma's shoulder and made him an offer.

"I can see that you are very tired, Ranma. Would you like me to give you a little massage. I am certain that will help you make a speedy recovery so you can get back to training."

Ranma smiled, and nodded his head rapidly. A massage sounded like just the thing to get him up and ready. When Kasumi's strong hands and thick fingers began to kneed into his sore muscles, the pig-tailed boy let out a satisfied sigh as he relaxed his body and enjoyed the experience.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Punching amazonian abs is a stupid thing to do

choices: Ranma hita Ryoga and activates his curse.
Ryog dodges or blocks the balloons.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Ranma was happy. It wasn't just the confidence of some hard days of training. He had gotten closer to both Kasumi and Akane. Akane, Shampoo, and he would train daily over the week, rushing to school, working on his dodging skills and enduring, playing keep away with his books, and using them as punching bags.

By night, Kasumi would rub him down in ways Shampoo didn't know how to. It was after the second night of hearing his passionate moans did Shampoo sit in on the massage and watched the shortest sister pleasure her Master.

Nabiki. Her help was negligible. She gave no help but gave no hindrance. She watched from a distance with cool eyes. Her camera ready to record all.

The three sisters and Shampoo joined him on the field and he looked at Ryoga and his Master. Ryoga picked this training area for their fight. He might come to regret that. Walking up to meet Ryoga with Shampoo next to him. Cologne was close behind her slave.

"Yes?" Cologne asked.

"Just wanted to make sure, we can use anything in this area against each other, but the observers can't attack us," Ranma said Ryoga nodded.

"Suits me," Ryoga said. Cologne nodded.

"Make me proud boy," Cologne said with a smile. She glanced at Nabiki and then back. Ranma backed away and took his stance. Ryoga took his. His umbrella folded up and ready to spear Ranma.

"When I ring the bell, please start," Kasumi said. She lifted a bell and rang it once.

Before the sound of the first ring ended, both men rushed at each other. Ryoga stabbed and threw punches. Ranma ducked and dodged each attack. He moved like a snake over hot sand as the tiger-like Ryoga swiped powerful blows at Ranma.

Ranma got in front of a car and dodged the umbrella, pausing only a second to watch the water-shielding instrument break through the metal door and rip the door off the hinges. Gulping, he took the chance to punch Ryoga in the face.

Ryoga laughed. "Gotta do better than that!" he yelled. Ranma smiled as well. As hard headed as Ryoga was, he was nothing to Akane and Shampoo's abs. Jumping back, he watched as Ryoga came at him hard once more.

----

Nabiki did her best to keep both in view of the camera. Her mind was focused on other things.

A week ago, she spilled the water on Ryoga and saw his cursed form. Happy she learned this key information, she moved to leave, with a 100 yen gratuity. Then Cologne moved up behind her and escorted her to the back room.

She was happy with Nabiki's ingenuity and clever tactic but frowned on her lack of escape plan.

So she offered Nabiki a deal to keep quiet on the matter. To not reveal Ryoga's secret and Cologne would pay her handsomely. Not only would she get a financial gain, Cologne would give her something the Tendo sisters were actually in need of.

If she refused the deal, Cologne would consider her an attacker on her servant. She would be attacked and by the laws of the Amazons, become Cologne's slave.

Nabiki hated the position her lack of planing left her in and chose to keep quiet.

----

Ranma dodged the next slew of attacks, looking for some sign of fatigue. There was none. He needed a means of breaking Ryoga's concentration.

Time for the first secret weapon. Jumping to the side, he rolled and picked up a bag of water balloons. The water was still cold and he threw them at Ryoga.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Ground Rules

choices: Ranma wins, and the others take him home to celebrate
Ryoga wins, and rubs it in Ranma's face
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
It was a tactic that Ryoga had expected to encounter in some variation during the fight, and his master had prepared him well for it. Using the random debris littering the area, Ryoga ducked and weaved through the landscape, using his umbrella to cover himself when he was in the open, and making sure that his rival never got a clear shot at him. The splash of the water balloons that landed near him might as well have been as loud as artillery fire. Ryoga put his full concentration into keeping dry, and all his senses were firing like wild.

It was honestly not a method that Ranma liked to use, but it was an advantage, and he had it drilled in his head that no advantage should be left unused. He had not expected Ryoga to be so good at dodging the water, and was somewhat glad that he had improved at least in that area since the last time they fought. Luckily, it took little to no effort to throw his wet ballistics towards their intended target, if anything it would help him by wearing Ryoga down some before they really started their exchange of blows.

The audience watched and cheered as the two combatants fought. The Tendo girls and Shampoo shouted their support to Ranma, and Cologne doing the same for her enslaved boy. The old matriarch was correct, this was as entertaining as she thought it would be. The two were already rivals, and both of them were pushing the other's limits.

The Saotome boy, seeing that none of his balloons were hitting their target, put the rest away for later, and moved in close. Using one more balloon, he managed to get Ryoga to put his guard up front, leaving his back exposed and his vision blocked by the umbrella he used to shield himself. Ranma slipped behind the bandana wearing boy, and landed four blows to his opponents exposed kidneys.

The impact of Ranma's fists on his back caused the eternally lost boy to flinch. After the first two punches, he managed to tighten his back muscles so they would absorb some of the force. Swinging his umbrella around, he forced Ranma to back away from him, and gained a small break.

Thinking back on the last week, Ranma was happy with how hard he pushed himself to reach his current level. With Akane and Shampoo's help, he had risen to a whole new level of skill that he didn't have before. Now it was just a matter of applying it to this battle. Though he hated to admit it, Ryoga's strength was greater than his, and he was built closer to an amazon than Ranma himself. However, because Ranma was more focused on speed and precision in his style, it was a perfect counter to the powerhouse style of his adversary. He just needed to find a decent opening, and he could end this thing with a few quick blows.

"I want you to find out anything that I can use to get rid of that tramp! DO IT NOW! Don't come back until you have something!" the Kuno girl screamed into her servants ears.

When she finished, her arm wound back and threw Sasuke out of the house, and into the street outside.

*****

Genma was panicking, his heart raced and his breathing was erratic. If he had just seen whom he thought he had seen, things were about to get much more complicated. He couldn't tell from this distance, but from where he was, that woman across the river was the spitting image of his wife. If she truly was Nodoka, he couldn't let her see him, but he had to know for sure. He would need a closer look.

Ranma's pants were down as Shampoo continued touching him. "Master need this to make mind clear," Shampoo said before continuing. Ranma released a load into his slave's hand and panted softly.

"Thanks," Ranma said. Shampoo nodded.

"Now, there could be way to get around this," Shampoo said. "In my village, while we honor female strength, strong males just as loved. If Tendos and Ukyo become Amazons, and you wed Shampoo, all could claim you as husband and share you. Five of us take you on different nights."

"So, not so different from now except I would be the husband of all of you legally," Ranma said.

"Better option than they become Amazons and give kiss of obedience," Shampoo said. "Then not really marriage."

"That's true," Ranma said.

Genma raced down the street as he followed the mysterious figure. She always had her back to him and the crowded streets was making it harder.

"Who is she?" Genma muttered. With his focus on her, he miss stepped off a curb and lost track of her. "No!" He pushed ahead,. He looked about, trying to see her once more.

--------

Ukyo was breathing heavily as she tossed the engine to Akane. The massive girl caught it and barely looking at Nabiki.

"Did . . . Did you guys . . .do this often?" Ukyo asked.

"Yeah. Quite a few times in the week," Nabiki said, She tossed the engine to Kasumi.

"Are you ready Ukyo-chan?" Kasumi asked. Ukyo nodded and the engine came as a light loft to her. Ukyo caught it and smiled. Taking a deep breath, she tossed it back to Kasumi.

"Ukyo, you're looking tired. Do you want to continue?" Akane asked. Ukyo looked at these mammoth women. They were barely sweating.

"No. No. I can go on," Ukyo said.

-----

Genma caught a glimpse of her once more. She went down an alley. Though he didn't like going to such a narrow way, as he couldn't hide, he couldn't risk losing sight of her. Turning down the alleyway, he saw nothing.

Was it all in his head?

Genma darted behind trash cans and piles of boxes while he followed the woman's path down the alley. He would not allow himself to be discovered by the mystery woman, for if it was his wife, he was surely doomed.

The disquieting silence put the fat martial artist on edge. If he had any hair, it would certainly be standing up. As far as he could tell, there was no one aside from himself in the alleyway, when just a minute ago, he had seen someone walk into it.

Then he felt cold steel touch his throat, and heard a voice just as sharp greet him.

"Hello, husband. How are you? May I talk to you for a second?"

Why wasn't there any cold water around when he needed it?

*****

Ukyo was hard pressed to think of a time when she felt anywhere near as tired as she was now. Her arms hung like cooked noodles, with no hint of changing anytime soon. The four of them were heading home, the chef was being carried by Kasumi, unable to really move after they finished the exercises. She really enjoyed being able to feel the muscles of her idol personally

*****

Ranma and his slave had put there conversation on hold for the moment, having heard someone come in from outside. The pigtailed boy pulled his pants back into their proper place, while Shampoo helped him to his feet. They went to meet whoever had entered the house.

Kasumi walked in and continued to hold Ukyo. "Hey you two," Nabiki said. "You missed the workout."

"Had some things on my mind," Ranma said.

"So, the bath is open?" Kasumi asked.

"What? Bath?" Ukyo asked.

"Yes. You look like you need one," Kasumi said. "Would you mind if I joined you?" Ukyo's heart raced.

"Wh-what?" the tired girl asked.

"I could use a back scrubbing," Kasumi said. "I would be honored if you helped." Ukyo smiled.

"Of course," Ukyo said. This day could only get better if Rama joined in. But the young man was walking away with Shampoo and Akane and Nabiki.

------

"Genma, if you're here, my child is here?" Nodoka asked coolly. Genma nodded as the blade rubbed against his neck,

"Yes. He is," Genma said.

"Good. I've been contacted by Katsuhito-san," Nodoka said. "He would like me to bring my child to his temple." Genma nodded. He recalled meeting Nodoka's adopted father when he asked for her hand in marriage. He thought he knew what it meant to be scary and intimidated by Master Happosai, but that man terrified the heavyset Saotome. With just a glance and cold smile Genma knew this man could kill him in an instant and not care one bit afterwards.

"Katsuhito-san is doing well then?" Genma asked pleasantly. He knew there was trouble with Nodoka marrying into his family and she taking his last name, unlike that brown-nosing Nobuyuki.

"He is. And he wants to meet his other grandchild," Nodoka said. "So, where is Ranma at right now?"

"Oh. Wonderful. I think he is with . . . the Tendos. Yes likely at my friend Soun's place," Genma said.

"Take me there," Nodoka said. Genma knew that tone all too well. It wasn't a request. It was a demand punishable by severe pain.

"Of course dear," Genma said.

--------

Akane wanted to hug and kiss Ranma right now. As he explained his dilemma and his feelings, her heart felt like it was going to explode from her chest.

"So, you want us to become Amazons, so we can all share you?" Nabiki asked when it was all over, Ranma nodded.

"That's the only thing I can think of," Ranma said.

"And what will this mean to us? How will we be expected to act as Amazons?" Nabiki asked, looking at Shampoo.

"You must protect and defend the honor of the village and help defeat any troublemakers," Shampoo said.

Genma was forcibly marched forward by the steel blade in his wife's hand. He already knew that his goose was cooked, as it would only be a matter of time before the curses revealed themselves. They always did in these situations, at the worst possible opportunity. He could only hope that the number of women who wanted their son would dissuade her from following up on that contract.

A storm of emotions welled up inside Nodoka Saotome. Her anger at the husband who robbed her of nearly a decade of time with her son, warred against her joy at the imminent reunion with that son. While she would never follow through with that ridiculous contract Genma had drawn up, it was nice to see the man sweat at the thought of seppuku if he failed with making Ranma a true man.

"Why do you want to take Ranma to see that old man?" Genma asked his wife, unable to stand the silence any more.

"I want to show my father how Ranma turned out under your teaching. It is my hope that he will find him worthy to teach the family sword style to. I want Ranma to know about MY side of the family." Nodoka spoke in that voice of her's that meant she would not be taking any objections into consideration.

As they turned onto the block the Tendo dojo was on, Genma sweat so much that it was visible through his gi.

*****

Sasuke was perched outside the Tendo home, a pair of binoculars in one hand, and a listening device in another. Ranma was explaining to the girls what he thought was the right thing to do. This was bad. Very bad. If they went through with this, Kodachi would surely be angry, and he would be the target of that anger.

The ratty ninja had to report this to both his master and mistress right away.

*****

Ukyo stared in awe at the broad back and shoulders of her long time idol. She couldn't help but envy the perfect skin that Kasumi possessed. The two of them had already disrobed, and stood in the bathing area. At first, she just watched as the amazon goddess cleaned herself, as her hands caressed her supple skin and steely muscle. If she was completely honest with herself, Ukyo would admit that she felt some sexual attraction towards the amazing woman beside her. When Kasumi spoke, Ukyo almost jumped out of her skin.

"Ukyo. Could you wash my back now, please?"

The sound of the front bell rang. "That is probably father. We should talk to him about this before we do anything," Akane said softly.

"Wow. You're thinking ahead," Nabiki said with a smile. Ranma led the group to the entrance where a woman was holding his father at swordpoint. Ranma couldn't see the woman's face clearly and sighed.

"Okay, is Pops in debt to you?" Ranma guessed.

"Tell him," came a cold voice that stirred in Ranma's memories. He blinked as his father gulped in fear.

"Ranma, your mother is here to see you," Genma said. The sword vanished from his neck and he stumbled down. A beautiful woman with teary eyes looked at Ranma.

"M-Mom?" Ranma whispered. The woman gulped and nodded.

"Oh, how I've missed you," Nodoka said before breaking custom and proper behavior. She rushed in and hugged Ranma. After a moment, Ranma hugged her back.

"Mom . . ." Ranma said as he began to fear. What would she do if she learned of his curse?

"Mother-in-law," Shampoo slipped out. Nodoka opened her eyes and looked at the giant women.

"Ranma, are you married?" Nodoka asked.

"Um, not yet," Ranma said with a laugh. Nodoka didn't looked at him.

"Are you a cousin of the Tendos?" Nodoka asked.

"Shampoo is Ranma's servant," Shampoo said.

"And she isn't one of the family," Nabiki said.

"But you want to marry him," Nodoka said. Shampoo nodded. "Genma, do you approve of this?" Genma was halfway up the steps t the second floor when he turned and looked at his wife's back, her cool aura. This would not be good . . . for Shampoo. Genma remembered a similar feeling when Nodoka challenged a girl who flirted with him when they were engaged. She was able to regain full use of her arm in three weeks.

"I haven't found a reason to not approve it, save other good choices available," Genma said.

"And you think they are strong enough?" Nodoka said. "A man amongst men should have only a powerful woman or women at his side."

"Look at Shampoo's body. Shampoo strong, Mrs. Saotome," Shampoo said.

"I see nothing that can't be taken down. I'll show you too," Nodoka said. She turned about and walked out. Shampoo did nothing. She looked at Genma and then Ranma. "If you do not come, I will never agree to the marriage!" Shampoo quickly followed. Akane and Ranma were quick after her as Nabiki wrote Kasumi a note.

-----

Nodoka stood in the street as Shampoo came out. She flipped her sword so the blunt side would strike her enemy. "Shampoo doesn't want to hurt you," Shampoo warned.

"Child, if you can touch me, I would be impressed," Nodoka said. "Genma, drop your bandana. We will start when it hits the ground." Genma took the cloth from his head and held it out. Shampoo glanced at him as the cloth fell. When it hit the ground, She rushed at Nodoka but Nodoka vanished. She heard her feet hitting the pavement. As her instincts warned her, something struck her right hand fingers, breaking them. Shampoo held in her scream and shock, finally seeing Nodoka as she jumped up and slammed the blunt side of the sword into Shampoo's neck.

The mighty Amazon fell backwards, gasping for air. She felt a shiver of fear when the tip of the blade touched her temple. She looked upon Nodoka with fear.

"Weak." Nodoka said softly. She turned to Ranma. "Anyone care to challenge me?" Nabiki's mouth hung open in shock. Akane shivered with fear as Ranma just shook his head.

"Now boy, you know why I don't like to cross your mother," Genma said.

"Ranma, my father would like to meet you and train you, if you want," Nodoka said.

"I haven't

choices: Continue with Ukyo and Kasumi.
The group arrives at the shrine.  Has Kodachi or Kuno found out about the trip?
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
The offer he received from his mother gave Ranma paused. His father had told him little enough about his own family besides the art, and he knew next to nothing about his mother or her family. The very notion of seeing family he had never before met was exciting, and he could not pass up the opportunity.

"Of course I'd like to meet your family. I haven't seen you in years, mom. Anytime I can spend with you would be great. Especially if it's time I can spend away from some people in this town."

At Ranma's response, the stern look on Nodoka's face softened. A small smile graced her face, and any form of hostility was lost, and the mother pulled her beloved son into a big hug for the first time in almost a decade.

"Oh Ranma! You've made your mother so very happy!" she cried as she squeezed him in her arms.

"Put me down, mom," Ranma laughed, "I know you're happy to see me, but I won't be around much longer if you don't let me breath."

The Saotome matriarch placed her son back on his feet, embarrassed at her loss of composure. Fixing her kimono so that it was properly worn, she backed up and let her son regain his breath. Taking a few deep breaths, the pigtailed boy spoke again.

"The only problem is that I still have school."

Nodoka's smile fell at that news. She had hoped to bring him right to the shrine, but this put a damper on that plan. Fortunately, Akane managed to salvage her mood.

"We DO have a break coming up in a couple of weeks. Ranma will have a week off, and could visit then."

It was agreed that the Ranma would visit the shrine for that week. Nodoka had insisted that Genma stay behind, something about her father's distaste for the man, and so would Soun. If it hadn't been for the firm argument put up by her son, along with some insistence from the Tendo father, it would have just been Ranma and her. Reluctantly, Nodoka had allowed the Tendo girls and Shampoo to come with.

*****

Ukyo continued to run her hands along Kasumi's smooth back and shoulders, feeling the power held within each muscle as the slightest twitch pushed her finger up. It truly was a dream fulfilled, spending time in the bath, bonding with the girl who had turned her on to bodybuilding. Not to mention her reconciliation with her childhood crush. The muscular chef didn't think this day could get any better, nor did she want it to end.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: To Yokohama we shall go

1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
By word of mouth and carefully listening ears, word spread in Furinkan about the Tendos vacation spot.

It was the day of them leaving and Cologne was worried. It had been her hope and plan for Shampoo to wed Ranma, rejoin the village and possibly bring the Tendo sisters with her. Their size and how they grew to that size would be a great boon to the village. But then Nodoka Saotome came into the picture. A true warrior if Cologne ever knew one. More than one in the weeks since her arrival, she watched from a distance as Nodoka handed each Tendo girl their asses in a fight. Bruised bodies and the occasional broken finger became common to the mammoth women. Ukyo continued to train but she was barely a challenge to the mother of Ranma. And through it all, Nodoka never was hit once.

A warrior of such power and Cologne didn't try to challenge her because, for the first time in over a century, she doubted her capacity to defeat an outsider who was so much smaller than her. "Curse you Misaki," Cologne muttered out loud.

"Master, did you say Misaki?" Ryoga asked. He was smiling as he swept. He had built up a lot of stamina with the continual nightly workouts. "Is that where Ranma's other is going in Yokohama?"

"Yes Ryoga. Didn't you know that?" Cologne asked in a frustrated voice.

"Just the city but not the family," Ryoga said. "They have a nice shrine there." Cologne turned to her slave with narrow eyes.

"What did you say?" Cologne asked.

"The Misaki shrine is really nice. I ended up there after Ranma ran from our first fight. They let me spend the night," Ryoga said. Cologne considered her words and future actions. She would be taking traveling directions from the boy who could get lost going into the closet. But would it be worth the risk of losing Ranma and Shampoo?

---------

Ukyo was beside herself. In the past few weeks, not only did she go to school where her idol used to go, she went with Ranma on a few jobs to protect Kasumi! Now, after endearing herself to Nodoka, she was going with the family to see her family.

She put her luggage up top and looked down the car of the train as it roared up the country side. A blue haired woman with nice breasts and a strong looking body had a strained face as she sat next to a blonde woman with larger breasts and the expression of a ditz.

"Come on Kiyone, this is fun!" the blonde said.

"Fun! You landed us in the wrong part of the country! Now we have to rush to get to Tenchi's for that big party Grandfather was going to throw for some visiting family member," the blue haired Kiyone said.

Ukyo shrugged and moved on to where their seats would be. She didn't mention this to the others.

-------

On the highway a fancy and large car was driving as a miniature man was pushing on. Kodachi was smiling. She had been for weeks. When word spread to her about how Ranma's mother was defeating Kasumi and the rest of them made her a pleasant person. She didn't even try to further harm the Tendos or Shampoo. She let what she saw as karma.

Kuno was shocked the day when Shampoo came in so injured but was also shocked when he learned Ranma's mother had done it. After long before coming to the idea that Shampoo was a cousin of Ranma's who served him, he wanted to pursue her but she always ignored him.

Now, with Sasuke driving at the best speed, they both hoped to achieve their goals. If the head of Nodoka's family agreed, and Shampoo was a cousin of Ranma's, then perhaps they could get his permission and blessing to make Ranma and Shampoo to marry them.

It was a perfect plan.

----

A woman with long purple hair stood next to a short girl with long blue hair. The purple haired girl was furious as she held a sign with the name "Nodoka" on it. Ryoko had to have tricked her. By saying she would wait at the train stop for Tenchi's family, the bitch knew she would volunteer as well. And then Ryoko backs out, meaning she had to wait here with Sasami while that old hag was with her Tenchi! The train had stopped a few minutes ago and she was on the look out for the photo of Kastuhito-san's adopted daughter.

She saw her followed by a handsome young man, fit young lady, and four massive women.

"Oh dear sister, I think we will have to walk back to the Shrine. We can't fit all of them in a cab," Sasami said.

"Perhaps you are right," Ayeka growled in further frustration.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: A Few Weeks Pass By Like Nothing

choices: Introductions, the girls' muscles are explained fully, peaking Washu's interest
The other visitors in Yokohama
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Nodoka searched the crowed of people for the person her father said would be waiting to pick them up. After the crowd dispersed, a pair of girls could be seen holding a sign bearing Nodoka's name. The taller girl had purple hair, similar in color to Shampoo's, which was pulled into two long ponytails. The smaller girl's hair was teal in color, and worn in two long pigtails at the the sides of her head. Waving her group along, the Saotome mother walked over to her escorts.

"You wouldn't happen to be from the Masaki shrine, would you?" she asked the two. The smaller girl's eyes lit up when she addressed them.

"Yes. Are you Nodoka, Grandpa Kutsuhito's daughter?" the young girl asked the woman joyfully. Her youthful cheer and innocence was infectious, actually causing Nodoka to smile.

"Why, yes, that would be me. My name is Nodoka Saotome, and this," the auburn haired woman introduced, and pulled her son to her, "is my son Ranma. Could I have your name's please?" The cute girl obliged.

"My name is Sasami Masaki Jurai," she said, and then gestured to the older girl, "this is Ayeka, she's my older sister."

"It is so nice to meet you, ma'am," Ayeka said, and bowed respectfully, "I am Ayeka Masaki Jurai, and your father sent us here to escort you back home. I hope you found your trip pleasant"

"My, what polite girls you are. We all have our bags already, so why don't we get on our way. Lead on, if you would."

"Very good. Well then, if you would follow me. I hope you don't mind a walk, I don't believe that all of us would fit into a single cab."

The girls, and Ranma, followed his mother and the two girls they had just met out of the station and into town.

*****

The Kuno luxury vehicle pulled into the drive of a house they had purchased the week before. After hearing that the Tendo girls, Shampoo, and Ranma would be staying in the area for an extended period, Kodachi and Tatewaki had found a nice house at the edge of the town, and bought it from the original owner for more than it was worth.

It was a small price to pay to be near their soulmates.

*****

The group was ascending the steps to the shrine. Ayeka and Sasami led them, with Nodoka at their side. Akane and Shampoo were loaded up with the baggage. Ranma watched, a look of wonder on his face as both muscle girls carried all the bags with no effort.

Ayeka looked back at the two amazons, at their bulging biceps and powerful legs, and questions rose in her mind.

"Excuse me, Ms. Nodoka, but may I ask you a question?"

Looking to the well mannered girl beside her, the Saotome woman gave a chuckle.

"Now that is an interesting story. I didn't know much about it when I first met them, but I have to say it is an interesting tale. One that would be better explained to everyone at once when we get to the shrine."

After a long climb, they reached the top of the steps, and were greeted by another group of people. There was an old man in a priest's garb, a teenage boy with his hair in a short ponytail, a woman with spiky cyan colored hair that clung to the boy, a short, red-haired girl. There were two other girls, who had ridden on the same train that they had taken, Ukyo realized. It was the blue-haired woman with a headband, as well as the curly-haired blonde with dark skin and generous assets.

The bespectacled priest came over to them, and pulled Ranma's mother into a hug.

"Welcome home, Nodoka," he said in his gravely voice, "it is wonderful to see you again." Turning over to the young man in the group, he offered his hand to him. "And this must be Ranma. I must say, you really have grown. The last time I saw you, you were just a little baby. Why don't you all come inside, and we can get better acquainted."
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Arriving at the shrine

choices: In the shrine with Ranma.  Does someone talk about muscles?
Nabiki enters the lab.  "Holy crap," Nabiki yelled at the spacious room.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
One train behind the Saotome clan, Cologne stepped out of the car with Ryoga close by. She looked about for any signs and smiled when one was pointing to the local shrine. "If you are telling the truth about your connection, you may take a night off," Cologne said. Ryoga smiled hopefully.

It wasn't that sex with her was horrible, but when she was in a foul mood, it wasn't the most pleasant experience.

------

"Sasuke, make sure the caterers understand the quantity of food will have to be equal to at least thirty people," Kuno said as he polished his sword. The servant nodded.

When he arrived, Sasuke asked around and discovered the Misaki family was one of the oldest and most respected families in the land. So, now the short man was planning on inviting them, Ranma, his mother, and because even Kodachi realized the Harlots wouldn't stay away willingly, she would just beat them in showing a good time.

"Understood Master," Sasuke said as he went back to the person he was on the phone with. "Yes, thank you for waiting. Now, can you handle this large a job in such a short period of time?" Sasuke nodded. "Yes, any anything you know the Misaki family and friends might enjoy." Sasuke paused. "That much?" Tatewaki looked over.

"We will pay what is asked," the elder brother declared.

"Yes, we can cover that," Sasuke said. "Tomorrow evening is correct at this address."

-----

Kodachi walked in a simple but formal outfit showing off her strength as she moved to the Misaki Shrine.

------

"Say Nii!" Washu called out as she took another photo. Akane blinked as her eyes were almost blind from the small woman taking all their photos.

"Washu, I think that's enough," Tenchi said as he brought out a pot of tea.

"Awe, come on Tenchi. We rarely see your family," Washu said as she took a photo of Shampoo. After one group photo of Ranma, his mother, and the women, and one just of mother and son, most felt it would be enough.

"So, each of you were born with enhanced bodies because you come from a special region in China?" Katsuhito asked as though this was normal.

"Correct honored Grandfather," Shampoo said. The old man looked at her with eyes that reminded her of Cologne's. Kind but piercing. She could tell why Genma feared the man. If he trained Nodoka to be that strong, could he be stronger?

"Our mother's mother came from the region but it skipped our mother," Kasumi said as she drank the tea. "This is wonderful Tenchi-san." Tenchi smiled and sat down. No sooner had he then Ayeka and Ryoko were at his side.

"So, gramps, dad said you didn't like him very much," Ranma said softly as Washu got one more shot of Kasumi as the small strange pet was sitting on her large lap.

"Ranma, let me be curt and say I think the man who fathered you is a lying, swindling, oaf of a man who would do anything for his safety and some money. He wastes his talent and intelligence on frivolous and dangerous acts," Kasuhito said without raising the tone of his voice.

Ranma flashed to some of the training methods his father used and really couldn't argue against the criticism. His grandfather continued, "All that said, it was clear when we met and asked me to wed my daughter, he loved her more deeply and more purely than I think he ever felt before. I also think he loves you in the same way, he just has a hard time showing it." The old man paused and looked at his daughter. "And if you tell him I said this, you will inherit nothing."

"Hear what?" Nodoka asked back. Her father smiled.

"Oh, out of film. Better go develop," Washu said. She walked off, heading out of the shrine and to the house at the base of the stairs.

"I have an interest in film. Would you mind if I follow her?" Nabiki asked sweetly. The grandfather shook his head. Nabiki rose and left.

----

Washu was about to reach the steps when she turned and saw Nabiki. "Oh, you want another photo?" Washu asked.

"Don't con a conman," Nabiki said. "That isn't a camera."

"Oh really? Why do you think that?" Washu asked.

"Because the camera you used to take Ranma and Nodoka' photo has different markings on it," Nabiki said. Washu eyed Nabiki carefully.

"You don't know who I am, do you?" Washu asked calmly.

"No. I don't," Nabiki said. Washu nodded.

"Come on to my lab. We can talk there," Washu said. Nabiki followed.

A minute or so later, they were entering the Misaki house as someone came to the land and looked up the steps. Local chatter said Kasuhito-sama would be in temple and where he would greet visitors.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Promises, Parties, And Pictures

choices: Washu unveils her newest invention, the muscle ray.  On no!  It's Mihoshi!
With the others
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
"Holy Crap!"

Nabiki said nothing more, taking in the sight of Washu's lab took all her focus. It was overwhelming to think that a girl who looked so young could create something so absolutely massive and complex.

Washu was not one for acting humble when it came to her scientific achievements. Her boisterous laughter filled the main entrance of her lab, echoing off the cavernous ceiling.

"Amazing, isn't it? And this is only the main entrance! The true size of my lab is bigger than a planet!"

If Nabiki was awestruck before, this new information almost short circuited her mind. The notion that this young girl had created a lab bigger than the planet was not something she could easily rationalize. She could barely manage the sense to ask the obvious question.

"How does a little girl like you make something like this? There's no way something like this is even possible" she asked with wide eyes and gaping mouth.

"Of course it's possible, Nabiki," the redhead boasted, "I just happen to be the greatest scientific genius in the universe!"

Nabiki brought herself out of the her daze at that proclamation.

"What do you mean, universe? How does a little girl like you make something this big? You can't be more than 12 years old. How do you even fit something this big in a broom closet?"

If there was one thing Washu liked to do, it was explaining her creations to others, especially when they had just learned how much of a genius she really was.

"Those questions are easily explained, Nabiki. For one, I'm really around 20,000 years old," she said with no attempt at secrecy. This was a friend of one of Katsuhito's grandchildren after all, and if they were as attached to the boy as they seemed they would find out about them being aliens eventually. "To answer your second question, this is a pocket universe anchored to our universe via the closet door. Now, since you're already here, how about letting me do a few tests. I would love to get some more detailed readings on your physiology."

Seeing no reason not to, and partially out of it from the answers to her questions, Nabiki nodded in agreement to the request.

*****

After being introduced to his cousin, Ranma had followed Tenchi out to the fields to get to know each other. Each had a hoe and a basket to carry the carrots they needed for dinner that night.

"I have to say cousin," Tenchi began, a smile on his face, "I'm kind of happy to know that I'm not the only one with girl problems."

"I know what you mean," Ranma said, his own smile answering his cousin's, "sometimes I wonder how I even lasted the first week without dying from exhaustion," the martial artist joked, "I have to say, you got some real pretty girls there, Tenchi. A little underdeveloped for my tastes, but still, very nice."

"Yeah, I guess it's just a trait of us Masaki boys. No matter what we do, we attract powerful girls."

Ranma had to agree that the girls around Tenchi were powerful, though they didn't look it. It was just something he could sense about them.

If only they were a little more muscular.

*****

"Aha!" Washu exclaimed in triumph, "While you are naturally muscular, there is evidence of enhancement that isn't natural. With this data, I can reverse engineer the effects!"

Nabiki gulped at the girl's unapologetic zeal for science.

Nabiki watched in silence as the woman leaned over some table and started bringing bits of different technology to her. Occassionally she would look at some data and seem to readjust things but nothing was really comprehendible to Nabiki.

------

Sasami had a devious grin as Akane sat next to her. Their fighters on the screen went at it once more. "Super combo!" Sasami called out as she devastated Akane's character.

"Knock out! cried the video game.

"Blast!" Akane growled. Kasumi watched with Ayeka. Ryoko was sitting further away with a note pad.

"Want to try again?" Sasami asked. "You might get lucky the seventh time." Akane nodded.

"Your sister is very good with video games," Kasumi said. Ayeka nodded.

"She does excel at them. When we first came to J- Yokohama, I learned quickly to not make bets with her when playing these games was involved," Ayeka said. She mouthed up to ten when it happened.

"Knock out! cried the video game. Akane shook her head in frustration. She looked at the tiny girl, who just stuck her tongue out.

---

Ukyo looked at the taller women she saw on the train. "I hope you don't mind me asking you a question," Ukyo said. Kiyone shook her head.

"No problem. You look familiar though. Do I know you from somewhere?" Kiyone asked as Mihoshi was enjoying the sunny weather.

"Yeah. We were on the train together. On the train, you said you landed in the wrong place. Are you two air pilots?" Ukyo asked. Kiyone smiled and nodded.

"Yeah, and Mihoshi went in the wrong direction!" Kiyone said.

"You said I should follow that cloud," Mihoshi said softly.

"I said don't look at the bunny cloud!" Kiyone said as she heard heavy footsteps coming up the stairs. Ukyo turned and gulped at the sight of Kodachi.

"Oh no," Ukyo whispered.

"This is the Misaki residence, correct?" Kodachi asked with more kindness and respect than Ukyo thought she could muster.

"It might be. And who are you?" Kiyone asked, sensing Ukyo's unease. Mihoshi came over as well.

"Kuno Kodachi, wife of Ranma Saotome. I wish to meet my wonderful in-laws," Kodachi said.

"I got to get Kasumi or Nabiki. Where is she?" Ukyo muttered.

"Oh, I know," Mihoshi said before running down the steps and past Kodachi.

"Wait here," Kiyone said before backing away. Ukyo followed, earning a glare from Kodachi.

---

The pair entered the temple and saw the Akane shaking her head in defeat. Ryoko was laughing to the side. "And the winner of the great tournament is Sasami with fifteen wins over Akane's none!" Ryoko called out.

"Akane, don't sulk," Kasumi said to her sister. "You can always get better."

"I just couldn't grip the controller properly," Akane said. "I was scared of breaking it."

"Maybe Washuu could make you one that won't break," Sasami suggested. Ukyo came into the house with Kiyone.

"Uh, Koodachi Kuno is here," Ukyo said. Both Tendos tensed up and looked at each other. The others in the room sensed their response.

"Something wrong with this visitor?" Ryoko asked in a soft voice.

"She claims to be Ranma's wife," Kiyone said. A similar pulsing rage she recognized Ayeka give off came from Akane.

"That bitch isn't Ranma's bride," she growled.

"She is more like Ranma's stalker," Kasumi explained.

"Well, perhaps you should deal with her Ryoko. You must have so much in common," Ayeka said.

-----

Well, you are correct. This is a very nice tea blend," Katsuhito said with a smile. "Thank you for serving it, Miss Shampoo." Shampoo smiled and bowed, stepping back. Ranma said to help his mother as needed and Shampoo was going to do just that.

"Do you need anything else?" Shampoo asked.

"Not at the moment," Nodoka said. Shampoo nodded.

----

Nabiki looked at the gun Washu had created. "What does that do?" Nabiki asked.

"It reconfigures a body to a chosen template, including fixing any medical issues that might otherwise interfere with the procedure," Washu said.

"What?" Nabiki asked.

"I can make anyone as muscular as you," Washu said, pointing the gun at the door to the lab. "With just a squeeze of the trigger." But the trigger was more sensitive than Washu realized. The gun ringed and fired as the door to the lab opened.

"Washu! Is Miss Nabiki here?" Mihoshi called out as the beam hit her.

With one of the other Yokohama visitors
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
"Oh my, that tickles!" Mihoshi giggled after the ray struck her. It wasn't instantaneous growth, the dark skinned blonde didn't explode into a mound of muscle. It was slower, with her muscle size increasing at a noticeable rate. To Nabiki, it was like watching a person shaped balloon being inflated.

Every part of Mihoshi's body expanded considerably, but her clothes were not so lucky. The shredding fabric screamed as the blonde's body forced it apart. By the time she was done growing, only some tattered cloth remained to protect her decency.

"Damn!" was all Nabiki could say as she watched the whole process unfold. She had not expected it to actually work. As far as she knew, the effects of the scroll were the product of mystical means, so how did Washu actually manage to replicate it. Mihoshi was now the equal in size to the Tendo girls and Shampoo. If Ranma had seen that, there was no doubt in her mind that he would have popped a tent right then and there.

"What are you doing, you ditz?! How did you get in here?!" Washu yelled in a panic. She still hadn't designed a way to reverse the process yet, so now blonde police officer from space had to remain like that.

Mihoshi seemed rather unfazed by the whole occurrence, and just look herself over and give the whole thing a lighthearted comment.

"Oh my, Miss Washu, that new invention of yours is amazing! I look just like Ranma's friends!" Holding up an arm, the blonde ditz gave it an experimental flex, and saw just how big her bicep now was.

"Okay, moving right along," Washu continued, having long ago learned to ignore the walking chaos that was Mihoshi, "What did you need to tell us, Mihoshi?"

Striking the palm of one hand with a fist made by the other, the cosmic police officer recalled why she had looked for them in the first place.

"Well, Miss Ukyo said that I needed to tell Nabiki that someone named Kodachi arrived at the shrine. She said she was Ranma's bride. Isn't that romantic? I mean, she came all the way here just to spend time with him..." Mihoshi rambled on for another minute or so before Nabiki signaled for her to stop.

"Are you absolutely sure that she said her name was Kodachi?" Just what the hell was she here for?
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Muscular Mihoshi

choices: Were the writings in a code Nabiki just didn't understand?  Or possibly alien?
How is Kodachi taking waiting?  Or others.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Tenchi stretched his back and looked at Ranma. "So, how did you come to find all those strong women?" he asked.

"Well, pops took me to live with the Tendos so I could pick one to marry. Before that Shampoo . . ." Ranma's voice dropped down. Should he say the truth? Would his cousin think him wrong to have a "slave"? "Shampoo became indebted to me."

"Indebted?" Tenchi asked. Ranma nodded.

"Yeah. Something happened in her home village and it resulted in her agreeing to serve me," Ranma replied. Tenchi could sense there was more to it but chose not to say anything.

"Alright. So, do you have a favorite?" Tenchi asked.

"Do you?" Ranma asked. Both stared at the other as silence fell. Tenchi didn't know what to say as he battled the question. But he also knew it would be his luck someone was watching mishear, cause some ruckus, or Washuu was recording this with some robocamera.

"Let's get back to work," Tenchi said. Ranma nodded and pulled some more carrots out.

Hiding in the bushes, Washuu-camera-bot sulked as it didn't get anything but continued to watch diligently.

-----

"Washuu, can you adjust that to any template?" Nabiki asked.

"In time. In theory I just need a good sample of the body's bio-energy and shape," Washu said. "But readjusting an augmented form could be tricky. I could end up shrinking the person or the transformation is compounding."

"Meaning you could add the new size and strength to the person," Nabiki said darkly.

"Agreed," Washu said.

"And juts how did you even do this with technology?" Nabiki asked. "What we did to get big was magic." Washu laughed once more.

"Magic? Well, after I woke up here, I did some reading. I think it was an author named Clarke. He said, 'Any sufficiently advanced technology is indistinguishable from magic.' Energy is energy. How it comes about doesn't matter."

"So you're saying you can reproduce magical events with technology?" Nabiki asked.

"In theory. Even with all this, there are parts of the mind which I can't break. Even the most energy efficient of my computers is primitive to the brain, which only needs like 20 watts to run," Washu said.

"Really? That's amazing!" Mihoshi said with a smile.

"Or just five in some cases," Washu said. She coughed. "Anyway, without understanding how you ended up this way, I don't know if I could reverse things." Nabiki clenched her hands and pulled out from her breasts a tube. She handed it to Washu, who opened it. A rolled up scroll came out and she looked at it.

"That's how we got big. There was some marking to look at it under the light of a full moon but I couldn't make heads or tails of the writing," Nabiki said. Washu typed a few things and a spotlight came down on the table.

"Same conditions as a full moon. Let's see what we got," Washu said.

-----

Nobuyuki was walking up the street after a hard day at work. He knew guests were coming and he would be happy to see his nephew. Looking to the side, he saw a tall woman with brilliant hair and a young boy who seemed familiar. "Hikibi-kun?" he called out. Cologne and Ryoga looked and saw the bespectacled man.

"Oh, Misaki-sama," Ryoga said. "He is one of the members of the Misaki family, ma'am." Cologne nodded. Nobuyuki came over to them.

"Are you lost again?" the man asked.

"No. You see, I wanted to show my thanks for you helping my servant years ago," Cologne said to the smaller man. "You and your family. May we accompany you to your estate?"

"I don't know," Nobuyuki said, "We are having family over today. I don't want to impose too much"

"Oh, we don't want to impose. Just be thankful. Perhaps a short meeting?" Cologne asked.

"I need to talk to my father. Would you come but just wait near the entrance?" Cologne nodded.

"As you wish," Cologne said.

The scroll went under the light and two muscular behemoths looked at it. Washu looked at the writings that appeared.

1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Washu had multiple scanners and recording devices focused on the scroll, making sure she got any scrap of data offered up from the examination. The pale light of the simulated full moon fell across the ancient paper, causing new, unseen writing to form.

"Amazing!" Washu exclaimed, her excitement percolating, "the ink only appears when hit with light with the exact wavelength and intensity as the light reflected from the full moon!" Her fingers flew over the floating, transparent keyboard that appeared before her out of nowhere. Her computer linked to every piece of equipment she was using, even the most miniscule details were recorded and saved for later analysis.

"What does it say, Miss Washu?" Mihoshi questioned.

"I don't recognize the language," Washu answered, her hands a blur as they deftly worked the keys of her computer, "but it shouldn't take me too long to translate it."

*****

Ranma and his cousin were returning home, each with a large basket full of carrots slung over their shoulders. The amount of carrots they had picked was enough to fully stock three grocery stores for a week.

"You know, Tenchi, I have to ask, why do you have so many of your fields used to grow carrots? And why did we need this many just for tonight's dinner?"

"I kind of had to after Ryo-Ohki moved into the house. She just loves them, and this was the only way to keep her happy, and not spend a fortune on carrots at the store."

Ranma scratched his pigtail in confusion, he hadn't met anyone at the shrine with that name. Maybe she was in town when they arrived or something.

"Who's Ryo-Ohki?" he asked his cousin.

As if to answer the question herself, the ravenous, carrot-loving Ryo-Ohki hopped down the path leading to the house, a ecstatic look on her furry face. The fluffy resident of the Masaki shrine looked like a cross between a cat and a rabbit, with a fluff ball tail, and ears that were long but still rigid enough to not flop under their own weight. While her appearance gave Ranma a slight surprise as he had never seen a creature like this before.

"This is Ryo-Ohki?" he asked Tenchi, clearly confused how such a small thing could be responsible for his cousin farming an entire field of carrots.

"MIYAH!" was the fluffy creatures happy response.

*****

Kodachi waited as patiently as she could to meet with Ranma and his honorable mother. Kasumi eyed her suspiciously, making sure that the slightly unhinged rich girl didn't try anything funny. An uncomfortable silence filled the room until the very woman the Kuno girl wished to meet appeared.

"So, you are Kodachi Kuno. If I understand correctly, you have taken quite a...liking to my son. Is that correct?" Nodoka asked cautiously.

"That is correct honorable mother," the rich girl put forth in as polite and formal manner as possible, "I am indeed Kodachi Kuno, and I wish to recieve your blessing in my pursuit of your son."
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: New writing underneath the light of a full moon
