1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
"Okay, I got the code deciphered," Washu said. She hit a button and the text came up on a screen. Nabiki looked up.

To my descendants who own this scroll, here Is your history.
I do not know the era or year of my homeland, but when I last some Christian missionaries, they said it was 1258. It has been fifty years since I arrived in what was a village of farmers. When I came, I never intended to stay. I was a monk who traveled from across the sea to see the world, find what medicines I could, and find myself. I came to this village as it was being raided once more. The men of the village had fought hard against these raiders but all had perished, Only children and the infirm lived. The women tried hard but couldn't win.

I joined the battle and help send the raiders away. Seeing a place that was in need of my help, I stayed and came to know the daughter of the slain chief. A strong beautiful woman. I think now it was because of her I chose to stay most of all. As the raids continued, I would stand against them and win many but I knew I could never last forever and with so few men, I took it to train the women to better fight.

But this was not enough. Though they had the skills, they lacked the strength against such men. So I pursued means of enhancing the body, to make it stronger and fitter.

The first technique I made allowed me to use magic to give Xue, the daughter of the dead chief and now my wife, a body like mine. A strong more man-like body It was used on others in the village, including a few men. They didn't grow as strong as the women. I don't know why. But we knew this wouldn't be enough so I pushed on. I searched and looked for another way to help the land and women I had come to know.

That is where the below information comes to be. It never worked on me and barely enhanced any males who were augmented, but on my wife Xue, she grew from equal to me to twice my height. Her body grew and expanded to such limits, she could lift the ox with her own hands. And with concentration, could shrink back to her old size.

The process was used on all in the village and while the men were not as enhanced, gaining only a little, the empowered women were enough to continue protecting us. Our daughters inherited their mother's size and beauty as our sons remained strong even in harsh times. As I look at my granddaughter now, just becoming a woman, it is clear she will grow up enhanced like her mother and her mother's mother.

I die now, happy in saving this village now christened Chinese Heroines.
Noriyuki


Beneath was a process similar to the above. "Hmm. Interesting," Washu said.

"What a strange name for a village. He doesn't even call it anything specific," Mihoshi said. Nabiki bit her lips and thought. Why did the name seem familiar. Heroine. A female hero. Nabiki's eyes went wide. Village of Chinese Heroines? Village of Chinese Female Heroes.

"Shampoo," Nabiki muttered. Washu turned.

"The purple haired one?" the scientist asked.

"Yeah. That's what her village means!" Nabiki said. "It can't be a coincidence!"

"I agree," Washu said. "Most likely the translation was too literal."

"Oh, so what does that mean?" Mihoshi asked.

"Someone must have stolen it from them," Nabiki said. She shivered as bad feeling hit.

------

Back in Nerima, Soun and Genma drank their tea when the glasses cracked. A gale blew in and a pairs of panties flew over the wall and into their faces. Both men shook in fear.

"Soun, I think I might go rejoin my family," Genma muttered.

"I think I will come with you," Soun said as they rushed to the train station.

------

Strange but cute, Ranma decided as he fed the strange creature a carrot. She smiled and devoured the orange rod. "Miyah!" she called out before jumping on Ranma's shoulder and rubbed against him.

"Guess she likes me," Ranma said.

"She likes anyone who gives her carrots," Tenchi said.

----

"And now you wish to wed him," Nodoka said.

"I would be a far better candidate than any he has known," Kodachi said.

"Well, I must admit, you are suprerior in some respects," Nodoka said. Kodachi smiled. "None of the Tendo sisters nor other two kidnapped and tortured my son with pain and sexual actions, try abducting a second time, try cheating in a simple school match with poisoned items, or come to my family home without invitation." As Nodoka continued, Kodachi's face became stuck on as she hoped such knowledge wouldn't be known but of course the harlots colored the truth.

"Damn," Ryoko muttered from the side.

"Indeed. This woman makes you look almost tame,' Ayeka said. Ryoko glared at her but didn't say anything else.

"Allow me to correct some fallacies these . . . women spoke," Kodachi said. Nodoka rose in an elegant way and lifted her hand. Her father tossed her a blade.

"You have two choices. Leave. Or face me in combat. Win, and I will entertain your request," Nodoka said as her eyes went cold and the room became heavy.

-----

"I'll look over this new data. You should probably deal with that Kodachi woman," Washu said. Nabiki nodded as shethought to what those words had said. Become twice as strong as she is? She licked her lips in anticipation.

The pair left the lab and then the house as Nobuyuki arrived with Cologne and Ryoga.

Nabiki and Cologne talk, about the scroll and Mihoshi's new body
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
It was like a scene out of a Kung Fu film, as two warriors stood across from each other atop a hill, with a breeze blowing through the scene. Nodoka held a wooden sword her father had generously provided her with in the traditional guard stance of her sword style. Kodachi held her specially made ribbon in front of her, holding it taunt between her hands. It was like a female version of David vs Goliath was unfolding before the spectators.

Akane sat with her legs crossed and eyes wide, not wanting to miss an instant of the battle to come. While she knew that Kodachi was equal to her in size and strength, Nodoka had been handing her, her sisters, and Shampoo their asses in any spar that they had with the older woman.

Shampoo sat by the youngest Tendo, just as interested in the fight as her friend. Watching Nodoka fight was something she couldn't miss out on, and seeing Kodachi the snot beaten out of her was just a bonus that she was looking forward to.

Ayeka and Ryoko were sitting next to the two amazons, both wanting to see the fighting abilities of the two women. Ayeka was hoping to see the strength of Katsuhito's adopted daughter, but Ryoko was more interested in the spectacle of the fight itself.

Katsuhito stood between the two combatants, having volunteered to officiate the match, seeing as it was his home and a fight involving his student.

Now all they had to wait for was Kasumi, who was making popcorn with Sasami.

*****

Ranma and Tenchi were walking up the final steps to the latter boy's home. Ryo-Ohki was perched on the Anything Goes practitioner's shoulder, rubbing against him like a loving pet. It would seem that something about the pigtailed boy was agreeable with the little cabbit, since they had just met and she was acting like they had known each other for a long time.

It was a quite walk home, until the two saw what was happening at the top of the hill.

"Oh crap! Kodachi?!"

The two were beckoned over by the four ladies sitting to the side to observe. Shampoo patted her lap, wanting Ranma to take his seat on her nice, thick thigh. An offer the boy happily accepted.

The two of them were filled in as to what had led to this event, and what the outcome would mean for him. If Kodachi won against the older woman, she would be allowed to pursue him with his mother's blessing.

*****

Nabiki and Mihoshi were heading towards the fight, when they ran into Noboyuki, who was escorting Cologne and Ryoga to the shrine.

"Hello, Cologne," Nabiki said, "I have some information that you might find interesting."
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Prelude to a duel for Ranma

choices: Follow the battle.
Which way will Cologne pick?  Washu or Kodachi?
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Cologne looked at Nabiki and then the equally large Mihoshi. "Did your mother have siblings up here?" Cologne asked.

"No. A woman named Washu here is a brilliant scientist. She was able to recreate the effects of how Kasumi and I became Akane's size.," Nabiki said as Mihoshi was with Nobuyuki. Cologne nodded and wondered what that method was. She still didn't know.

"Oh, everyone is up top meeting," Mihoshi said.

"So Nodoka-chan was able to make it," Nobuyuki said. "Is your father here Nabiki?"

"No uncle," Nabiki said. She looked back to the elder. "I have some questions about your village, Cologne." The old woman nodded and sensed a sincerity about Nabiki. It was . . . disturbing but worth delaying her approach just yet.

"If you would excuse me Misaki-san," Cologne said. The single parent nodded.

"It was good to see you again. I'll tell the others," Nobuyuki said. Ryoga nodded and watched as Mihoshi wearing some tight skinned clothing walked away. What legs and chest!

"Now, what do you want to know?" Cologne asked.

"What is the history of your village? How far do you go back?" Nabiki asked.

"Over nine hundred years of history," Cologne said.

"And you weren't always warriors?" Cologne shook her head. "How did that change?"

"That is a matter of debate and legend. The scrolls which held that piece of history were lost," Cologne said.

"Tell me the legend," Nabiki said.

"At the start of the thirteenth century, our village was weak and defenseless. But when a traveler came, we protected him despite our weakness from raiders. Impressed by our courage and our hospitality, he revealed himself to be an agent of a high god and blessed our women with strength and endurance," Cologne said. Nabiki nodded.

"Cologne, I have that missing scroll," Nabiki said. Cologne's eyes widened and her hand gripped Nabiki's wrist. She stopped herself from further attack and calmed her breathing.

"This should not be a lie," Cologne whispered.

"The daughter of the chief of the village was Xue. The man's name was Noriyuki," Nabiki said. Cologne's mouth hung open.

"Master, couldn't Shampoo have told her that?" Ryoga asked. Cologne shook her head.

"Shampoo knows the legend but that part. That was kept among the elders only to verify the validity of the missing scroll," Cologne whispered. "How? Where?"

"Kodachi Kuno had it and used it to enhance herself. I procured it after her fights with us and been keeping it safe," Nabiki said as she looked to the house.

"Did . . . Did you find the moon?" Cologne asked. Nabiki nodded.

"He recorded the truth there," Nabiki said. Cologne's mouth went dry. "I also understand Kodachi is up on the hill. She might be willing to tell you more on where she found it." Cologne nodded.

-------

"Watch me husband!" Kodachi called out as bowls were passed about. Nobuyuki sat next to Tenchi and accepted it from Ranma. Mihoshi was a short distance away as Kiyone was screaming softly at her wondering what the hell happened.

"Did sister use the scroll?" Akane asked in a concerned voice.

"I certainly would like to know," Kasumi said. Mihoshi went and sat near Tenchi, smiling at the little man. This annoyed Ayeka and Ryoko. It wasn't the fact she was muscular that frustrated the,. Her breasts were larger than theirs!

"On the ready," Katsuhito called out. Nodoka prepared herself. Kodachi drew in a deep breath. "Begin!"
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: The Thief and the Legend

choices: Kodachi manages to land a hit, does she win
Nodoka wins, another flawless victory
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
When the battle began, Kodachi sprinted forward, ribbon twirling, meaning to score the first hit of the fight. If what she heard was true, none of the girls who tried to tempt her Ranma had been able to land so much as a blow on her; so if she could at least do what they could not, she might endear herself to this noble woman.

Nodoka remained still, and showed no openings for her opponent to exploit. Her guard was flawless, and her reflexes honed to perfection. Her stance and posture were the picture of grace and elegance.

Kodachi could see that any head on attack would be met with nothing but pain and failure. Her only advantage over her rivals who had fought this woman before her was the flexibility and quickness of her unorthodox weapon. It was a skill that she was very proud of, being able to control her ribbon so deftly, and it was her only chance of landing at least one hit against the Saotome matriarch.

From his seat in Shampoo's lap, Ranma watched intently as his muscular stalker tried to prove her worth to his mother. It still amazed him that his mother was so proficient with a sword. She made precise movements that wasted no energy, so as to preserve it while her foe tired herself out trying to hit her. He reached for one of the bags of popcorn Kasumi had made, and then leaned back into his servant's breasts and made himself comfortable while the fighters danced around each others attacks.

The sun's rays beat mercilessly down on those gathered before the cave in which the dreaded master of Genma and Soun. With the exclusion of Katsuhito, and Washu, there wasn't anyone there who wasn't sweating bullets due to the heat.

Katsuhito began to complex ritual to reseal the hibernating menace to women everywhere, chanting mantras that the onlookers could not make out, and performing various body movements. As he continued, the world around him faded away, and he focused entirely on repairing the seal.

The others watched, as the Katsuhito, decked out in his full ceremonial robes, repaired the seal. They were all seated in the formal position, legs tucked beneath their body and hand s on their knees. The old priest had instructed them to do so, as it was still a sacred rite passed down in the Masaki family, and it deserved to be observed respectfully.

Ranma was seated between his mother and Shampoo. The older woman was currently dressed in the outfit befitting a daughter of the shrine's head priest, and was a vision of beauty. Shampoo, too, was wore the most formal attire she had packed, her fanciest and most well designed silks. It contrasted nicely against Nodoka's own traditional clothing, and made Ranma glad he was alive to see her in such garments.

The old priest's chanting intensified, and the entrance of the cave began to emit a bright light, which blinded those watching for a minute. When it finally died down, Katsuhito had assumed a more relaxed position, and sighed.

"It has been years since I performed that ritual, and it never gets any easier to perform." the old man mentioned offhandedly. He was then mobbed by his spectators, who were all asking the question on everyone's mind.

"DID IT WORK?!" they said simultaneously., all secretly praying that it had.

"It has for the moment, but the seal had been severely weakened, and I could only reenforce it momentarily. I do not know how long it will hold, but it should keep him at bay for the time being. I wish I could do more, but I don't have a power source that can provide the same amount of energy as Washu's prison."

Nagi growled at the woman's attitude. So what if she was a walking muscle mountain. No one talked to her like that and got away with it.

"Listen old woman," she snarled, "I've got business with one of your little party members, and I'm in no mood to deal with you right now!" Nagi reached half her arm into her matching purse (courtesy of Washu) and drew out a futuristic looking rapier. She took up her guard, and prepared to remove this obstruction with force, if necessary.

"You should learn to respect your elders, girl." Cologne said, falling into her own fighting stance, "I may have to teach you how to do so."

With a war cry, Nagi charged forward, intent on showing this woman who she was messing with.

*****

With a sigh, Washu finalized her design for the seal power source. It was by no means a guaranteed solution, but out of all her attempts, it had the highest probable success rate. With a few keystrokes, she sent the command for its construction.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Back to Washuu's work

choices: Who are Tenchi's and Ranma's next partner?
Does Cologne kiss Nagi?
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
They were onto the third song. Ranma had to hold his hand up his partner so he could hold the waist. Nabiki smiled down at Ranma with her pearly whites. "I'm surprised you can dance so well," she said. Ranma blushed.

"My father taught me," he said. "Dance requires precise movements and reading the music." Kasumi nodded.

"That makes sense," Nabiki said. She looked about. Genma was dancing well with Nodoka, Sasami was dancing with Tatewaki. Soun was with Akane. Ryoga was continuing to dance with Kasumi. And Tenchi was with Kiyone. "This is turning to a nicer night than I was thinking it would be."

"Kodachi keeping in line makes it easier," Ranma said.

"What number is she?" Nabiki said.

"Seventh, after my ladies and Sasami," Ranma said.

"If you need help, I'll be there, Ranma," Nabiki said. Ranma smiled.

"Thank you," Ranma said.

-------

"To think I got Sasami then you Kiyone," Tenchi said as he looked at the taller woman. She nodded.

"I didn't think I would end up so high either," Kiyone said. She sighed, raising her big breasts up then down. Tenchi gulped.

"So, are you still off for a month?" Tenchi asked.

"Yeah. We're going to have to get some job somewhere," Kiyone said.

"Um, would you be against showing yourself off? You did look good in that swimsuit contest," Tenchi said.

"What did you have in mind?" Kiyone asked with some curiosity.

"Well, Kasumi told me about her job as a model last night. Maybe you could do that," Tenchi said. Kiyone leaned down and whispered.

"You tell anyone else about that?" Kiyone asked. Tenchi shook his head.

"Just you," he said. "I'm scared to think of Ryoko and Ayeka fighting in front of a camera." Kiyone nodded and lifted hsefelt back up. They continued to dance. "Are you not keeping pace?" Kiyone asked.

"Um your holding me off the ground," Tenchi said. Kiyone blushed and set him lower.

"Sorry."

---------

Cologne growled in anger. The woman was fast. And her rapier nearly ruined Cologne's dress. As she came at her, Cologne focused her mind and finally countered.

She grabbed the blade and while it cut into her skin, her grip held and pulled Nagi close to her when she slammed her fist in Nagi's gut. The powerful blow knocked the wind out of Nagi.

"You have ruined my dress," Cologne said as she slammed a fist into Nagi's face, sending her back into a tree. Before she could rise, Cologne closed the gap between them. "Now you will pay."

------

The song came to an end and Nabiki kissed Ranma on the lips. "Later tiger," she whispered. Ranma smiled.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Dances of All Sorts

choices: Cologne claims Nagi as a slave
Cologne leaves it at that
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Nagi pulled herself up, gulping in air in an attempt to catch her breath. This woman may have looked old, but damn, her muscles weren't just for show. That had hurt like hell, and the galactic bounty hunter wasn't sure just how many more of those punches she could take. She could tell that the side of her face was already starting to swell where the big, meaty fist of her opponent had impacted.

Cologne sent a half dozen more blows at the disrespectful girl, each landing with only minor resistance from her adversary.

"You really should have backed down, girl." Cologne said smugly, pressing her increasing advantage, "if you had just walked away, we wouldn't have a problem, but now I am afraid that you are going to be on the receiving end of a very severe lesson."

*****

Ranma and Akane danced slowly, the boy's head was pressed against her rock-like abs and enjoying every second of it. The youngest Tendo had grown herself to twelve feet, so it was the ideal place to be, with Akane's hard muscles pressed against him, and her abundant chest just overhead. Proving again just how much of a genius she was, Washu's clothing had grown with the girl, keeping the same relative dress length as it did.

Finally, the song stopped, signifying the end of Akane's turn. Both she and Ranma had content smiles on their faces as they finished by bowing to their partner, and walking off the dance floor.

"Tonight's been fun so far," Akane admitted after she knelt down to be at eye level with Ranma.

"So far, so good. I don't think we've had a night this calm since we came here, but this has been a pleasant surprise. I just hope that those two," he gestured to Kodachi and her brother, "can keep themselves under control."

Akane gave the boy a peck on the cheek, before leaving his side. Ranma blushed, before going to get his next partner.

*****

Nagi had been run ragged by the unrelenting assault of her seemingly tireless foe. Her gown was tattered, and her rapier had been shattered by one of the old woman's techniques. Her chances of victory were quickly flying out the window, and Cologne was moving in for the finishing blow.

Bringing her fist back, the amazon elder feinted a right straight, bringing her worn out opponent's guard to her front to try and block. When Nagi took the bait, Cologne's left hook caught her on the side of the head, putting the girl down. Finally, at the cost of her lovely dress, she had attained victory.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: The end of the fight

choices: "is sending us new clothes and calling the house to let you in officially."
"has vouched for your honor.  Take me to your ship."
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Cologne knoelt down and lifted up Nagi. "I should make you my slave . . . but I have enough trouble with Ryoga," Cologne muttered. She dropped Nagi. The beaten alien rose up slowly.

"What?" Nagi asked. Cologne looked at the woman.

"In my society when an outsider and one of the village clash, one tends to become the slave of the victor. If you had won, I would have no choice but to prostate myself before you," Cologne said. "As I am the victor, it is my choice to take you as my slave or not." Nagi groaned and nodded.

"Well, thank you then," she replied. "What am I going to wear now?"

"All Washu told me was you would likely cause trouble with Ryoko. Why?" Cologne asked.

"I'm a bounty hunter. She's a pirate. I keep coming after her or looking to beat her," Nagi said. "The worst I intended to do was dance with her guy and make him want me a bit more than her." Cologne nodded and chuckled.

"You should know then, Washu developed a muscle ray. Ryoko is now large like me," Cologne said. Nagi's eyes widened.

"Just my luck," Nagi growled. She looked at the formidable woman and a thought came to mind. "Would you train me?"

"What?" Cologne asked with a laugh.

"Train me to fight someone as large as you. I can get Earth money if need be or I can give other services," Nagi said. Cologne closed her eyes and considered this.

"You have a spaceship?" Cologne asked. Nagi nodded.

"He's likely off looking for carrots," Nagi said. Cologne said nothing for a moment.

"Let me contact Washu. Give me a few minutes," Cologne said. "Try running into the house and I'll break your legs."

-----

Genma whirled about the floor with Shampoo. It was strange to see her coming over, but, as she whispered to him, "I should be respectful to Master's father." He nodded and went along with it.

"So, how was dancing with the host?" Genma asked.

"He alright. Good dancer but not who Shampoo love," Shampoo said.

"Do you believe in fate?" Genma asked.

"Why you ask that?" Shampoo asked.

"I was just thinking of how I learned about the Jusenkyo training area. An advertisement was on the back of an article I was reading about the Misaki shrine celebrating a holiday," Genma said. "And now here we are."

"Fate can be funny," Shampoo agreed.

--------

Ranma smiled as he danced with the beautiful chef. Her long brown hair and smile. "It feels amazing Ranma. I love being this large," she said, standing eight feet tall.

"I'm glad we finally grew you," Ranma said.

"Ranma, do you want to try growing your other form or yourself ?" Ukyo asked.

"Hadn't really thought about it," Ranma replied. Ukyo nodded.

---------

Ayeka smiled at Tenchi as they waltzed about the room. She was sighing and in heaven. She was just tall enough so when she pulled Tenchi close he was caught between her breasts. She glared at Ryoko as they passed by.

-----

Nabiki held a 10,000 yen note in her hand as she danced with Tatewaki. "This is a very nice party," Nabiki said.

"Thank you Tendo-san," Tatewaki replied. "How is your sister so much taller?"

"We learned a new technique," Nabiki said. "It is really quite amazing." Tatewaki nodded.

-------

Sasuke smiled as he was carried around. Because of his height, even a 6 fot tall woman would be too tall, so Sasami just smiled and carried him about like he was a doll. Her radiant smile and kind eyes made him melt.

-----

Cologne came back to Nagi. "Washu . . .
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: No Need for More Slaves

choices: Ranma and Kodachi dance and talk
Nagi is introduced by Cologne
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
"Washu said she's sending us new clothes, and will notify the others that you are coming to the party."

On cue, one of the redhead's drones appeared before them, and deposited clothes into Cologne's hands before disappearing as suddenly as it had come. Tossing Nagi her own change of clothes, Cologne ushered the bounty hunter towards the house to change and then join the party.

*****

After her drone had returned from its delivery, Washu pressed a button on her keyboard, activating her communications array, and dialed up the Kuno's rented mansion. After three rings, someone answered.

After a brief explanation, she managed to gain entry for their unexpected guest from the temporary master of the house.

*****

Ranma had gone through his lineup of girls, and was now standing before Kodachi Kuno, preparing to dance. While she was no longer anywhere near the size of the other women in his life, her muscular form still stirred up feelings of desire in him that would be troublesome if he didn't already know how she behaved.

For her part, Kodachi was quite nervous being this close to the martial artist again. She wanted to make sure that the impression she gave to both him, and his family, was far more elegant than his initial thoughts. She needed to show Ranma that she could be just as kind as those other girls chasing after him, and surely, with a little effort, he would see that she was his true love.

*****

Ryoko almost choked on her drink when she saw Nagi walk through the entrance. The silver haired bounty hunter stood beside the old amazon, wearing lovely black strapless dress that billowed around with each step she took. They had been told another guest would be joining them, but why did it have to be this pain in the ass.

When she saw her target, Nagi had to fight down the urge to capture her, with how things were now, she was in now fit shape to do so. Even if she hadn't used up so much energy fighting Cologne, she didn't like her odds against the current Ryoko. She could only hope that her training would boost her up enough to fulfill her goal, and maybe a little muscle growth too, if possible.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Nagi joins the party

choices: The song go on and more talking is done.
The song ends and Ranma and Tenchi look for new partners.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Cologne's first pair to see was Ryoga still dancing with the smiling Kasumi. The pair stopped and looked at Nagi. "Kasumi Tendo, Ryoga Hibiki, my new student Nagi. She will be returning with us to Tokyo," Cologne said. Kasumi's encompassing hand reached out and Nagi shook it, not sensing any trouble from her. She looked to the young man and took his hand. It was a strong shake. He wasn't a weakling, that's for sure.

Ryoga stared into Nagi's eyes as he felt her firm handshake and the power in it. She wasn't a muscular amazon but she wasn't to be taken lightly. "May I have this dance?" he asked.

"On the next turn," Cologne said. "I have others to introduce you to." Nagi nodded.

------

"My Lord, I wish to apologize for my actions," Kodachi said. "The act of kidnapping you wasn't right."

"Are you saying that because you were beaten or my mom scared you into saying it?" Ranma asked. While he loved her body, the size and the power, her actions against him weren't that easily forgotten.

"Both," Kodachi said. "I acted with haste in kidnapping you and then sought to keep you for myself." She looked down into his eyes. "Will you forgive me?"

"Not yet," Ranma said softly.

-------

Nodoka and Katsuhito smiled at Nagi. "You will be training with Cologne then?" Nodoka asked.

"Yes. I want to get stronger to handle tougher bounties," Nagi said.

"Well, your target here and now is certainly stronger," the old man said. Nagi glanced at Ryoko.

"So, you collect the bounties off criminals," Nodoka said. "A profession you enjoy?" Nagi nodded.

"I do," she said.

"Do you have a boyfriend?" Nodoka asked.

'No. I haven't found a man who would be that interested in me," Nagi said.

"Well, perhaps fortune will change that," Nodoka said as she looked at Kodachi and her son.

------

"I cannot believe that woman is here. Well, she will have something to worry about now with this new body," Ryoko chuckled. She looked to Tenchi and Ayeka. Her next dance would be with him. And she would make sure he was swept off his feet.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Nagi is introduced by Cologne

choices: She would help at the shrine the rest of their stay, after Katsuhito gave the ok
Ranma would think on it later, and tell her the next day
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
The music continued to play as the Kuno/Saotome pair danced around the ballroom. Their earlier conversation had been put aside as the two of them just enjoyed their synchronized movement. After their initial conversation, Ranma and Kodachi circled around the dance floor in silence. They just danced, gazing at each other as they did so. Then the gymnast spoke up.

"Pardon my impertinence, Ranma, but I have a question," she whispered to the boy so that those around them couldn't hear her clearly. It was a rather odd sight, seeing an eight foot tall muscle girl bend down to be at ear level with him.

Seeing no harm, the martial artist simply nodded at her, goading her to continue.

"I have been thinking. Is there anything I can do for you to show how sincere my apology is. I truly am sorry, and if there is something you would like me to do to at least partly make it up to you, please tell me."

*****

Ryoko was close to pulling out her hair hair by the fistful. While the others were either dancing or enjoying the fine food and drink their hosts provided, she was on edge, because of her jealousy over Ayeka and Tenchi's dance, and the presence of her most tenacious and unforgiving rival/enemy.

'Dammit! When is this song going to end?!" she thought furiously. It was like Ayeka had gotten her turn during the longest song of the night. She would so enjoy punching that disgustingly satisfied look off her face.

Unknown to the space pirate, her thoughts had led her to flex subconsciously, with her muscles swelled up like a pissed off wolverine's fur.

*****

Nodoka and Katsuhito shared a chuckle at the disconcerted Ryoko. Young love, such an amusing and lively thing it was. Even if said girl was far older than she appeared.

*****

Ranma and his dance partner continued to dance in silence after the latter had asked her question. While he didn't think he could fully trust this muscle woman yet, he the pigtailed boy could see the sincerity in her eyes that she truly wanted to make it up to him.

"Please, Lord Ranma, if there is anything I can do to make things right between us, do not hesitate to ask it of me." she whispered as she pulled him closer to her muscled form, and wrapped her arms around his body.

This conversation was making Ranma's head hurt, but he gave her an answer.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: The song go on and more talking is done.

choices: Follow Ryoga and Nagi dance near Ryoko and Tenchi.
Skip to the competition and who is Ranma's partner going to be?
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
"I need to think on this. I'll tell ya tomorrow. Come to the Shrine then," Ranma said. Kodadchi nodded slowly.

"I understand," She said as the music ended An announcement said there would be a short intermission from the disk jockey. Gracefully, she let go of Ranma and bowed to him. Ranma bowed and walked to the drink bowl.

Akane was standing there sipping the punch. "What did she talk to you about?" Akane asked softly as she watched Kodachi move to where Tatewaki was sipping his own drink.

"She wants my forgiveness and to know how she can make up for her past actions," Ranma said.

"Did you give it to her?" Akane asked.

"I'm thinking on it. I just don't know what I could have her do," Ranma said. Akane nodded.

"Kidnapping you certainly shouldn't come off with a slap on the wrist," Akane said.

"I know. Part of why I didn't make a choice is I wanted the opinions of my friends," Ranma said. "My lovely . . . special friends." He blushed as he spoke.

"You know, after this party, I was thinking, we should do what we did earlier, but Shampoo is pressing against my walls," Akane said. Ranma choked as he sipped.

"That . . . That would be wonderful," Ranma said. Akane nodded.

--------

Kasumi and Ryoga walked over to Cologne and Nagi. "Mrs Cologne," Kasumi said, "I need to use the lavatory. Here's Ryoga." Cologne nodded as Kasumi walked away. Ryoga glanced around and saw no one.

"Master," Ryoga said.. "Miss Nagi." Cologne smiled.

"Master? So, you are . . ." Nagi asked.

"Her servant for losing to her. Are you now her servant?" Ryoga asked.

"No. Just her student," Nagi said. Ryoga nodded. Nagi looked over to the smirking Ryoko. "Ryoga, are you a good dancer?"

"I'm a fast learner and good at rhythmic gymnastics," Ryoga said.

"Good. I want to outdo that woman over there," Nagi said.

"I would be glad to help," Ryoga said. Nagi smiled.

"Hmm. That could be interesting. Pardon me," Cologne said. "Oh, and don't let Ryoga wander off. He can get lost easily." Nagi blinked in confusion as her teacher walked away toward Nodoka and Katsuhito.

"Is she serious?" Nagi asked. Ryoga nodded.

------

Nodoka and Katsuhito nodded with interest as Cologne told them her idea. She walked away from them. "I should find my husband," Nodoka said.

"I think I might look for a date as well," Katsuhito said.

--------

Cologne walked over to the host's table where Kodachi was eating a large plate as Tatewaki was speaking with the DJ. "Pardon me," Cologne said. Tatewaki looked up with a smile.

"Ah, Madame Cologne," Tatewaki said, "Enjoying yourself?" Cologne nodded.

"I was speaking wth the Misaki elder and learned of a nice restaurant in this town. Given all the interest in dancing, if we had a dancing competition, I would be willing to pay for a dinner for two or few people," Cologne said.

"Well, we would need an objective judge," Tatewaki said. "Sister?" The behemoth woman shook her head.

"I would seek to enter brother," Kodachi said.

"So would I," Tatewaki said.

"I have experience judging such things," the disc jockey said. "And I could be impartial." Tatewaki nodded.

"Then we shall have the competition. It will be after you play the next song. I have asked Miss Shampoo for another dance and I suspect she might not accept me as a dance partner," Tatewaki said.

"Yes sir," the Disc Jockey said with a nod. He checked his watch and went back to his station to play the next song.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: The Rest and the Competition

choices: Shampoo
Ayeka
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
After announcing the competition to his honored guests, Kuno proceeded to inform them on how the partners would be decided. It was truly the only fair way to do so, in everyone's opinion. They simply drew lots from two boxes, one for the guys and one for the girls. Cologne, Kiyone, Nabiki and Nodoka had decided to remain on the sidelines so that things were even between men and women, or, in Nabiki and Kiyone's case, didn't feel like competing in some silly dance off.

Each contestant drew a number from their respective box, and those who drew the same were paired together. So far, Ryoga had been paired with Nagi, Sasami with Sasuke, and Genma had been paired with Kasumi. When it was Ranma's turn to draw, the eyes of half the girls in the room were on him, each hoping that they would be paired with him.

Ranma drew the number 7 from the bag, and every girl interested in him narrowed their eyes in determination.


*****

Meanwhile, at the shrine, Washu, accompanied by several work drones, was hard at work setting up the power source for the seal. It may not have a 100 percent chance of success, hell, it barely had a 50/50 chance, but it was the best design she had, and they were on a time limit.

It would be another hour before the set-up was done and the system was calibrated for the sealing ceremony. As far as the redheaded genius was concerned, it couldn't happen soon enough, even she didn't like the perverse aura coming from the cave.

*****

Three more pairs had been made since Ranma had drawn, but he wasn't in any of them. Much to Akane's ire, she had been paired with her father, who was happy to be dancing with his little girl. Katsuhito had been paired with Kodachi, a circumstance in which the gymnast saw an opportunity to grow closer to her beloved's family, and the old man just found amusing. Finally, Noboyuki had been paired with Mihoshi, and they both were grinning like happy idiots, not really minding either way.

Finally, Tenchi drew his lot, and had drawn the number 3, which elicited a similar response from Ayeka and Ryoko. They both narrowed their eyes, as if trying to look through the box to find their number.

The next girl up drew the number 7, and became Ranma's partner. Ranma hadn't been watching, as he was busy talking with his cousin about unrelated matters, but when he heard his number called, he turned to see that he would be dancing with...
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: The dance-off begins!  Who is Ranma's partner?

choices: It's either Akane and Soun or Sasami and Sasuke
Skip to either Ranma's or Ryoga's dance.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Ranma smiled at his servant. She walked over to him with a smile. She lifted him up and let him sit on her powerful arm. She turned to Tatewaki who gave a reserved bow of the head. He looked back to the remaining two women. Both of whom glared at Tenchi Misaki as intensely as the sun burns the desert. Ayeka's large hand shook as she put it into the lot and pulled it out.

She and Ryoko stopped breathing as Ayeka turned the lot over.

Number 4.

"Noooo," Ayeka moaned.

"Yes!!!!" Ryoko called out. She reached in and pulled out lot number 3. She rushed to Tenchi and pulled him close. Ayeka shook with anger as Tatewaki approached.

"It would seem I am your partner," Tatewaki said. Ayeka nodded.

"So it would seem good host," Ayeka said as she composed herself. "The winner of the competition, they will receive the chance for dinner. Must it be with you?"

"That isn't my intention," Tatewaki said. Ayeka smiled.

"Then I shall enjoy the chance to win," Ayeka said as she looked back to her Tenchi and Ryoko.

"As will I," Tatewaki said as he looked at Shampoo.

----

With the teams set up one partner put their lots back and the box was put next to the DJ. The best four would compete in the semi-finals against another team. Considering the size of the lady dancers, save one, it was agreed the man must keep his feet on the ground unless doing a lift, which couldn't last more than a few seconds. The DJ started the first song and pulled a number. "Number 2," he called out.

Katsuhito and Kodachi rose and walked empty dance floor.

"Sir, thank you for this chance," Kodachi said. The old man nodded and took her hand and placed the other on her waist. Even as her hand encompassed his, she could feel a power inside his smaller body. It was clear he was the one who trained Nodoka Saotome to the powerhouse she is.

They danced a waltz to the modern music. They spun in time and kept good form.

"Most impressive," Katsuhito said softly.

"I have years of gymnastics training. I would often use music to help," Kodachi said.

The song ended and the DJ wrote down some notes. Polite clapping was heard from all around.

"They were good," Cologne said.

"Kiyone, think he would be willing to date Kodachi?" Nabiki asked.

"I don't think she is his type," Kiyone said.

----

"Ryoko," came a voice at her elbow. The muscular woman turned and looked at Nagi with cold eyes.

"What?" Ryoko asked confidently.

"These muscles won't help you dance any better. I saw your form earlier. You're not going to win," Nagi said. She turned and walekd away from the fuming Ryoko. Ryoga was waiting by the punch.

"What's your history with her?" Ryoga asked.

"I'm a bounty hunter and she's my target," Nagi said. "I will take her down. Eventually."

"I know the feeling. I went after Ranma for skipping out on a fight we agreed to," Ryoga said. Nagi nodded.

"Why did he do it?" Nagi asked as she looked at Ranma.

"I couldn't find the place we agreed to fight at. I was lost for four days before I got to the lot behind my house," Ryoga said. Nagi turned slowly and looked at Ryoga. There was no sarcasm or apparent obfuscation. He was being simple and honest.

It took him four days to get to his backyard.

No wonder Cologne said to watch him carefully.

"Okay, the next numer will be 5," the DJ said.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Lovely Lavender

choices: And the winner is...
Talk before the winner is announced
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
It was now Ranma and Shampoo's turn to cut a rug for the contest. It would have been odd to see the lean boy lead a girl who was currently almost twice his height and about 10 times as muscular begin to dance.

Holding her beloved master close, Shampoo danced elegantly as he led her across the floor. Her eyes never left his as she seemed to drown in those grey-blue pools gazed back into hers. While it was always wonderful to be intimate with Ranma, but just holding each other closely and dancing was a lovely change of pace for the two. It was almost a shame to have the song end, as the loving scene they created was almost intoxicating to behold.

While they couldn't say for sure, Shampoo and Ranma ascertained from his smile, that the contest judge had really enjoyed their performance. That being said, they moved off to the side as he called Ryoko and Tenchi to participate.

Ryoko was in heaven, with Tenchi pressed against her muscular form. The boy laughed nervously as his face was brought closer and closer to his partner's breasts with each passing second. The space pirate happily swayed to the rhythm of the music, content that the boy she cared so much for was doing so with her. Of course she wanted to win but as long as they beat Ayeka, she would be satisfied.

Taking down his notes, the DJ called the next pair to the floor. Having been their number that was called the Kuno/Ayeka pair stepped out onto the floor, and prepared to move.

Now that it was their turn, the Jurian princess danced with a furious grace, almost lifting her partner off his feet as she did so. Ayeka was resolute that, if she couldn't be the one to dance with Tenchi, then, at least, she would prove herself to be the better dancer that the boy's bimbo of a partner.

Dancing right after the Ayeka Tatewaki pair, a more comical duo joyously moved to the music. It was hard for the spectators to look at them and not break out in laughter due to the ridiculous size difference between them. Sasami stood well over two meters tall, while her partners, Sasuke, barely reached her mid-thigh. So there they were, him dangling from her grasp as the happy go lucky girl danced with him like one would with a doll.

The last to dance were Ryoga and Nagi. All those who bore witness to the precision and grace with which she moved, were awestruck by the newly arrived girl's moves. She danced with all the professionalism of a Russian ballerina, and with a silent beauty to each of her moves. Ryoga had no words to describe his partner's sublime dance, so relegated himself to be led by her.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: The contest continues

choices: Stay with Ryoga and Nagi or Ranma and his ladies.
Back to Washuu's work
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
With the first round over, the DJ selected the top four. He chose Ranma and Shampoo, Ryoga and Nagi, Tenchi and Ryoko, and lastly Ayeka and Tatewaki.

The next round was a fierce quick dance as Ranma and Shampoo danced at the same time as Tatewaki and Ayeka. The mammoth women and slim men moved in a strange precision that some would have guessed was intentionally choreographed. Both pairs put all they had n the line but sadly for Ayeka and Tatewaki it wasn't enough.

Tatewaki gave a small bow of defeat to Ranma and Shampoo before walking back to a chair to watch. Ayeka held in her anger as Ryoko was snickering.

But the blue-haired pirate got her head in the game as she walked out with Tenchi and faced the tiny pair of Nagi and Ryoga.

When the music started, al was good. The four moved well to the music, neither pair gaining a clear advantage. This angered Ryoko as she couldn't stand the thought of losing to Nagi and her cool expression of a face. That small confidant smile that said, "I am better than you Ryoko. I won't even acknowledge you right now, you are so beneath me" made Ryoko stumble as she lost focus. She heard a gasp as Tenchi 's foot was nearly stepped on by the elephant-like foot.

"Sorry," Ryoko whispered as she tried to get her head back in the game.

But the damage was done. The more she tried to think about moving back in time with the music, the more she was behind it and made a few more missteps.

When the music ended, she knew she had lost. She shook with anger and frustration and was close to releasing it when she felt Tenchi's hand on her thick arm. "That was fun. Maybe we can have more competitions back home like this," Tenchi said with that smile of his.

Between that and remembering Washu made this dress, she felt her anger leave her.

"I think you might be right," Ryoko said with some latent anger there. She and TEnchi went to sit down and before Ayeka could do anything, Ryoko pulle Tenchi to her lap.

Ranma and Shampoo walked out to the content Ryoga and Nagi. Both men nodded to the other and got ready.

A slow waltz started the final dance and both excelled at it. They moved like leaves on a spring breeze. The DJ kept a close eye on both as he shifted the music to a quicker tempo.

The trained fighters didn't miss a beat. With less than a second of new music, they had already caught up to the quicker tempo and were going all out. Shampoo lifted Ranma into the sky and spun around. To counter, Ryoga lifted Nagi up and then Nagi lifted Ryoga up. The new pair moved like they had known the other for years.

Both pairs had smiles, enjoying the fierce competition, leaving all they had on the floor.

When the music ended, all were sweating and breathing hard. Those watching clapped, though Ryoko clapped more for Ranma to win she was impressed by Nagi's skill (and hated her for it).

"Well, the moment of truth," the DJ said. "It is my opinion that the winner is . . . Mister Hibiki and Miss Nagi." Cologne smiled with great pleasure as Ranma turned to Ryoga. Though he was too tired to move right now, his eyes had the same strong spirit.

"Next time, we break the tie" Ranma said. Ryoga nodded.

Ranma fell back against Shampoo, who was weary herself. She felt a pair of strong hands behind her and saw Akane smiling.

"You two were great," she said. "We've decided to call it a night. Want to come with?" Ranma nodded and he and Shampoo followed Akane out as her sisters left first. They gave their thanks and respect to the hosts of the party. Genma and Soun picked up some more food for the next day.

"I had a wonderful time with you Mister Sasuke. Please come to visit before you leave," Sasami said. The small man nodded.

------

Outside the home, once they were a distance away, Akane grew taller than 20ft and picked up the smaller Shampoo and Ranma. "Hey," Ranma said as Akane walked to the dark woods.

"You enjoyed me on Shampoo. Fair is fair Ranma," Akane said. This made Ranma smile and feel a surge of energy.

"Maybe I could do for one more dance," he said.

------

Cologne looked at the sky and felt an ominous air. It made her uneasy.

"That was fun. Thank you Ryoga," Nagi said as they were the last to leave the party. She looked around and gave the younger boy a kiss on the cheek. He blushed and smiled. "Beating Ryoko was really nice."

"I just pushed myself. And you helped me beat Ranma too," Ryoga said.

"So," came an old voice from behind them. The pair turned to see Cologne. "Student, where are you sleeping tonight?"

"Back on my ship or in town," Nagi said.

"Would you please take care of Ryoga for the night? Some business just came up."

"You won't be needing me tonight Master?" Ryoga asked.

"Not at the moment," Cologne said before walking towards where Happosai's seal was. Once out of sight, she started to run.

"Well, I guess now we can get to know each other a bit better," Nagi said. Ryoga nodded and stayed close to Nagi.

The scientific genius checked, and double checked the data she was given by her monitoring devices, and confirmed her worst suspicions. Judging by the rapidly decaying seal and the dramatic increase in the ki that was leaking through it, in a matter of hours Happosai would break free. She looked back at her monitors to check on the progress of the power source, and was very thankful to see that it would be ready in another ten minutes. This gave her just enough time to set it up for Katsuhito so it was ready to go when he arrived.

She could only hope that the others would make it back in time to prevent the worst case scenario.

*****

The woods had finally given way to a small clearing when Akane put her two passengers down on the grass. With a flourish, she removed the fantastic dress that Washu had made for her and turned to look down at her co-lovers.

"This place looks perfect," Akane observed as she gave the others a look of silent expectation. "We should be just far enough away from the house to not bother anyone else at the house. So, why don't you two get more...comfortable."

Eagerly, the master/servant pair complied with the towering muscle mountain of a girl's request, and stripped down to nothing.

Gently, Akane once again picked up her two lovers, and, after reclining on the grass, placed them on her front. It was a feeling of power and control she had never felt before, and she loved every second of it.

After adjusting themselves, the two smaller lovers began to kiss each other deeply, while their audience, and stage, watched.

*****

When Katsuhito entered the household, a very paniced redheaded genius practically tackled him.

"We have to do the sealing ceremony NOW!" Washu yelled as she began to pull the old man back out the door. Sensing the urgency in the woman's voice, the head priest kept a cool head and spoke.

"Take it easy, Washu," he got out after slipping his arm free from her grasp, an odd occurrence considering the fact that her grip could pinch steel girders in half. "First, I need to get the proper gear ready. I shall meet you at the cave in fifteen minutes, and then we can start."

*****

As the muscle mountain that was Akane watched them, Ranma and his amazon slave explored each other passionately. There hands never stopped moving, until Shampoo, in an unusual show of assertiveness, pushed Ranma away. The pigtailed boy looked at her in confusion, until she spoke.

"Ranma, Shampoo wondering if we can do something different this time." she stated. Her crimson eyes gazed into his blue-grey ones expecting an answer.

Ranma, never one to be able to deny such a cute look answered.

"Alright, Shampoo. What do you want to do?"

1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
With a slight apprehension, Shampoo told the pigtailed boy exactly what she wanted him to do.

"If it alright, I is hoping you would worship Shampo muscles." A noticeable blush grew on her cheeks as she continued. "Ranma always saying how much he love Shampoo muscles, now Shampoo want him to show just how much he loves."

Naturally, the muscle-loving boy was happy to comply, planting a loving kiss on her bicep.

*****

Dressed in his full priest garb, Katsuhito left the main shrine building with everything needed to seal the lecherous fiend known as Happosai away once more. While the chance of success was much lower than he had hoped, the old man had faith that Washu's scientific genius and his sealing arts would prevail in the end. After a quick double check of all his tools, he headed straight towards Happosai's resting place.

Waiting for him at the entrance of the cave was Washu, her robotic drones putting the final touches on the array of machinery that would become the seal's source of power. The red-headed genius had a look of consternation upon her face.

"It's about time you got here. I already have the power source ready to go, and according to the readings I'm getting, he'll escape within the hour!"

"I understand, but this is a very complicated ritual, and I will need some time to set up. If we are so pressed on time, I would appreciate some help in doing so."

"No problem. Just tell my robots what to do, and it will be done." With a cocky grin, and a snap of her fingers, Washu had a lineup of drones at the ready.

"Very good. I'll let you know when we can begin." Katsuhito said, and began to guide his floating robotic helpers on what to do.

*****

His lips planted delicate kisses up the muscular amazon's arm, feeling every vein and muscle that pushed up from the skin. Shampoo's mild, flowery scent filled his nose, and was almost intoxicating.

The tender worship she was experiencing was working Shampoo into a heated sexual frenzy. It was exhilarating to feel her master show his love for her muscles with more than words. Her body trembled in anticipation as his lips trailed up her arm and across her broad, powerful chest.

*****

With the power apparatus charging up, and his tools at the ready, Katsuhito Masaki was now fully prepared to seal away the pervert Happosai for good. If what Washu had said could be believed, after he finished the seal, her device would be able to provide a self-sustained source of energy to feed said seal for eons. With such high hopes as to be rid of that little gnome for eternity, the old priest began to chant, and perform intricate movements to begin the process.

Naturally, Washu was not one to miss a chance to study such an interesting ability such as sealing, and already had multiple sensors and measurement tools recording the whole thing. She wouldn't let one iota of data slip by, no matter how small.

As the ceremony progressed, the entrance of the cave began to emit light, signifying the activation of the seal, and its restructuring. Had things gone as planned, this light would have been the only indication that anything had happened at all, but that was not meant to be.

The first indication something was wrong, was a deep rumble from within the cave, which spread out powerful tremors from the epicenter. The old priest barely managed to keep his feet and continue, his face showing the slightest hint of worry as he did so. Next came the cracks that appeared around the mouth of the cave, from which fell bits or rock and dust.

"What's going on?!" Washu yelled towards the old man, as the tremors increased in strength to the point were it was visibly shaking the ground beneath them.

"Happosai has regained consciousness and is fighting back the seal! I need to finish this quickly, or he will break free!"

His chanting became strained, and his movements more forced as Katsuhito attempted to finish his work before the worst case scenario could happen. The light around the cave intensified, blaring as bright as the sun, as the priest pushed more power into the seal. Unfortunately, it was too little, too late.

"SWEETOOOOOOO!!!!!" called a voice from inside the cave, a voice that the old Masaki had hoped to never hear again. He made a move to block the freed pervert's path, but just missed grabbing a small blur that whizzed by him.

Happosai was free, and he was heading towards the great deal of chi and lust he could feel coming from the woods near the shrine.

Akane watched with an envious smile as Ranma buried his face deep in Shampoo's cleavage, not just going for the soft mammary but the powerful pectoral muscles.

She felt a yearning down below as she watched. She wanted to feel what SHampoo was feeling to, but more than that, she wanted to kiss Shampoo and hold her. She was important to Ranma. Now she had him and if being with him meant sharing, so be it.

"Sweeeetooooo!" came a voice in the darkness. The embracing couple didn't seem to notice but then something landed on her nipple. A small man, who was not much larger than her nipple, whistled. "Amazons certainly have gotten bigger." He turned his huge eyes to Akane. "Much bigger."

"Hey! Leave us," Akane growled. Her tone shook Shampoo from her euphoria and her tree trunk arms pulled Ranma behind her as she noticed the newcomer.

"But I just got here and these beauties are so big and wonderful," Happosai said with a smile. He leaned down to kiss the breast whenAkane swiped her hand at him. The man jumped like a flea and dodged.

"Me?" Happosai asked. He laughed and it was dark enough to make all shudder. "I am just a harmless old man who likes large women."

"Hey, are you Happosai?" Ranma guessed. The man smiled.

"Very good. I must say, to have two Amazons as your lovers is quite a feat boy," Happosai said. He studied Ranma's face and then looked at Akane's. "But you look familiar too. All of you in fact."

----------

"Shampoo thinking that deal with little troll is bad idea. Great-grandmother have reasons to turn Happosai down, and Shampoo think it was for best."

It didn't take much more than that to convince Akane and Ranma. If the elder amazon had refused such an offer, even though bringing in more strength to the tribe was normally considered a good thing, than there must be more to it than just a power up. If they really thought about it, wasn't this old pervert sealed for a reason.

"Shampoo's got a point," Ranma said, confirming his contention to the idea of making a deal with the lech. "I don't think that this pervert will give us something like that without getting something in return. It was obviously something that Cologne couldn't possibly agree to, and I think that we should do the same."

The two girls nodded, both agreeing with the logic behind Ranma's words. There was something untrustworthy about the little troll, something that told them that whatever he had to offer was costly.

"Very well, I shall accept your decision for now, but perhaps a quick demonstration of my method will convince you otherwise."

Happosai leaped forwards at Ranma, arms extended in preparation for a grapple hold. His attack was quickly diverted by the teenage martial arts prodigy, sending the old man towards a tree. With a tuck and spin, the letch rebounded off the trunk and back at the pigtailed, naked boy.

"What the hell did you do to me?!" he cursed at the old man.

"That, my boy was my secret technique. With a touch, I can absorb the ki from your body into mine, adding it to my own. Your strength, and skills come with it. Just that slight graze was enough to shock your system with the sudden loss of strength and ki. Why, I bet I set you back a month with just that one glancing blow." The old man cackled at the weakened boy.

"Get lost, you pervert!!!!" Akane shouted as she used one big hand to try and smack the old man into next week.

Pulling out her floating computer from nowhere, Washu began to check her various monitors around the shrine's land, and answered. "Unfortunately, no. He is no longer within tracking distance of any of my sensors."

"Then we have failed to stop him this time. If he has already escaped the grounds, then we have no hope of catching him tonight. For now, I suggest that you all return to the house for some much needed rest and a bath."

They walked into the nice hotel and the man at the desk looked worried. "One room for the night please. Two beds," Nagi said.
