Ryoga stood in the doorway of the high end hotel room usually reserved for a newly married couples. It was bad enough that he was in a room where many newly weds had their first time as man and wife, but the fact that there was only one available bed made it a thousand times more embarrassing.

At his side Nagi stood with a slightly more aloof feeling. She had been a professional bounty hunter for years, and knew how to deal with unusual sleeping conditions, so this was nothing new to her. Sure, there was a certain base attraction she felt for the boy, but it wasn't enough to make her uncomfortable sharing a room, or bed, with him. She was a professional, after all.

*****

After his daring escape, Happosai had hopped a train heading towards Nerima, and contemplated what was to come next. He took a seat on the smooth roof of the train car, and pulled out his pipe. No matter what, he knew it was going to be a hoot and a holler one way or another, especially with that enviable boy of Genma's, and his harem of muscle women.

"That boy's got it made," he said appreciatively, "sticking around to train them should be fun." With a drag off his pipe, the diminutive master of Anything Goes martial arts began to chuckle.

*****

Both boys looked at the collected group of amazonian muscle women that encircled them. They were filled with excitement and a great deal of nervousness at what the near future would bring.

"Okay," Ranma spoke at the massive ladies before him, "exactly what does this mean simple terms?"

Sly smiles crossed the faces of every woman in the room, and it was once again Shampoo who answered him.

"Simply put, it means..."
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: "Just kiss us and love us dearly."

choices: When Ranma gets to the dojo, he finds a note for him from Happosai.
On the ship, Nagi asks what Ryoga's freedom would cost her.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
"We will take turns. You will be with us and Tenchi will be with you," Shampoo said. The mighty Sasami held up a tiny ticket.

"And I get to be first," she said with a smile.

"You do huh?" Tenchi asked.

"Out of civility, we chose to draw lots for this wonderful position," Ayeka said. Tenchi nodded. He walked towards the pretty young maiden.

"So, do I choose then?" Ranma asked as he looked at the five lovely ladies.

"Well, you recently had me and Shampoo, so we agreed to be last," Akane said.

"And since I haven't been with you, they offered me the chance," Ukyo said. Ranma nodded and walked toward the chef.

--------

Ryoga was laying on one side of the very nice and soft bed. Nagi on the other. She didn't change out of her clothes as she laid on the bed. She smelled different from the Mistress. It was . . . for lack of a better term, alien. But he didn't mind it. It was soothing and he soon closed his eyes to sleep.

Nagi continued to glance over at her bedmate. She thought about what he told her earlier, about his life, his frequently getting lost, what it was like being the slave to that mammoth woman. She had seen some odd couples in her years, so really took no surprise there. What she didn't like was this version of indentured servitude with a sexual requirement to release him.

Maybe she could help him be free. Give her people some technology or help and simply ask for his freedom as the price. She nodded and closed her eyes.

--------

Dawn came to the world and Ranma was thoroughly tired. It had been a while since he pushed himself that much in a night. From the sex with Akane, then the dancing, then with Shampoo, then with all the ladies he was close to, it was a real wild ride for him and Ranma Jr. Ranma found himself not on some female nude body but a deep purple mat. It seemed a light rain came sometime in the night.

Ranma was a nude skinny woman and under her was a giant tiger. Her purrs soothed Ranma and made her almost want to sleep again.

"Oh good, you're up," came Kasumi's voice. Ranma turned to see the titan woman. She had a tea pot in her had. "Want to get changed?" Ranma nodded and watched as Kasumi reached to pick her up.

A deep growl came from Shampoo. Her eyes flicked open and she stopped. She glanced at herself and nodded. Focusing her mind, she began to shrink down in size. Ranma felt the world go down as Shampoo went from felinus major to only a tiger-size cat.

Kasumi poured the hot water over them and they shifted back.

-------

Ryoga felt something nice in his hand. Slowly he opened his eyes and saw his hand was being held by Nagi's. Carefully, he pulled it free and she didn't seem to notice. She probably does that with everyone she rested with.

------

An hour or so past and everyone was up and had one final quick meal together. Tenchi and his cousin said good-bye. Their muscular ladies hugged. a daughter said goodbye to her father. Soun and Genma were worried what Happosai might do now he was free but didn't let it show.

The group headed off to the train station, with the enhanced women having to keep themselves small for travel sake.

"Man. You get used to being ten feet tall and then everything's wrong when you are smaller," Nabiki said.

"It is an adjustment," Kasumi said.

"Shampoo wonders if she could run faster than train in cat form?" Shampoo mused as she sat down and Ranma on her lap.

"Could be something to test," Ranma said.

------

"We aren't going by train?" Ryoga asked as he and Cologne walked with Nagi to the park. A strange creature came out.

"No. I have a quicker means," Nagi said. Her furry creature jumped into the air and became a crystal-like ship.

"Now, that is impressive," Cologne whispered. They boarded and Nagi took their directions to Nerima.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Final Night

choices: Kodachi and Tatewaki return home
Meeting Happosai
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
The trip back was uneventful, something for which they were all slightly thankful. The trip to Ranma's cousin's house had been fun, but it had been an exhausting one, even for the ladies. Ranma had spent most of the time on the train sleeping peacefully in Shampoo's lap, something every girl on the train found to be absolutely adorable. Needless to say, there was plenty of photo evidence to embarrass the boy with later.

Ranma awoke when the train jerked to a stop at their destination. The happy face of his amazonian lover was his first sight when his eyes blinked open. There wasn't a more perfect sight to wake up to in his opinion. The rest of the journey home was a short walk from the train station back to the dojo.

When the group arrived home, Kasumi was the first to enter, making sure that she had all of her luggage put away so that she could get back to working on the housework that had been neglected during their trip. While the eldest Tendo left to continue her cleaning and cooking, the others dispersed into the house. Nabiki followed Kasumi up the stairs so she too could unpack. Akane made a dash down the hall, intent on using the toilet, as she had been holding it in since they left the train station. The two fathers dropped their travel bags and went to play a game in the living room.

Ranma and Shampoo were left alone in the entrance. Both of them felt the desire to relax, and, for the two of them, the best place for that was the dojo. Setting their bags out of the way, the master and servant pair entered the practice area.

It was a refreshing sight after the trip to his cousin's place, and even though Ranma was thankful he got to meet more of his family, it was nice to be back. Taking in the familiar, and calming atmosphere, the pigtailed boy paced around the room, stretching and limbering himself up for a quick practice session. It was during this walk around the dojo that he found a scrap of paper, inexplicably placed in the middle of the wood floor. Reaching down, the young fighter picked up the paper, and saw what it was.

Somehow, the perverted Happosai had managed to beat them back home, and left a message for them to find.

Meet me at the girls usual training place tomorrow night at 6.

-Happosai

Beckoning over to Shampoo, Ranma shared the contents of the note with her, and would do so with Akane later. For now, though, the smell of Kasumi's cooking had wafted into the dojo, making both his and Shampoo's stomachs growl monstrously. Not long after, the older girl's sweet voice called them to eat.

*****

Cologne, Ryoga and Nagi had arrived home before the Tendo/Saotome party. They would have gotten back sooner, but Cologne had insisted that they take time to enjoy the ride on the ship. One does not often get the chance to see the Earth from the moon, and it wasn't something the old amazon was going to miss.

Ryoga had acted the role of the gentleman, and carried the ladies bags into the building, despite the fact that one of them was easily much stronger than him. He placed the bags in their respective rooms, and went to help Cologne prepare the cafe to open. It may have been later than usual, but it was important not to disappoint your regular customers.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Happosai's note and settling back in

choices: Stay with Akane and Shampoo or the Amazons
Back to the photo shoot prep.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
The next day Akane and Shampoo were worried. The elder sisters enjoyed training and showing off their strength before Ranma just like they did. They might come with them to the session and could be against what they were going to do to Kodachi. (Well, more Kasumi than Nabiki). But shortly after they got home from school, Kasumi approached Nabiki.

"Sister, I received a call for a shoot this evening. A gentleman saw our work in Cologne's menue and had a shoot in mind," Kasumi said.

"Really?" Nabiki said with a smile. "Are we shooting tonight?"

"No, just discussing things and setting them up," Kasumi said. Nabiki smiled and nodded. Easy money for clothes and other gifts would be nice.

"Alright. When do we meet?" Nabiki asked.

"We must be there by 5:45 and it is a fifteen minute walk," Kasumi said. Nabiki nodded.

"Well, good thing I got only a little homework," Nabiki said. Kasumi nodded.

-------

Kodachi set down the phone and smiled. "Brother, I have another photo shoot. I will be gone for part of the night," Kodachi said.

"Be well sister," Tatewaki said as he closed his eyes and remembered the wonderful dances he had over the weekend.

--------

Cologne looked at the tiny woman before her. "You think you can purchase him from me?" Cologne asked.

"I think you have agreed to the idea Ryoga's freedom has a price. I'm just haggling to what that price may be," Nagi said. The young man wasn't present in the room. He was taking out the trash and cleaning up before the dinner rush.

"Are you offering money?" Cologne asked.

"I have some funds in bank accounts. They can be exchanged for the local currency. I also have technology I'd be willing to give you or your village," Nagi said.

"Why? Why do this for Ryoga?" Cologne asked in a neutral tone.

"Because I loathe slavery," Nagi replied. Cologne chuckled.

"The young man is prideful. You save him, he might just seek to serve you, regardless of your desires for him to be your slave," Cologne said.

"I know but I don't want to see him forced to serve you if there is a chance," Nagi said. Cologne nodded.

---------

At 6, three people waited in the abandoned lot. Akane, Shampoo, and Ranma kept a close eye on everything. From the lengthening shadows, a small form appeared.

"Good evening," Happosai said. "I'm glad that you came."

"Thank you Teacher," Akane said with a bow. Shampoo copied her.

"Please teach us your secrets," Shampoo said.

"You know, it is fortunate there are two of you. You can practice on each other until you get it down for proper combat," Happosai mused. "Well, that aside, let's start with your first lesson." Both his students nodded.

Ranma watched carefully.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Meetings and Shootings

choices: Happosai and his students
The photo shoot
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Happosai gave all three of them an appraising look over, judging just where they were at skill wise, before he continued speaking.

"First of all, I think it would be a good idea to move to a new location that I found. I only called you here because I heard around the neighborhood that this is where you train regularly. For now, I want to keep my presence a secret, so please follow me to a more secluded area that I found while exploring the town."

The old master beckoned them to follow, before he leaped onto the nearest rooftop. His new students following closely behind him.

*****

Cologne and Nagi continued their conversation about Ryoga's enslavement to the former. While Nagi had brought up many good points, it was all ultimately for nothing.

"I hear what you are saying, girl, but this is not a matter of money, it is a matter of honor. I am sorry, but until Ryoga finishes his duties to me, I cannot release him from his servitude on my honor as an amazon matriarch."

Nagi grit her teeth in anger. Sure, she could somewhat understand the woman's reasons for not complying with her request, but it still pissed her off. Amazonian culture was a pain in the ass, as far as she was concerned, and her complete ignorance of its specifics would probably work against her if she was to train under the old matriarch. She would have to know more if she wished to continue her training here, and maybe she might find a way to help Ryoga out as well.

After asking Cologne, the elder amazon happily gave her a printed copy of the tribes laws.

"Have fun reading it," the old muscle woman chuckled as she left the room.

*****

It had taken Kodachi a while, but she was finally ready to go meet her client. The time spent on her trip had been enjoyable, spending time with her precious Ranma had greatly relaxed her, but now it was time to get back to business.

Her bag packed and ready with everything she might need, from combs to asprin, the large girl left the house in one of her family's nicer cars. It paid to make an impression on the client even before they saw her, after all.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Stay with Akane and Shampoo or the Amazons

choices: Stay with Happosai's training
Back to Kasumi or the Amazons.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Kasumi walked in a nice outfit Miss Washu had made as a going away present. Nabiki wore hers as well. They walked in mostly silence until they saw Kasumi's studio. "Still can't believe you kept this a secret for so long," Nabiki muttered.

"It helps that you don't buy the things I sell too. And I've noticed even with an enhanced body, changing my expression and clothes can make people not think it is me," Kasumi said. Light flared up behind them as a nice car rode by slowly. The window dropped enough for Kodachi's eyes to be seen as she glared at them.

"Oh wonderful," Nabiki muttered.

"Tendos," Kodachi said before the car pulled ahead.

Two men were waiting for them. "The one with the blue suit is Hiro, my agent," Kasumi said. Nabiki nodded and watched as he opened Kodachi's door for her.

"I am Kodachi Kuno. Sir, thank you for this chance," Kodachi said formally. But Hiro held up his hand

"Please wait until everyone is here," Hiro said. Kodachi's smile seemed fixed but she nodded.

"Of course sir," Kodachi said.

Kasumi and Nabiki arrived not a minute later. Both bowed.

"Miss Tendo, it is a pleasure meeting you," the man in a gray suit said with a smile. He looked at Nabiki with the same smile. "I am Akira." Kasumi bowed.

"Thank you for this opportunity. I am Kasumi Tendo. This is my younger sister Nabiki," Kasumi said. Nabiki bowed.

"Well, shall we go to the restaurant?" Hiro said.

"Restaurant?" Nabiki muttered.

"Of course. I don't like to talk business in stuffy office spaces," Akira said. "And I imagine your bodies require sufficient sustinance to maintain such . . . amazing figures."

"That sounds most lovely," Kodachi said warmly. Nabiki was impressed by how well she could fake it.

A second limo drove up, larger than Kodachi's, which seemed large enough to fit each muscle girl.

And they did too. A bit cramped but they didn't complain.

-------

Happosai took them to the warehouse district. A nice area with few people around. "Um, could we be trespassing?" Ranma asked.

"While my training your fathers might have dabbled in some unwelcomed places, I am smarter than to risk a chance Cologne could catch me over burglary," Happosai said as he pulled out a key and unlocked a door. "I have rented this place under a false name. One advantage of my sealing is the compound interest on my bank accounts." The old man cackled a little.

The expansive area was certainly a place the two muscle girls could grow in, but not to their full heights. "This is wonderful Master. Now, this technique," Akane said. Happosai nodded.

"To start with, I need to examine you and your bodies closely. I need to see where your ki paths are so I can direct you to the proper technique," Happosai said. "It would help if there are no clothes on your body."

"Is it the only way master?" Akane asked.

"No, but it will help give me greater accuracy," Happosai said. "I had the advantage of being close with Cologne and helping as a medic in the village to study those women. You are different, stronger and larger than they ever were. I need to make sure the paths are right or you could suffer for it."

---------

They got out at a restaurant Nabiki only heard about but never thought she could afford. Kasumi came next. "Oh, I hope they still have that special," Kasumi whispered. Nabiki glanced at her sister and wondered what else she could have hidden.

The other three got out and they entered the restaurant.

---------

Nagi was skimming through the thick book. There had to be a way to help Ryoga.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: The Plan and The Technique

choices: Ryoga was preoccupied with a horny Cologne
Ryoga was sound asleep
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
"First of all," Happosai began, using his most instructive voice, "to learn this technique, you must learn all about proper ki control."

"I already know how to use ki, old man," Ranma explained disrespectfully.

"Sure, you know how to send ki to your limbs to slightly boosted speed and strength, but that's just beginner's stuff. No, I'm afraid that you, all three of you," he said as his eyes scanned over his new students, "have much to learn in this area. Don't worry though, this is usually the last thing most martial artists master, as it is the trickiest, and with my teaching it shouldn't take you too long. So, for today, I want to start you off with a ki exercise that will help you better understand how it flows in the body."

Happosai continued with his teachings, having his students take a meditative position, and talking them through the exercise.

*****

After a long time of reading and re-reading the amazonian law book, Nagi had finally found something that might help free Ryoga from his enslavement. It was a fairly new article of law, considering most of the laws were over a thousand years old, and it provided an honorable way to be freed by the tribe.

Apparently, years and years ago, a thief had stolen a multitude of treasures from the amazons, leaving them shamed and dishonored. If a slave was able to recover on of these lost artifacts, they would be given their freedom for doing a service to the tribe as a whole. Also, it just so happened that this thief was the very same person she had heard Cologne talking about escaping just a short time ago.

It was a perfect way to earn the young man his freedom. So, book in hand, Nagi went to find Ryoga and give him the good news.

*****

The other restaurant patrons stared as the three muscular women continued to eat their meal. Piles of plates were being carried away by overloaded servers. It wasn't just the amount of food they had eaten that was surprising, it was the fact that they had done so while still keeping an air of elegance and grace that never faltered.

"Now ladies," Akira said during a pause in the meal, "I wish to discuss the particular assignment I have for you. It would involve working together for a commercial we are producing for my company."

Kasumi didn't save a word. She had plenty of experience doing photo shoots, it was her bread and butter, but being in front of a camera and having to pose on screen was something that was new to her. However, her professionalism, and love of the job overcame these doubts for the time being.

"Okay, but I've never done anything that would be on television before. Are you sure?"

"Absolutely!" Akira answered without a doubt, "We've seen your work, and we believe that you would be perfect."

"Excuse me sir," Kodachi interrupted, "but I, also, have never done any televised work. Are you sure you wouldn't do better with trained actors?"

While Kodachi wasn't one to sell herself short, she also wasn't about to make a fool of herself on camera.

"Don't worry. What I have in mind won't require you to read any lines. What I want is to give our customers a real look at what those muscles you have can do."

*****

Nagi stood outside Ryoga's room, book in hand. She knocked, only to find no one was answering. She knocked again, but still no response. It wasn't like he had left the building, he wasn't allowed to without someone escorting him, and she hadn't seen him anywhere else in the building.

Instead of trying again later, Nagi quietly opened the door and peered inside.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Happosai's training, a commercial, and a loophole

choices: Stay with Cologne or back to Ryoga.
Back to Kasumi's meal or Akane's training.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Nagi walked in on the lonely Ryoga. A note was on his bedside.

"Boy,
I have some business to do after we close up for the night. Rest well. I may come calling later, so be ready with clean sheets.
Cologne."

Nagi grimaced at the sight of it. Gently she knelt down and shook his strong arm. Ryoga opened his eyes right away.

"Master, I'm up and ready," he said.

"Good, but I'm not Cologne," Nagi said. Ryoga blinked in the darkness and turned on the bedside lamp. He looked at Nagi's cool face.

"Miss Nagi, what do you want?" Ryoga asked. He glanced at his groin.

"Not that. Tell me, do you want to be free from Cologne?" His eyes widened just a little.

"I do . . . but I won't be for nearly ten years," Ryoga replied.

"Not necessarily,' Nagi said. "There is another way." Ryoga turned his head to Nagi.

"What?" he asked as hope glimmered in his eyes. Fear was there too. Fear of this being just some unobtainable goal, of him failing.

"That man who escaped the Masaki shrine, he stole many treasures. If we can find even one and you give it to Cologne, you can be free," Nagi answered.

"No. No, that can't be right," Ryoga said. "Why . . . Why didn't Master tell me of that chance?"

"Honestly,, I think it is your habit of getting lost that held her back, so you didn't end up gone forever," Nagi said. Ryoga nodded. He heard Nagi press some button.

"Then, I don't think she will let me go now," Ryoga said. He sighed in defeat.

"Don't give up yet," Nagi said as a soft thunping was heard entering the room. A familiar "Nya?" was heard and Nagi went to the window. She pulled back the curtains and Ryoga saw Ken-Ohki smiling at him.

"Wait, we're going now?" Ryoga asked.

"I don't want to lose the man's trail," Nagi said.

"You have it? I don't think Cologne will like that fact," Ryoga said as he got out of bed. He put on some pants over his underwear.

"No. Washuu sent me some data on this man. If he's in the area, I have a way to draw him out," Nagi said with a smile. It was both scary and nice, Ryoga thought.

"How?" Ryoga asked.

"Ryoga, I'm a bounty hunter. I know a thing or two about setting traps," Nagi said. She opened the window and Ken-ohki jumped out. He changed and sent a teleport beam into the room, taking Nagi and Ryoga with him before rising up into the sky.

-------

"So, will we be lifting heavy things?" Nabiki injected as she sipped her drink. Akira nodded.

"Correct. With such amazingly large women as yourselves, I have several demonstrations in mind," Akira said. Nabiki nodded. Kasumi watched her sister and knew that was her merchant face. She was in a selling mood.

"Tell me, do you believe in magic?" Nabiki asked. Akira chuckled as Hiro looked at Kasumi to rail in her sister before ruining this chance.

"Nabiki, are you thinking talking about that thing we had done out of town a few days ago?" Kasumi asked with a smile. Kodachi held in her anger.

What sort of tricks or enhancements did they get but she was denied? She barely had any chance to be with Ranma. No. No. Now she must be calm. This could be a very nice deal.

"I am, dear sister," Nabiki said. She looked to Akira. "Well, sir?"

"I believe there are things we can't explain," the man said. "Why?" Nabiki smiled and sheemed to shudder. Something seemed different about her.

"Yes sister," Kasumi said. Gently, the mountain of muscle rose up. Nabiki soon followed and both Akira and Hiro's eyes nearly fell from their faces. Kodachi grimaced as her fears were confirmed.

When they arrived, Akira noted Kasumi and Nabiki were the same height. Kasumi might have been a hair taller. Now Nabiki was inches taller. It couldn't be. It shouldn't have happened but . . .

"Now this is interesting," Akira said.

-----------

Cologne walked the silent streets. She had no viable reason to think so, but her gut told her Happosai was present. He was somewhere in this city. Why? Why?

He was never scared of her size or strength. That much was certain. He loved her strength. Loved it . . . too much.

Maybe he followed Akane and Shampoo here, wanting to touch them and take their large panties.

Perhaps she could have Nagi watch them to be safe. Cologne nodded.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Alone, Power, and Guts

choices: Happosai finishes his lesson
Back to Ryoga and Nagi
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Ranma, Akane, and Shampoo sat in a circle, backs facing each other, feeling the flow of their ki move through their bodies.

"Remember, you have to push all distractions from your mind," Happosai explained, "your focus should be entirely on yourself."

While he was making good progress with feeling his ki, Ranma was becoming slightly impatient. For the last hour or so, they had done nothing more than sit in place and finding their centers, and this was starting to get to the boy. Sure, he had learned how to meditate properly, but he was someone who would become restless if they stood still for too long a time, and he was now at his limit.

"Isn't there a quicker way to learn this technique, old man?" Ranma asked, letting his legs disentangle and his eyes open.

"Sorry, m'boy, but this skill requires absolute awareness of your, and your opponents, ki. To even hope to learn this ability, this exercise is essential."

Akane was the next to chime in, also starting to feel slightly stir crazy, "I have to side with Ranma. Surely there's some way to get the same result without all this."

"Shampoo want to know, too." the purple haired muscle goddess insisted.

Eyes narrowed in thought, Happosai said nothing for a moment. He could tell that trying to train these three was going to be a challenge far beyond Soun and Genma's own training. If he wanted to make sure they stuck to his teaching method, perhaps a cautionary tale was necessary.

"There is one way that I know of that could produce similar results. However, I must warn you that this requires the repeated usage of several pressure points, and could very well have lasting effects."

Ranma, Akane, and Shampoo all leaned in closer to hear the old man. Seeing that he had an attentive audience, the old perverted master continued.

"As you said, there is a way to get nearly identical results in a much shorter period of time Yes, I have taught it to one other person before, but after seeing what the after effects of that dreaded technique were, I would highly suggest against it."

Letting his introduction sink in, Happosai carefully chose his next words.

"You see, the only person I have shown this to was a weak, hospitalized little girl many years ago. Upon seeing this poor little dear on one of my visits with the nurses, I took it upon myself to help her get back on her feet. After manipulating a few of her pressure points, I made the sweet girl able to absorb the battle aura of other people. She could metabolize these auras into muscle of strength and size equal even to yours," Happosai pointed to Shampoo and Akane. "Unfortunately, she can only stay in that state as long as she retains the absorbed ki. When that ki is released, she would revert to her normal form, that of a little girl, a form she will have for a long time to come, regardless of her true age."

His three students mouths hanging open in shock, said nothing.

"Now, does any of you still wish to take a shortcut?"

None of his students pursued the technique any further.

*****

"I've seen all I needed," Akira said with a big smile. "You three really are perfect for what I had in mind."

"Glad to hear it," Nabiki said smugly.

The four of them talked until the check was paid, and the dishes were taken. They then returned to the limo, and escorted back home.

Kodachi left with a feeling that she needed to get some more time with Ranma, or else she would be forgotten among the ever growing girls with whom he lived.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: A cautionary tale from Happosai

choices: He saw a large pair in someone's window.  He couldn't resist.
Cologne was on the street below!
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
"So, how will we trap him?" Ryoga asked.

"With these," Nagi said. She pulled out a pair of panties Ryoga was sure could only fit on his mistress or one of the Tendos. She was also holding a watch.

"You stole Master's panties?" Ryoga asked.

"No. I asked around and found the one place in this town which sells oversized clothing and said I was buying for one of the enlarged women," Nagi said. Ryoga nodded.

"And the other one?" Ryoga asked.

"A holo-suit," Nagi said. "For a short time it will protect a physical image of another body. I've used it to infiltrate some places looking like another person." She put it on and tapped the active button. A flash of light appeared and she was dressed like Cologne and just as large. She even seemed taller too. Ryoga gulped and smiled.

"Wow. How . . . How can it do that?" Ryoga asked.

"By refracting light within a matrix. I don't know the total readon, but it is effective. This evening, we'll be at an apartment with this hanging outside my window and me fake sleeping in a bed," Nagi said.

"And do you think you could capture him so easily?" Ryoga asked.

"Considering these have a paralysis toxin able to stop a gregunth in its tracks, it should hold him for a few seconds," Nagi said.

"What's a gregunth?" Ryoga asked.

"A creature from Rtiolpa IV. About three times the size of your elephant and a lot more dangerous," Nagi said. Ryoga nodded as Nagi walked to the teleport pad. "Now come on. You need to be the one to ask him about the stolen goods." Ryoga nodded and walked towards her large form. They teleported down.

-----------

"More like I had him in a brief weak spot. We used a bra for a woman your size to lure him in. When he nearly escaped, I threatened to destroy them. As a good faith payment, Nagi gave him her bra," Ryoga said. Cologne nodded.

"He told us about a shrine he buried the necklace at and we went there this night. We found it and retrieved it from the shrine personal," Ryoga said. Cologne nodded and touched the necklace.

"If this is the genuine article, I will give you your freedom and owe you a debt, Mister Hibiki," Cologne said softly.

"Please come outside then, for verification," Ryoga said. Cologne's eyebrow raised and followed him outside. From the shadows of the building, a woman emerged as tall and powerful as her great-grandchild.

"Do you have any clothes that could fit me?" Nagi asked.

"Verification affirmed," Cologne said with a smile.

By sunrise, Nagi had another set of clothes while Cologne sent word to the homeland of the find and some material they made for the strongest of women. Ryoga was allowed to stay at the cafe and work there for a paying job now. Cologne also agreed to show Nagi how to fight with such a body.

-------

Kodach continued her training and lifting. Though she wanted to show off more to Ranma, she heard from her brother the women in his life were not letting him go very far alone. So, she found another way to entice him. She had Sasuke take a photo of her lifting set. The car, which was a little on the smaller side, was soon replaced with a larger car. It seemed an effective way to contact him and arouse his interest.

Soon she would be up to a large truck.

Nothing could stop her now.

-------------

Ranma looked at the photo of the larger car. Ever since the night of the spar, when he arrived home to an awakened Shampoo, he explained he was in the mood for a quick run, hence the sweat and exhaustion, neither she nor the Tendos or Ukyo left him alone for a long time. When a few days past and the car photo showed up, he knew what it meant and had to hide his excitement and made him curious, what could his girls lift in their smallest forms?

He didn't ask, for fear of not being able to cover his tracks, and life resumed most normally. The big deal for Kasumi and Nabiki was approaching. Ukyo was enjoying her new strength. And their training with the old master was nearly complete.

He watched today as Akane made the hand gestures and focused her ki. Shampoo stood before her and resisted as best she could, but the draining was happening. Shampoo was growing smaller and smaller. When Shampoo had shrunk about a foot and the powerful Akane was even larger, Happosai clapped his hands and Akane stopped. Akane looked at her powerful body and flexed.

"Don't get used to it," Shampoo said.

"Well done Akane. That was a perfect balance of everything. Now Shampoo, your turn," Happosai said. The purple haired woman nodded and copied what Akane did before. The titanic Tendo likewise resisted.

Slowly she shrank down and Happosai stopped them when they were about even.

Happosai nodded with a smile. His maidens were ready. He knew Cologne was looking for him. She came to where he left Nagi's bra. While he accepted the gift, he wasn't too stupid to not test it to make sure it wasn't being traced by some means. He would have to work out a way to remove the tracer if he wanted to add that exotic one to his genuine collection.

"Now it's time to reclaim what Kodachi stole from me," Akane said with a smile.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Of Debts and Cars

choices: Kodachi and Akane's fight
Kasumi and Nabiki prepare for their new job
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
At a small, secluded shrine, where once the a mysterious power dwelt, a group of priests and priestesses were setting into motion a chain of events which would have far reaching consequences. In the center of a small circle of shrine caretakers stood a woman who was much taller than anyone there, and with a body build that dwarfed everyone at the meeting.

"Thank you all for coming," the muscular priestess bowed deeply to her honored guests. Each and every one of them wearing the traditional clothes of their particular shrines. Everyone there was either a friend or close acquaintance the two caretakers of the muscle shrine had met over the years. "As I have told you, two of our temple's sacred relics has been stolen, taking with it our shrine's power. I wish to implore you, my friends, for your assistance in retrieving them."

The guests spoke words of outrage, as even the thought of someone desecrating holy ground was so wrong, that it filled them with righteous anger. Fists were clenched in fury, and teethed gnashed as their voices grew hoarse from their indignant yells.

"Who would be so bold as to steal from a temple?!" one of the guests demanded.

"There were two of them," the shrine's priest answered, "One was a male, with a tiger-striped bandana and fangs, the other was an attractive female, with pointed ears, and facial markings."

"Clearly, some kind of demons," one of the guests muttered with a hand on his chin.

"Yes, so again, I ask each of you for your help."

The meeting soon dispersed, each person leaving with a mission to reclaim their comrade's sacred objects.

*****

Akane, Shampoo, and Ranma stood before the gates of the Kuno estate. After some debate, it was decided that the best way to remove the Kuno girl's ill gotten muscle was in a fair fight, anything else wouldn't sit well with Akane. The Tendo girl's hands were clenched tightly as she prepared to punish the girl who used her DNA to craft an muscular amazon body of her own. When she reached to ring the buzzer at the gate, her finger almost went pierced through to the other side. The reply was quick, as both Kodachi and Tatewaki walked out of the massive mansion.

"My beloved Akane, and beautiful amazon, have you finally decided to confess your love to my glorious self?" the egotistical boy asked with a puffed out chest, before he was quickly tossed aside by his much bigger sister.

"Darling Ranma," Kodachi cooed, her hands clasped before her, "what brings you to my home today?"

"Kodachi!" Akane called, "I challenge you to a duel!"

The other girl blinked, dumbstruck at what she had just heard. When she had seen Ranma outside her home, her vision narrowed, and anything other than Ranma was ignored.

"Well, do you accept?" Akane demanded.

Shaking off her initial shock, Kodachi simply nodded her head, a confident smirk on her face. It was the perfect way for her to show her dear Ranma just how far her training had taken her.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: The shrine keepers rally, and Akane wants a duel

choices: Does Rei recognize Ryoga or Nagi by their descriptions?
Back to Akane's fight and her soon-to-be shrinking foe.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Ukyo watched with a smile as Nabiki and Kasumi stood in their custom-made kimonos. They were just delivered and the Tendo women needed to learn to wear them. Having grown to larger sizes than the typical Japanese maiden early in life, properly wearing them wasn't an easy task for the titanic Tendos. Thankfully Ukyo was small for so long and could help them get into the traditional gowns.

The elder Kasumi wore a red kimono with white cranes on it. Nabiki wore a green one with foliage designs. Supposedly Kodachi would be wearing a kimono of blue and purple with aquatic designs. The sky, earth, and ocean was what they were to be symbolizing.

Her smile grew as the music came to a key point and they pulled a part of their gown and the kimono fell revealing their strength and size as they wore swimsuits beneath. A red for Kasumi and greed for Nabiki. Their muscles pulsing as they continued the dance before ending with them bowing. They would be lifting a heavy weight at this time, but didn't have that prop.

"Brilliant. I didn't see any problems," Ukyo said.

"Well, we owe that to your help Ukyo," Kasumi said.

"Yeah, I don't think we would have even gotten into these outfits if not for your help," Nabiki said.

"Thanks, so what is your next plan?" Ukyo asked.

"We are going to visit Kodachi in a short time to practice with her and make sure we move in time together," Kasumi said.

"It's going to be fun. Especially if we show up just a bit bigger than her," Nabiki said with a laugh.

"Nabiki, Kodachi is stressful enough do deal with on an ideal day. Let's not antagonize her anymore," Kasumi said softly.

"Alright," Nabiki said after a moment.

----------

Akane stood before Kodachi in the mansion's yard. "Does thou really think you can best me in combat?" Kodachi asked. She pointed to the large truck sitting in the yard. "I can lift that machine over fifty times in squats!"

To the side, Tatewaki stood with Shampoo, Ranma, and Sasuke. "She is being honest about that claim," the elder brother said. "She lifts frequently, when not practicing her routine for the commercial."

"Shampoo think commercial people will need to find replacement soon," Shampoo said. Tatewaki gulped slightly at the chilled tone. He knew these ladies were powerful, but could they legitimately break the arm of another one?

"So . . . how did the car get in here?" Ranma asked as Akane charged at Kodachi.

"I dismantled it and her ladyship brought in the heavier pieces," Sasuke said. Ranma nodded as his eyes focused on Akane and Kodachi.

A powerful fist that would have dented the car's door blasted into Akane Tendo's wall of abs. Into Kodachi's face, the heel of Akane's slammed into the gymnast with enough force to make a horse's kick look pathetic. The strikes briefly stunned both, but Akane, thanks in part to her training with Shampoo, recovered quickly.

She needed to be close to work the technique Master trained her in and focused her mind and body to activate it.

Shampoo saw the signs and smiled a cat-like smile. "Karma to the thief," she whispered.

-----------

Rei Hino smiled as she walked down the street with her friends. They weren't secret warriors like Usagi and the others. These were just normal girls, but were interested in an advertisement they saw and wanted to check out this cafe with huge women.

Rei was sure the image was faked somehow, because there didn't seem anyway a human woman, especially one who was Japanese and normally petite, could grow that large.

They came before the cafe and entered. And there she saw the powerful Cologne, smiling as they entered. "Welcome," the old woman said. Rei gulped at the sight of the powerful woman who looked strong enough to beat even Makoto. "So, a group of four today?"

"Tes please," Rei's friend said. "Wow, this is amazing. That advertisement wasn't lying."

"You doubted the authenticity of my size?" Cologne asked with a chuckle.

"It is hard to believe," Rei said, as her instincts warned her this woman was potentially dangerous.

"Well, because you mentioned the advertisement, you will get 10% off your total bill and one free drink," Cologne said. "Please tell others about us."

"Um . . . do the other women in the photos work here?" another friend asked.

"Sadly, they do not, but I recently hired another large woman. She will serve you your food," Cologne said.Cologne led them to an open table and met Rei's eyes. Like Rei, she sensed this dark haired young woman was more than she seemed.

They sat down and a young man came to collect their orders.

1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Never one to be too far from her weapon of choice, during the brief interval after the first attack, Kodachi reached into her valley of cleavage, and pulled out her most useful tool, her ribbon. With a snap, the whole of her carefully crafted gymnastic weapon was free from her chest, billowing around her menacingly. The Kuno girl readied herself, and then launched towards her opponent.

The two foes exchanged another volley of blows with one another. Akane was trying her best to keep the gap between them closed, but Kodachi was an expert at mid-range fighting thanks to her specially made gymnastics ribbon. Every time the youngest Tendo tried to close in on her, the gymnast would simply use her odd weapon to force her back, before engaging with hit and run tactics.

'Dammit!' Akane cursed to herself, 'she's keeping me at a distance. If I can't get in close, I won't be able to use my new technique!'

The others watched from the side, as the two massive beauties did battle, careful not to get too close, lest they be caught up in the crossfire. Two of them were watching anxiously, hoping that the many weeks of training they had taken under the most perverted master on the planet hadn't been for nothing.

*****

Rei sat quietly with her school friends, patiently waiting for their server. The other girls were chatting animatedly while the shrine priestess' eyes kept going back to the large amazonian woman who kept coming and going in the dinning area. So, when their waitress finally arrived, Rei didn't notice until the woman spoke.

"Thanks for choosing the Cat Cafe. I am Ryoga, and I shall be your waiter. Can I start you off with something to drink?" a masculine voice said with enthusiasm.

Their waiter was a sturdy looking boy wearing a tiger-striped bandana and a smile that gave a hint of fangs. Rei couldn't say for sure, but she could vaguely remember her grandfather asking her to be on the lookout for someone that looked like this boy.

"Hey Ryoga!" a feminine voice called from the kitchen, "Table 3's order's ready, I need you to take it to them." The voice's owner peered out from behind the kitchen door.

Turning her head towards the speaker, Rei's eyes widened as she saw a waitress who was even bigger than the owner. The woman had a body that was beyond anything she thought was humanly possible, with sharp eyes and hair swept back by a black band. Almost as striking as her muscles, was her facial markings and pointed ears.

Rei's thoughts immediately drifted back to what her grandfather had told her earlier, about how his friend's shrine had been pillaged by a pair of demons, one of which was described as looking exactly like this woman.

The sight of the woman confirmed Rei's suspicions, as he matched the description of the other demon. However, because her non-magical friends were with her, she couldn't risk making a move against them. She would have to wait until later, preferably with a group of more magically inclined friends to back up her mission.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Akane tries to close in

choices: Kodachi manages to break away but has little muscle left. at this point.
Akane holds on and Kodachi is at where she used to be or even worse off.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Akane ground her teeth. Her mind considered her possible attacks but realized with Kodachi's main weapon keeping her at bay, none of her physical techniques would work. She needed something else. She needed . . . Her eyes fell on her tiny lover and she smiled.

"You're good Kodachi," Akane said. "At this rate, you might prove yourself worthy of Ranma's affections."

"You harlot! Lord Ranma has already given me his attention," Kodachi replied as she whipped her ribbon at Akane. The massive Tendo dodged.

"You might have his lust, for all of your stolen power, but his affection? I don't think so," Akane replied. "You couldn't be gentle if your life depended on it!"

"Silence," Kodachi said coolly. She felt her anger bubbling but held back. Now wasn't the time to act on it. Even with her training regiment, she didn't wish to bear the punches she felt at the beginning of the match for a long period.

"Come on Kodachi, you're smarter than that. You could never be the one he really wants," Akane said. Kodachi's mouth twitched into a snarl but was quelled.

Ranma nodded with a smile at Akane's work. While not a display of muscular strength, he knew very much what it was like facing opponents of serious strength. Getting them to lose composure and focus was a smart play.

"You think he likes you because of that dance you shared? That you had some precious moment at that party?" Akane asked in a mocking tone as she avoided more ribbon strikes. They were becoming stronger as Kodachi released her building rage.

"We had a dear moment, you harlot. Nothing you say could ru-"

"Ranma and I were having sex not ten minutes after we left the party. Shampoo joined us. They laid on top of me while Ranma was hot between us. He-" Akane injected. Kodachi's eyes widened. She looked to Ranma, who had an awkward look of affirmation and on the purple one, a smirk of confidence.

How? How could her lord Ranma . . . do . .

And in that brief moment of distraction, a freight train of power closed in on Kodachi. Akane got close and pressed her hands against Kodachi. She smiled as she felt the strength of Kodachi flow from her and back into its rightful place.

Ranma watched with some joy and sorrow. Joy to Akane getting her justice, to her growing larger, stronger, and more lovely. He also felt sorrow for the lose of the amazonian beauty that Kodachi was. Insane? Heck yeah. But she was still a beauty to look at.

-------

Kasumi, Nabiki, and Ukyo were closing in on the Kuno mansion. "Oh, I hope this works out well," Kasumi whispered.

"Don't worry. What's the worst that could happen?" Nabiki asked with a smirk.

-----------

Rei departed from her friends soon after leaving the cafe. She said she promised her grandfather to visit a local shrine and would catch a later train. Her friends understood and departed from her. Rei went her own way, looking for a place to call from. She didn't want to lose sight of the cafe for too long. Who knew what malevolence was happening inside?

-------

"You are doing wonderfully on your training Nagi," Cologne said as the new massive woman was taking a short rest from waiting tables.

"Thank you," Nagi said. "So, why don't you want me to transport you and the necklace back to your village?"

"They know about me having it and have allowed me to study it in near privacy," Cologne said. "We don't want a tug-of-war for its power right when I get home with it. It would make studying it impossible."

"And if I'm here with Ken-ohki, you will have a quick exit if they come to you," Nagi said.

"There is that reasoning too," Cologne said. "They only know you are a mercenary who helped out my former slave, nothing else." Nagi nodded.

----------

Rei stood in the alleyway across the street and pulled out her communicator. First she would call Ami. She would be able to get the scatter brain moving over here.

--------

Tatewaki felt his mouth hang open as he saw the impossible. Akane Tendo was growing larger, her clothes ripping at the seems, while his younger sister was shrinking.

His sister was valiantly trying to break free of the hold.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Akane's New Technique

choices: Ranma feels Akane deserves a reward for her victory
Back with Kasumi, and Nabiki
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Akane held the struggling gymnast firmly, in a grip that wouldn't relax as Kodachi's physical muscle was transfered over to her through the contact. With each passing second, the Kuno girl's struggles became less and less powerful as her strength was lost to the now much larger amazon.

As she felt the strength of her foe being drained into her, Akane couldn't help but gloat to herself a little. Maybe it was the fact that she was finally getting back at this psycho for stealing her DNA, or maybe it was just the massive rush she was getting by stealing the strength back, but it caused Akane to drop her guard. This would provide an opening just long enough for Kodachi to deliver a kick to the inside of the amazonian girl's armpit, hitting a cluster of nerves and causing the bigger girl to drop her, allowing the Kuno girl to put distance between them.

Despite being slightly unhinged, even Kodachi could tell that at this point there was no winning this for her. Her foe had stolen the muscle she had gained, and now she was left with the body on par with an amateur bodybuilder, rather than the lovely mass of super muscles her darling Ranma loved. She doubted that with her reduced power that even her specially designed ribbon would do any damage to the Tendo girl, whose muscles where now like armor. Regrettably, Kodachi had no choice but to concede defeat this time.

"I surrender," she said begrudgingly, her hands raised above her head in resignation.

Akane was rather shocked, to say the least, when she heard those words come from her hated opponent's mouth, Not in a million years had she expected Kodachi to admit defeat, even if she had knocked her unconscious. However, rather than try to steal all of the girl's muscle mass, the Tendo girl accepted her victory with as much grace as she could.

Regardless of Tatewake's offers of a meal, and a date for two of them, Akane, Shampoo, and Ranma left the Kuno mansion to head home. Kodachi couldn't even say goodbye to her darling love, especially after her defeat and shrinkage at the hands of her rival.

choices: Stay with the scouts or cafe.  Do Nagi or Cologne notice them spying?
Back to the Kunos or Tendos.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Akane carried the now tinier Ranma out as Shampoo had to shift a little to match her height. "How did it feel?" she asked as they walked down the street to go to the park.

"Really amazing when it was happening. I feel a lot stronger too, though considering how big we can get, I don't know if it is much in the whole thing," Akane said.

"Maybe your full strength has been changed as well," Ranma said.

As they left the Kuno's area, another Tendo trio was approaching. Nabiki noticed the open gate to the Kuno house. She glanced inside and blinked at what she saw. Kodachi was tiny! Not as tiny as she was when they first met, but she now stood only just under her brother's height and Tatewaki was tall for a Japanese man.

"Nabiki, don't pry too much," she heard Kasumi said.

"Kasumi, we might have a problem," Nabiki replied. She pushed open the gate, making the Kunos turn to her presense.

"Oh, Nabiki Tendo, Kasumi Tendo, amd Miss Ukyo," Tatewaki said. "What brings you here?" Nabiki smirked as she heard Kasumi gasp at the sight of Kodachi. Ukyo watched with an impassive face.

"We are here to practice with Kodachi for the commercial," Kasumi said. "What . . . What happened?" Kodachi glared hatefully.

"Your witch-sister stole my strength from me," Kodachi said, "But regardless. I am ready to practice. I will show you the way."

"Um, I don't think so," Nabiki said.

"Nabiki, now is not the time for mockery," Kasumi said. Nabiki looked at her sister.

"I'm not mocking," Nabiki said. "I'm being honest. Part of the commercial will be our equalsizes, using camera tricks to make people not realize we are titanic beauties until the kimonos come off." She turned back to Kodachi. "How we shift sizes has limits. I don't think I can get that small."

"Oh my," Kasumi said as she considered this argument.

"What?" Kodachi growled. "You would remove me from this opportunity because I am not your equal? It was your sister who did this to me! Your family needs to pay me for thi-" Nabiki lifted Kodachi up into the air swiftly and without effort. Shen then rose up and up until she towered at ten feet tall.

"Listen well. You stole Akane's strength and size. If she found some means of dealing you justice, good for her," Nabiki said, "But we didn't plan this and now we all have to deal. The commercial needs three women and you were the best option."

Ukyo held a smile in as inspiration came to her. She moved to Kasumi's side and whispered while Tatewaki was focused on his sister's plight and beauty of Nabiki.

"Nabiki, please put her down. I will contact Mister Hiro and Mister Akira," Kasumi said. Nabiki growled and put her down. Nabiki shrunk back three feet and looked down at Kodachi. She turned to leave with her sister and friend.

----

Once down the street, Nabiki tensed up. "Damn it. Damn Kodachi for losing her strength. Damn Akane for ruining this by taking justice now!" Nabiki grumbled.

"I'm sure she didn't know about our needs for Kodachi, but all isn't lost," Kasumi said.

"Oh yeah? And where will we find another girl with that level of grace who can learn the moves in just two days?" Nabiki asked. "If Akane tries, it will look like we sent her to remove Kodachi and put her in the spot!" Granted, it was something Nabiki had considered, but doubted one could break one of their enhanced bodies so much to cause one to be removed without sustaining serious injury herself. Just how the heck did she shrink Kodachi?

"No, but I know the moves. I've watched you since you started training," Ukyo injected as she shifted to Nabiki's height. Nabiki nodded.

"Okay. That could work," Nabiki said. "Still, how did Akane do it?"

"We can ask her at dinner," Kasumi said as they continued walking.

---------

Rei watched as Minako came down the street. She was the closest, having gone to see the modeling company Kasumi is part of for an audition. "You jerk. I was in the middle of my audition when you called," she fumed.

"Sorry," Rei said, "But I need help. I can't go back in there without looking suspicious." Rei looked at the cafe. She told her friend about the muscular demons inside and their attack on the shrine a short time ago.

Despite her frustration, Minako listened carefully and nodded. "How big are we talking?" Minako asked. Rei pointed to the opposite alley where Nagi was walking out with a trashcan in hand and dumped it in the dumpster. Minako whistled.

"That big. I don't know if she's the leader or just a minion, but you can see why I don't want to do this alone." Minako nodded.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Rejection and Infiltration

choices: Meanwhile, with the Kunos
Akane seductively shows Ranma what her new body can do
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
The two magical girls were by no means masters of espionage, hiding rather awkwardly behind trees and trashcans as they tried to get a closer look at the woman who Rei had confirmed as an enemy. The large, muscular woman had was giving the trashcan a final few shakes to make sure it was empty, before she turned and headed back inside.

"Are you seriously planning on fighting that...that beast?!" MInako practically screamed, just managing to keep her voice at a volume that wouldn't be heard by the giant woman.

"Of course not! Are you cazy? We would have to transform to deal with her, and there are two many people inside to risk throwing magic blasts around," Rei stated seriously, "We just need to find out where she hid the artifact and we can retrieve it for its rightful owners."

Sending her friend inside, telling her to try an make as big a scene as possible while she sneaked in through the back and searched the building for the stolen relic.

*****

Kasumi, Nabiki and Ukyo sat in front of the middle Tendo's laptop, something she had bought after she landed the modeling job with Kasumi. On the screen was the person in charge of putting their ad together, as well as the manager of Kasumi's modeling agency. They had just finished their discussion about the situation with Kodachi and how it would effect the job.

It had taken a while to convince them, but Nabiki had managed to prove Kodachi's smaller build, and to show them that Ukyo was more than up for replacing the girl, but she had managed to do it. The chef had to give them a good showing, going through different poses, alongside Kasumi and Nabiki, letting those on the other end see that she knew the routine and could perform it well.

"Thank you so much for your time," Kasumi said politely before they disconnected from the web chat. She turned to the other girls seated next to her, seeing Nabiki sigh in relief while Ukyo was jumping around excitedly about being able to work with her idol.

*****

Rei could hear her friend distracting the restaurant's hostess and the demon woman from the back of the building. Minako was going on and on about wanting to see the two's muscles flex and pose. Flattering them about their size and strength so that her fellow magical girl could find and make off with their quarry.

It had taken the scout of Mars a while, but she had finally come across a room way in back, where she found the bejeweled item set on a table, along with the scroll. She carefully pocketed the items and turned to leave, nearly stepping on a weird looking rabbit on her way out. The little thing looked at her curiously before hopping out the door and down the hall. Rei made to leave, but it wasn't going to be so simple. She was out of the building, and in the alley heading towards the street when she was was stopped by a question.

"Where do you think your going?" a gruff, feminine voice said sternly.

Turning, the young priestess saw that behind her stood the demon woman, with the strange rabbit perched on her shoulder, giving the other girl a mischievous look. Rather than answer, Rei took off running, going as fast as she could. She knew the other woman was following her, because she could hear her cries to stop running.

Rei barely managed to send her friend a text, her thumb clumsily typing a message for help, before she turned all of her attention towards escaping.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: The artifact is stolen again

choices: Rei becomes Cologne's size.
Rei becomes equal to Nagi's size.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Ranma, Akane, and Shampoo arrived at their private spot in the park. Her free hand rubbed over the enhanced arm carrying Ranma. "This is amazing," whispered Akane.

"Does it feel better than when you drained Shampoo?" Ranma asked with a gulp.

"Oh yes it does," Akane said. "That was a bite of a steak. What I took from that Kuno bitch was eating the entire thing." She pulled Rana close to her enhanced breasts. "Can't you feel the difference?" Her voice was soft. Ranma gently touched the empowered body and shuddered. Akane turned and smiled as even Shampoo was touching her.

"Akane's back strong," Shampoo said. "Shampoo could stab with sword and not cut."

"Shampoo, let's find some rocks for me to lift," Akane said. Shampoo nodded and they went looking.

---------

Rei turned to the open streets and ran hard, but she could tell she was being pursued. The heavy feet of the titanic demon could be heard on the concrete. The street was pretty much empty meaning she had no cover for looking like a civilian. Besides, who knew what that strange rabbit could do? It could be tracking her by scent. She came to a conveniently open lot as all the people here had some instinctive drive to avoid the danger.

Why couldn't her region of Tokyo be the same?

She panted slightly as she looked back. She needed a moment to transform.

"Hey demon!" came a voice. "Don't go attacking innocent girls!" Rei smiled as she recognized the voice. She turned and looked to see standing a short distance away was a tall, brown haired woman with much talent and a green-colored dress.

"I only want what she took from my employer," Nagi noted as she drew her rapier, which was more like a short blade at her size. The new girl smiled.

"Well, sorry, demons don't get any returns!" She crossed her crossed her arms as a small rod rose from her tiara. "Jupiter Thunderbolt!" Lightning from a cloudless sky shot at the woman. Nagi watched with some interesting, looking for an opening as well as defense when the blast of lighting flew at her from the girl. It was incredibly fast. Nagi stood her ground for maybe a second before driving her rapier into the ground and jumping away.

The lightning struck her rapier and grounded out, but Nagi, in her move to run, didn't fully calculate her new strength into this action. She flew harder, further, and faster than she would have before, landing inches from the thief.

Rei flew back as her hand touched the center jewel of the necklace. She gasped as a warmth filled her body and then was gone.

"Hey, are you alright?" Sailor Jupiter asked.

"Fine. Well, time to help as well," Rei said as Nagi rose to her feet. She drew her compact containing her crystal. She called out to transform.

----------

Shampoo held the large boulder before her. It was the largest one she could find. But to Akane, it wasn't heavy enough. So, the enhanced girl came on a new idea. As Shampoo held the boulder, Akane was lifting Shampoo, doing squats as Shampoo rode on her shoulders.

Ranma watched with wet lips and a hard penis at the sight of these squats. Akane was into the fifties and showing no signs of slowing or having to grow to maintain herself.

"Just think . . Shampoo . . .what we could do if you took some muscle too and we just kept getting stronger," Akane grunted.

"Shampoo impressed with Akane's actions. Shampoo want to drain someone too," she replied. "Would Ranma like that?" Ranma's mouth went dry at the thought of these titanic ladies growing in new and stronger ways. He could only nod.

Shampoo smiled but concealed an uncomfortable feeling. The only place they could find women of significant size to add anything of substance to their power would be her home village. She would have to attack her friends in order to get stronger. It had been plaguing her since she started. But this wasn't the only voice inside of her. Part of her, the part that deeply cared for the Tendos like a new family, reminded her that to her "friends" she was dead at best, a person to be killed if she returned unwed at worst.

If she wanted to return, she would have to marry Ranma, leave the Tendos, and swear to kill them if they tried to have fun with Ranma. Even if they joined her in the tribe, adultery was a serious offense in the village.

She didn't know what she wanted anymore.

--------

Nagi watched as some power came over the young girl but noticed something was off. She wasn't just changing clothes by some mystical means. She was growing larger! "Crap," Nagi grumbled.

1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Rei could tell by her sudden change in perspective, that something was wrong. Due to her brief contact with the muscle artifact, and its interaction with her own magical powers, Rei experienced a secondary transformation. Although her contact was only for a moment, the effects were great. She now truly looked liked a sailor suited warrior of Mars, muscles and all.

Nagi grit her teeth in frustration. It was bad enough that the girl who had stolen that which she and Ryoga had worked so hard to recover, but now it turns out she was a freaking magical girl, with muscles to boot! Sure, she was still much bigger than her, but if she couldn't get the amazon treasure away from her, that may not be the case for long.

*****

Gloomily, Kodachi dragged herself into the Kuno household. The crushing defeat she had suffered at the hands of Akane Tendo had just about broken her spirits and left her feeling smaller than she had ever felt before. The lose of all her wonderful muscle was only made worse by the fact that her beloved Ranma would no longer look at her with those same lust-filled eyes as he did with Akane or Shampoo.

Upon reaching her bed, the much smaller, but still somewhat muscular girl, flopped onto her bed in a heap. Tears began to seep out of her eyes as she continued to think more and more about her humiliating loss.

'Dammit,' Kodachi cursed to herself, 'Dammit, dammit, dammit! How dare she humiliate me in front of Ranma!'

The Kuno girl stayed that way for the next twenty minutes, sobbing quietly into her pillow, before she was disturbed by a knock at her bedroom door.

"Mistress," said a voice belonging to her family's loyal retainer, "I humbly request an audience with you."

With a slight growl, Kodachi prepared to deny the little shrimp with a scathing retort, but instead gave a defeated sigh and bid him to enter.

"What do you want?" she said in an unladylike manner.

"Mistress, I have news of your father," Sasuke reported after taking a submissive knee.

"Oh, and how fares my dear father?" she asked somewhat sarcastically.

"He is on his way home," Sasuke replied, "and should arrive after dinner tonight. He asks that both you and your brother be present, for he has gifts from his travels for the two of you."

With another sigh, Kodachi dismissed her servant.

*****

Ranma, Akane, and Shampoo passed through the entryway of the Tendo home. The three noticed that they had the house to themselves, since the older Tendo sisters were busy elsewhere, and the fathers were out, presumably for a drink at one of the local bars.

The girls settled into the living room, in front of the TV and proceeded to watch a daytime drama. Ranma walked passed them, continuing to the bathing area.

"I'm going to go get a bath ready," he told the other two, "I think that I need to get cleaned up after today."

Akane and Shampoo watched as their mutual love interest left the room, and exchanged a knowing, mischievous look.

*****

With speed that contradicted her size, Nagi moved in to snatch the treasure from the magical girl, only for the less muscular girl to dodge and send a fireball her way. She knew that she had to recover the artifact, both for Ryoga's sake, and to prevent the girl from becoming any bigger.

Mars snarled, gripping the recovered object tightly in her powerful fist. She was still getting used to her new size, but she knew that testing this new form would have to come later. She had a demon to dispatch, and with the help of her friend, Jupiter, she was sure that she could.

As her grip covered the gem, the gloves prevented direct skin contact, thus preventing the gem''s magic to affect her further. She wanted to release her strongest attacks, but couldn't while holding the necklace in her hand. The only option would be to wear the piece. And pray nothing else happens to her.

Nagi approached once more as she saw an opening in the enhanced girl, but another lightning strike came at her.

----------

Minako smiled at Cologne willingness to showcase her strength. "Wow. Just wow," Minako said. "That is amazing."

"Thank you child," Cologne said. she felt an unease about this young maiden. She was only partly happy. The elder woman could sense her unease and ready to fight if something came up. She was likely working with whomever Nagi pursued. "My cafe enjoys showing off female strength." She walked to one stack of papers and returned with the cover photo from the photo shoot. "As you can see."

"Is . .Is that Iron Kasumi?" Minako asked. She followed the older girl's career. Her body shifted to a less threatening stance, but still wary.

"Yes, she is an acquaintance of mine," Cologne said. Minako's mind raced at the thought of what this could mean. Could her idol, the woman who showed her it was okay to be super powerful and feminine was possible, be in league with this demon? Yes, she didn't have a body like that but she was a powerful reincarnation of a magical princess who could vanquish evil.

When she learned the truth, she was scared, in part because she didn't know if any guy would like her for it. Then she saw the first photos of Kasumi, of guys not reacting in horror or disgust when they purchased it. Guys could accept a stronger woman. It gave her confidence and hope.

Cologne glanced around as Ryoga served the last customers. She smiled at the boy. One thing she had taught him in his tenure as a slave was the Amazon hand code system. Her poses were signals to him to slowly evacuate the building. Even if it cost her some profit from these free meals, she didn't want them hurt.

When the last person left, Cologne stepped back, out of the girl's kick range but within her own.

"Now tell me, why have you been distracting me?" Cologne asked. Her voice was cool and precise. "While some of your actions have been genuine, you seem to be wanting to keep my attention. Why?" Minako looked up in shock. She stepped back, which Cologne kept up with, to keep the same distance between them.

"I . . . I don't know what your talking about," Minako said.

"Child, I don't like to ask twice," Cologne said.

---------

The lightning blasts kept her from approaching but she could see what the fire-throwing girl was doing. "No! Don't put it on!" Nagi said. You can't handle it!"

But it was too late. Sailor Mars clasped the ties together. The necklace hung a bit loose on her neck and pumped up pectorals and breasts.

"Now I can fight with both handsss," Rei said before she moaned and fell to one knee.

Nagi held her breath and remembered Cologne's words. She had to get that necklace off now!

------------

It was two days after the return of the necklace. Nagi walked into Cologne's office carefully. The mystical necklace laid out on the desk. "I cannot believe after so long it has been found," the amazon whispered. Tears fell from her eyes.

"Thank you for honoring your law," Nagi said. "And freeing Ryoga."

"So long as it isn't stolen again, we will all be free," Cologne said.

"Pardon me?" Nagi asked. "What does that mean?"

"You agreed to stay. So did Ryoga. We are each the guardians of this until we can put it into a secure place. If it is stolen, each of us will be considered property of the village as compensation," Cologne said.

"And the village isn't secure?" Nagi asked.

"No. The other elders fear there could be a fight for it. Better our heritage be researched here, in solitude," Cologne said. Nagi nodded.

"Then, why don't you wear it and keep it safe there?" Nagi asked. Cologne looked at the old scroll.

"Because I am too old. I could die from the transformation. The power would try to change my old and inflexible body and meet resistance. The results . . . are not kind. The necklace works best on a young female body. You grew much from it touching just your hand. Should you wear it, especially for a prolonged time, you could grow too large to enter into a building."

"And any reason it doesn't change men?" Nagi asked.

"No clue there," Cologne said. "But do be careful if you touch it, you could grow even larger still," Cologne warned.


-----------

Sailor Jupiter gasped at the sight of her friend growing larger now. The behemoth demon was closing in on her distracted friend.

1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Nagi watched as the once lithe girl grew larger with each passing moment. It had been less than ten seconds since the sailor suited girl placed the necklace around her neck, and she had already reached the bounty hunter's size. Finally, the experienced fighter saw an opening when Mars moaned and fell to her knees from the overwhelming feelings of her growing body, and Jupiter, thinking she was in pain, let up her attack, turning to check on her friend.

Seeing her chance, the muscular bounty hunter sprang forward, with as much speed as her powerful muscles could generate, with a hand outstretched to snatch the treasure from the growing magical girl. Feeling the weight of the mystical object hit her gloved palm, Nagi closed her fingers around it and pulled up. Kicking up dirt, the alien muscle woman dashed past the other girls, the artifact clutched in her fist.

"Dammit!" Jupiter cursed, before turning her attention back to her kneeling friend.

As the surge of feelings ebbed, and she regained control of herself, Rei made to stand up, only to experience a feeling of slight vertigo. As if it wasn't enough getting use to the extra couple feet she had gained when she first touched the artifact, but now it was even more pronounced.

Nagi was shocked to see that in only a few seconds of contact with the other girl's bare skin, she had grown to even bigger proportions, and was easily two feet taller than her. It was because of this that the bounty hunter missed her chance to make a break for it.

"Jupiter," Sailor Mars said, having regained her senses, "she had the sacred relic, we have to get it back!"

"Shit!" Nagi swore, realizing she was in hot water now.

*****

Minako knew that she was screwed. The old woman had called her out, and now she only had two options. Option one: try to explain to the buff amazon the situation, or option two: run like a little bitch, and haul ass out of there. Naturally, Minako chose option two, and sprinted for the door.

Cologne could only chuckle. Sure, she could have caught the girl as easily as could be, but she would rather follow, and see with her own eyes what the purpose of this little ruse was. After a quick check to make sure that Ryoga had things at the restaurant covered, the elder took off after the blonde.


*****

Kodachi stood in the front hall with her brother as the two of them waited for their father to return from his long stay overseas. Nervously, she rubbed her diminished arms, still shaken up by the loss of her muscles. Trying to take her mind off her defeat, the Kuno heiress turned her thoughts towards her father's homecoming.

"Da Big Kahuna is back!" came the call of the embarrassingly off kilter man that was her father as he burst into the household holding two large suitcases in the air. "Come say hello to ya fadda and get your gifts, keiki!"

*****

With a content sigh, Ranma leaned back in the hot bath water and closed his eyes. As moments of Akane's fight played in his mind, he couldn't help but have some mixed feelings about the whole thing. While he loved the fact that the fight had left Akane with an even stronger, and bigger body, as well as her reclaiming muscles taken from her DNA, the lose of Kodachi's muscle kind of made him sad.

So engrossed in his own thoughts, the Saotome boy didn't even hear the bathroom door open and a two pairs of feet walking onto the tiled floor.

"Oh my, it seems we should have knocked," Kasumi said as she looked down at the nude and relaxing Ranma. He blinked his eyes open a and gulped at the two nude Tendo women.

"My Ranma, it looks like you're buffer than the last time I saw you nude," Nabiki said as she grabbed the five gallon bucket that the larger women used to clean themselves before entering the bath.

"Just sparring, you know," Ranma said.

"Ranma, you know about our business venture with Kasumi, right?" Kasumi asked as she grabbed the soap.

Ranma nodded. "Yeah. You've been practicing for it non-stop," Ranma said. Kasumi nodded. She and Nabiki doused themselves and began lathering up.

"Well, somehow, she became too small to be part of it . . . . Someone, she said, took her strength," Nabiki added. She smiled at Ranma. "I'm not one to judge, as she did take the strength from my baby sister."

"And she claims Akane took back her strength, Ranma," Kasumi said. "Is . . Is this true?" The soap-covered eldest tTendo leaned over Ranma's relaxing form.
