Sailor Mars focused her hands and called forth a fireball to disable but not destroy the suspected monster, as that could damage the holy relic too. But rather than a ball the size of a golfball, her trash can sized hands formed a fireball more akin to a soccer ball or basketball. It rocketed at Nagi and the bounty hunter just dodged it.

Nagi began to sweat. That blast was on par with some of Ryoko's stronger strikes with the added bonus of burning her. She didn't think to what strength the attacks would be now in the titan Ryoko. Focusing back on the now, she knew she would have to get away. Things were too dangerous against these women.

And she didn't want to resort to wearing the necklace either.

But before her two figures appeared. They were normal sized girls, one with long blond hair and the other with short blue hair, but they wore nearly identical outfits to her current foes. "Crap," she muttered.

The blue one donned some glasses and was typing at a computer.

"Sailor Mars! What happened?" the blond asked.

"Sailor Moon, this demon has a holy relic which increases one's size. We have to get it back," the giant muscular woman called out.

"I am not a monster," Nagi yelled, but her eyes looked back to the blond. She had taken off her tiara.

"Moon Tiara Action!" she called. She began spinning and Nagi's instincts told her to run, so she turned.

She raced down the street, glancing back she saw some circle of light coming at her fast, faster than even her new body could move. Looking ahead, a blod who seemed familiar was racing towards her. If she jumped out of the way, the newest one's attack would hit her.

Sometimes it sucked having a conscious. The bounty hunter didn't like getting others drawn into her fights. She turned and faced the attack of light, her empowered enemies were moving in, watching.

Minako saw the mammoth woman coming at her and she started to panic. Could the head demon have called her back? She needed to transform now. But the mammoth woman turned and just past her, Minako could see the faces and bodies of most of her friends . . . with Mars now towering over the rest! None of them seemed taller than Rei's hips!

Nagi stared down the attack as it slammed into her face. "Grnnt!" she screamed in pain, "That's smart." The disc of light fell to the ground and a normal tiara just sat there.

"Looks like I'll need to use a stronger attack," the blonde said.

"Why didn't you use the stronger one in the first place?" Sailor Mars asked. She reached her hand down and grabbed her leader.

A strange warmth came over Usagi, but she remained pretty much unchanged. Mercury and Jupiter shuddered too, but they past it off as nothing important. "Because you said she had some item you wanted to not be destroyed!" Usagi yelled back.

"Um, Mars," Mercury said, "Is that item Japanese?" Rei released her captain and nodded.

"Yes, it came from a shrine. Why?" Rei said, as she looked at the demon, now holding what looked like a busted nose. Blood dripped from the injury.

"Because it has old Chinese on it. And that monster's blood . . . isn't one of our enemy's blood," Mercury explained.

"What? But look at her face! Those are demon marks!" Rei yelled.

"You dink I'm a monster because of my facial markings?" Nagi screamed through a broken nose. "How dupid are you?! Dat cop Mihoshi is smarter than you!"

--------------

Cologne watched from a distance. She smiled at the beauty Sailor Mars had become. She had feared the necklace was damaged or no loonger as potent as it was before and wanted someone to test it on, but Nagi didn't want to and she couldn't use herself if something was wrong. She had been tempted to call on Shampoo, but the others in the village wouldn't have approved a banished one getting the blessing.

Now, thanks to this magical maiden's actions, she could see the results of using the necklace to its fullest were as it claimed in the scroll.

The group of girls flinched back at her harsh words, with their so called leader on the verge of tears, and Mars gritting her teeth and growling in anger.

"HEY!" Jupiter cried, "Just because we made an honest mistake doesn't mean you can call us stupid!"

Of course, that attempt at defending their actions fell flat on its face, as Nagi just gave them a deadpan look before facepalming and letting out an annoyed growl. Her patients had reached its limit, and, with a crack of her knuckles and a snarl, she advanced on the group.

*****

From her place, perched atop a nearby building, Cologne watched her student deal with the current situation. There was a moment where she considered jumping in and setting them all straight. Of course, part of the enjoyment of being an elder was watching the young folk work things out for themselves. If things did escalate, she would intervene, but seeing as this was still nothing more than bickering between youngsters, she felt her help was unneeded.

Right now, though, she was more interested with the strange powers she had witnessed the group of scantily clothed girls use.

Before the galactic bounty hunter could close the distance between her and those magical pests, one of the girls spoke with a desperate voice.

"Please wait," called the tiny blue haired girl, "can't we talk this out?"

"We're long past the point of talking Mercury!" Rei said harshly to her friend.

"You got that right," Nagi said with grim conviction.

"But...but" Ami stuttered out, "but if we talk about this, I'm sure we can work something out. Why don't you and Mars tell your sides of the story, and we can try and clear up any misunderstandings."

"WAAAAH!" Sailor Moon cried, "Can't we at least try to get along?!"

Despite her wanting to knock the little blonde ditz upside her head for trying to kill her, Nagi couldn't bring herself to actually attack such a pathetic girl. With a sigh, she dropped her aggressive stance and decided to go along with the bluenette's suggestion.

"Alright, fine," Nagi said in irritation, before blowing some blood out of her nostrils, "I'll tell you why I need this thing back," she indicated the necklace, "but I expect an apology from that tiara throwing dolt."

"I'm a bounty hunter from out of the country," Nagi said. "I'm working at the restaurant to help pay a debt and found a quick way was to retrieve the old woman's people's lost items."

"You stole from a shrine," Rei replied.

"The item was left there by the thief because he figured no one would find it. As it remained hidden to many for three hundred years, he was right," Nagi noted.

"Three hundred? A guy lived that long?" Makoto asked.

"From what my employer has said, it isn't surprising and quite unfortunate for all the women's underwear in the land," Nagi said. "Anyway, if I don't keep this necklace safe, my employer, the guy I helped pay off the debt, and I would become property to the people who lost this."

"You'd be slaves?" Usagi asked.

"Yep," Nagi said. "And considering how hard it was to free him last time, I doubt we'd be lucky to be free if we just got this back."

"Okay . . . Look. I'm sorry for attacking you without knowing all the details," Usagi said. She bowed her head.

"And you?" Nagi asked the fire-throwing girl.

"You could have explained yourself to the people of the shrine. It's been theirs for centuries," Rei said.

"Taking it back to its lawful owners wouldn't be something a wise and benevolent shrine keeper should object to, is it?" Nagi asked with a sneer. Rei growled again.

"Okay. Um, since we have that settled, do you know anyway to get Mars back to a smaller size?" the blue haired one asked.

"No. My understanding is its permanent," Nagi said as she flexed her own body. "Gotta learn to live with it."

"Maybe I could look at the necklace in a secure spot?" the same one replied. "I have a database of magical items and theory."

"I'll need to talk with my boss," Nagi said.

----------

Uh . . . . How would I know?" Ranma asked in return.

"Cuz you've been spending a lot of private time with Shampoo and Akane lately. You would really know if she developed some new technique," Nabiki said as she came from behind Kasumi. Ranma looked at her lathered skin. He gulped.

"Ranma, we need to know," Kasumi said gently. She reached down and pulled him close to her chest. She turned and entered the tub, as Nabiki joined. Ranma was caught between the pair of Tendos.

"Come on Ranma, spill," Nabiki said.

---------

Shampoo watched as Akane pulled out the body oil. Her large hands gathered some from the bottle and began coating herself to get a nice shiny look. Shampoo soon joined her in coating herself.

They would make for a really appealing pair when Master returned.

"Damn, still the same problem," Akane muttered.

"What's wrong?" Shampoo asked, though she could guess. For all their power, they couldn't reach their backs.

"I want to be completely covered. Will you oil my back?" Akane asked. Shampoo nodded and walked to the titanic Tendo. Her hands moved gently over the warm but hard muscles. They reminded Shampoo of summer in the mountains. The hard rocks filled with the warmth of the sun.

"So, did it feel good?" Shampoo asked. "Reclaiming what was taken?"

"It felt great," Akane said. "You know Shampoo, I don't think I have said this, but I'm glad you came with Ranma."

"Really?" Shampoo asked.

"Yeah. You've become my best female friend. I really enjoy having someone my size to talk with, who knows what it's like being large, and I can hug without fear of ripping you in half," Akane said.

"Well, Shampoo feels similar. I don't know what would have happened if you had been stick figures," Shampoo said as she finished and turned around. Akane smiled and went to work on Shampoo's back.

-------

Minako backed away when the group was heading back to the restaurant. She had decided to join them as Sailor Venus and drew out her compact. She didn't know above her an old woman was watching with amusement.

"What's she up to?" Cologne muttered as Minako began to be covered in a strange light. Her clothes vanished, with similar ones to the other magic girls appearing on her.

But that wasn't all. She was growing larger! "She didn't touch the necklace. What is going on?" Cologne asked herself, genuinely confused.

1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
By the time the dazzling light show of her transformation had ebbed, Minako had been completely changed, and not just her clothing. Her body had become many times stronger, bigger, and denser than her normal body. She was now equal to Rei in size, pushing ten feet and with muscles that strained even her magical uniform.

"What the heck?!" Minako said in surprise, looking down at her now immensely powerful body. "What happened?! I'm supposed to turn into a beautiful soldier of love and justice, not the Hulk!"

From her chosen hiding spot, Cologne stifled a fit of laughter, both at the girl's reaction, and the sheer absurdity of an muscular, amazonian body stuffed into a sailor suit.

While Cologne was fighting down her laughter, Minako was busy exploring her new body, feeling her much larger muscles out with experimental flexes. This continued for about two minutes before she decided that it was time to continue on to her friends.

*****

Shampoo relaxed beneath the strong, but gentle ministrations of her best friend's fingers. The soothing oil caused her muscles to unclench as the warm feeling of Akane's big palms worked it into her body.

"You know Shampoo," Akane spoke softly as she continued to massage the oil in, "before you came her with Ranma, the only people who ever understood what it was like to be my size were my sisters. They were a big help of course, don't get me wrong, but I never really had anyone outside of my family who understood what it was like to be me like you do. All my friends at school liked me well enough, sure, but I could always feel this distance between them and me. As if they could never get over how different I was, how much stronger I was than the rest of them."

Shampoo nodded in understanding, and she was happy to listen as her friend spoke her feelings.

"Shampoo glad to be Akane's friend," the amazon spoke over her shoulder, loving the feeling of the girl's hands on her broad back. "Back in village, there is big feelings of competition between all women, make it hard to make friends, because everyone want to be strongest. Make for very high tension between all amazons, and make it hard to drop guard."

With a smile, Akane continued to run her fingers over her friend's velvety skin, and powerful shoulders.

*****

Nagi lead the Sailors back to the restaurant, arriving through the rear door and ushering them into a room in the back. She pulled out some of the chairs from the front, and seated the girls around a table she brought in as well.

"Please sit here, I'll go find my boss and we can start talking." With that Nagi left to find Cologne, necklace still with her and secured in a pouch so as not to make direct contact with her skin.

After some time hunting around the restaurant, and a quick chat with Ryoga, she learned that Cologne had left to follow one of the other girls who had been in the Cat Cafe that night, and had yet to return.

"Dammit! Looks like I have to go find her."

At that moment, Sailor Venus lumbered in, her eyes fixed in a serious glare as she stared at the older woman.

"Where are my friends?" Venus demanded, her fists clutched threateningly in front of her.

"Now, now girl," came the wise voice Nagi recognized as Colonge, "none of that. I can sense your friends in back, and perfectly fine. Isn't that right, Nagi?"

"Of course. I brought them here so we could talk. The blue-haired one says she can scan the necklace and maybe tell us more about its effects. Unlike the others, she doesn't seem like a ditz, so I think we can trust her word on that."

"Hmm...that may be a worthwhile endeavor. If what she said is true. After all, it never hurts to have some more insight into magical artifacts like this."

Giving the massive Venus a push forward, the three went into the back room, leaving Ryoga to clean up for the night.

*****

Ranma was trapped between two sets of muscular boobs, as the older Tendo sisters continued to question him on what exactly Akane, Shampoo and he had been doing during their time alone over the last weeks.

"Come on Ranma," Nabiki said as she wrapped her arms around his waist, while Kasumi wrapped her's around his shoulders, "just tell us what you and my little sister have been doing when you leave the house, and it will be much easier for you."

"I told you, we've just been hanging out. We haven't been doing nothing too special."

"Now, now, Ranma," Kasumi teasingly berated, "it isn't good for you to lie to us. We DO have ways of making you talk."

"We need to see how things have changed and how it has affected our bodies," Mercury said.

"Well, get a move on. I want to be normal," Rei said. "Stupid necklace." She watched as the three unchanged young women changed back to their civilian identities. No change now.

Mercury returned to her Sailor form first. Her body glowed as she grew in height like the others. She practically doubled in size as her muscles ballooned out to make her looked like a bulked up swimmer, lithe but strong and fast. She was just about eye-level with the other enhanced scouts.

Sailor Jupiter went next. The tall, athletic girl bounded up, gaining muscles more for weightlifting and powerful feats of strength. She opened her eyes and still looked down on her teammates. She looked up and touched the ceiling with her hand easily.

"Wow. I'm huge," she said. "I hope guys will still like me. Okay, your turn." Usagi bit her lip and nodded.

She called on her magical power and felt it flow into her She grew stronger and taller, more than doubling her old height. She became a chiseled rock at 12ft tall.

"This is too freaky," she cried out.

"We better get used to it," Venus said. "Now let's get back to normal." They nodded and changed back. Like her, they were the same height as before this debacle, but gained a healthy level of muscle on their bodies.

"Well, now I can carry all my books easily," Mercury said with a smile.

"You enjoy it. I liked my body as it was," Usagi said as she touched her body. Makoto leaned down to her leader.

"I think heard Mamoru say once he liked to see really fit girls," she whispered. Usagi's eyes lit up.

"Seriously?"

"Would I lie?" Usagi smiled and they left the building.

"Maybe I shold work out to see if he would like these even more?" Usagi said as they walked in the darkness.

---------

Shampoo tossed and turned in bed. She had feared the worst and her nightmares showed it. Only because Ranma was on her, did she instinctively not turn and harm him.

Her eyes were a little red from crying. Both over fear of how her friends would react and what happened between her and Ranma. In the early dawn light, he kissed her hard on the forehead. The Kiss of Freedom, releasing her from her bounds as his slave. In her failing to win Ranma over to her people, she knew now she was banished from them, if learning from Happosai hadn't been enough.

While it hurt, she reminded herself it was like a bandage. It hurt to take it off, but it was needed and would feel better in time.

As she looked across the breakfast table, the enhanced Akane looked weary as well. Kasumi and Nabiki brought in several platters for the muscular women to eat and fill their dietary needs.

"Before we begin, I think there is something that needs to be said," Nabiki said as she looked at Akane.

"What she talking about?" Shampoo asked.

"I swore on my word as a martial artist to tell them," Akane said. "I took back my strength from Kodachi."

"Did you take something from Washu to do this?" Kasumi asked.

"No . . . Master Happosai taught me the technique," Akane said. "We, Shampoo, Ranma, and I, have been training under him."

"Happosai? That thing Ranma's grandpa worked to seal and it failed?" Nabiki asked.

"He found us after the party and made the offer," Ranma said.

"Well, that explains a lot," Kasumi said.

"So, what are you going to do with this technique?" Nabiki asked.

"I own't hurt you guys or my friends. And it's not like I need to be any bigger," Akane said. "I just couldn't stand that bitch thief."

"And you nearly ruined our business venture with her," Kasumi said. "Please think about the consequences before acting."

Ranma felt his titanic . . . friend shake with fear. He patted her thick leg and smiled.

"Uh . . . Shampoo have confession as well," Shampoo said. "For many months since Shampoo, Ranma, and Genma arrived, we have been deceiving you."

"You're actually married?" Nabiki asked in jest, but as she saw Shampoo's body language, she held back.

"What have you been lying to us about?" Akane asked softly. Her eyes hardened a little.

"Shampoo followed Ranma not because Ranma saved Shampoo's life, but Ranma was victor in combat. Shampoo died in eyes of village when defeated by outsider," Shampoo said.

"You were as big as Akane when we met. How the heck did you beat her?" Nabiki asked Ranma.

"Knocked her off a log," Ranma explained.

"And you must serve him now until your death?" Kasumi asked the purple-haired girl.

"Supposed to, yes. Shampoo was Ranma's slave, bound to do whatever he asked. Shampoo's only hope for returning with honor would be to wed Ranma. If freed before then . . . Shampoo never able to return home."

"Wow," Nabiki said.

"That is a very harsh punishment," Kasumi said. "Why tell us now?"

"Because Shampoo realize that village no longer my home. Here . . with you three . . you are home. You are closer to me than anyone in village. We laugh together, cry over silly romantic movies, and equally care for Ranma. I . . . I don't want to leave this and . . and as of this morning, Ranma formally freed me from my bonds. I am . . . cast out forever." She looked down.

"You seemed to have ample reasons to keep this from us . . . I can understand your actions," Kasumi said.

"I knew the Amazons were crazy, but this is beyond that. Yeah, well thanks for being honest," Nabiki said. Ranma looked at Akane. The titanitc Tendo sighed.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Seeing Effects

choices: Kodachi finally settles on the perfect outfit
Akane returns after a long time thinking things through
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
All at once, the stress came down on Akane like an avalanche. What she had just been told by her friend, coupled with what she had been forced to admit by her sisters had caused the young muscle woman to stare into the distance. She didn't respond to Ranma's attempts to talk, remaining silent for a time, before getting up slowly, and leaving the room.

"Akane, where are you going?" Kasumi asked, placing her hand on her little sister's shoulder, halting her movement.

"I..." Akane began, looking into the concerned eyes of her sister. "I have to think."

Pulling free from her eldest sibling, Akane dashed up to her room, and slammed the door behind her.

Downstairs, Shampoo and Ranma shared a nervous look after witnessing their friend's reaction to their revelation. The amazon looked to be on the verge of tears, and the young man attempted to console her with a hug, before he turned to the remaining Tendo sisters.

"Shouldn't we go after her?" he asked.

"No," Kasumi answered, gently shaking her head, "I think we just need to give some time to herself. This day has been really rough on her already, and she needs time to process it."

So the group waited, hoping Akane would come out on her own.

*****

It had taken him all night, but Sasuke was almost halfway done with the alterations to Kodachi's wardrobe, and his mistress was in the process of trying on the finished clothing.

'No, a simple sundress won't do if I am to impress Ranma," the Kuno girl thought, before removing the dress and placing it back on the hanger. 'Perhaps that costume I wore for that convention photo shoot a few months ago?' Kodachi reached for a hanger on which was hung a very skimpy, two piece outfit. The top half of this piece of clothing was little more than a metallic bikini top, while the bottom half was designed in such a manner that one would believe that it was just two lengths of silk held around her waist by a slim belt, with nothing underneath.

'What did they call this outfit? The Slave Lina...Leia? Well, regardless, this may be too revealing. Perhaps I'll wear it when darling Ranma and I spend our first night of loving passion together.' Placing yet another outfit in her growing collection of unsuitable clothing, Kodachi reached for the next one.

*****

After dragging Usagi out of bed, with the help of her annoyed talking cat, Ami, Makoto and the blonde ditz set out for Rei's family shrine, where they agreed to meet that morning to discuss the events of the previous day.

"Ugh...why do we have to meet so early?" Usagi groaned as her friends dragged her down the street. Despite her more developed body, the Sailor warrior of the Moon was still as childish as ever.

"I know you just got those muscles, but if you keep being lazy, they're going to turn to fat," Makoto said with a snicker, her response having the expected effect of an even bigger whine from her blonde friend.

"This is important, Usagi," Ami interjected, "We need to decide how to proceed from here, and how we should handle a magical artifact of that magnitude, and at least another like it, being out there."

And so, the unenthusiastic leader of the team was taken to the bus stop.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Akane needs some time to think

choices: Akane makes her choice.
Back to Kodachi or others.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Kodachi smiled as she moved from size to side. The cloth moved over her nicely and it didn't seem stressed. She wore something she once chided Kasumi Tendo for wearing. A simple blouse with a skirt that went past her knees. In truth, it was a dress for a normal-sized woman, but she didn't care.

"Sasuke, thank you," she said with a smile. "This is truly wonderful work. Ranma will love this mature-looking me."

"Shall I resize your leotards as well?" Sasuke asked.

"Of course. With my new body, our record will go back to being perfect this coming season," she said. She chuckled softly. She moved to her desk and sat at it. She gripped a pen carefully and started trying to write a letter to her Ranma.

But as she was much larger than before, the pen fractured from the increased strength and broke.. She muttered and tried starting again.

----------

Akane laid on her bed. She thought about this whole situation and the truth. Ranma was enslaving Shampoo. Shampoo's stupid traditions could make her that to someone she didn't even know?

She thought of Shampoo's words the night before, the loneliness she felt in her village. No wonder she wouldn't want to go back.

But that was only last night. They should have been up front about the whole thing!

"My, you look lovelier today," came an old voice. Akane turned her head and saw a diminutive man in the window. She smiled at Akane, enjoying her enhanced curves.

"Master," Akane said softly.

"Akane, I saw your battle. Very good work. You had excellent form," the old pervert said.

"Thank you Master," Akane said. "Master, I would like to ask you a question."

"Go ahead," Happosai said.

"Did you know about the Amazons making their own slaves to outsiders for being defeated?" Akane asked.

"Ah. Found out, did you?" Happosai asked. Akane sat up and looked down at the tiny man.

"You knew? Why didn't you tell me?" Akane pleaded.

"First, I thought you knew. When I realized you didn't, it isn't my place to tell you," Happosai said. "Figured it might have made you less eager to learn from me."

"Well, Shampoo just told me. I . . I can't believe they didn't tell me the truth!" Akane said.

"Actually, this is better than the alternative for Ranma," Happosai said.

"How?" Akane asked coldly. "He enslaved a girl!"

"If he had lost, he would be the slave," Happosai said sharply. "And refusing Shampoo in her own village would mean a possible death sentence then and there for her." Akane gulped.

"They . . They would have killed her?" Akane whispered.

"She was dead to them and seen as now a servant to an outsider who took her," Happosai said. "The Amazons are pragmatic about dealing with enemies." Akane nodded.

"So, were you a slave?" Akane asked.

"No. I had realized what would happen if I beat Cologne, so we made sure our sparing matches came to draws," Happosai said. Akane nodded. "So, what will you do?"

--------

Six pens and five sheets of paper later, and the letter was finished. She handed it to Sasuke to put in an envelope. "Deliver this to Ranma. Make sure no one else is around to see it happen," Kodachi ordered. Sasuke nodded and left.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Good Clothes and Surprise Visits

choices: Ranma meets Kodachi
Back with the scouts
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
The ever obedient servant that he was, Sasuke had reached the Tendo's neighborhood in record time. Now all he had to do was watch, and wait for the perfect time to deliver his letter to the Saotome boy. If only those other girls would leave, even for five minutes, so that he could complete his mission.

Akane had left her room, having decided to talk things out with her friend after her talk with Happosai. She found the former amazon tribewoman in the living room, where she was looking depressingly at her feet.

"Shampoo," Akane said softly, wringing her hands nervously, "can we talk? Y'know, about what just happened?"

The muscular Chinese girl lifted her head to look into her conflicted friend's eyes, before giving a curt nod. Kneeling down, Akane put her hand on the other girl's shoulder as a means of comforting the both of them. For a few minutes, they were both silent, before the youngest Tendo girl spoke.

"I'm sorry I reacted like I did after you told us that," Akane said, removing her hand from her friend so she could bow in apology, "It must have been hard for you to confess that to us. I can only imagine how much it must have been eating away at you inside."

"Is okay, Shampoo understand it rather shocking to hear, and accept apology, if Akane accept Shampoo's apology for not telling truth sooner."

"Master Happosai explained to me how things work in your village, and I have to say, I'm glad you're with us."

Smiling, and on the verge of tears, Shampoo pulled her friend into a hug that would have been of the bone crushing variety to almost anyone else.

"Well, now that that's over," came the familiar voice of Nabiki from behind them, "why don't we celebrate your reconciliation doing something fun?"

*****

Shortly after Akane had run to her room, the pigtailed young man left for the dojo. Something about the movement and being sucked into the flow of his forms allowed Ranma to think.

Perhaps it was best that he just let things work themselves out for now. It seemed to him that there were times when his interference just made matters worse. This was most definitely one of those times, so, absorbed in his movement, Ranma let the world fall away. The young man continued on like this for a while, until a voice pulled him back.

"Ranma," called Akane, as she walked into the room.

The Saotome boy turned his head, and met the Tendo girl's gaze, a slightly guarded feeling of still in his heart. She didn't seem to be angry anymore, looking more remorseful than anything, but that didn't mean he was out of the woods just yet.

"Hey Akane..." Ranma greeted, his voice drifting away as he spoke.

"I just wanted to let you know that I'm sorry for how I acted before, and I understand why you kept it a secret from us as long as you did."

The young man scratched the base of his pigtail, the muscular girl's words resonating in his mind, followed by a wave of relief at her declaration of understanding.

"Thanks," Ranma said in return, "y'know, for staying friends with us, even though we weren't entirely truthful since we've been livin' here."

The two shared an understanding look, there eyes fixated on each other, slight blushes on their faces. Their eye contact didn't break until another voice cut in from inside the house.

"Akane, I thought we were going now, you and Ranma can share feelings later!" came Nabiki's voice. Ranma gave the girl a questioning glance.

"Well," Akane said in answer to his unasked question, "after Shampoo and I reconciled with each other, we all agreed to go have some fun in town, to show that there are no hard feelings."

"Oh...should I get ready to go, or something?" asked the befuddled martial artist.

"It's kinda a girls only type of thing," Akane said with a nervous chuckle, "not that we wouldn't want you to come," she continued, putting her hands up defensively, "it's just that, well...Shampoo's my best friend, and we think that this will help us grow closer after the sort of things we all revealed this morning."

Ranma shrugged, if they didn't want him to come, he wouldn't argue. It saved him from the almost certain fate of being a pack-mule for girls who could lift many times the weight he could.

"Alright, enjoy yourselves then."

With a smile, Akane left the Saotome boy to his training, and went to the entrance way were her sisters and best friend were waiting. Alone once more with his thoughts, Ranma started back into his routine.

*****

'What a stroke of luck!' Sasuke thought as he watched the women of the Tendo household leave through the front gate without the boy his mistress so desired. After waiting for them to leave his sight, the small man slunk onto the property, knowing that, while the girls were gone, there was still the chance he could be caught by someone he would rather not.

It didn't take Sasuke long to find Ranma, all he had to do was follow the kiai yells coming from the dojo. Slipping in, the servant made his presence known.

"Pardon me, Ranma-san," Sasuke said, gaining the martial artists attention.

"Huh," was the Saotome boy eloquent response. His eyes fell onto the tiny man, before widening in realization over who he was. "Wait, aren't you the Kuno's servant?"

"Indeed, and my mistress has sent me, to deliver this to you," Sasuke finished, holding up the envelope for the boy to take. After the young man snatched the letter from the Kuno servant's hands, the psuedo-ninja disappeared, but not before saying one more thing. "Please, be sure to read this, and tell no one of its contents."

After the older man disappeared, Ranma opened the large envelope. Pulling the letter free, Ranma noticed something slip out from it. Picking it up, he saw it was a glossy, wallet-sized photo of Kodachi, in a rather provocative pose, wearing a rather sexy number. On the photo was a kiss mark, and the phrase "For my darling" written on it.

After going through the letter, Ranma learned two things: 1. Kodachi had regained her muscularity, becoming even bigger than before, and 2. she wanted to meet him today, alone. Even promising that no harm would befall him or the girls whether he did or didn't. Either way, he needed to verify for himself whether the girl had indeed grew big again, and if so, how.

After a quick bath, Ranma was off to the Kuno's.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Back to Kodachi or others.

choices: Stay with Ranma or back to the Tendos and Shampoo
Back to the Scouts or Cologne
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
The five muscular young ladies walked onto the hollowed ground of the shrine. "I never knew this one existed," Ami said.

"They're a secluded sect," Rei said. "They were protective of their relic."

"And now we have to tell them they aren't getting it back," Minako said. "Swell."

"Why do we have to do it so early?" Usagi asked with a yawn.

"How can you still be sleepy? I've never woken up with more energy," Makoto replied.

"I was up late talking with Luna again. She wanted to see me train more in my new size," Usagi said.

"Are you sure it isn't worrying about Mamoru coming back tonight?" Minako teased.

"No!" Usagi said defensively. Before she could respond, they reached the shrine.

They saw the young female acolytes cleaning up the entrance and doing other chores. "Um, ladies, your priestess is expecting us," Rei said. The three looked at them and gasped.

"You're all so strong looking! Have you found it? The relic?" one asked as another ran to the shrine.

"Lady Gin! Miss Rei has arrived!" she called. The old priestess emerged and her eyes lit up.

"Rei! I knew it would have been you to find our relic. Tasted some of its blessing too, I see. No harm done. We can consider it your payment," she said as she walked over.

"Um, Lady Gin, we don't exactly have it," Rei said. "The people who took it, they worked for the original owners of the relic."

"So . . . what did you do?" the woman asked.

"We left it with the owners," Rei said. She saw the holy woman's face become covered in anger but it past and calm returned.

-----------

Ranma arrived at the Kuno house with a small smile. Seeing what the new Kodachi looked like had put a skip in his step. As he crossed the yard, a yell caught his attention.

"Saotome! Good, you arrived," Tatewaki said. Ranma turned and looked at the older student.

"Well, I like to answer messages promptly," Ranma said.

"Good of you. Now, you understand why you were called?" Tatewaki asked.

"Yeah, a big development happened last night," Ranma said as he watched frustration appear on Kuno's face.

"Indeed. A most unpleasant development," he said.

"What? I thought you'd be happy," Ranma said.

"How can I? That big . .," he paused to collect himself, ". . is going to go too far." Ranma held in his anger.

"I thought you didn't mind Kodachi's large size?" he demanded Kuno looked shocked.

"My sister's size? What does her lack of muscularity have to do with my father's plans?" Tatewaki asked.

"Your . . father? What the heck are you talking about?" Ranma asked.

"Last night, I set out a letter in the mail for you this morning," the older student said. "My father is planning to make all students conform to his ideals of dress and hair style." Tatewaki shuddered.

"Well, I got a letter from Kodachi said. She wanted to see me in private. That's why I'm here," Ranma said.

"I see. Hurt my sister in her fragile time, and I shall strike you down, even if it loses me the affections of Lady Shampoo and Lady Akane," Tatewaki said. Ranma nodded

"Furthest thing from my mind," Ranma said. Tatewaki nodded.

"We will talk once you are done with Kodachi," Tatewaki said before walking off.

"Great, now their father is causing trouble," Ranma grumbled before he carried on.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Shave and Hair Cut

choices: Ranma starts to feel Kodachi's muscles
The scouts, along with the priestess meet with Cologne
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
While moving through the Kuno compound, Ranma caught the curious scent of pineapples and coconuts. Apparently, much of the mansion had been redecorated with a Hawaiian theme overnight, with large palm trees and sea shells scattered about the halls.

'Talk about tacky,' Ranma thought as he passed yet another palm tree in the hall. If it wasn't for his prior engagement with Kodachi, the pigtailed boy would seriously consider doing some redecorating of his own, to spare his eyes from the ugly sight of the overdone theme.

Following the winding paths of the mansion, Ranma finally came to the Kuno daughter's room. Even from outside the closed door, he could smell the fragrant scent of her iconic black roses. Gently, he rapt the door with his knuckles, eagerness barely restrained at the thought of seeing Kodachi's new, muscular body.

"Is that you, darling?" came a lilting voice from the other side of the door.

"Uh...yeah, it's me, Kodachi. I got your letter, and came over like you asked."

Ranma's excitement and eagerness were nearing their peak, as the door separating them slowly opened, revealing his lady caller in all her glory.

*****

"How could you just leave our shrine's most sacred relic with some strange Chinese woman based on a story she told you?" roared the furious shrine maiden.

"B...but she gave us some re...really good proof that it was her t...tribes'," stuttered out Usagi in a panic.

"I asked you to retrieve our stolen relic, and you come back empty handed with just a sob story and an excuse! Did you not want to return our relic or are you just stupid?!"

"Hey!!!" came the simultaneous yells of the five girls.

"I want you to take me to see this woman, and we'll see who it really belongs to."

So, the priestess, lead by Usagi and her friends, started towards the Amazonian owned restaurant.

*****

Shampoo sat quietly in the dark theater, her head cocked in slight confusion as she took in the scene before her. Leaning to her left, she whispered into Akane's ear.

"Why little man disappear after putting on ring?"

Akane grunted, slightly annoyed because this was the tenth time since the movie started that the Amazon had interrupted with a question. Being a good friend though, the Tendo girl answered.

"Because the ring has the power to make whoever wears it invisible."

Akane wasn't sure if she could make it through the rest of the movie like this. It was bad enough that the usher asked them to sit in the back because of how big they were, now she had to weather Shampoo's constant questions throughout the film. Well, whatever, she still loved hanging out with the girl regardless.

*****

There stood Kodachi, dressed in a simple blouse and skirt combination that molded to her frame perfectly, but still kept some of her body to be left to the imagination.

Kodachi stood proud, her muscle greatly surpassing their former size. On her face, a slight blush colored her cheeks, as the thought of Ranma coming to see her filled her thoughts. Taking a pose she knew would showcase all her new muscle, the young lady smiled warmly at her guest.

"It is lovely to see you again Ranma. Especially after what happened when we last met."

"Uh-huh, it's nice to see you too..." Ranma said, nodding dumbly.

"Again, I must apologize for the uncouth behavior of mine. I hope we can move past it and start anew. I meant what I said in my letter, and I wish to make amends both with you, and your friends."

Ranma was snapped out of the trance he had entered upon seeing the muscular gymnast's body.

"Do you really mean that?" he asked with slight hope and apprehension.

"I swear it on my family's honor." Her voice never wavered once, or gave any hint of a lie. "So...will you forgive me, Ranma?"

Seeing the sincerity in the young woman's face, Ranma nodded.

"Okay, I guess I can forgive you, but you have to promise that you'll apologize to Akane, Shampoo, Nabiki, and Kasumi."

"You have my word that I will apologize to them."

After that bit of awkwardness, there was a pause where they just looked at each other in silence. Ranma quickly grew weary of the silence, and decided to move the conversation along.

"S...so how did you get like this? I thought Akane took your strength and size from you during the fight."

"Indeed she did, but my father's homecoming brought with it a fortunate turn of events, and I can assure you that my current form did not come from genetic material stolen from Miss Tendo, or anyone else for that matter. This is all me."

Kodachi took yet another pose to show off her amazing arms, powerful pecs, and glorious glutes. The sight of her bulging musculature caused Ranma to drool slightly, something that didn't escape the young woman's notice.

"Would you like to feel, Ranma dear?" Kodachi asked with a slight lustful smile, and leaned in closer while offering her flexing arm to him.

"M...may I?"

Rather than answer, Kodachi grabbed his hand with her larger one, and placed it on her bicep.

"Touch my muscles as much as you please, darling Ranma."

As Ranma felt her massive arm, Kodachi's hand snaked behind his head, and pulled him into a scorching kiss, leaning down to meet his lips.
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.title: Ranma meets the new, improved Kodachi

choices: Stay with ranma.  Does he notice the necklace?
Back to Cologne or Akane
1442221212212212121112221212212222221221.content:
Ranma smiled as the kiss ended. He turned his gaze to the powerful arm before him. If her previous form could bench-press cars, he had no doubts the same could be done here. he moved down the arm to start at her tough, but soft hands. There was wear and tear on them, showing hard work done with them, but a softness that showed they were taken care of as well. He followed the right arm up to the forearm. The powerful muscles felt warm even with the cloth between his hand snd her skin.

As a fighter, Ranma knew many forms and means to use his body as a weapon. Besides the standard punches and strikes, he knew the forearm could be an effective clubbing weapon The strength of the muscles and bone could do some serious damage to a person in close-quarters combat. He squeezed the forearm and Kodachi smiled at this sign of affection.

Ranma smiled and continued to squeeze. As nice as this felt, as close to giving into his lust as he was, something felt off with these muscles. He needed to touch more to be sure, but . . . there was something not normal about them.

Slowly, he moved on back to the biceps and triceps.

---------

Cologne nodded as she read over the inventory list and what they needed for the next delivery. Nagi went off into space for a short time, some job to handle a criminal with a good bounty on his head. Ryoga was counting the inventory and the place was pretty much dead.

Which was fine at this morning hour. They weren't a breakfast establishment.

Which is why shen she first felt the threatening aura approaching her place followed by the front door's bell jingle, did she rise and move caustiuously to see who was there. She glanced around the corner to see who had entered.

A old looking woman stood among five familiar looking ladies. Cologne recognized the older woman's garb as the typical shrine wear for priestess, but few Japanese priestess were taller than six feet.

"Go and get that thief our here now!" the older woman said. The one Cologne recognized as mars gulped and started to move.

Cologne appeared first. she walked towards the slightly taller priestess with a soft smile on her face.

"Welcome to my cafe. While we are not currently serving any meals, how may I help you?" she asked in a polite tone. The priestess held back a snarl.

"You will give me my temple's treasure," she said. "The one your thieves took from it not a month ago."

"What might have been taken wasn't yours originally," Cologne said. "It was buried by another thief long ago when he hid it from my tribe."

"I don't care about your past grievance. We use that necklace to help our maidens become stronger and carry on the burdens of helping the spirits," the priestess said. "A strong body gives us more means of combating problematic spirits."

"I empathize and understand your desire, but you won't be getting it back. The lost treasure as been sought after by my people for over 300 years," Cologne said.

"If you do not hand it over, I will take it back," the priestess said. "I do not like to use force, but I will if I must."

"My lady," Rei said, "This isn't very-"

"Shut up you stupid girl! I will do what you failed to do!" the priestess yelled before throwing a punch. It was a good punch. One able to crack stone. And against a normal person, it would be a dangerous attack.

Against a woman of Cologne's age and experience, it was slow and pathetic. The movement was sloppy and didn't have the effectiveness that even Ryoga had in their first fight. Genma and Soun had left town to deal with some business relating to the school, leaving Ranma and the sisters alone for an undetermined amount of time. What most people would call a normal morning, the people of Nerima called a prelude to disaster. In fact, any time when it is peaceful only serves to stress out the populace even more, it just meant something incredibly chaotic was about to happen, and this chaos usually went hand in hand with destruction of property. Many silent screams of worried torment echoed simultaneously in the minds of everyone in the area.

Inside the house, Kasumi was the first to wake, as per usual. It took her less than a second to realize something was off. For one thing, her bed seemed to be much smaller than before, her shoulders didn't hang of the edge when she went to sleep. This coupled with the feeling of torn fabric on her soft skin caused her to look down on herself to exam what was going on. The first thing Kasumi saw was her now incredibly well developed abs. Jumping out of bed (and practically hitting her head on the ceiling) the chestnut haired girl ran to the mirror on her dresser.

Her new musculature rippled and swelled with even the most miniscule of movements. Kasumi pinched her cheek to see if she would wake up, but no luck, this was real. this shock was quickly overcome when the young lady remembered her chores for the morning and placed her new worries in the back of her mind, where she would leave them until later, when she had no chores to do.

Making breakfast proved to be a challenge, as Kasumi's new frame was much broader than her normal one, which made it more difficult to move around without knocking over pots and pans. It took a lot of trial and error, but the she managed to cook yet another fabulous breakfast for her family and guest.

Meanwhile, in Akane's room, the youngest Tendo woke up, and groggily slipped out of her now tattered pajamas and into a pair of shorts and a shirt and left her room, looking to start her normal morning jog. She passed her sister in the kitchen, the older woman tried to tell her something, but she was too out of it to care then. She would listen after she got back from her jog, and was fully awake. She exited the house after grabbing a bottle of water and started to jog lightly down the block. She was completely unaware of the changes that had taken place during the night, but she would soon find out.

Kasumi was surprised that her sister was taking this so well. She ran a now big hand over her new muscles, in awe of just how powerful she felt now. Her now braided hair was draped over a massive shoulder. Her regular dress strained to hold her new figure in, only doing so because it was the most elastic piece of clothing she owned. This newly found power could go to a girl's head, and it was starting to do just that with Kasumi.

Ranma awoke with a groan, happy that for the first time in months he wasn't woken up by being tossed out a window into the pond. His stomach growled, signaling its demand for food, large quantities of food, specifically Kasumi's wonderful homemade breakfast. After storing his futon and changing into some clean clothes, the heir to the Saotome school of Anything Goes went downstairs to get some food.

With arms that looked like someone had placed boulders of cut marble beneath her skin, and legs that were wider than a man's waist, it was no question as to why no one wanted to cross her. "If that fast panda thinks I'm going to marry anyone he says, he's out of his mind," the teenager grumbled, her fists clenched tight at her side. "It's one thing that he got me cursed, now he thinks he can decide my life for me."

After that stupid excuse of a father had kicked the young martial artist into the spring, his life had become much harder.

Ten strides behind her, and staying to the shadows, was a big ball of fat and fur that was Genma Saotome. He had learned through experience that it was not wise to directly confront his son in his cursed form, as all of the training had given his female form am even more powerful body than was normal for the gender. For now, though, he needed to get the boy over to his friend's house, and make sure the joining of the schools happened.

Finding a suitably heavy and blunt object in the form of a uprooted street sign, the scheming panda put his plan into action. With a mighty leap, he cleared across the distance between them and brought the metal down in her head with almost all the force his panda body could bring, and the redhead toppled like a fallen oak tree.

Carrying the unconscious Ranma proved difficult, as she was much heavier and larger in female form, but Genma managed to get a good pace going, moving toward Soun Tendo's home.

*****

The excitement that Soun was feeling since he had received the letter from his old friend was more than the other occupants of the traditionaly styled house could bear. While they didn't know the reason for his sudden abundance of energy, they knew their questions would be answered when he had eagerly called them to assemble in the family room, like a child wanting to play, and told them he had a special announcement.

Like all of the houses in the area, the Tendo home was scaled so that women could move unimpeded by low ceilings or narrow halls, and the building felt cavernous to Soun. His voice echoed across the house as he called his family.

His eldest daughter entered the room first, one arm occupied with a dumbell that weighed more than her father did. She was followed closely by her younger sister, Nabiki, who had been working on her tan in the back yard.

"What do you want, daddy?" Nabiki asked, sounding bored and would rather still be tanning.

"I've got excellent news. My old friend and training payer, Genma, is arriving today to fulfill our promise of joining the schools of anything goes by having our children marry. He is bringing his son here so he can choose one of you for a fiance."

Fumes floated out of the kitchen and into the living room of the Tendo household. Kasumi was reluctantly sitting at the dinner table with Nabiki, both nervously waiting for their younger sister to finish dinner. Akane had not taken no for an answer when she asked Kasumi if she could do the cooking for that night's meal.

Soun Tendo, their father, had run out of the house upon hearing this, saying something about having remembered an urgent appointment. Ranma and Genma had jumped out the door, a backpack strapped to each of their backs. Genma mumbled that they were going on a quick training trip and would not be back until the following evening. This left Kasumi and Nabiki alone with what would surely be a stomach churning meal. They had been unable to escape because Kasumi was too nice and Akane had trapped Nabiki before she could.

A loud explosion followed by the smoke detector going off signaled the arrival of Akane's horrid meal. The short-haired tomboy entered the dining room carrying a tray with three bowls of a bubbling, near black liquid. The fact that Akane was holding a spoon with half the end burnt off and charred black was disheartening to the two.

"Dinner's ready," Akane stated proudly, her chest puffed out proudly as she displayed her creation, "I'm really proud of this batch. I think I'm finally getting this cooking thing down." She placed a bowl in front of her sisters before taking the last one for herself. "Well...dig in."

***ONE HOUR LATER***

All three of the sisters were slumped over, groaning and clutching their stomachs in pain, three bowls sat on their sides on the table, the black slop had hardened like cement, ruining the heavy wooden table for good.

"What on Earth did you put in that soup, Akane?" Nabiki groaned through her teeth.

"I followed the recipe exactly," was Akane's response, "I only added one thing that wasn't in the recipe and that was a weird looking, glowing mushroom I found on the way home from school. I thought it looked tasty and cut it up into the pot."

Nabiki and Kasumi were in too much pain to vocalize their anger and disbelief that the girl would make them eat something she described as weird looking and glowing. They thanked the gods as they slipped into unconciousness.

***THE NEXT MORNING***

The sound of knuckles on wood woke Kasumi from her delerious slumber. That night had been filled with odd nightmares and dreams which she attributed to the food from dinner. She opened the door and saw the paperboy standing there, paper in hand, smiling up at her.

A disturbing feeling came over the girl, as she looked at the teenager before her she couldn't help but think about how nice it would be to have him in her stomach.
