Her body oozed strength and confidence, but beneath that steel outer shell was the heart of a young woman. One night, after a lot of saki and beer, he approached her as she sat alone drinking in a corner. They talked and got to know each other. They soon started dating and it was then Genma came to notice his wife's strange aura. She owned a gym of her own, not just to keep her own body in top shape, but she seemed to draw women to her. She didn't understand this power either, but ever since she was young, girls and women who met her became interested in working out. They regularly flocked to her gym, providing her with a nice customer base. Her mother was like her, but had a smaller body.

When Ranma was born a boy, she agreed to let Genma care for him, to help him appreciate a woman of incredible strength. Now that he stood next to his son in his new powerful body, he wondered if he should tell her the truth. Should Ranma be told why he is now so tall and powerful? And how women might come to him yearning to be strong?

"So, if we get hit with some hot water, we'll go back to normal?" Ranma repeated. Genma shook his head and came back to the conversation.

The tour guide nodded and led them into his hut. Once inside, he pulled a hot kettle off his fire and splashed Ranma with some. Ranma shrank dramatically to the body of a strong male youth. His clothes no longer fitting just right. They were stretched by his alternate form.

Genma became human once again and Ranma looked at his pops. Dad was deep in thought, Ranma realized. He knew that look well, mainly because it usually led to some trouble or unfortunate situation. "What'cha thinking about pops?" Ranma asked.
15533222221.title: A New Body for a New Form

choices: Genma and Ranma's journey home
The day of their reunion with Nodoka
155332222211.content:
Genma remained silent for a moment, as he prepared to fill his son in on what he knew, about his new body, and his mother. The stout master knew that it would be better for Ranma to learn this now, as opposed being kept in the dark, as the only one who could help Ranma master his new form was Nodoka.

"I was thinking about your mother, boy. You look almost exactly like her as a girl, from the hair color, to the ridiculously big muscles you have."

Ranma's eyes widened in shock at the bombshell that his father had just dropped. Never in a million years had could he have guessed that.

"Wha...what are ya saying, pop?" the young man stuttered.

"That your mother, boy, has the exact same body that you have. She has arms that could crush stone with a flex, son, and your girl side got its build from her, no question."

"Why didn't you ever tell me about mom, pop?" the confused martial artist asked.

"Ranma, your mother is a very...powerful individual, and trying to explain her abilities to you would be doing them, and her a disservice. Even I don't fully comprehend your mother's strength, but I do know it would have proven a distraction to your training if I had brought it up. I only tell you this now, because not doing so would be dangerous, as there are abilities Nodoka had that I cannot teach you to control."

Ranma nodded in understanding, such a revelation would have been quite the distraction, indeed. His father was obviously incredibly worried about his new form, and the old man was never one to let the little things interfere with their journey.

"I think our best course of action is going to be returning to your mother, and hope that she isn't too mad with me about getting you cursed. I had hoped we could have visited my old friend before we went home, but that isn't something that we have the luxury of doing anymore."

"Why were you wanting to go see your friend before we went home, pop?" Ranma asked.

"No reason, son. He and I just trained under the same master, and became masters together. Now get your gear, tomorrow we are going to the port, and catch a ship back to Japan."

Genma fell silent and only the sound of their guide bustling about the small house could be heard. Ranma was filled with unease, as his father's words sank in, and uncertainty welled up inside him.

*****

Across the narrow sea, on the island nation of Japan, Nodoka Saotome sat behind a high quality executive desk, sorting out various bits of paperwork for her self created business. A short time after she married Genma, the young woman opened a small gym for women, that quickly exploded into an overnight success, and soon expanded into one of the most successful franchises in the country. The amount of money she earned every year meant almost nothing was out of her reach, though there was not many material things that she wanted. No, Nodoka had much grander plans.

Ever since the woman had entered puberty, and her body's abilities activated, the auburn haired woman had delved deeply into anything that could explain her powers. Everything from magic to super science, she had people working on all of it. It was all to realize her dream.

"Lady Nodoka," a spiky-haired redhead called from the office door, her muscular body filling up most of the entrance, "we have narrowed down the location of your wayward husband and son. It appears that they are on mainland China, and from what we've heard, they are heading for the coast, possibly on their way back to Japan."

A beaming smile curled Nodoka's lips, it was news that she had been waiting on for months. It was coming up on the ten year mark of when she agreed to let her husband take their son on a training trip, and the time was coming for them to return home.

"Thank you very much, Washu. Please keep me updated on the matter."
155332222211.title: Genma tells Ranma about his mother

choices: Ryoga chooses whether to stay or go.
Follow Ranma, or check on Nodoka.
1553322222111.content:
One choice changes everything. People don't think it can be, but it happens. Genma's choice of honesty shifted things. Instead of chasing his father through the cursed ponds, Ranma slept on a mat in the guide's home. Because Ranma wasn't there, a short distance away a lost boy took a misstep and fell into the Spring of the Drowned Piglet.

The tiny figure climbed out, shocked but alone. No one could explain what befell him because the guide was busy playing host to some other guests.

So Ryoga did all he could do: he wandered. After walking a few miles in his new form, he came across a celebration at this village. He felt his nose begin to bleed as his tiny form allowed him to see up the skirts of many women. He rushed through, trying not to look, and ran into the leg of one girl in particular. She had long purple hair and was very happy. She jumped up and down, causing her breasts to bounce too.

"I won. I am the best," Shampoo said in her native tongue. She looked down at the piglet who ran into her. "Aw. How cute. I never saw you around." Shampoo picked him up and fed him some food. Ryoga, hungry from his long walk and lack of proper food in the past few days, ate what was given to him.

While he would never get vengeance on Ranma, if his new life meant living with this girl who would treat him nicely, that would be fine.

"Just wait until he's grown and then we can feast on some good pork," Shampoo said to her friends as she fed the piglet.

------

Shampoo returned to her home and Ryoga was too fed to notice she was walking to the bathroom. His eyes closed as sleep called to him. He heard the splish-splash of water and was set down on something soft. Opening his eyes, he saw he was on some clothes. In fact, it was girl's panties! Looking up, he saw the purple-haired girl undressing. He squealed in embarrassment. He tried turning away, but couldn't run.

Shampoo saw this and laughed. "Cute piglet," she said softly. Her naked form descended and picked up the piglet and brught him to her bountiful chest, which caused him to squeal some more. She lowered herself into the hot water.

As Ryoga descended, he felt a sense of vertigo. His body expanded outward and he was a young man once again. With his full clothing and backpack. The shock of returning with the shock Shampoo felt with this pervert cursed boy trying to sneak in caused her to attack Ryoga, but he wasn't a lightweight like Moose.As she tried to throw him off her, He fell to the side, out of the tub and took her with him. They tumbled, causing a ruckus, and when Cologne opened the door to investigate, she saw a naked Shampoo under Ryoga.

"It's not what it looks like!" Ryoga screamed, in hope someone would understand him. All he felt was a kick to the groin.

-------

Five minutes later, Shampoo was clothed and Ryoga sat with an ice pack on his family jewels. He listened as the purple-haired girl vented in fury to the tiny old woman. But the old woman said one thing and the girl was silent. She turned to Ryoga. "Do you know what happened?" she asked.

"I-Um, earlier today, I was looking for a person I will kill, when I fell into some water. I was a piglet. I walked here and when I was put into the bath,I was a guy again," Ryoga said, as the memories of a naked Shampoo came to him. "Tell her I am sorry I saw her naked. I didn't mean to. She never gave me a chance to escape." The old woman laughed softly.

"Such a gentleman. Boy, there are far more serious things than you seeing my great-grandchild naked," the woman said. "You defeated her in combat."

"What? I was just trying to get off of her when I changed back," Ryoga said.

"And she attacked you. You pinned her to the ground. You beat her," Cologne said. "Shampoo!" Ryoga blinked in confusion.

"I don't think I need-" Ryoga said before the girl reached over and kissed him on the lips. It was a nice soft kiss. Her lips were warm and smooth. "What?" was all he could say when it ended.

"Our traditions say when one of us is beaten by an outsider make, we must become betrothed to them," Cologne said.

"And if I was a girl?" Ryoga asked.

"Shampoo would have to kill you," Cologne said in the same tone. Ryoga nodded.

"Good thing I wasn't a girl," Ryoga said as he realized she was serious. "So, what now?"

"Now, your choice. You can live here or leave. Shampoo will be with you either way," Cologne said. Ryoga nodded. "You said you wanted to kill someone. Are you skilled in tracking?"

"Um, not really," Ryoga said, not wanting to admit his really bad sense of direction to these people.

"Then stay here for a time. Shampoo can train you in fighting and tracking. You can help her Japanese. Once you are ready, you can continue your hunt," Cologne offered. Ryoga nodded in understanding.

"Can I tell you in the morning?" Ryoga asked.

"Of course," Cologne said. Shampoo muttered something under her breath before leaving.

"What did she say?"

"If you touch her without her permission, she will cut off your -ahem- with a dull blade," Cologne said. Ryoga blinked and nodded.

-------

With provisions from the guide, Ranma and his father set off to port to meet his mom.
1553322222111.title: Divergence

choices: Ranma and Genma arrive home
There is a distraction along the way
15533222221112.content:
Nodoka smiled gleefully at the sunny day from behind her office desk. One of her contacts had confirmed that Genma and her son had departed from China from a small port within the last few hours. Soon her pride and joy, and his father, would return home, and to her. Oh, what surprises she had in store for Ranma when he arrived. She leaned back in her chair, and allowed her mind began to drift back to how she met her husband, and her life to that point.

As a teenager, Nodoka knew that she was very different from her peers. Once puberty hit her, she noticed big changes in her body that went far beyond the norm for girls her age. By 7th grade she had the body of an Olympic athlete, by 9th she had the physique of a heavyweight bodybuilder, and she just kept getting bigger. Her parents could not explain it, and neither could any doctor she went to. It was something they had never seen in any other person on the planet. It was this abnormality of her's that started her fascination with anything strange, magical, or weird in the world.

When she met Genma for the first time, she didn't really think much of him, but he was persistent if nothing else. By then she had acquired many female followers, but had found no acceptable suitors. Her strength and size had intimidated any man she met, everyone except Genma. Her strength was actually something that attracted him to her, and his passion for the martial arts, and for her, eventually won her heart.

On Ranma's 6th birthday, the two disembarked for their ten year training voyage. It broke Nodoka's heart to see the two of them go, although Genma knew she would be fine, as her gym was bringing in plenty of money for her to live off for a long, long time. With her company well established, and no one waiting for her at home, Nodoka had taken to her hobby in search for anything magical, or unexplained.

It was during one of her journeys into the weird that she investigated an old, abandoned shrine that was said to have a cave in which a goblin was sealed. She had wandered past the dilapidated old shrine, the family said to have moved somewhere far away, and eventually came upon the cave of the goblin. The many traps that were set did not dissuade her, and served only to annoy Nodoka in her quest. She kept going until she came upon a giant crystal surrounded by a seal. It was the beast's prison, and she fully intended to see for herself what was trapped there. With a mighty pull, she lifted it off the ground, it was no problem for her powerful muscles, and only an ill placed rock underfoot managed to make her lose her grip, and send the crystal smashing into the side of the cave. It shattered into hundreds of pieces, but in the mess, Nodoka found what she was looking for.

Washu had joined up with her soon after, quickly falling under Nodoka's charm, and just as interested in helping her find the bizarre. The redhead was a scientific genius without equal, and went out of her way to invent many things to aid the Saotome matriarch, but none was as great as her dimensional portal generator. It had been the most amazing thing Nodoka had ever experienced, hoping to alternate worlds as she pleased, though she only did so every few months, but almost every time she came back, there were one or two people who came with her. They were always women, and many of them were Ranma's age, and that gave her a wonderful idea. After all, Ranma was going to be a man among men, so he should have his pick of the ladies.

*****

Aboard the small vessel that they had taken for the voyage home, Ranma sat, covered in a raincoat to keep him from getting wet. They were within an hour of their destination, and it would be straight from port to home from there. The journey out of the mountains had been arduous, but they had managed to get to a port town fairly fast, and without anyone seeing his girl form. If he was honest, the young man was nervous about seeing his mother for the first time in ten years, especially with his new condition, but at the same time, he was happy to be able to see her again.

*****

Ryoga nervously glanced at his newly gained wife from across the table. Her threat of painful castration had put him on edge, and he wasn't sure how to talk to her, He just wanted to get back to his search for Ranma, and would sort this out later. He had already told her about his plans, and she had reluctantly agreed to follow. They had decided to head out the next day, at sunrise.
15533222221112.title: Nodoka thinks about the past

choices: Stay with the couple as they walk.
Back to Ranma as the women aren't fawning over him.
155332222211122.content:
Genma and Ranma arrived at one of Tokyo's ports and started walking. They moved towards the last place Genma knew Nodoka lived. Ranma noticed something off as they walked into this new neighborhood. "Dad, is it me, or are all these girls stronger than the typical girl?" Ranma asked.

Genma looked around and knew what his son meant. Each girl from small elementary students to young career women looked strongly built. Some were more fit, taller even, but not one out of shape woman was around them. It was Nodoka Country, as he used to joke to his wife about her cult of followers.

"This is your mother's charm, boy," Genma asnwered. "I would bet each one of these girls has met her or seen her, or lived with someone who has scene her." Genma's trained eyes spotted another woman, but she wasn't hard to miss. She stood taller than anyone else. Well into the six-foot range with chestnut brown hair. She walked hand in hand with a young man dressed as a doctor. Out of one store, they were greeted by a pair of women, nearly equal in the one woman's size. One had long dark hair matching her dark skin. She wore blue shirts and shorts. The other was a pale woman with her hair helt in a tight bun, preferring clothing of red, gold, and black. It reminded Genma of pictures of the Imperial Army.

"This is unreal," Ranma said. Then he saw something that made his heart race.

"Hm. Why do you think I never disrespected the idea of strong women?" Genma asked. He turned and saw an empty space. Turning, he saw Ranma racing towards a child, whose ball had been rolling into the street. Coming head on was a car. Ranma pushed the small girl, feeling her dense muscles under that shirt. He barely had time to respond or jump when some larger form enveloped him. He felt something slam into whatever grabbed him. Glancing down, he saw arms thick as his own body, but pale like paper, holding him.

"My," came a silky voice from above. "Are you brave, or just that stupid to run after a kid like that?"

"Azula!" came another voice. The woman, Azula, Ranma presumed, released Ranma. He felt small next to her large frame. He looked behind her and saw the car. It looked like it hit a brick wall. A tall brown girl joined them. "You're bleeding."

"It's just a scratch, Katara," Azula said dismissively. She fell to a knee. Looking at Azula's back, under her clothes was a deep gash where the car struck her.

"When I go back to talk with your brother about how you are doing, I don't want to tell him you're unable to walk," Katara said.

"Katara, does she need more than your healing?" asked another voice. Ranma turned and saw a doctor looking at the driver of the wrecked car. His airbag had deployed. A woman larger than either Katara or Azula stood by with the car door in hand. Had she ripped it off?

"No," Katara said. "It should be fine." She pulled water out of a bottle with ice in it and it formed around her hand. It began to glow and the gash was healed.

"How the hell did you do that?" Ranma whispered. Katara smiled.

"You would call it magic," Katara said, "Now let me make sure you are alright."

"Wait, what?" Ranma said, as her other arm grabbed Ranma and brought him close. The cold water hit Ranma's chest. The familiar vertigo hit Ranma as she expanded out and up into a muscular form.

--------------

The sun was rising as a not-so-happy couple walked away from the village of the Amazons. Shampoo knew her duty. It was to be a good wife to this outsider who beat her in combat. But that was just luck. A surprise trick. If they met in a proper battlefield, she would have won. Of that, she was certain.

They walked back to the cursed springs where Ryoga was sure Ranma had gone. Maybe the guide would know if this Ranma came through. She turned from watching her husband to the ground, where the tracks of a piglet were noticeable to her. When she looked up, her husband had turned about and was walking back to the village. "You want to stay after all?" Shampoo asked.

"What? No. I'm going to the springs," Ryoga said. "They are that way." He pointed at the village before chuckling softly. Shampoo stared at him.

"Which way east?"

"East?" Ryoga repeated.

"Yes. Direction sun come from," Shampoo said.

"I know which way is east," Ryoga said.

"Then prove it." Shampoo declared. Ryoga gulped and pointed. "That north. East is right behind you." Ryoga looked over his shoulder and the morning sun burned there, as though it were mocking him.

"Um," Ryoga said softly.

"Lost husband going to drive Shampoo insane. Okay Nothing meant by this, but come on," Shampoo said, grabbing Ryoga by the hand and walking to the springs. Ryoga followed along.
155332222211122.title: Arriving in Proper Form

choices: Ranma meets the first girl
Shampoo and Ryoga hunt down more clues
1553322222111222.content:
With the exception of Genma, the eyes of everyone were wide, and locked on Ranma. Their mouths were hung open at the sheer strangeness of what they had just witnessed. Ranma braced himself for the inevitable worship that she was sure to receive.

"Wow, Katara, I when were you going to tell me you could do that with water," Azula said teasingly, "I don't know about the whole gender-swap thing, but I'd love it if you could do that to my muscles."

"I didn't do that, I don't know what happened." Katara stated in confusion.

"Well, something had to have caused this," the chestnut haired girl said as she looked over Ranma's body.

Ranma had never seen people react like this to his girl side, it was strange to not be pawed and fawned over by women who had seen his cursed form, but he enjoyed not being treated like some kind of goddess while like this. She sighed, both in relief and exasperation, and decided to tell them what had happened.

"It wasn't anything you did," Ranma explained to the now panicky Katara, "This is just a curse I happened to pick up while in China. It turns me into a girl with cold water, and take after my mother a lot like this."

A meaningful look was exchanged by the four, as recognition dawned on them about who they had just met.

"Your name wouldn't happen to be Ranma Saotome, would it?" Katara asked,

"Uh...yeah, it is. Why?" Ranma answered.

"We know your mother," Azula provided, "She's been expecting you, and so have we. We can take you to her now if you want. Unless you need us here for anything, Dr Tofu."

"No. Although I would like Katara to stay with me to provide any first aid to the driver." Tofu said.

"Well, how about it?" Azula pressed.

The father and son exchanged a look, before Genma nodded his consent, and the two joined up with Azula and the as of yet unnamed brunette.

*****

It had taken some doing, but Nodoka had managed to get all of them to arrive on time. The energy bill for the month was going to be ghastly for sure, but it was worth it to get everything ready for Ranma's arrival. All of her special guests were waiting in their respective rooms, save one, and once her son arrived she would introduce them one at a time. It was best not to overwhelm him all at once, and it would give each girl her fair shot. It was going to be great.

There was a knock at the front door, and a quick check out the window showed her that her long expected reunion with Ranma and Genma had arrived.

*****

Their new guides had been kind enough to allow him to stop for some hot water to change back to his original body. Ranma didn't want to meet his mom for the first time in ten years in his cursed form if he could help it. He would tell her for sure, but not before he had a chance to talk with her for a while.

When he first saw the size of his mother's home, Ranma almost didn't believe it. He had never seen a house so large in all his life. He had seen hotels in Tokyo with fewer rooms than this unbelievable mansion. The front door by itself was a a sight, almost twice as wide as a standard door. He could tell it was sturdier than normal as well when he knocked.

The excited rumble from inside alerted the two Saotome men to the coming of Nodoka. The door swung open so fast that the vacuum created by the displaced air practically sucked them into her awaiting arms.

"Ranma! Genma! I've missed you so much!" she cried as she hugged the two into her massive chest.

"Nodoka! It's wonderful to see you again, my darling wife!" Genma exclaimed back, burying his face in her loving bosom.

She saw Azula and their other companion behind the boys, "I see you already met Azula and Kasumi. They are such nice girls aren't they! We have so much to discuss. Follow me." Nodoka said as she ushered them inside.

"We sure do," Ranma sighed as he was followed his mother.

"I want you to tell me all the interesting things you did on your trip," Nodoka said happily.

"Where to start..." Ranma trailed off.

*****

With his new wife's help, Ryoga managed to find his way back to the damned springs were he had been cursed. The guide they found easily enough, as his was the only building within miles of the magical place, and he was sitting outside it, eating his lunch. He soon noticed them approach, and went to greet them.

'Hello! Welcome to the cursed springs of Jusenkyo! Is there anything I can help you with, dear customers?' the guide asked in Chinese.

"What did you say?" Ryoga asked. "Do you speak Japanese? I need to ask you some questions."

"Oh, so sorry Mr Customer," the guide said as he quickly switched to Japanese. "You have question for me?"

"Yes. I'm looking for a son-of-a-bitch coward. He has a black hair that he keeps tied back, and his fatass of a father is with him. He usually wears a ratty old gi, is bald, and wears glasses."

"Ah yes! You mean customers who were here before you. They leave almost a day ago. They say they go to Japan."

"How did they plan to get there!?" Ryoga demanded as he grabbed the guide by the collar of his shirt.

"They not say!" the guide cried out as he was hoisted off the ground by the irate teen.

Ryoga would have shaken the man to pieces as his anger took hold of him, and it was only the gentle hand of Shampoo that stopped him.

"Husband need calm down. Let Shampoo ask questions now."

After a brief exchange of words with the scared man, Shampoo was able to determine the direction the two went. It wasn't much to go on, but it was something.

"Come, we find more clues on road."

Once again, Shampoo held his hand, and Ryoga found himself somewhat grateful that she had joined him for the first time since he met her.

*****

After a long talk over what he had experienced on his trip, Ranma and his mother had settled into a calm silence, just enjoying each others company. If there was any time to tell his mother about his condition it was now. Ranma gathered his courage, and opened his mouth.

"Mom there's something you need to know..." he started.

"I'm sure it can wait for now. I have something incredible to tell you," Nodoka interrupted, her eagerness to start her plan could no longer be contained. "While you and your father were away, I met many, many people do to my hobby, and quite a few of them I have really come to appreciate. And so, I agreed to let them be your potential fiancées, and they are all here to meet you today!" Nodoka dropped her bomb of a reveal, shocking husband and son alike. "They all want to meet you, and they are waiting in their rooms to do so. They want to introduce themselves one at a time, and after, there will be a big banquet. Isn't that exciting?"

Ranma and Genma stood still, their mouths agape in shock.
1553322222111222.title: Back to Ranma as the women aren't fawning o...

choices: Ranma has a nice time with Ty Lee.
Back to Genma and Nodoka, or Ryoga.
15533222221112222.content:
Shampoo stared at the ground as they walked down the main road. The earth trail showed some signs of travelers, but a recent rain eroded some of the tracks. Ryoga didn't wander off. He stayed close by. In fact, as much as he didn't want to admit it, he was acting a bit of a pervert. He stared at his "wife" and her nice looking backside as it stuck up in the air while she looked at the ground.

"I see," Shampoo called out.

"I wasn't looking!" Ryoga hastily shouted. Shampoo rose and turned.

"You see strange change in tracks from there?" she asked.

"Um, what?" Ryoga asked, confused.

"What you see? What you not looking at?" Shampoo asked. She moved close to Ryoga in a threatening stance.

"Yo-you're pretty body," Ryoga confessed, Shampoo blinked and nodded. She turned and smiled softly when he wouldn't see.

"Well, Shampoo find weird tracks," Shampoo said. "They shift from a man and teenage boy to animal, probably panda, and very large human."

"Wait, are you saying Ranma got cursed too?" Ryoga asked.

"Yes. If these right tracks," Shampoo said.

"And the smaller pair becomes big?" Ryoga asked. Shampoo nodded.

"Most everyone get cursed when they go to those springs. Even Amazons who train there and know about dangers," Shampoo said.

"Curse you Ranma. I become a piglet ad you become larger?!" Ryoga yelled. "Which way do they lead?" Shampoo pointed down the trail they are on. Ryoga nodded and started walking in that direction. Shampoo stayed close, hoping she wouldn't have to hold his hand, but a bend in the trail was coming up. Ryoga kept walking and started going off the trail. Shampoo grabbed him by the collar and stopped him.

--------------

"Just go to each door. You will have ten minutes with each girl," his mother said. She patted him on the back and left him to the long hallway of applicants.

Ranma opened door number one. Nodoka told him this girl, Ty Lee, was something of a gymnast and circus performer. Ranma anticipated she would be muscular, but still, he stopped at the sight. Unlike his mother, or the other girls who knew his mother, Ty Lee wasn't bounding outward with muscles. She was lithe, like a gymnast or swimmer. She had tight, compact muscles which he guessed held more power than they seemed.

He also had to look down to see her face as she was doing a handstand and bending her legs in a very provocative way.

"Hi. Aren't you a cutie," Ty Lee said with a smile. She returned to upright form and walked over to Ranma. His head was about as high as her chest. "You must be Ranma."

"I am," Ranma said. Before he could respond, he found Ty Lee lifting him up into the air.

"Want to get married?" Ty Lee asked. Ranma's eyes widened.

"Um, I think I want to get to know you better first," Ranma said, wondering if all the girls would be this open with the marriage idea.

"Okay. Let's talk," Ty Lee said.
15533222221112222.title: Strange Tracks and Bends

choices: Time for Ranma to meet the next girl
Shampoo and Ryoga reach the port town
155332222211122221.content:
"So,ummm...how did you meet my mother?" Ranma asked uncertainly. He had never really had a chance to talk to a girl for any period of time during his childhood, and was unsure of how to progress, so asked the first thing that came to mind.

"Oh, that's a fun story!" Ty Lee exclaimed as she moved into yet another seemingly impossible pose, as she stood on her tiptoes and pulled her leg over her shoulder from behind. "I actually met her during her visit of my home. The first time I saw her, I was amazed at the strength and power she possessed, and after I talked to her, by the amount of kindness she showed. I joined up with her soon after that, and left my home to come here. Worth it, by the way!"

Ranma caught as much of what she said as he could, though it was difficult due to her body's constant shifts from pose to provocative pose. She was the most flexible person he had ever seen, and his teenage mind struggled to keep his mind off her nicely developed physique.

"How was your ten year trip? I bet you had a lot of adventures during that time, tell me about some of them," Ty Lee prodded.

"Oh...well, the most recent thing we did was head to China," Ranma answered. "The old man actually made us swim there so he didn't have to pay to travel there."

"You actually swam there?!" Ty Lee asked in disbelief, her eyes wide with interest.

Their conversation continued like this for a while, and Ranma found that he actually enjoyed the flexible girl's company.

*****

The amazon tracker, and her troublesome partner, had followed the tracks of their quarry through the dense forest path. The tracks were heading southwest, out of the mountains, and Shampoo was starting to see where they were heading.

"Shampoo think that husband's enemy is heading towards port town. Probably leaving China to return to Japan."

"Damn it! I just got to this country not to long ago, and now Ranma went back to Japan?!"

"Don't know for sure, but direction of tracks points towards coast, and that most likely thing they do. Only way to know for sure is to follow tracks all the way."

Shampoo grabbed Ryoga's hand and pulled the young man along as she followed the markings of their prey. It would be slow going for a while, but once they reached a the end of the tracks, they would have a more definitive idea of where the father-son duo were headed.

As the amazon lead the him along, the lost boy once more found his eyes scanning the slim, but well developed figure of his unexpected spouse. He tried to pay attention to what was ahead, but his vision would always wander back to the sight of her bubbly rear and the way it moved with every step Shampoo took. Ryoga sported a blush that would not go away as she led him.

*****

Ranma and his first potential fiancée shared a hearty laugh as he explained the time he spent at an all boys school, and the boy who had challenged him there.

"I was waiting at the lot for days, and he still hadn't shown up by the time pop said we had to go. I mean, it was the place he picked, and it couldn't have been closer to his house, and he still got lost."

The two of them were having a good talk as they exchanged stories from their lives. Ty Lee was the first girl not related to him that Ranma had spoken with for so long, and he was glad it was going so well. Ty Lee was incredibly positive, and not to mention cute. Her kind brown eyes, cute nose and always present smile put him at ease. He found that he couldn't stop looking her over, from her perky chest to her chiseled abs, a fact that the girl didn't overlook.

"Checking me out, huh?" Ty Lee teased as she bent over to give him a good look at her cleavage, "If you want a better look, you only have to ask."

Ty Lee trailed a hand along her luscious curves, while the other slipped under Ranma's chin, giving it a tickle. She began to hold herself against him, only to be interrupted by a knock at the door.

"It is time to meet the next girl, Ranma." Nodoka's voice explained.

"Awww...and I was really having fun," Ty Lee lamented, "Oh well, we'll have plenty of time to play from now on. See you later, Ranma!"

The young man exited the room, waving goodbye to the girl inside, and followed his mother down the hall once more.
155332222211122221.title: Ranma has a nice time with Ty Lee.

choices: Stay with Shampoo and Ryoga.  Do they get enough?
Back to Ranma's meeting with the ladies.
1553322222111222211.content:
Ranma entered the next door. For a moment, he was shocked. No one was there. Was she in the bathroom? Then his senses warned him to duck. He dropped to the ground and looked up. A woman of immense size floated above him. Her entire upper body seemed to have exploded with muscle. Thick bounds of muscle coated her arms and torso. Her legs, long and lovely, were similarly bound in bulging muscle. After looking past her muscles, Ranma saw her skin was a tan color, with her long orange hair floating above her. Her clothes were skintight and barely covered her bountiful breasts and groin.

From this muscular floating force came a sweet and bubbly voice. "Oh! Joyous day! You have arrived!"

"You're floating!" Ranma finally said.

"Yes. Lady Nodoka advised me to not so I wouldn't surprise you, but I was in such a wonderful mood, I couldn't help myself," the potential fiance said. She lowered herself to eye-level with Ranma, barely missing touching the floor with her body mass. "I am Starfire from Tamaran."

"I didn't do so well in geography. Where's that?" Ranma asked. Starfire laughed.

"Oh, possible husband to be, Tamaran isn't a country on this planet, it is a planet in space," Starfire said.

-------

While Nodoka was introducing her son to his potential wives, Genma enjoyed a nice hot bath to clean himself up. Before she left with Ranma, Nodoka noted he smelled of seaweed, sweat, and dead fish. So, he took advantage of her custom-size bathtub, which was a small pool for him, and cleaned up.

Putting on new clothes his wife had provided, he was happy to have returned. Things were looking well. Though, he should probably notify his friend Soun Tendo about his arrival back in Japan sooner than expected and see if his girls would be willing to marry his son. They had competition now. If they were close to Nodoka, it could be quite large competition and if Ranma took after him, beautiful muscular women were his weakness. So, he went to her office to find a phone.

---------

Starfire didn't want to stand, Ranma realized, as she the room would have been cramp for her. Her mammoth frame had certain problems with standard building structures.

"So, do you go to school on your planet?" Ranma asked, as he sat on a table designed for a woman of his mother's side. Starfire floated in front of him, now just high enough for his eyes would be level to her cleavage.

"I had a proper education for one of my stature," Starfire said, not wanting to tell him she was a princess and for a short time Grand Ruler of her planet, "And after I came to Earth, I learned much more from my friends."

"So you live here now?"

"No, I am visiting for a short time today because of Lady Nodoka's request to meet with you," Starfire said. "I must depart in a few hours." Ranma nodded.

----------

Genma walked into the office and saw the chestnut-haired woman from the street. She was placing files on Nodoka's expansive desk. Her clothes were conservative for a woman her size. They all but hid her powerful body. She smiled at Genma. "Mister Saotome, it is a pleasure to see you again."

"And you, young lady," Genma said. "I don't think I caught your name."

"No. I am Kasumi Tendo," Kasumi said.

"T-Tendo? I know some Tendos," Genma said.

"Yes, my father. I just spoke with him on the phone. He is coming over here," Kasumi said.

"Well, that saves me a call," Genma said. "How did you come to know my wife?"

"Aunty came to my family in a time of need. My two sisters have also grown well under her guidance," Kasumi said.

"And are they waiting to meet my boy?" Genma asked.

"Akane is. Nabiki has no interest in dating one boy at the moment. I am in a relationship with another gentleman," Kasumi said. Genma nodded.

---------

Shampoo was impressed for once with her husband. While they were walking down the road, some local thugs came out of the woods to rob them. They didn't scare Shampoo, as their forms were terrible. Who teaching someone to hold a knife like that? But the sight of them drawing a weapon on her infuriated Ryoga. Using his own umbrella as a weapon, which Shampoo now realized was heavier than it seemed, he beat down these thugs.

"Are you okay?" Ryoga asked, looking her in the eyes. Shampoo turned away, so she wasn't facing him. She didn't want him to see her blushing.

"Shampoo fine. Shampoo warrior. Didn't need your help," Shampoo declared.

"I . . . I know. But I just got angry when they drew a weapon against a lady," Ryoga said. Shampoo smiled and kicked one thug in the stomach. He cried in pain.

"Do you have money, Ryoga?" Shampoo asked. Her blush was gone as she looked back.

"I have some. I don't know if it is enough for passage to Japan, especially with both of us," Ryoga said.

"Let's see if these idiots can help," Shampoo said, reaching down and searching the first one for a wallet.

Soun and Genma meet
15533222221112222112.content:
"So what was life on your, um, planet like?" Ranma queried uncertainly.

"We of Tamaran are a mighty warrior people," Starfire happily declared, "Fighting is something we do well, and are revered as fierce warriors throughout space."

Ranma nodded at her words, making note to question her on any fighting styles she may know. After all, it wasn't every day you came across the possibility of learning fighting styles from alien worlds.

"Tamaraneans are a very passionate people as well, in fact all of our powers tie into our emotions. My excitement and joy of being able to meet you is actually what is letting me fly right now."

"You said something about powers, so does that mean you can do something other than fly?" Ranma asked. Personally, he thought being able to fly was awesome in and off itself, and anything else would just be icing on the cake.

"Oh my, yes! I also have what you humans would call super strength," Starfire declared, and lifted the boy off the ground with one arm, her palm on his stomach as she scooped him into the air.

"I kind of expected that, seeing how big your muscles are," Ranma quipped.

"Oh, but my muscles were not always like this, I had super strength before I grow bigger. It was only after I met Lady Nodoka that I began to become strong."

"Uh huh..." Ranma trialed off as he was gently lowered until he was eye-to-eye with the bright emerald irises of Starfire. They were innocent, and loving eyes that clearly displayed the excitement of the girl. "You have pretty eyes," Ranma let slip.

"Thank you for saying so potential husband, I think your's are as well," Starfire whispered as her face drew closer to his, their foreheads touching as they stared into each other's eyes.

"So, do you have any other powers?" Ranma continued, a blush glowing on his cheeks at how close the alien beauty was to him, and her plump, soft lips just inches from his own.

"I do," she claimed before her eyes flared up with emerald fire, and she held up a fist glowing the same way, "I can project energy blasts from my hands and eyes."

"That is...so awesome!" Ranma declared.

"So I have heard," she whispered back. Her hand released the energy it held, and moved to cup Ranma's chin. "I am glad I agreed to come, I have had the fun getting to know you, and wish to know more about you."

Ranma remained silent, though a slight smile could be seen on his lips.

*****

After the two had pulled the cash from every thug's wallet they found there was enough there to pay for travel, but only for one person. They had just reached the port town and after some investigation, they learned their quarry had left for Japan not long ago, and even where the ship was headed, but getting there was another story. They checked into other ships heading for the same port, and found that even with the crooks' money, only one of them would be able to buy a ticket.

"I guess we're gonna have to find some more cash if I want to get back home," Ryoga grumbled.

"Maybe not," Shampoo countered, her mind going back to what the dock official had said, "Maybe only enough money for one person, but Shampoo think that we can get around that. Shampoo see sign on wall that list prices for certain things, and saw that there only small fee to take pet with you."

"So? What does that have to do with anything?" Ryoga asked

"Shampoo think if husband change into cute little piglet, then we only need pay for ticket for one, plus pet fee. We have enough for that," Shampoo reasoned.

As much as the lost boy didn't want to spend an entire sea voyage in his cursed form, he couldn't deny the logic of her words, especially since it would be difficult for him to make any money in a different country. Defeated, Ryoga allowed his Amazon wife to douse him in cold water, and with his giant pack and umbrella on her back, she scooped him into her arms and held him to her chest as they went to buy their way to Japan.

*****

Once he had received the call from his daughter, Soun Tendo had wasted no time to get to his old friend. There was much he wanted to discuss, but nothing more than their plans for the engagement between their children. The two schools of Anything Goes would soon be united, and the school would finally thrive.

After a short taxi ride, he stood outside the gate to the home of his old friend. No matter how many times he saw it, he could still not believe the size of the building, which had rooms that could hold his whole house with ease. With a press of the door buzzer, he prepared for the reunion with his old training partner.

*****

Starfire carefully placed Ranma back on his feet, and floated into a pseudo sitting position. For a laugh, she pulled the young man onto her lap, and let him experience what it was like to fly with her.

"I am glad to have met you," Starfire said, as she hugged him into her generous bust, and almost enveloped his head entirely in her breasts. "You are a kind person, and I can feel that we would do well together."

Ranma nodded from is place on her lap, flushed with embarrassment and hormones. He wasn't sure how much longer he could keep himself in control, as each girl had a body that sent his body on high alert, something he supposed he got from his father.

"I hope to see you again soon, but it seems that our time is now up," Starfire said regretfully.

"Ranma, it is time to meet the next girl," came the voice of Nodoka, right on cue.

The muscular alien girl lifted him off her lap with ease, and set him on the ground before floating back and saying goodbye.

155332222211122221121.content:
Ranma smiled as he walked with his mother to the next room. "Um, this is the last one in the hall," Ranma noted.

"I know dear. While you were with Starfire, another girl took Ty Lee's spot in her room." Nodoka said. "Once you are in with this young lady, I'll have Starfire leave her room carefully." Ranma nodded. He still felt off, not telling his mother about his cursed form. He opened the large door and entered the third room.

Inside was a a girl sitting in a long dress. It almost looked like a school uniform. Her muscles were thick and her blue hair cascaded down her back. Her eyes locked onto Ranma as he entered. "Hi," the girl said.

"Hi. I'm Ranma," Ranma said. The girl nodded.

"I'm Akane," Akane said. "Akane Tendo."

"Pleasure meeting you," Ranma said, getting close. After the first two girls were friendly and flirty, he thought this one would be too. A glare from her and her rising up in a tense way told him she wasn't like the ones before.

"Look, I know Aunty Nodoka wants me to be your possible bride, but . . ." Akane started but the thought of going against Nodoka's desires, to see a pained look on the woman she considered a second mother, was a weakness for Akane. "Don't bend low to peek under my dress."

"Alright. I'll stay back," Ranma said. "So, are you special in anyway?" Akane's eyes narrowed.

"I'm taller than any other girl outside this gym membership. I can benchpress cars," Akane said defensively. "That isn't special?"

"Well, are you flexible like Ty Lee? Or fly like Starfire?" Ranma asked. Before he could respond, Akane closed the distance on him and hoisted him up with one hand gripping his shirt.

"Don't go comparing me to those visitors. I might be normal to them, but I am still special," Akane growled.

---------

Genma greeted his old friend with a hug when he arrived. Soun walked with Genma to the large living room, sitting on cushions that would be better considered futons for men their size. Kasumi brought them some tea to drink as the friends chatted. "So, how did you come to know my wife?" Genma asked.

Soun drank his tea and controlled himself. "My beloved wife . . . when died of cancer, I wrote to you, inviting you to the funeral. I felt the need of my good friend," Soun said. "But you had been on your journey for the better part of a year. Nodoka didn't know where to find you, so she came in your stead."

"I see," Genma said, guessing his wife's charms helped her grow close to the young Tendo girls.

"She was a good friend to the family in that time. She got the girls focused on other things, like working out. Little did I realize your tale to me about women growing stronger in her presence wasn't a fabrication," Soun said. "When my youngest Akane lifted up a heavy oak table to get her pencil that rolled under it without effort, I truly realized what was going to happen."

"And you let them grow as they wanted, I see," Genma said. Soun nodded.

"It actually helped me feel safe no man would touch them without their blessing," Soun said. "Only the insane or perverted would try something."

"That I agree to," Genma said.

----------

Shampoo moaned heavily as the boat rocked on the open sea. Up the waves and down the waves. The undulating made her want to hurl. And she did. Piglet-Ryoga watched as Shampoo suffered from seasickness. It hurt his heart seeing a girl so in pain. But without warm water to change back, it wasn't as though he could give her words of comfort.

So, he squealed once as an idea came to him. Shampoo looked at him from her bed. "What, stupid husband?" she muttered in Chinese. Ryoga, not understanding, jumped onto the bed and climbed onto her back. He pushed his tiny body against her back, giving her a massage.

Shampoo didn't know what to think when her husband jumped on her back For a moment she feared he was in a rutting mood. It was said some cursed victims who became animals acted more like them. But then his tiny powerful body pressed against her sore body, his tiny hooves worked her muscles and she felt better.

1553322222111222211212.content:
Akane snarled at the young man in her iron grip, his feet dangling in the air as she hoisted him to eye level. If there was one thing that she was sensitive of, it was being told that she was nothing special when compared to the others. She hated being compared to them, it wasn't fair, they all had special abilities, it was practically cheating.

"Listen buddy! You may be Aunty Nodoka's son, but I'm not gonna take any crap like that from you!" Akane declared in a fit of anger, "Just because the other girls you've met so far can fly or bend themselves into a pretzel doesn't mean I'm no less amazing then them!" The enraged girl had started to shake the young man by his collar, his eyes started to spin in his head as the his world began to blur.

"O...o...ok...you....yo...you're...special...too..." Ranma grunted out as he tried not to vomit at the rapid movements she was forcing him through.

Akane ceased her violent shaking of his person, and dropped the boy to the floor once more.

"You're damn right I am!" Akane snorted as she leaned her back against the far wall of the room, her arms crossed indignantly.

An uncomfortable silence fell in the room, and Ranma struggled to think of something to say to the rather violent girl to try and break the ice in some way. She may not be as outstanding as the other two were, but he felt he owed it to his mother to at least give a shot at talking to her. After a few minutes, he finally gave it a shot.

"So, um...how did you get to know my mom?" the young man asked uncomfortably. "You seem to treat her more like a family member than the others I've talked to so far..."

Akane said nothing for a moment, but eventually opened her mouth to grace him with her answer.

"Of course I'm close to Aunty. She was there for my sisters and I after our mother...passed." Akane said melancholy. She rubbed her elbow comfortingly as her eyes fell to the floor as the memories of those days came to the front of her mind.

"Oh, I'm...sorry to hear that...I didn't mean to bring up such bad memories." Ranma apologized.

"It's okay, you didn't know," was Akane's grumbled response, "Plus, meeting Aunty was a pretty big change in my life. She taught me how to be strong, and helped my sisters and I through that tough time. We owe her a lot, and I at least want to give this engagement a shot for her sake."

Ranma listened quietly as the uneasy girl .continued on to with her story.

*****

Shampoo hugged the black piglet to her chest tightly, as the sea became rougher, not wanting him to fly overboard from a particularly violent shake. The little piggy's hooves had miraculously eased her once turning stomach back to calm, and she was glad for it. Ryoga had initially been an unwelcome addition to her life, but the time she had sent with the young man had caused her to warm up to him considerably. His kindness towards girls, and her in particular, had endeared the amazon to him, and she started to feel grateful for her lose to the directional-challenged martial artist.

"Thank you for back rub husband," Shampoo whispered as she stroked his little ear with a finger, earning an appreciative oink from the cursed young man. "Shampoo feel much better now. You relax now, let Shampoo hold you, and you sleep until we arrive."

*****

Happosai's old students continued their talk as Kasumi graciously brought out another serving of tea and snacks. The two men had missed each other's company over the years, their friendship that had developed during their hell that was training under their master had not diminished in the slightest.

"So, did you tell Nodoka about our arrangement from way back?" Genma asked.

"It came up eventually," Soun said, "and once she learned of it, she seemed quite supportive of the idea. It's why Akane is meeting with your son today, actually."

Genma's face brightened significantly, knowing that Nodoka supported their plan was encouraging, and gave him hope for their union of the schools. He took another sip of tea, and enjoyed a moment of quiet with his oldest, and best friend.

"I wonder if Nodoka kept my old game boards?" Genma asked, now bored after they had finished catching up with each other.

"You won't get the upper hand on me this time, old friend," Soun guffawed.

*****

"Aunty practically raised us, since daddy was pretty devastated when mom died. He was so depressed, and Aunty was the only really reliable adult we had for a couple years afterwards."

The two young martial artists had exchanged a few more words in an effort to reconcile somewhat before their time was up. They both wanted to at least give their relationship a chance, if only for their shared mother figure's sake. While they weren't anywhere close to any kind of romance, they could now at least say they were on friendly terms with each other after the initial unpleasantness. Not a moment too soon, either, as the rapping of Nodoka's knuckles told them it was time to move on to the next girl.

Ranma walked back down the hall to where he met Ty Lee. He opened the door and stopped. Before him were a thick pair of legs in shorts that didn't even reach mid-thigh. The legs had a brown tint to them. As his eyes looked up the body to uncovered abs of granite-hard quality, he came to a bountiful pair of breasts hidden by some very tight fabric.

"Hi there!" the woman exclaimed, as she finished a situp and sat on her knees. "Name's Polt!" Ranma stared at her furry face with what looked like dog ears on her head. Briefly Ranma considered how Akane considered herself the normal one. Another example to that idea sat before him.

"I'm Ranma," Ranma said.

"Sorry I'm so sweaty," Polt said, "Just finished my job."

"You have a job? What is it?" Ranma asked as he got closer. Polt smiled.

"I'm a trainer and owner at my gym. I also help the ladies here every week or so," Polt said. She flexed her arm, causing the muscles to bulge out. "You want to touch my hard work?" Ranma bit his lip and moved closer. As he rubbed her arm, he felt the fur under her fingers. It was fine, like the hair on the belly of a dog. He took in her musky, sweaty scent.

"This is really impressive," Ranma said.

"Thanks. There are some other girls I want your mother to meet. They have a cute guy they like and I think a strong body would really impress him," Polt said.

-----

Elsewhere in another dimension, Kurusu Kimihito shuddered in fear for no apparent reason.

-------

"So, you aren't human, are ya?" Ranma asked.

"Nope. I'm a Kobold," Polt said. Ranma nodded. One alien and now a monster girl. Just where was his mom meeting these ladies?

----------

Azula, former Princess to the Fire Nation, sat on a bench lifting dumbbells. She was being watched by a tall girl of similar body. "So, you denied my aunt's request to meet him?" Nabiki asked.

"I have have already met Ranma. He doesn't impress me, either side," Azula said confidently.

"Either side?" Nabiki asked. "What does that mean?" Azula smiled smugly at Nabiki.

"If you haven't been told, I won't speak of it," Azula said. Nabiki glared at Azula. It faded to a confident smile.

"Guess you're right. You are beneath his standards. I mean, he has two alien Princesses, your former companion, a rich monster girl, a bending mage stronger than you and, what, two years your junior, some superheroines, and my sister all courting him. You really never had a chance," Nabiki said. Azula set the weight down.

"What did you say?" Azula whispered.

"You don't have what it takes to get him to pick you," Nabiki said. Azula clenched her hands and walked away, her heavy feet slamming the floor.

"Everything alright?" Ukyo asked as she walked over. Nabiki nodded.

"Just thinking how Akane really is the most normal of the ladies Ranma is meeting," Nabiki said.

"Well, good luck to him," Ukyo said with some anger. She closed her eyes and calmed down.

"You aren't going to reclaim payment for your stolen dowry?" Nabiki asked.

"Nope. I've been paid that back in full and more," Ukyo said. "My father and I consider Nodoka's hiring him a chef for the gym and good pay these past nine years more than compensation. Besides, I see Nodoka like a mother. Dating Ranma would be like dating my own brother." Nabiki's eyes lit up as she giggled.

"I'll have to remember that," Nabiki said as she considered calling Akane a brocon if she liked Ranma. The Tendo sisters had similar feelings for Ranma's mother, after all.

"Say, could you please hand me the water bottle and towel on the table over there?" Polt asked politely as she pointed behind the young man. Ranma kindly retrieved them for the young woman and made to hand them to her. Polt accepted the water bottle, and took a big sip from it. The towel, however, she left alone, and quickly explained why. "Would you help me wipe down from my workout?"

Uncertain at first, but goaded by the kobold's beckoning finger, Ranma lifted the towel, placed it gently on her shoulder, and started to dab the sweat away. It gave him an even closer look and feel of the broad bodied monster girl, and just how defined her "hard work" was.

"I can see that you like the my physique," Polt said happily as she indicated his blushing face, and gave her arm another flex. "Feel free to take a good look and feel."

Polt was very proud of her body, and it was exciting to meet someone who was able to appreciate it as much as she did, and judging by Ranma's face, the young man appreciated it very much. His hands traveled over the swell of her melon sized biceps when he spoke.

"So, you run a gym, huh? Is that how you met my mother?" the martial artist asked curiously.

"Yup! In fact, it was partly in thanks to her that my gym is doing so well. She helped me quite a bit with the its set up, and now I see so many customers a day thanks to her!" Polt declared.

Ranma wasn't sure if it was Polt's incredibly positive energy, or the fact that she had let him touch her, but he was really getting into her.

*****

Azula grumbled to herself as she left the weight room. How dare that peasant infer that she was in any way inferior to the rest of those girls. She was Azula, she had toppled the walled city of Ba Sing Se, and would not be beaten by those other girls. It was time for her to show just how incredible she really was to the pigtailed boy, and once she did, he would be her's, and her's alone. She marched into the hall where Lady Nodoka had taken her son, and found the older woman standing in the hall.

"Lady Nodoka," Azula said with a bow. Manners were important after all, especially when dealing with a possible mother in law.

"Oh, Azula! I thought you had decided to not participate in this," Nodoka said, confused.

"I had a...change of heart. I would love to be your son's wife, and if you will let me, I would join this event." Azula said respectfully.

"That's wonderful to hear! I really think that you'll have fun getting to know each other. However, it wouldn't be fair to let you just go ahead of everyone who was participating from the start, so, unless they agree to trade places with you, you will have to go last."

"Of course, Lady Nodoka," Azula said passively. Of course, if she could help it, she wouldn't be last. She would just have to convince one of the other girls to swap places with her. Perhaps that airheaded blonde would be so kind as to trade places.

*****

Ranma had moved on to the kobold girl's legs, as his hands felt the curvature and solid muscle of her quads, amazed at their thickness.

"Are you at all interested in running a gym like your mother?" Polt asked out of nowhere, taking another drink of water right after.

"Um...I kind of want to do something a little like that, but it involves teaching my martial arts style at an established school," Ranma answered.

"Really? That would be incredible! I'm sure if you chose me, I could set it up so that you can give classes in my gym," Polt declared happily.

'That wouldn't be so bad' thought Ranma as he started on her calf, now having an unblocked view of her butt, the hard slab of muscles that made up her cheeks flexed teasingly. It was an incredible sight to behold, but it was cut short be he all to soon call of his mother.

"Ranma, it's time to move on" Nodoka called from behind the door.

"It was great meeting you, Ranma! You're cute, and I think we'll get along great!" Polt cried as she pulled him into a goodbye hug, burying his face into her furred chest.

"Yeah, I had fun, Polt. See you later," he said back, before she set him down and he left the room.

1553322222111222211212121.content:
Ranma opened the door. A tall regal looking woman of dark skin with pointed ears stood there patiently. Her long white hair cascaded down to her back. She wore long sleeves and a dress made of a see-through material, with her core privates covered by solid white material. Her abs were thick and strong. Her arms were thin like Ty Lee. Her smile as he approached reminded him of Starfire.

Damn, he met so many amazing ladies so far, and from the sounds of it a few more yet to meet.

"Good day. I am Allura, Queen of the Altean Kingdom, and pilot of the Blue Lion of Voltron," Allura said.

"Another princess. Are you . . an alien?" Ranma asked. Allura nodded.

"I come from a galaxy many light years from this world," Allura said.

"Wow. So, did you know Starfire before meeting my mother?" Ranma asked.

"No. Space is very vast. The planet of Tamaran was never discovered by my Kingdom or the Galra Empire,"Allura said. She didn't want to talk about other girls. Not at this moment. "Would you like to see an ability inherent to my people?" Ranma's eyes lit up with excitement.

"Sure," Ranma said. Allura toook a deep breath and Ranma watched when nothing seemed to happen. Then her slim arms started bulging outward. She grew taller until she was near or past Mom's height. Her body became a wall of thick muscle. Allura chuckled.

"Your mouth is open," Allura said. Ranma touched his jaw and closed it.

"Sorry," he said.

"No need to apologize. I don't usually show off my power," Allura said. She turned to a table. "Please sit with me so we can talk more." Ranma nodded.

"So, you said you pilot a lion?" Ranma asked. Allura nodded.

"Yes. The Blue Lion is a large robot in the shape of a lion. When I fight with the other Paladins of Voltron, we become one of the universes strongest fighters," Allura said.

"How did you become a pilot for that?" Ranma asked. A pained smile came on her face.

---------

Azula found Minako in the lounge with that blind girl Toph. Toph was smiling Raven was in the corner mediating. "So you're next after Queeny?" Toph asked Minako. The model-turned-superheroine nodded.

"Yes. And you don't mind going last, do you, Toph?"

"Not at all," Toph said. "I've got a great plan to impress him despite all you ladies going ahead of me." She chuckled softly. "So, Zuzie, what are you up to?" Minako turned and saw Azula. She stared confidently at Minako.

"I have decided to enter this meeting for Lady Nodoka's son. It would be rude if the Fire Lord didn't honor her debts to one who has done so much for her," Azula said.

"Don't ya mean former Fire Lord, who had her ass kicked by her brother and Katara?" Toph chided.

"Quiet," Azula said coldly.

"I think that's great Azula. Love can make anyone stronger and feel complete," Minako said.

"Speaking of love, how is Usagi enjoying her new body since you convinced your friends to come over here?" Toph asked.

"She was freaked out at first by the idea of building muscle, but after I helped us against a stronger foe with my new body, it turned them around to the idea," Minako said.

"I wasn't finished. I don't want to go last," Azula injected.

"I don't care. You can go ahead of me," Toph said.

"I don't mean just ahead of you," Azula said. "I want to be next."

"Raven, you mind if she jumps ahead of you?" Minako called over.

"No. I'm doing this just to meet him. I don't expect something to happen," Raven said.

"Gee, aren't you Miss Sunshine?" Toph asked.

"Well, I do have issues with you jumping ahead of me," Minako said. She walked to one side of the sturdy coffee table. "Let's wrestle for it." One arm went up. Azula smiled.

"I can respect that," Azula said.

"Yeah, because you have such a great track record against lovey-dovey girls like her," Toph chided. Azula ignored Toph and knelt across from Minako.

-------------

Allura explained her history and what trials she had been forced to endure. "Then a few years ago we finally defeated Zarkon and all his forces," Allura said.

"W-wow," Ranma whispered as he looked into her eyes. He was sitting across from a Galactic Savior. She fought to defend his little planet from an incredibly evil force. Allura smiled and nodded.

choices: Ranma meets Azula...again
Ranma meets Minako for the first time
15533222221112222112121211.content:
Ranma gapped at the regal looking woman before him, once more overwhelmed by the origins of someone who know his mother. Allura had an almost ethereal beauty about her, her flowing white hair glowed like the moon as it framed her face, and her watery blue eyes shimmered like jewels. What was most impressive, however, was just the size of her physique, with only his own mother matching her in bulk, although he did have a question.

"So, what is your natural size, is it this, or is it how you were when we first met?" Ranma asked curiously.

"Oh...well, my natural size is actually a little smaller than what I am now, how I am now is actually modeled after your mother. How I looked when you first came in is a form I take for diplomatic purposes, as it is not as intimidating as my actual body. In fact, I'm the second biggest of the girls you are to meet today. The largest is one you haven't met as of yet." Allura explained as she shifted into her actual body size. Her arms and legs lost an couple of inches, and her form settled at a height slightly taller than Starfire. She gave her arm a flex to show off their size, it was like a basketball had inflated beneath her cocoa skin.

Ranma gave a nod, but filed that information away for later. There was a girl here even bigger than Allura, which he had to see to believe.

"What was it like as a royal on your planet?" Ranma asked.

"Well, I would say my childhood was fairly standard for an Altean. I spent much of it being tutored by some of the most intelligent people in the galaxy, and learning fighting techniques from some of the most talented masters."

Ranma's ears perked when he heard the part, his brain already eager to learn any new type of fighting style and incorporate it into his own.

"Do you think you could spar with me later?" he asked excitedly, his hands clenched in anticipation.

"Of course," Allura agreed with a smile, "I didn't realize you were so eager to grapple with me," she finished with a wink.

The blush on Ranma's face could have been used to light a dark room, the implications of what she said was not lost on him, not after the other girls.

"How does dating a princess from yo...your planet w...work?" he stuttered out.

"Similar to how it works here I'm sure," Allura answered, "although I think we are a little more open with what is allowed. For example, my father could have had multiple wives if he so chose."

*****

The strength of their grips could have crushed stone into powder as the two muscle girls prepared to do battle with their arms alone. Azula grinned confidently as her fingers flexed into position over the back of Minako's hand. Their arms both tensed with strength far beyond normal humans, and the seemingly sturdy table beneath their elbows let out a strained creak.

"Are you both ready?" Toph asked, acting as judge for the two, her hand atop theirs. Her way of viewing the world would ensure that the decision would be correct. The two girls nodded, a competitive smirk on both of their faces. "Then begin!"

Both girls let their arms explode with power, each putting their all into slamming the other girl's hand onto the table top. Neither succeeded in getting an early advantage, as their hands remained stationary in a stalemate.

"I have to give it to you. peasant, at least your body has made good use of all the nutrients that your brain never received," Azula said bitingly.

"I'll show you!" Minako growled back.

The two fought for control, and it switched back and forth a few times before one finally overtook the other, and slammed the loser's hand onto the table with enough strength to crater the wood.

"WInner!" Toph declared as she raised her hand on the victor's side.

*****

"Multiple wives?" Ranma questioned.

"That's right. On Altea, as long as all parties involved are okay with the arrangement, there is no problem with multiple spouses."

"Uh huh..." Ranma quipped smartly.

"That would include our relationship as well you know," Allura whispered into his ear heatedly, giving his ear a small peck as she did.

Ranma lit up at the idea she had given him, unable to answer back.

"Time to meet continue on, Ranma." Nodoka called all too soon, as she seemed to do.

Allura swept the boy up into her arms in a giant hug, her muscles enveloped his body almost fully. She placed his hand on a bicep and flexed it, letting him feel the hard muscles beneath.

"It was a pleasure to meet you, Ranma. I cannot wait to spend more time with you."

With that, she set him back on his feet, and let him leave after the memorable goodbye she gave him.
15533222221112222112121211.title: Relationships on other planets

choices: Ranma lifts leg number 1.  Now for the second leg.
Back to Minako after her lose.
155332222211122221121212111.content:
Ranma followed his mom. He opened the door and there stood the girl from the s. She had a smirk on her face as she lounged confidently. "Hello," Azula said. "I am Azula, Princess of the Fire Nation."

"Ranma Saotome. Glad to meet you . . . again," Ranma said with a smile. Starting with her feet and moving inch by inch up her large and powerful form, he took in this newest competitor for his heart.

"Indeed. Tell me, have you told any of the other girls your secret?" Azula asked.

"Um, not yet. It is a bit much to spring on most people," Ranma said.

"Well, I am unlike most people," Azula said. "I am their superior." She rose to her feet. "Now, are you weak in thos form?"

"What do you mean?" Ranma asked.

"If you are to be my husband, I cannot have you be weak. Your other form is most acceptable, but I want to see if you are worthy of me," Azula said.

"Wait, ain't this about me meeting girls I could marry?" Ranma asked. Allura's words came back to him. Multiple wives if possible.

"A marriage is a two way street. I have my own conditions to be met," Azula said. "Or do you believe you cannot do my tasks? Are you that weak?"

"I'm not weak," Ranma said.

"Then prove it," Azula said, laying back down. "Can you lift my two tiny legs over your head?" She tensed her leg muscles. Ranma licked his lips as a fire burned in his eyes.

-----------

Allura walked into the second lunge on the floor above where Ranma was meeting his potential brides. Her competition was sitting around, chatting about their potential husband-to-be. It was friendly on the surface, but Allura knew politics well and could feel the frustrated undertones in their conversations and postures.

These ladies were at war and few if any would be willing to become second-wife and submitting to Allura as first wife. Allura spotted one potential ally. Starfire was floating upside down, laughing with Polt. She moved closer.

To build up the potential for an Altean marriage, she would need support.

Ranma touched the powerful lower legs. He could only touch from the feet to the knees. Any closer and Azula assured him she would squeeze whatever he put there like a grape.

Azula held back a smile as she felt the touch of this young man. He wasn't scared by this challenge or her fearsome form. He was excited by it. It made her heart flutter at the thought of a man who wasn't scared of her. So many were scared of her . . . or they pitied her.

She would have none of that in a husband. He had to be strong and fearsome.

Ranma slipped one hand under her right leg, his hands touching her muscles through the cloth. He knelt down and started to lift.

-------------

"Hey Allura," Polt said with a smile as she looked up at the taller woman. Allura nodded.

"Polt, Starfire. I have a question about your cultures," Allura replied.

"Oh, I would be more than happy to tell of my culture to you," Starfire said.

"Same. I mean, I'm talking to two alien princesses. My friends at home wouldn't believe me at all," Polt said.

"What is the custom for a spouse with several others of a different sex?" Allura asked.

"Polymorphous?" Starfire repeated back. Polt's ears perked up as she looked around. No one seemed to notice them.

"Are you talking guy with a harem or a lady with lots of guys?" Polt asked.

"Yes. Either," Allura said.

"On Tamaran, if one genuinely feels affection for many mates, it would be fine to wed them. So long as they appreciated and loved the ones they would be sharing the spouse with," Starfire said.

"Pretty much the same. Kobolds have a very open view of marriage," Polt said. Allura smiled.

"Then ladies, I have a suggestion so we all might win," Allura said.

------------

Akane walked over to Ty Lee as she stretched out. "Hey Ty Lee," Akane said.

"Akane, how are you doing?" Ty Lee asked, looking at the larger girl.

"Good. Hey, could you show me some of those moves where you bend your body all around?" Akane asked. Maybe if she became a little more special, Ranma would like her. Not that she cared.

---------

Sweat was forming on Ranma's brow as he slowly lifted the dense leg up and up.
