Allura approaches Akane and Ty Lee with the idea
1553322222111222211212121111.content:
Azula's first leg reached its zenith over Ranma's head, and the young man didn't waste any time in starting with the second. Azula smirked wickedly, he had managed to get one of her legs up while she offered some resistance, that was impressive by itself, but it was time to see what he could really do against her power.

"All right, little man, you've done well so far, but let's see what you can do when I actually resist," Azula said menacingly. Her left leg began to press down, when before she was focused on keeping it in the same place. Of course she would use her full strength, or she would send the young man through the floor, but it was enough power behind it that he would have difficulty pushing it over his head. "Don't get squashed now," she laughed at the end.

Ranma fell to his knees as the force behind the massive leg multiplied, pressing his body into the floor. His body strained as he tried to push the leg back upwards, the leg barely moved in response.

"You're going to have to try much harder now," Azula claimed.

*****

"...and that is my proposal to the two of you," Allura finished. The other two girls looked thoughtful for a moment as they considered her words.

"That is acceptable to me," Starfire answered, "I do not have any quarrels with sharing Ranma with you two, but what of the other girls?"

"They are free to join in too if they so wished, but I feel that a shared relationship will be much better in the long run for everyone involved in this situation," Allura asserted.

Polt nodded her approval, it was counterproductive to try and compete with each other with this, and would only serve to make them appear in a less than favorable light to the young man in question.

"Then it is agreed, we will pursue Ranma together," Allura said happily as she placed a hand on a shoulder of the other girls.

*****

Ranma's body strained, and sweat poured down his face as he tried to lift Azula's leg overhead. Even using every muscle in his body against just the muscles in her leg did not make for an easy task. Azula's calf was like diamond, and did not give a millimeter to his fingers, making getting a good hold on it incredibly difficult, as it was so wide he couldn't cover the back of it with both hands. He had managed to raise it just over his shoulder, but it was slow going, and with the fearsome girl was not making it any easier as she seemed to enjoy throwing taunts at him as he struggled to complete her task.

"What's the matter, is my little leg to much for the big, strong fighter?" Azula teased.

It was time for all or nothing, and Ranma put everything into his last push against the firebender. His incredible final effort paid off, as he lifted the muscled leg the last several inches until it was just above his head. The pressure bearing down on him was relieved, and Azula took her legs off him.

"Not bad, you managed to complete the first of my tasks. A lesser man would have been crushed beneath my might, but you managed it. Do not let it go to your head, as I still have a few more challenges for you before I'm satisfied."

Ranma's head drooped, exhausted. Azula was proving to be more difficult than Akane, but almost contradictorily, it was proving to make him feel all the more attracted to her. Whether it was her domineering personality, or the nonchalant way she tried to show her strength, something about it just worked to her advantage, and he wasn't about to give up on a challenge.

"Your...on," Ranma gasped out as he caught his breath, Azula answered with a menacing smile.

*****

Out in the hallway, Nodoka waited for her son to finish with his current meeting. She was happy so far with how things were progressing, and couldn't wait for him to finish meeting them all.

"Lady Nodoka," came a dignified voice from behind her.

"Washu," Nodoka said, recognizing the voice without seeing its owner.

"How are things going with your long lost son?" Washu asked politely.

"Well, he has already met some of the girls, and I think they are hitting it off rather well."

"Just as planned, huh?"

"Almost, I was hoping all the girls would hit it off with him, but it looks like Akane let her slight inferiority complex get to her again," Nodoka answered, slight disappointment in her voice. "But enough on that, how goes the planning for Ranma's first field trip?"

"On schedule. We should have a destination dialed in shortly, as always, filtering out possibly toxic or instantly deadly universes is taking a great deal of time, but I expect to have something by tomorrow evening."

"Good, I'm sure my son will have just as much fun as I do on those trips," Nodoka smiled with anticipation. "Now if you will excuse me, I have to let my son know it is time to move to the next room."

Allura walked carefully, observing as Ty Lee rubbed and pushed on Akane's arms. "I can help a little, but you are so much . . . bulkier than me. Your muscles aren't stretched to the point you could do what I do for a while," Ty Lee assessed.

"Dang. I want to try. Can you start stretching me?" Akane asked. Ty lee nodded.

"Let's start with the arms," Ty Lee said, gripping the thick limbs. She slowly moved it up and found resistance in the muscles.

"Ladies," Allura said as she finally spoke. They looked at her.

"Hey Queenie," Ty Lee said.

"Your majesty," Akane said.

"Ladies, we've been over this. Call me Allura," Allura said. "Now, what did you think of Ranma?"

"I thought he was great. I really hope he chooses me," Ty Lee said. She smiled warmly.

"I thought . . . he was okay," Akane said softly. Allura nodded.

"Well, I was talking with some of the other ladies and we were talking about our native cultures," Allura said. "How do you feel about a polygamous marriage?" Both stared at Allura.

"Ah! Ah!" Akane gasped. "Let go!" Ty Lee gasped and released, letting the arm move back to its proper position.

"What did you just say again?" Ty Lee asked.

--------

The next challenge Azula had decided on was had Ranma standing behind her. As she leaned back, he would need to hold up her mammoth weight. His hands rubbed the small of her back, looking for the best spot to hold her up by as she started to lean when the door opened.

---

Nodoka stared at her son with his hands on Azula's back. A devious smile on Azula's face and a smile on Ranma. "Ranma, ready to move on?" Nodoka called. Both turned to her. Ranma had a look of embarrassment.

"Hm. We will need to continue this later," Azula said softly. "Keep getting stronger Ranma if you want me." Ranma gulped and nodded. He walked out of the room.

----

"So, what were you doing in there?" Nodoka asked.

"I was, uh, going to try and hold her up as she leaned back," Ranma said. Nodoka held her breath before opening the door.

"Ranma, you need to understand something. These bodies I've blessed Azula and the others with, the muscle is far denser than normal muscle. I am pseveral times as heavy as one would be if they had this body normally," Nodoka said in a concerned and loving voice. She caressed his cheek with one hand.

"I guessed that when I lifted her leg," Ranma said. Nodoka nodded.

"So let me make this clear. I don't want you to be hurt. If one of these girls hurts you without your permission, I'll break their bodies in two," Nodoka said in the same loving tone.

"Ah . . . um" Ranma said, really unsure what to say.

"Oh, I know, you don't want your mother fighting your battles, but you are my baby boy. And I am a fierce mama bear who will rip the arms out of any who dare raise a hand against you," Nodoka said. She kissed Ranma on the forehead.

"Th-thank you mom. But what Azula and I did was fine. I accepted her challenge and I couldn't back down," Ranma said. Nodoka nodded. She saw a flash of his father's pride in her son.

"Just . . . remember what I said," Nodoka said, before opening the door.

155332222211122221121212111121.content:
Whatever Ranma was expecting to see when he entered the room, it wasn't a big ball of depressed, blonde, muscle girl curled up in the corner. She appeared to be absentmindedly poking the wall with her finger, and had not yet noticed his entry.

"Um...Hello? Are you okay?" Ranma asked as he approached the blonde young lady with concern.

"Huh..." was her intelligent response to his inquiry. "OH! You're here already? Oh jeez!" the muscle girl said as she tried to collect herself, embarrassed. "M...my name's Minako Aino, it's good to meet you." Minako got to her feet and bowed in greeting.

"Ranma Saotome. So...um...why were you so depressed just a second ago?" Ranma returned.

"Oh, that?" Minako said, "let's just say that I lost to someone who's a sore winner and really got under my skin afterwards." Minako said nothing more on the topic.

*****

"So, what was your plan, again?" Ty Lee asked, not quite getting it.

"I am merely proposing a polygamous relationship with Ranma. He would marry all of us who agree to it, that way, we all win," Allura explained again.

"That's an interesting idea," Ty Lee commented. She was always one of the more agreeable girls Allura had found, and it made sense that she wouldn't outright disregard it. "Sure, I'm game, let's give it a shot."

"Well I'm not," Akane cut in, "I don't want to be just another girl in some pervert's harem! You can count me out!" Akane growled as she marched off, not even wanting to continue with Ty Lee's help.

"Well, that's Akane for you," Ty Lee mentioned offhandedly. "Figures she wouldn't go for it. Always on about perverts."

"Well, hopefully she can be swayed later on, but for now, I can count on you to support my idea, right?" Allura asked.

"Of course," Ty Lee affirmed.

*****

Minako had managed to cheer up after a little small talk with the young man, and a smile was now prominent on her face. The both now sat at a table she had brought in beforehand.

"What were you doing when you first met my mom?" Ranma asked, glad to see that the girl had gotten happier over the course of their conversation. It was a relief that he had managed to salvage their meeting from its less than perfect start.

"Well, I actually met her when I was with my friends. You see, we take care of odd jobs around the Juuban district, and one particular job was giving us no end of difficulty," Minako began, memories of that day still fresh in her mind. The five magical girls were struggling with the monster of the week, even their strongest attacks only did superficial damage. The creature they fought was humanoid, but incredibly animalistic, with fur, fangs and claws, and a regenerative ability. It moved with incredible speed that even their most athletic could barely react to, and used it to run circles around the magical warriors. "But then your mom showed up, and solved it, no problem." Minako could remember when Lady Nodoka arrived, as if sent by the gods, and saved them. With a few almost imperceptible moves, she captured it in her mighty arms, and crushed its body into her's. She finished the job by crushing its head between her powerful hands, the only part of it that could not be healed. "My friends and I joined up with her right after, and have been coming to her gym ever since. As you can see, I've done very well under your mom's training," Minako finished as she flexed her right arm,

While much of how it happened had been glazed over, as Minako was not yet ready to tell him her secret, it was enough for the young man.

"In fact, I think I'm thriving under her, don't you think?" the blonde girl rose to her feet, and brought her other arm up to join its twin, Minako's head sat between two biceps which dwarfed it in size.

Ranma nodded dumbly as he stared at the impressive mass of Minako's arms.

"Let's try something," Minako said, "May I lift you?"

"Um, sure," Ranma said. Minako knelt and one hand went behind his butt and he was hoisted upwards.The beautiful blonde didn't seem to exhort any effort in this act.

"Climb onto my other arm," Minako said. Ranma gripped her right arm as she relaxed it. Straddling it, Minako smiled as she flexed the arm again. Ranma could feel the tightening and expanding of the muscles. It rubbed against his groin and he felt hardened by it.

The door opened and Nodoka stood there, her eyes scanning the situation. She smiled. "Sorry, but time is up," Nodoka said.

"What? Already?" Minako asked.

"Well, you did spend a lot of time talking about how you met my mom," Ranma noted as he dropped down, thankful his erection was dying out quickly. Minako nodded.

"I didn't mean to," Minako said.

"It's no problem. It was cool learning a bit about her too. Thanks," Ranma said. Minako smiled and nodded. Ranma walked after his mother and went to the next room.

Azula walked into the second lounge. She scanned the room quickly. Most of these girls sat on one side, chatting about something. Probably her Ranma. Akane was doing squats while holding one of the heavy couches on her shoulders. Her body pulsed with expanding muscle with each drop. From what Azula knew of the girl, she was angry about something. Azula looked back to the gaggle of ladies and Allura looked at her. Ty Lee had a concerned look on her face and Starfire shook her head. Allura replied and started walking over to the Fire Nation lady.

"Azarath. Metreon. Zinthos." Raven whispered to herself as she kept calm and in control. She heard the door open and she kept herself calm and in control.

Ranma stared at the massive floating form shrouded by a blue cape. "Hello?" Ranma asked. The figure turned in mid air. Her cloak covered her body, not a single part of her was outside of it. Her eyes and mouth were just lit enough to make them out. She looked like a big blue mountain.

"Hello," Raven said in a soft tone. "I am Raven."

"And you can fly," Ranma said.

"Actually, it's more a controlled levitation," Raven said in the same neutral tone.

"There's a difference?" Ranma asked. Raven's eyes narrowed a little and she nodded.

"Alright. I'll take your word for it," Ranma said. "Can you show me your body?"

"Are you only interested in my body?" Raven asked back.

"I am not like most people," Raven replied. Ranma gulped slightly.

The storm had past for the ship. Shampoo felt better as she sat on her bed, her piglet husband on her lap. She stroked his back affectionately. A knock came and Shampoo rose to answer it. She spoke in Chinese with the person. "Dinner miss, for you and your pet," the server said. "We still recommend you not leave the room in case of bad weather hitting again."

"Thank you, sir," Shampoo said. She accepted the covered plate and walked with Ryoga back to bed.

She uncovered the plate and saw . . ."Pork soup. Too cruel a joke," she muttered. She rose again to make a complaint when Ryoga hopped out of her arms and took a chunk of the pork. He nibbled on the meat. He squealed in joy.

"You no mind eating pig?" Shampoo asked. Ryoga shook his head. "Good. Because Shampoo love pork soup too." She smiled and took the spook and joined Ryoga in their meal together.

Seconds of silence ticked by between Ranma and Raven.

"So, were you meditating when I came in?" Ranma took a shot in the dark.

Allura approached the firebender with slight caution, by tried not to let it show on her face. This would be a delicate process, especially considering Azula's perilous personality, and it would take every ounce of her diplomatic skills if she wanted a chance of this succeeding.

"Good day to you, Azula," the Altean princess greeted. "How was your meeting with Lady Nodoka's son?"

"About as well as can be expected. He actually managed to pass my first test before Lady Nodoka said our time was up," Azula answered. "Now what can I do for you, princess?"

Azula cut through the pleasantries like a knife, she could already tell that there was something more to this "casual" greeting that Allura didn't mention immediately.

"Oh, well...I actually had a proposal for you regarding Ranma. Would you be so kind as to hear me out?" Allura asked diplomatically.

"Very well. I'll humor your little proposal."

"I was discussing this with some of the other girls who have met Ranma already, and most of them have agreed to join me on this. We have agreed to try and share the young man as co-wives, as I believe it is the solution with the greatest likelihood to make the most people happy."

"You want me to join a harem. That's your proposal," Azula said with a hint of disdain. "I haven't even fully approved of the boy yet, so there's no way I'm going to agree to join his potential harem. I don't even know if he'll pass the rest of my little tests of his worth, so I cannot agree to something like this. Congratulations, you have succeeded in wasting precious minutes of my time."

Azula turned from her fellow princess, and dismissed herself from the room. She had other things to take care of, like plan how to next test the young man.

Allura heaved a disappointed sigh. While she hadn't expected Azula to agree right away, she hadn't expected the situation to by quite so complicated. Now she had to worry about how, exactly, the Fire Nation princess intended to test the young man, considering her somewhat sadistic personality.

*****

They were on minute five of their introductory meeting, and the atmosphere between Ranma and Raven had calmed slightly. Ranma had remained calm and quite while he waited for the hovering woman to become use to his presence, and finally he felt it was the time to start talking.

"So, besides levitation, what else can you do?" Ranma probed carefully. Raven did not immediately respond, her eye twitched slightly at the sound of his voice, but eventually she did answer.

"I can also move objects with my abilities," Raven answered, and a black aura surrounded Ranma and lifted him off the ground in demonstration.

"Y...you don't say," Ranma stuttered in surprise. "That's amazing. Is there anything else you can do?"

"I also have empathic abilities."

"What does...empathic mean?" Ranma asked.

"I can sense the emotions of those around me, sometimes whether I want to or not." Raven said with a sigh.

"That sounds like it would be tough."

The two of them continued their conversation, as Ranma slowly loosened up Raven and made her more comfortable with him. He heard of some of her adventures with Starfire and her other friends as heroes. A small hint of a smile began to appear on her face as Raven began to open up to the young martial artist.

A quick rap stopped their light conversation as Nodoka opened the door. The normally recluse Raven had a warm look on her face and eyes as she chatted with Ranma. "Ranma, Raven, it's time," Nodoka announced. Ranma rose from his meditative position.

"It was fun meditating with you," Ranma said.

"Agreed. You know what you're doing. Maybe we can continue this later," Raven said. Ranma smiled warmly at that and left with his mother.

"So, what did you think of Raven?" Nodoka asked.

"She is a hard person to get to know, but I think she is cool," Ranma said. Nodoka nodded as she opened the door to the last candidate. Ranma walked in and heard his mother close it.

A large tri-fold screen stood blocking some of the view. He felt heavy footsteps coming from behind the curtain. She was large, probably on par with Ranma's mother. She could be a head taller than any of the girls with a bulkier form too, Her body glistened softly with the sweat of a hard workout. It dripped and flowed down her body. The young woman had her hair done up in a tight bun. And she was naked. Completely and totally naked.

"Oh, you're here. Didn't see you come in," Toph said without looking at Ranma. Ranma coughed and averted his eyes.

"Um, yeah. Sorry, I should have announced myself a bit louder," Ranma said in a flustered tone. The young woman laughed.

"Oh,aren't you sweet," Toph chided. "Turn and look at me." Ranma didn't move. "Come on. It's no shame in looking at everything our mother did to me." Ranma gulped and kept his vision up, focusing on her face. A youthful smile was on it. Her eyes were a grayish-green. "Like what you see?"

"You look really good," Ranma said.

"Great. Can't say the same for you," Toph replied. She walked over to a chair and sat down. "So, tell me about yourself."

------

Soun and Genma finished their last game of shogi. Despite having few times to play, Genma smiled at his third victory, and only one where he didn't trick Soun when his back was turned. He heard the door open and watched as Kasumi came in with his wife. Kasumi was whispering something to his darling beauty and he could read her face quite well. It was her questioning face.

""Husband of mine, Soun," Nodoka said softly, "Ranma will soon be done with meeting the girls. Kasumi found me and told me something interesting about meeting Ranma on the street."

"Yes dear. I was meaning to tell you about that," Genma said. Anger or fear were not on her face, but a happy smile.

"Ranma becomes a young woman like me. Does she have all my gifts?" Nodoka asked.

"From what I could see, young ladies do become attracted to her," Genma said.

"Strange, I felt no compulsion towards her," Kasumi said.

"That's because you know me first," Nodoka said. "And what of you, husband, do you change as well?"

"Genma becoming a woman?" Soun mused. Genma glared at his old friend.

------------

Ranma recounted his history once again to a prospective bride. Unlike the others, Toph didn't really seem to care. She was picking at her toes. "So, what about you?" Ranma asked.

"Me? I'm the greatest Earthbender of all time," Toph said. She smiled broadly at Ranma.

"Earthbending. What's that?" Ranma asked. Toph lifted a hand and a rock the size of his head flew into her hand. His mouth opened slightly. Toph clenched her hand and the boulder split into three parts.

"Your mom calls it a kind of magic," Toph said. "Did the Psycho Princess tell you about this?"

"Um, who?" Ranma asked.

"Azula. She was so eager to meet you. She even let that slip near me," Toph said.

"She said that?"

"No. I just can tell when someone lies," Toph said nonchalantly. She closed her eyes and smiled. "Would you ever try lying to me?"

"Sure can," Toph stated proudly.

Ranma fell into the spring of drowned girl," Genma explained as he stared into his wife's curious eyes.

"Here you are Auntie," Kasumi said, setting the tray before the three parents.

"Thank you, Kasumi. Now, go ahead, Genma. Let's see this form changing magic you spoke of," Nodoka prompted.

After making sure he had glass of cold water, he dumped the contents over his head and triggered the change. His body expanded outward, and black and white fur sprouted up, until he was nearly twice as big and covered in the two toned hair.

*Growf" Genma articulated. As if by magic, a sign appeared in his hand, bearing a translation of his animalistic dialogue. I fell into the spring of drowned panda.

You can be my cuddly teddy bear!"

The panda martial artist waved its paws in a slight panic as it was hugged into the rock-hard pecs of his beloved wife.

While she watched the show, her hands were busy inputting the complicated calculations needed to for what her Lady had planned later. After his mother left, Ranma was left alone, with not a noise beyond the cavernous silence of the gym. He stared down at the thick stack of paper, turned it over, and grabbed a pencil. The young man's heart pounded in his chest, this was, by far, the biggest challenge he had been presented with since arriving home. His martial arts prowess may have been second to none, but his father had never been too concerned about the rest of his education, to which him never spending more than a few months at any school could testify, as could his spotty attendance in general. All he could do was read the first problem, and hope he retained enough from his less than regular time at school.

His pencil eraser soon suffered, as he began to gnaw the end of it nervously.

*****

It had become a morning routine for the group of girls since they were brought to the Saotome home, and it was treated as a daily event by the nearby residents of the town. A parade of muscular women jogging through the town drew the attention all the passed by. It was like watching a force of nature stampede through the town, and the streets usually cleared out fast once the group is spotted, as no one wished to be trampled by the massive women, all of who bore the name of the Saotome gym on their shirts.

Polt led the pack, the fitness obsessed monster girl happily hummed as she set the pace for the others who followed behind her. Right behind her was Akane, who huffed and puffed as she tried to keep up with the ultra enthusiastic fitness maniac. The others were like a herd of buffalo, closely grouped and with ever changing positions. Toph tailed the pack of muscle girls as she somewhat halfheartedly jogged down the road.

*****

Shampoo and Ryoga wandered through the winding streets of the odd town as they intensified their search for the latter's target. As they moved further and further into the township, the frequency of their encounters of muscular women increased along with their size. However, what they saw now had taken the cake, as a group of women with muscles more developed than either of them had ever seen stamped through the town. The couple had to dive to the side to avoid the massive bodies that moved like wrecking balls down the street.

"What was that?" Shampoo gasped as he stood. "This town too too weird!"

"I don't know what that was," Ryoga answered, "but I did see the name on all of their shirts, and I don't think it was a coincidence that it was Saotome."

"Husband want to follow them?" Shampoo asked. Ryoga gave a nod, and the young Chinese girl grabbed his hand. Both of them followed after at a safe distance.

*****

Ranma nervously placed his pencil down, and sighed. He had answered everything he could on his mother's test, and his brain throbbed painfully from overexertion. He was never one for learning outside of anything related to martial arts, but he hoped that he recalled enough from his spotty education to at least earn a passing grade. He finished just in time, as his mother walked in and claimed his test.

"It shouldn't take too long for us to get the results back from the test," Nodoka stated, "I'll fetch Washu and we can get this graded."
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.title: Stay at the gym where Ranma is schooled.

choices: Does Ryoga meet the mass of massive girls or they hide?
Back to Ranma's results.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
"Washu is a genius," the words were whispered. "Washu is beautiful." These were followed by kisses to her abdomen. Washu smiled as she looked past her perky breasts to the man placing his head on her hard muscular body. She reached down and stroked his long hair. It was strange, falling in love for a second time for someone as old as her. She thought she had moved past those emotions years ago before her sealing. But this simple, hard working man awoke them.

Oh, he didn't understand a bit of her science or the technology she created, but he didn't fear her. He accepted her and cared for her. It was so cute watching him court her. Like Nodoka, she too had a child missing from her life and Soun's girls helped that void too. They loved her and accepted her. And she loved the, She helped Kasumi start dating that cute doctor. She helped Nabiki focus her mercenary mind on expanding the gym business. She helped Akane find acceptance and friendship despite her being so much larger than the average girl. She was a good aunt to figure to each of them and friend of Soun.

But still, they hadn't gone that far. Even after years of dating, it was all they reached. Neither her nor Soun had gone over the edge and proposed to each other.

Now they laid here resting after her working hard to fix the machines The system just needed to reboot and that would take a while. He watched her and was aroused by her mind and abilities.

Would one of them find the courage to ask the next question?

-------

The herd of muscular girls ran through the city on their planned route. It was a compromise with the local government to stick to this path so they could adjust traffic if need be.

They were used to being watched as they moved down the streets and occasionally some untouched person would try to follow along. They never made it a mile, matching these mammoth ladies’ paces.

That is until today. As Toph stayed in the rear, she could feel the pair of regular sized people coming up behind them. "Queenie," Toph called out. Allura turned her head back and looked at Toph. "We got some followers."

"Truly?" Allura asked, adjusting her head enough to see past Toph's frame. Her alien eyes spotted the young man dressed in yellow with a heavy backpack running while holding hands with a young purple-haired maiden. "How long have they been there?"

"Past twenty minutes," Toph said.

"That is impressive," Allura said as other ladies heard this conversation and it soon reached Polt. They were coming to an open park soon where they might sometimes stop for water. She didn't want to stop, as they were making good pace, but she didn't want to drive away more people from the gym.

"Water Break!" Polt called as they reached the park. The herd slowed their pace and trudged to a stop. The ladies took the gallon jugs they had as their water bottles and sipped.

----------

Shampoo and Ryoga were breathing hard. These women were really booking it, at least as far as the normal sized people were concerned. Seeing them actually stop though, sparked some concern in Shampoo. Were they noticed? Was this a benign action or prelude to an ambush?

"Husband, Shampoo concerned about approaching these women right now," Shampoo said. "We could turn here and hide, waiting for them to start again." Ryoga breathed a few times as he considered their next course of action.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.title: Next Step

choices: It is time for the group's field trip
Ranma's search for the bathroom takes a wrong turn
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
"Shampoo think it would be best to retreat now," the Chinese girl stated as she held Ryoga back. "They not ones we should mess with, and at least some of them well trained in fighting."

"But they could lead us directly to that coward, Ranma. I don't want to lose this chance for a rematch." Ryoga argued as the Chinese girl tugged him back.

"We know about gym. We just need to find it later,” Shampoo rebutted, as she gave one final pull.

Ryoga saw the sense in Shampoo's logic, and the pair began to back away slowly, putting distance between themselves and the group of amazonian women. They would put his plans on hold for the moment, and ask around later for directions to the gym.

*****

"Looks like our stalkers have decided to leave," Toph said with a shrug.

"They were probably just some tourists who've never seen girls like us before," Akane theorized, "It's not like this is the first time out-of-towners have been curious about us."

"Well then, shall we head back?" Allura asked. "It won't be too much longer before everything's ready for our first excursion with Ranma, and I would like to shower before we go."

Polt was the only one who gave any protest, she would have run across the entire country if they let her, but decided to go along with everyone else. The group then began their jog back, much to the collective relief of the townspeople who would rather not get caught up in the massive torrent of muscle.

*****

Ranma had barely managed to squeak by with a passing grade, but his mother's look of disappointment with his academic performance felt like a stab in the heart. She had left him to talk with Washu about the proper curriculum to take with him, and the thought of private tutelage from the scientist set his danger sense into overdrive for reasons he didn't quite understand.

He wandered the halls of his family home in a daze, his brain felt like a wrung out sponge as every ounce of his intelligence had been drained from him. He could no longer muster the brainpower to think, and just meandered aimlessly through the labyrinthine halls of his mother's house, and soon found he was lost. While his mother had given him a brief tour of the property, it barely covered a quarter of the total building.

"Where the hell is the bathroom?" Ranma grumbled as he trudged through another long corridor.

*****

The girls had returned to the estate in relatively short order, the mere 5 kilometers they ran since they turned back was nothing to the super-fit cadre of teenagers. They immediately grabbed a change of clothes from their individual rooms, and headed for the communal shower they shared.

The troupe of amazons stepped into the specially built shower that Washu had kindly made for them and their rather large frames. There was enough space for each girl to bathe at once, without worrying about being cramped.


Hot water poured between Allura's ripped chest, taking with it the white suds of her body wash. The ivory lather made for a stark contrast against her milk chocolate skin as it glided down her chiseled form, like foam on a cappuccino. Her silvery hair draped across her broad back, slick with water as it clung to her wide lats and fell just bellow her rock solid glutes.

Toph occupied the stall to her right, the blind mountain's hair, normally worn in a bun, now cascaded downward in a tangled mess. The earthbender was engaged in washing her arm, a smile on her lips as she playfully flexed her bicep to its full size.

In her stall, Polt was busy with the arduous task of washing the fine fur that covered her body. It took hard work to give it that silky shine and fluffiness, especially since it required thorough cleaning and specialized soap to get her coat just right.

“So what kind of world do you think it will be?” Allura asked her fellow amazons as she ran her fingers through the long locks of her hair.

“Oh, maybe a world that has evil versions of us that go around destroying things and conquering the world!” Ty Lee put forth energetically.

“That’s just stupid,” Akane grunted from her spot, preoccupied with lathering up her long hair. “It’ll probably just have small differences.”

“I hope it’s somewhere with a good gym at least,” Polt commented, earning a laugh from her comrades.

*****

“Washu is the greatest!”

“Washu is a genius!”

The brilliant scientist’s computer screen was flanked by two digital cheerleaders as it finished compiling the final bits of calculation needed for the planned excursion. The redhaired scientist smiled from her cushion as the generators hummed to life and one of her greatest inventions went to standby, awaiting a simple button push to tear a hole into the unknown.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.title: Ryoga retreats for now

choices: Stay with Ryoga in the gym with Shampoo. They start lifting to continue the ruse
Stay with Ranma as he feels worse as some local ladies arrive.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
When walking through the labyrinthine halls, Ranma fell upon a savior. A man in his mid twenties, Tofu Ono, the doctor of the gym, at least the one who tended to the normal people in the regular part of the gym and dating Akane's sister, found him and led him to the nearest bathroom. Once he was relieved, he walked with Ranma back to the more common areas.

"So, you're dating Akane's sister, you said?" Ranma asked, his mind was a bit focused on not peeing when they met. Tofu nodded.

"Yes. Sweet, lovely, and powerful Kasumi," Tofu said. "You'll find on each of the ladies the steel strength beneath their feminine curves."

"I kind of noticed that already," Ranma said. "Got to say, it's kind of a little scary and amazing what my mom and me can do."

"I was there when Kasumi kissed

They came to Wasshu's laboratory door and he knocked on the door. Tofu left him there and went back to his business. The muscular form of Washu opened the door. She wore only a large white lab coat that covered her body and groin. Her bare legs stood like tree trunks. "Ranma, perfect timing. We're just waiting for your mom and the girls," Washu said. "How did you know?"

"I didn't," Ranma said. "It's another matter . . ."

"Ah, well, come on in," Washu said. She stepped back and Ranma entered the strange lab once again. "Well, what is it?"

"I kind of . . . almost failed my school test," Ranma said. Washu nodded.

"Don't worry. I'll look over your results and derive the best plan for you," Washu said. "When I'm done, you'll be one of the smartest martial artists in the world."

"You think I need that much?" Ranma asked defensively. Washu grinned.

"You study Anything Goes, right? The practice of smart but pragmatic combat techniques?" Washu asked. Ranma nodded. "Then you need to expand your mind to know how verbal attacks can be just as devastating, use information from history and cultural studies to win some fights fists alone won't." She paused for a moment. "Unless you think you can't do it." Ranma clenched his hands.

"I can handle it," Ranma said. "I'm gonna beat them all."

"Beat who?" came a voice from behind. Ranma turned quickly to see all the ladies he could marry standing behind him, watching him with eagerness and interest. Akane stood at the front.

"Do you want to wrestle with us?" Polt asked.

"Now now ladies, we don't have time for that," Nodoka said as she walked through the crowd. "Washu, ready?"

"Ready," Washu said as she went to the big button. She pressed it and a large circle big enough for two of these enhanced women to walk through at the same time shimmered. A strange white liquid erupted out of the wall before falling back onto it. It was like looking at a television screen through a sheet of water. One could see a fine looking mansion that was a bit blurry in resolution.

"Wow," Ranma said softly. "That's another world."

"You sound so surprised. Each one of us came through this portal too," Allura said.

"Now, because of yesterdays' trips, we have to restrict this to a two hour trip people," Washu said. "Don't lose each other on this venture. Does everyone have an emergency inter-dimensional signaler?"

"Uh," Ranma said before one was handed to him. What was meant as a wrist strap for the ladies fit well around his neck like a lanyard.

"Remember, use this if something happened and you need to get back here quickly. You will be transported back through the gate and I will also be able to talk to you though it," Washu said.

"You don't come with us?" Ranma asked.

"No one is skilled enough yet to run things if something goes wrong," Washu said with some regret. "Problem with being a super genius, even normal smart people can't do everything I can."

"Well, let's go," Nodoka said. The fiances nodded and slowly walked into the gate. They vanished almost instantly. Last, Nodoka walked with her son, holding his hand as they hit the barrier.

-----------

Shampoo's wisdom paid off. It didn't take long to find the gym. The large building housing it in the middle of the street had a large sign and the same symbol on the girls' workout outfits. The pair entered and Ryoga saw another incredibly strong woman. She smiled warmly at them.

"Hello. I am Kasumi," Kasumi said. "Are you here for the free day?"

"Free day?" Shampoo repeated back.

"Yes. We are allowing non-members full access to the normal membership areas at no cost beyond a simple 1,000 yen entry fee," Kasumi said. "You can try any one of our workout machines, enjoy time in the sauna, workout in our pool, relax in our whirlpool baths, or get a massage by some of our top trained people."

"Uh, one moment," Ryoga said. He turned to Shampoo and spoke softly. "What do you think?"

"Hmm. Shampoo good at sneaking around. Shampoo say we go in and Shampoo sneak to back area," Shampoo said. Ryoga nodded.

"Um, here's the money," Ryoga said. They wouldn't have much left but neither Shampoo nor he were strangers to living on minimal goods. Ryoga paid the bill. Kasumi handed over the forms for them to fill out. Ryoga helped her with hers. Speaking Japanese was one thing. Reading it was a bit harder.

-----------

The bright noon sun hung over the crowded group as they entered this new world. "Lots of people that way," Toph noted as she walked around. She pointed towards the mansion. "And some strange underground buildings here too."

"What sort of world is this, auntie?" Akane asked Nodoka. "Is it magical or more science?" But Nodoka didn't answer. She turned to Ranma, who was looking flush and had his mother's attention.

"Ranma, are you okay?" Nodoka asked.

"I feel fine. Just . . . woozy from the trip," Ranma said. Nodoka nodded.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.title: Departure and Arrivals

choices: Ranma gets splashed while they explain
Shampoo is caught snooping by Washu
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
Ranma's body felt prickly,almost numb, but with a slight uncomfortable pressure. Since he had gone through the gate everything felt off with no clear reason as to why. It wasn’t painful by any means, it just felt like his skin was one size too small.

It was only the sudden, and rather shocking change in the appearance of his travel companions that snapped Ranma out of his daze. Where once a group of muscular amazons stood, there was now a troupe of lithe women. They no longer towered over him, and, if not for some of their more exotic characteristics, would look like any random person off the street.

"Mom?" Ranma looked questioningly at the woman with his mother's face, "Why do you guys look like that?"

"Hmm? Oh, sorry dear, I forgot to tell you about our specialized camouflage. It's a little something Washu put together. As you can probably guess, or normal bodies would stand out a lot no matter what dimension we enter," Nodoka lifted her arm, on which a simple looking watch was attached, "this device allows us to take on the form of a standard human. It makes it easier for us to blend in with the crowd."

Ranma nodded in understanding, and took the opportunity to look over the group, and guessed that this was what they would have looked like if they had not met his mother.


“Looks like we landed in someone’s yard,” Akane stated as she looked over the well kept landscaping and the giant mansion that sat in the center of it all.

“It also seems like we’ve been noticed by the residents,” Toph added as her feet picked up the subtle vibrations of the unknown persons that were approaching.


*****

Seconds after Ranma and company’s arrival alarms had sounded inside the impressive estate. A group of frantic teenagers were scrambling to figure out what had happened. Each of them wore odd clothes that were figure fitting, and all bore an X symbol on their belts.

“Ugh! Like, why did this have to happen today of all days?” asked a brunette girl with long hair that was pulled back into a ponytail. “Seriously, the one day we have the mansion to ourselves, and this has to happen!?”

Across from the brunette, a young woman with a shock of white amidst her otherwise dark hair grumbled to herself. This had certainly put a damper on her plans for the evening.

“This sucks! I finally get a chance to hang with my new friend at home, and now some punks had ta come and ruin everything!” the teenager snarled in her southern drawl.

“You can complain after we figure out what’s going on and who snuck onto the grounds,” a young man with a slight accent said as he poofed out of existence only to reappear at the front door of the large mansion.

The others followed quickly as they burst onto the grounds heading towards the source of the disturbance.

*****

Ryoga and Shampoo entered the gym proper, and followed the young woman, who had introduced herself as Kasumi, to the main floor. They had each been given a set of workout appropriate clothes and, after a quick change, followed the muscular young woman to an open bench.

“How experienced are you two in regard to free weights?” Kasumi asked the pair.

“I’ve never actually done much weightlifting before,” Ryoga answered honestly. It was technically true, as his training had involved the use of weights, just not in the normal manner.

“Shampoo hasn’t either,” the purple haired girl added.

“Would you like a demonstration then?” Kasumi asked, a helpful smile on her lips.

“That would be nice,” Shampoo answered. It would give the brunette something to occupy her attention and Shampoo and opening to investigate the grounds.

Kasumi loaded up the bar with more weight than Ryoga thought possible, sat herself on the bench, and laid back her hands grasping the bar a shoulder width apart. Shampoo took the opportunity to slip away, leaving Ryoga alone with the Tendo girl.

“Would you be so kind as to spot me, Ryoga-kun?” Kasumi asked sweetly.

*****

Ranma’s group and the four figures that were approaching from the central building now stood just feet from each other. The tension in the air was palpable, as the four teens in strange outfits had battle ready stances.

“Who are you people, and why are you here?” asked the southern sounding girl as she held up her fists, ready for a fight.

“Oh my! Please don’t be alarmed. We mean you no harm, and can explain everything if you would let us,” Ranma’s mother said as she waved dismissively at the aggressive stances their new friends had taken.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.title: Meeting new people in new places

choices: Rougue takes this chance to touch one of the ladies to do her own scan.
Back to Shampoo's running Washu's maze.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
Shampoo was true to her word. She moved quietly through the gym to a sign which read "Employees Only." She pushed it open and went inside.

*****

Washu watched the grainy image from Nodoka's return medallion. Sometimes she could get a clear picture. Sometimes she got nothing. A soft ringing came froma monitor behind her. She turned about and looked at a young woman of Chinese descent walking in the off limits area. She studied her for a minute and guessed she wasn't some by-standard who went through the wrong door. Her body was tense and she kept an awareness about her.

"Interesting," Washu said with a smile. Spies, thieves, and the medically curious usually tried some sneaking around to see what cocktail of drugs might be responsible for the ladies coming in lithe and small, and leaving beefcakes. Washu hit one button and locked Nodoka's office door and the records room where the customer's financial information lay. But she left the young woman continue the trespassing. Both Nabiki and she were here to properly detain the girl if need be.

She tapped another screen and rewound security footage of the girl to see when she came in. She found her entering with a young man who was currently helping Kasumi lift. She brought that to a live feed on another monitor.

Washu observed the girl was approaching one door. "Let's see what's behind door number one," Washu commented as the girl opened the door.

********

Shampoo was so excited right now. Infiltration attacks were fun for her. While there was the nice simple overt and direct attack, she did appreciate her grandmother's wisdom in teaching her to be stealthy and attacking enemies from their vulnerable places. She came to the first door since entering. She didn't understand the word on the door and opened it up.

A lounge was before her but unlike anything close to normal proportions. The couches and chairs were mammoth to the young girl. "Must be for the large women," Shampoo whispered in Chinese. She saw another exit and moved quietly across the floor and went through.

-------

The microphone on the camera picked up some of her words, enough for Washu to identify the language. The Chinese girl was now in another hallway. Her darling Soun was resting in one of the nearby rooms. A press of a button and the door became invisible. A moment later, the girl walked past the door without incident.

"Where should I lead you girl?" Washu mused as she looked back at the video from Nodoka.

*********

One of the four stepped forward. She had long red hair cascading down her back. "We're listening," she said. "How did you get past the proximity sensors?" Nodoka assessed the four. The red-head was the leader of the group. The only man in the group was covered in blue fur and had a tail. Was he a demon?

"Would you believe we come from another world?" Nodoka asked. The four glanced at each other.

"Come again?" the southern-sounding girl asked.

"We are travelers from another world. We visit new places and learn about new people," Nodoka said.

"Jean, do you believe them?" the girl with a ponytail asked outloud. The red-head glanced back and the ponytail girl nodded. Raven liften an eyebrow.

"Is that telepathy?" Raven asked. The red-head looked at the pale woman who lifted a hand.

"You have powers too," Jean said.

"Raven-dear, what are you doing?" Nodoka asked.

"Their leader can read minds. I'm just making sure she doesn't read ours without me noticing," Raven said.

"Mind reading. Truly a marvelous ability," Allura said.

"Not always," Jean replied. "So, you came right out on our front lawn. Do you know who we are?"

"A freak squad? Is that a tail on one of you?" Toph joked. She felt their hearts race and the four were tense and angry at the comment.

"Please excuse Toph, she is direct and very rude sometimes," Ty Lee said. Toph chuckled.

"What? A blind girl can't be direct?" Toph asked.

"Toph, you aren't helping us be welcomed," Nodoka said. She stepped forward from the group. "If you can read minds, I offer mine. Look at my thoughts and intentions. We aren't here to hurt you. Only to learn and if possible, leave you better than you were before." Jean stepped forward. A small smile formed on Raven's face. She knew this tactic. Looking into the mind of Nodoka, reading her emotions by touching her on a deeper than physical way is how Raven came to love her and wanted to follow her. This girl would become very friendly to Nodoka in quick fashion.

"Wait Jean, the pale Fraulein is smiling," the blue-haired boy said. "It's weird." Jean looked at Raven and nodded.

"Is this a trap?" Jean asked as Rouge removed one glove.

"No trap. We just want to show our good intentions," Nodoka replied.

All while this was happening, the ponytail girl watched the only boy in the group. He seemed out of it. He lifted his hand to his face. "Hey, is he alright?" Kitty asked. Nodoka and the other girls turned to look at Ranma.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.title: Caught Cat

choices: The water splashes Ranma
One of the girls blocks it
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
The defensive measures the universe class genius had installed throughout the property were quite extensive, including doorways that could appear and disappear as she wished. If someone lacked the proper credentials, Washu could lead them wherever she wished, much to the chagrin of her unsuspecting victim. One of the locations she could lead a trespasser to just happened to be a very special area that was on the outskirts of her lab created for troublemakers who felt entitled to snoop around without asking in places they didn’t belong. Nodoka had even said such people were fair game as guinea pigs, as long as they weren’t too banged up afterwards.

With a boisterous laugh, Washu prepared to show this would be interloper the error of their ways with many vigorous, and thorough, tests.

*****

Shampoo had expected to step into an office of some sort, but was surprised to find herself in an expansive, sterile looking room with paneled walls and a cavernous ceiling lined with a multitude of devices she had never seen before. The door she had entered through disappeared seconds later which left her trapped in the unnerving area.

She quickly fell into a guarded stance, her eyes open, scanning the room for any signs of movement. There was no way that this wasn’t a trap, and she wasn’t about to be caught off guard. For a moment, there was nothing, except the sound of her own breathing, until the Chinese warrior girl felt a sharp jab in her posterior. The skilled amazon leaped forward and spun around to catch sight of what had attacked her. A metallic tentacle with a syringe attached to it was not what she had been expecting.

*****

“Blood sample secured,” said Washu, a mischievous smile on her lips, as she activated the room in which her less than willing test subject was trapped. In reality, this particular area had been created to test the abilities of the girls, allowing them to go all out without worry of causing damage to the surrounding area, or drawing unwanted attention from others. Given the destructive capabilities of the others, it was a sure bet that this intrusive little girl wouldn’t be able to escape unless Washu wanted her to. With a few button presses, and slight adjustments on the controls, the genius began her rigorous testing, much to the dismay of the would-be-spy.

The results of the early bloodwork tests were already making her hopeful for this new guinea pig, as she sported great genes, and there was even some evidence of applied eugenics from what the scientist could see. How exciting to see a Terran in pique physical condition take on her specially made training program.

*****

As more metal tentacles appeared from the floor, walls, and ceiling, Shampoo had to move like a rocket in order to dodge and counter the unsettling things. Each one of them possessed a different weapon, everything from a stun gun to gas was being utilized in an attempt to put her down and out.

The trained warrior moved in close to one of the offending appendages, gripped it by the base and, with a mighty pull, yanked it free in a shower of sparks. She would show just how strong those of the Joketsuzoku were. The now lifeless tentacle would make a fine weapon, an impromptu whip which she lashed out in a flash and wrecked two more of them. A grin of determination grew on her face, and she weaved through the advancing tentacles like lightning.

*****

Meanwhile, in the other world, Ranma and company were busy with their new companions. Ranma was still slouched over, looking like he was about to eject the contents of his stomach violently across the room. The brunette with a ponytail, who they found out was named Kitty, had left to fetch something to hopefully calm his stomach down. In the meantime, they held a now civil discussion about who they were, and how they had appeared out of nowhere onto the grounds of the Xavier school.

“It is a hobby I have come to enjoy,” Nodoka explained to her enraptured audience of teens, “seeing all the differences, both big and small, between our Earth and one of a different universe.”

Rogue listened with a cynical ear as the new guests explained their origins, her back against the wall closest to the entryway. Next to her stood the nauseated teenage boy who had arrived just minutes before, his hand lightly clutching his stomach in an attempt to calm it. His mother continued her story while keeping a close eye on him, telling fantastical tales about alternate realities and such. The fact that her teammates were even entertaining the crap that spewed from the older woman’s lips was laughable, especially after all they had gone through the previous year. Maybe it was their improbable story, or maybe her past with Mystique left her with a deeply ingrained mistrust of redheads, but the mutant girl just couldn’t bring herself to believe a word of what the lady who had introduced herself as Nodoka Saotome. Stay there. We're on our way."

Nodoka and Ranko stood at the foot of the medical bed as Ranma hoisted himself off it. The young man’s head was still swimming from the realization that he had spontaneously gained a loving little sister near his age within the last ten minutes, and that he had to play along with her memories until they got back to run some tests. He looked back into the bright blue eyes of his new sibling, eyes filled concern and love, and could only sigh and roll with it.

“So what’s the plan now?” Ranma asked as he wearily eyed his acquired relative, still unsure of how to handle her.

“Since the situation has taken a very unexpected turn, we decided it would be best to take our freshly bulked up friends back with us so that Washu can run some thorough tests to make sure they won’t have any more sudden growth spurts, or cause others to.” Nodoka calmly answered. “We also want to make sure that you or your sister weren’t adversely effected by the dimensional change since you both passed out soon after we got here.”

Ranma got to his feet, a little wobbly, but not unable to walk. Ranko made to catch him, but he held up a hand in refusal as he steadied himself. She may have been much stronger than him, but he wasn’t about to be treated like a sick child. After he reaffirmed his balance, Ranma headed for the door.

“We better get going then,” the pigtailed boy said.

“Hold up, big bro,” Ranko interrupted. “Are you sure you should be moving right now?”

“M’fine. I just need to walk it off and I’ll be right as rain,” Ranma grunted as he turned toward his mother and sister. “and ‘sides, we gotta let the others know what’s going on so they don’t worry.”

“Um…Ranma?” Nodoka started as she finally got a look at the young man’s front. “Are you sure you don’t want to change before you go?”

The Saotome male looked down at his clothes, to find them still slightly soaked, with a slight dark spot over the crotch of his pants. His mother handed him a fresh change of clothes from his sack, which he quickly changed into in the adjacent bathroom.

*****

In another part of the mansion, Storm stood stoically between the three teenagers, a contemplative look on her face. Things just got much more complicated very fast, and with Logan and the professor absent it was up to her to make the right call.

“Okay girls, it looks like we have an important choice to make,” the weather mutant stated, her arms crossed over her chest in a show of authority. “We need to ensure that you two,” she pointed at Kitty and Rogue, “aren’t in any further trouble, and that whatever changed you isn’t going to spread further. While we could accept the generous offer of our guests to join them in their world, we must also be careful so as not to willingly walk into danger.”

“Like, what do you think they’re going to do to us?” Kitty asked, perplexed. “If what they say is true, then they have no reason to want to hurt us.”

“Which is why we must proceed with caution, so I will be sending you two along with Jean on this mission. I cannot allow you to come to harm, and Jean will have a better chance of sensing any ill intent they may harbor.”

“Whatever, I just wanna get this done and over with as fast as possible,” Rogue said flatly. “It’s bad enough that I messed things up this bad, and now we gotta depend on the help of people we never met before to fix it.”

“Woah, lighten up Rogue. I mean, aren’t you excited about the opportunity to go to a completely different and new world?” Jean asked.

“Exactly! We’re going to a world we know nothing about. For all we know, we’ll be made to fight to the death for entertainment as soon as we get there!”

“I don’t think that’s something we’ll have to worry about. I read their surface thoughts and didn’t sense any ill will towards us. I think the genuinely want to help us.” Jean countered calmly.

“This is a chance we have to take. I don’t want to risk what could happen if we don’t. You three will go with them when they leave, and just to be safe, take Kurt with you as a means of quick escape if such a thing becomes necessary. I’ll hold down the fort here.”

The group of four had their plans set and went to meet with the other X-Men.

“Ranko dear, could you go make sure that we got everything out of the medical ward, I think I may have left something there.”

The redheaded amazon nodded to her mother, and made her way back.

The Saotome family opened the door to the sitting room where their group was waiting and discovered that they had managed to break the ice with their hosts. With the exception of Azula and Raven, there were lively discussions happening between them.

“Well, I guess we’ve got some explaining to do,” Nodoka said, catching everyone’s attention. “The first thing being the new daughter I have gained.”

The collective mouth drop from everyone in the room was a sight.

Nodoka gave an explanation that was as detailed as possible, urging them to play along with Ranko’s perceived memories as much as possible to prevent any incident. They were joined midway through by Storm, Jean and the two newly muscular teens.

Ranko still has her mother's muscle blessing and needs to learn to control the pushing of it. Otherwise, there isn't any trouble for them.

Ranma, a young man is here to challenge you to a fight," Nodoka said. "His name is Ryoga." Ranma's eyes widened as he recalled the name.

Her mother was obviously bothered by the kissing, but she didn't blame Ranko, which made the girl happy. She soon met Ryoga, Shampoo, and Nabiki at the entrance. None of them noticed the small fly drone following them. Ryoga took Shampoo's larger hand and looked up at the bigger and still radiant woman.

A half a block down the way and they came to a nice restaurant. Nabiki opened the door and looked around. A faint scent of roses was in the air. A woman with long brown hair walked up to them and smiled at Nabiki.

"Nabi-chan," the woman said with a smile.

"U-chan," Nabiki replied. "We got some company to the gym." Ranko bit her lip as she looked at this well built woman. She looked familiar, but couldn't place it in her head. Ukyo, for her part, looked over the guests and thought the mammoth redhead looked familiar and felt a peculiar throb at the sight of the woman, but ignored the feeling.

"This way to a table," Ukyo said, leading the way. They came to a table that was designed for the taller and stronger, and by default, heavier women the gym would yield. The chairs were a thick material and the table was taller than a typical one. Ryoga climbed into a taller chair so all were about equal at it.

"We'll need the platter special. Three of them, and Ryoga, do you want to eat something on your own or share with your wife?" Nabiki asked.

"Um..." Ryoga started, he looked at Shampoo. "Mind sharing?"

"Not at all," Shampoo said with a smile. Ukyo nodded. She left to make their meals.

"What's the platter special?" Ranko asked.

"A big meal meant for big ladies like us," Nabiki said. "Filled with healthy stuff to make our muscles grow bigger and stronger." She looked around. "Be right back." Nabiki followed Ukyo into the kitchen.

--------

Nabiki smiled as she watched the slightly shorter woman start cooking. She kissed the strong young woman on the back of the neck. "Nabi, stop," Ukyo said.

"I just love your cooking so much," Nabiki said. Ukyo blushed.

"Thanks. So, who is that redhead with you?" Ukyo asked.

"She is why I came back here. You told me once you knew Lady Nodoka's son in your youth, right?"

"Yes. She paid me back for the dowry and invested in this shop," Ukyo said. "Why?" Nabiki smiled and told her girlfriend the whole story.

-----------

In the corner of the restaurant eating a platter meal of her own, Kodachi Kuno looked at the beautiful mammoth redhead. Like a light radiating through perpetual darkness, she sat before Kodachi with some common riffraff. Her heart raced as she ate her meal. It was not unlike when she last saw Lady Nodoka before her exile from that establishment. Given the logo on the redhead's jacket and that Nabiki's company, the redhead goddess was likely associated with the place.

Kitty pushed hard against Akane's grip. There was power in the mutant's arm, but it was slowly giving way. Kitty's face scrunched up hard but it was for naught. Her hand slammed against the table. Akane smiled and rose. Kitty joined her and they shook hands.

"Wow. That was an intense match," Yuka exclaimed. "Truly amazing." Rogue had watched the first two matches and considered her best option. She didn't know if she was still possessing the muscle touch power, and didn't want to risk it. If she made Akane bigger and stronger while trying to wrestle her in one way or another, it wouldn't increase her chances to win after all. To break the chains or a pose-off?

Rogue took her time in deciding her challenge, as this was all new to her. While Akane was intimidating, the mutant girl felt that her best chance at winning against her would be in something that she at least had a chance to do, and witness for herself. A pose off was the only real choice for her, and she made that choice known after a few more seconds of thought.

"Ah choose the pose off!" the muscular mutant declared loudly to the hostess. She was confident that this was at least something that she could have slight chance of winning. If nothing else, she could at least try to bluff her way through this. How hard could it be?

*****

Kodachi could not tear her eyes from the magnificent form of the redhead on the other side of the restaurant. Something about her was just eerily similar to Lady Nodoka, but she didn't dare get closer for fear of Nabiki interfering. She was deep within the territory of her former idol, and could not risk calling attention to herself for fear of reprisal. Her banishment from the gym due to the actions she had taken to overtake the likes of Akane Tendo and the rest of the girls that had gathered around the feet of her beloved inspiration had left her using alternate methods to keep the playing field level.

Now, however, she had the opportunity to change that, and from her corner, the Kuno girl watched, and plotted her next course of action. This new arrival had certainly changed things, and her plans would need to be altered accordingly.

*****

"Alright everyone! Our two competitors are ready to begin!" the excitable announcer called happily.

Akane and Rogue stepped forward, bikinis the only thing covering their modesty as their defined, thick muscles were exposed, much to the crowds excitement. Once they were front and center on the small stage, a rhythmic song began to play over the speaker system to signal them to start.

Rogue led off with an impressive double bicep pose, her arms swelling with power as she flexed them as big as she could, veins rising from beneath her skin as they were forced upwards from below. The crowd roared at the display of her incredible physique, a fact that filled the mutant girl with an odd excitement. She was enjoying the feeling of showing off her powerful body, and the crowds cheers urged her to continue.

As Rogue finished her pose, Akane stepped forward, and mirrored her opponent's chosen form, but with a flow and grace that came with focused practice Her arms closely matched the mutant girl's in size, but her flexing emphasized the muscles more clearly, it was like comparing a high definition photograph to one taken with a slightly fogged lens.

Judging from the reactions of the spectators, Rogue could tell that this was an uphill battle for her, and she would give it her all to come out on top. She shifted her stance into a front lat spread, showing off the broadness of her shoulders and chest. Sweat began to drip down her forehead as the stage lights shone down on her, highlighting every inch of her sculpted form, much to the joy of the cheering people. Akane soon followed suit, as she shifted into the same pose as her competitor.

"Like, why does she keep doing the same poses as Rogue?" Kitty asked as she rejoined her friends in the audience.

"It gives a fair chance to the other girl," answered a stranger next to them. "Akane's basically the ultimate champion of these things, and limits herself to copying challenger's to give them a fighting chance. If she really tried to go all out, I doubt anyone who chose to compete here would be able to take her on in these things."

Kitty nodded dumbly before turning back to the contest, and the new pose Rogue had chosen to try. The skunk-haired girl had placed her hands behind her head, focusing all attention on her legs and abs, her chiseled stomach twitching as she pulsed the muscles to the music. Akane once more followed suit, and the showdown continued like this for another few minutes before the judges declared the winner.

Rogue found that she didn't mind the loss, and showing off her sheer strength and power had proven to be exhilarating to the power-sucking mutant.

Now the only one left was Usagi, who proved to be a crowd favorite, and the one most believed could hope to compete with Akane on even terms. The only challenge left was the chains, and it would prove to be the crowd favorite.

They pushed and pushed. Their faces contorted with determination.

"Oh my goddess was amazing. She is truly so powerful and happy with these victories," Tatewaki exclaimed as he clapped. Jean looked at Akane and even without her slight empathic powers or telepathy, she knew a teenage girl's body language. Akane was upset about something.

Maybe they could talk after this was over.

Ukyo looked back into the restaurant from the kitchen and was shocked. Ranma now had a magically created sister who didn't know she was only created a few hours ago. If she introduced herself, the girl would likely have memories of their time together when they were smaller.

"Excuse me, miss, but do I know you from somewhere?" she finally asked, unable to recall for herself.

Ukyo looked up from her dish, swallowing the bit of food in her mouth before taking a sip from her water glass. After being told about the girl's origins, the muscular chef knew that this would had to be handled deftly so as not to cause big problems in the future.

A scene of the two of them riding atop of some kind of cart with another child waving goodbye came to the front of her mind, and her eyes widened in realization.

"Ucchan?" Ranko gasped as the memories started to surface.

A heavy knock hit the door. Ranma's heart raced as he struggled but the powerful women refused to allow him any chance of escape. Their glistening bodies were relaxing after the euphoria and very little would stir them. The door opened and a figure filled the opening. Ranma leaned his head over Allura's larger body and looked at the door. His mother walked into the room. He saw the quick expression of shock and anger, but she contained it.

"Allura. Polt. What are you doing?" Nodoka asked curtly. The sound of Nodoka's voice woke both women. Allura's face went pale as she turned to see Nodoka standing there. Polt pulled back and bowed.

"Lady Nodoka, we were just . . ." Allura began.

"I can see what was going on. Ranma, get dressed. We are going on another trip," Nodoka said. "You two, get checked out by Washu." Ranma gout out of his lovers' grips and found his clothing.

"Um, we were supposed to join you," Polt noted.

"Not right now. You broke my confidence by having sex with my son," Nodoka said. "You are grounded." Both adult women looked down in shame. Ranma dressed and followed his mother out of the room. Half way down the hall, she looked at her son. Her boy, her baby boy, was now a man. What she felt was both a mixture of joy, fear, and rage.

"Um, mom, I can explain," Ranma said as he felt the glare of his mother on him.

Nodoka stopped and knelt down. She looked into her son's face. "You have to be careful, Ranma. You need to be smart enough to hold in your urges. I know you are yours father's son in many ways, but casual sex with some women when others are trying to date you and you date them will lead to a lot of problems." Ranma thought about Akane walking in and nodded.

"I'll be careful," Ranma said. Nodoka smiled and hugged her son. His frail body, to her, pressed against her chest and was filled with her motherly warmth.

"And if they coerce you, force themselves on you, make you feel uncomfortable that you say no and they ignore you, I will break their bodies into pieces," his mother growled. Ranma laughed softly.

"You're serious, aren't you?" Ranma asked.

"I think Ranko would join me in it, so yes. Very much so," Nodoka said. She broke away from her son and rose.

"Um so what place are we going to now?" Ranma asked.

"Not sure. Your aunt likes to keep things close to the vest," Nodoka said.

----------

Akane was joined in the back by Rouge, Kitty, Jean, and Kurt. She grimaced at the sight of Tatewaki Kuno but security held him back. "That was really impressive," Jean said. "Your skills are really amazing."

"Thanks," Akane said. "You can read minds, right?"

"And move things with my mind too," Jean said.

"That would be an awesome power to have," Akane said. "No offense to you two." Kitty and Rogue nodded.

"You get used to it. I mean when we were kids, Jean's powers are the things kids dream they could have," Kitty said. "But moving through walls is also cool." Rogue looked down.

Could the crazy scientist help her control her powers while she was here?

A phone rang by them. Yuka answered and walked over to Akane. "Akane, phone." Akane took the phone.

"Kasumi," she said. There was a pause. "Right," she growled. "I nearly forgot. Tell them I will join them." She handed the phone back.

"What's going on?" Kurt asked.

"Nodoka is taking Ranma on a trip with a few people. I was invited," Akane replied as her hand clenched tightly. Yuka was happy the phone was back safely in her hand. "I have to head back to the gym. Thanks for letting me blow off steam." Yuka nodded.

"Any time," she replied.

----------

"Right Ranko. You guys left me behind and stole my dowry," Ukyo said with a smile.

"Ranma stole from a girl, the coward," Ryoga muttered.

"Hush," his wife said, wanting to listen to this.

"What? We did? I don't get it...." Ranko said. She thought about how they had some good food for a few days and then pops sold the cart. He got some decent booze money. "Oh. Dad, what did you do?"

A device in Nabiki's pocket rang. She pulled out a phone and listened to the other end. "Right Kasumi. I can be there soon," Nabiki said.

Ukyo turned to her beloved. "You have to go?" she asked.

"Yeah. I need to help out in the lab," Nabiki said.

"Why? What's going on?" Ukyo asked.

"Mom is doing a mother-son outing with Ranma and I need to watch things," Nabiki said. Ukyo knew enough of Washu and the hidden area of the gym to not need anymore information.

"Yeah. Mom said the next trip for fun would be me and her," Ranko said, recalling her mother saying that when she got the money.

"Help them back to the gym, if they need it, will you?" Nabiki asked, leaning in to kiss the smaller woman. Ukyo kissed back.

"Shampoo wonder where they going," Shampoo muttered.

"A really interesting place for sure," Ranko said as Nabiki left.

"Oh, can you cover my meal Ranko? I forgot my wallet in the gym," Nabiki said.

"Oh, sure. Mom gave me plenty," Ranko said. Shampoo caught Ukyo's eye roll at Nabiki's antics.

"Mercenary girl forgot money on purpose," Shampoo declared.

"What? I would never do that," Nabiki responded with a false smile. She left the reunited "friends" to continue eating.

"So, what happened after we left you?" Ranko asked Ukyo.

----------

Ranma sat on a chair in the lab as the strange machine made whirling noises. "This won't split me into another person again, will it?" he asked.

"Highly unlikely," Washu said. "But it is one reason I am coming with you this time."

"You're joining us?" Ty Lee asked as she walked in. Ranma blushed at the sight of the acrobat.
