1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
Washu was practically bouncing on her toes in anticipation for the chance to discover yet another dimension. Her eagerness to explore the unknown was only matched by her amusement Ranma's love life. Of course, she would have to do something about Lady Nodoka's aversion to letting her son enjoy his youth, responsibly of course, but it was the privilege of youth that she couldn't let him be denied.

Minako casually strode in with a duffel bag over one shoulder and a broad smile on her lips. She was practically skipping towards where Ranma was sitting, and gave him a wave as she passed, placing her luggage on the floor nearby. Raven soon appeared as well, a suitcase floating along just behind her until she sent it to join the blonde's. She chose to hang back from everyone else, her nose quickly poked into a book she had pulled from somewhere in her cloak.

An out of breath Akane swiftly entered the waiting area, her still wet hair clinging to the side of her face. She had managed to fit in a quick shower to wash the sweat buildup from the competition, and had just enough time to shove some clothes into a backpack before running down to the lab as fast as she could.

"Alright everyone," Washu called like a school teacher, "let's make sure that you have everything you need now. I can't guarantee we'll be able to get anything you leave behind at our destination."

Ranma's mother finally joined the collection of teens and Washu as they finished checking their bags. She glanced around the room until her eyes fell upon Ty Lee, who shrank back at the hard stare she was quickly met with.

"Ty Lee, I believe I requested that you were to head towards the med lab for your check up. You will not be participating in this excursion." Nodoka said with authority.

The gymnast began beat a hasty retreat, not wishing to anger Ranma's mother further. It was best not to incur the wrath of Nodoka, especially when she was already on thin ice with her after the fun Ty Lee had shared with her son earlier. She gave Ranma a wink and wave goodbye and then darted out of the room as fast as her feet could carry her towards her new destination.

"Now that all unrelated parties have left, and everyone on the team is here, let's send you off to this new world." Nodoka said as she made to corral them towards the dimensional gateway.

"Wait, is this really everyone who is coming?" Akane questioned as she looked over the small assembly. "I thought the same team from last time would be going this time."

"Due to certain circumstances, the others participation has been scrapped for this excursion. They will be staying behind this time so they may take their annual examination."

His mother's answer may not have prompted any worry from his compatriots, but Ranma knew the real reasons behind their exclusion from the trip. However, he decided discretion was the optimal solution for now, and kept his mouth shut on the matter, and just let it pass.

"Alright everyone, I want all of you to line up by the gateway and wait for my go ahead. I will join you quickly after I have a word with Lady Nodoka." Washu beckoned her closest friend to join her at the other end of the room.

"Is there something I can help you with, Washu?" Nodoka asked her friend, a puzzled look on her face.

"I was just wondering why you chose to punish those girls like this?" she said flatly.

"I hardly think this is the time to discuss such things. Besides, I gave them clear rules when they accepted being part of this."

"None of them did anything to him against Ranma's will. Besides, they're young, and who are we to deny them a little fun as long as they do it safely. Just try to lighten up a little with them okay?"

Washu left her friend to mull over her words, joining up with the rest, an eager smile on her face as she hit the button combination on the keypad to open the gate to another world.

"Let's head out everyone!" Washu called ecstatically her fist raised above her head as she walked through. One by one, the group followed behind her, bags slung over shoulders as they marched towards their next adventure.

*****

Allura, Polt, Toph, and Ty Lee all stood before the entryway of Washu's medical lab with stern faces and wavering hearts. They had each experienced the terrors behind those doors personally, and knew that, outside of the gym building, the machines the scientist considered basic diagnostic equipment would be called torture devices. Now they had been ordered to go inside by Lady Nodoka, and subject themselves to the horrors within.

"Well, I suppose we should just go ahead and get it over with." Ty Lee suggested.

"I guess so..." Toph grumbled as she tried to contain her frustration with the situation. The four of them entered, and were immediately captured by mechanical tentacles that had apparently been waiting for them.

"Welcome everyone!" came a voice in front of them, which drew their attention to a massive screen in the center of the room. Washu's visage graced the display, a smiling like the cat that had caught the canary. "I'm sorry I can't be here to do this personally, but that doesn't mean we won't be as thorough as possible."

Toph strained her muscles, arms swelling as big as boulders as she fought against the iron grip of her restraints. There was no effect. The foursome began to scream while the psuedo-Washu laughed as the examination began.

*****

The dimensional gate had deposited the team in a countryside before a massive stone castle. One of Washu's inventions was already making such a clamor as soon as they had arrived, which the redhead excitedly logged for later. With the only form of civilization in sight right in front of them, the group marched onward.

"Ohh wow. It really is potent here," Washu said with excitement.

"What's potent?" Akane asked, as she kept the other girls between her and Ranma. Her mind flashed to that scene again and again.

"Magic," Washu said. "Or rather, what is commonly called that because lesser minds call anything they don't grasp magic. You see-"

"Washu, we can hear your explanation later. There are some people ahead of us," Nodoka said. Ranma turned and saw the people his mother was talking about. Walking across the vast field were three people. Two teens about his age he might guess and one . . . calling her a woman would be kind. The traveling visitors got about a hundred feet from the three before they noticed the visitors.

"What's going on Mr. Potter? Are you trying to ambush me? I should expect nothing less!" the woman cried in fury.

"What? I have no idea who they are!" the boy called Mr. Potter explained.

"Honestly Professor, they're stranger to us too," the girl said.

"Lies! You are lying Mr. Potter!" The woman turned to the six travelers. The hair on the travelers' necks rose as they each sensed an attack was coming. Red light flew from what seemed to be her hand.

"Dodge it," Washu ordered. The group scattered and the blast of light flew by them. The boy and the girl jumped away from the attacking woman. She turned her sights on them. Ranma could now see a wooden rod in her hands.

"Raven, detain her," Nodoka ordered. Raven nodded. Another ball of light flew from the wand

"Azarath. Metrion. Zinthos," Raven called out. Her black aura flew from her hands and wrapped around the woman as the boy took the red blast meant for his female companion. He fell to the ground as Akane moved towards the teens. The attacking woman stood bound and gagged by Raven's aura. Hate filled her eyes as the group got close.

"Are you okay?" Akane asked the young woman as she looked at her friend.

"I'm fine," the young woman said. "Who are all of you?" Nodoka joined them.

"We are travelers," Nodoka said. "Do you know about alternate realities?"

"A little," the young woman said. "I-I'm Hermione. And this is Harry." The unconscious boy seemed in pain.

"Will he be alright?" Akane asked.

"He took a stunning spell at close range. He will be fine, but . . . oh we are so rushed right now. Our friends and. . ." Hermione whispered.

"Calm yourself dear," Nodoka said in a firm tone. Hermione looked at the woman and felt . . . calmed by her presence. There was an air of authority like being around McGonagall.

"Minako, hold the woman who attacked us. Raven, can you try awakening the boy?" Nodoka asked.

Raven nodded as Minako stood behind the short woman. "We should keep this from her too," Washu said, taking her wand. "What a delicate design for channeling energy formulated by one's own thoughts and willpower. This will be fun to study." "I didn't think that a daughter of Lady Nodoka would be so weak as to come under Kodachi's influence," said the snide voice of Azula. She proceeded to strike a point on Ranko's neck, rendering the girl unconscious before she could react.

"Azula!" Kodachi cried in fury. "How dare you show yourself before me after your betrayal!"

"Honestly, what could I do after what you tried to pull?" Azula sneered. "Sorry, but I'm going to have to put a stop to your little plan in its tracks."

Azula thrust out a thickly muscled arm, shooting a stream of flame at the ground between them, creating a wall of fire that also served as a distraction. She through the redhead over her shoulder and turned on her heel to beat a hasty escape. She knew that a fight here would cause quite a bit of property damage due to Kodachi's particular way of fighting.

"I'd follow close behind if I were you," she called back to the stunned mutants. "Kodachi has a penchant for using unconventional weapons and especially chemicals when she gets angry."

*****

It hadn't taken long for Mihoshi to arrive at the approximate coordinates of the mysterious energy reading. She had followed a tracking device to the entrance of a massive structure that was labelled as a gym. Her mind was so focused on the mission at hand, that she failed to notice much of anything else, bumbling through unopposed until she came to a sealed door, which she immediately ran into.

"It seems like the readings are coming from in here." Her blue eyes watery from the impact, she pulled out a cube and began to spin its corners randomly as she tried to gain access to the answer to her investigation. After a few hectic spins, she found herself on the other side of the door, oblivious to it for several seconds until she heard something odd.

"Ahhnn!" came an heated cry from a little further inside, which Mihoshi immediately followed, ready for action. She rounded a corner and her eyes widened in surprise as she saw what had made the noise, and why.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.title: A new player enters the scene

choices: Is the fall enough to wake Ranko from her stupor?
Kodachi fumes at this set back.
Ranma and crew arrive at the Ministry and start their plan.
Mihoshi is measured and Nabiki records.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
Ranma was seriously freaked out right now. Over the past week, he endured becoming a giant woman, that woman became her own entity thinking she is his sister, he got introduced to a dozen women who want to be his wife with each one twice his height and muscles like he never dreamed a woman could have, met his mother who was even bigger than his now-sister, traveled to other dimensions, and lost his virginity to some of these women. And yet those all paled in comparison to him riding an invisible animal whose beating wings he could feel. In his ear was a little device Washu placed before they took off. The whole crew had one as they were both locators and communication devices.

"So, Delores will give us any codes she knows to the security measures into the places we need to go," Washo said on the radio.

"From what Mr. Potter described, the location we seek is the Department of Mysteries," Delores said. "I only know a base amount of information as to the goings on there."

"What is this place, professor?" Hermione asked. She looked at the woman she hated for much of the year She flew close to Lady Nodoka.

"it is where witches and wizard study the most mysterious things in life: time, intelligence, the future, life and death, and other such places. I don't know much else about the Department, unfortunately. They do maintain the Time Turners I recall you being loaned a few years back, Ms Granger."

"Time Turners?" Washu asked.

"A small necklace which allows a person to travel back in time," Dolores said.

"Really. That woul-"

"Washu, no. We are not going there to give you free reign," Nodoka cut in. She was one of the few who had seen Death in her life and so rode her mount with ease.

"But a personal time travel machine! That is unheard of. And I would know because I never made one!" Washu replied in a pleading tone.

"If you go on tangents while we are there, your budget will be slashed 25% for each one," Nodoka cut back.

"Yes Lady Nodoka. So, anyway, this 'Vold and more' is likely waiting or has minions you called Death Eaters waiting to take whatever it is they need Harry there to obtain. Could it be a bio-chemical lock then?"

"A what?" Ron asked.

"It is a lock that needs one's DNA to be registered and approved to access what is behind the lock," Washu said.

"So Miss Raven, do you have any pets?" Luna cut in.

"Um, what?" Raven asked, looking at the blonde witch riding side-saddle on her Thestral.

"I was curious to what animals you might have where you came from originally," Luna replied in a tone that seemed more fitting for afternoon tea.

"Luna, focus," Harry said.

"We can talk more when we get back to your school," Raven replied.

"That would be wonderful," Luna said.

"Anyway, back to your plan Washu," Nodoka said.

"Well, the best plan right now is to just set off the trap. The minions will be around waiting for Harry to do what he needs to do and come in. Then we will come in and capture them," Washu said.

"Oh yes, deep in the Department there are anti-apparating spells that inhibit entry into the facility," Dolores chimed in.

"What?" Nodoka asked.

"Teleportation magic, my lady," Dolores said.

"Really-" Washu started. Raven shivered as she recalled Washu studying her own teleporting capabilities.

===========

Mihoshi watched as four giant women were in various states of laying down, sitting, or standing. Four robots who all looked the same were pulling tape measures out of every limb, and one from the groin as they wrapped them around the arms, legs, necks, chests, and one even measuring the fingers and toes of one furry woman. Then an image appeared and Mihoshi felt like she knew it from somewhere. A beam of light scanned Mihoshi.

"Ah, welcome," the image of Washu said. "Since you have entered this lab without permission. I will need some data on you." Another drone of the same form appeared and moved close to her.

"Wait, I don't know what's going on!" Mihoshi screamed.

=========

Nabiki ate some popcorn as she watched the machines beep and get readings. It was enjoyable watching the girls get experimented on. Nabiki was smart to stay on Nodoka's good side, so Washu's experiments on her were infrequent. When the new girl walked in, Nabiki knew she wasn't a local to this planet. One of the sensors she watched was part of a satellite network that looked for threats to the planet. It recognized the ship as a glactic police officer's ship and Nabiki started recording everything the woman did, from illegal entry of the planet, to illegal entry of the building.

Blackmail was an easy thing with this many cameras.

==========

Shampoo started to lift up the smaller woman, who put pressure on a point in Shampoo's hand. Shampoo didn't feel it like she once did, which is why the maiden brought out a taser and hit Shampoo. Shampoo fell to one knee.

"Lady Nodoka takes a dim view on girls she helps become big try to steal from our establishments," the associate said. Shampoo glared.

"Shampoo no thief. Shampoo need to find goddess!" Shampoo declared. Ryoga patted down his pants and found nothing. They were broke after all.

"Can I go look for our friend? She has the money," Ryoga said.

"Ryoga no! You get lost too easily," Shampoo replied. Not only was she scared she might not get help soon, but she could lose her husband.

"You may," the associate said.

"Have faith. I won't get lost because I am thinking of you," Ryoga said. Shampoo smiled at the sweet comment as Ryoga went out and got to the front door. He stepped out. Once there, he would write everything he could down to help find this place again.

He was not a foot in front of the door when a furious voice screamed, "Hey move!" Ryoga turned to the voice and saw a mammoth woman carrying some larger thing barreling at him. He started to dive back into the store but was too late. He was hit by the charging woman, who tumbled and dropped what she was holding. Ryoga held in a scream of pain as he turned to see the lovely Ranko now on the ground and four people he didn't know stopped. Two were mammoth size.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.title: The Plan

choices: Back to Ranko
Mihoshi at the lab
At the Department of Mysteries
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
If there is one thing that could be said about both Ranma and Ranko, it is that both possess hard heads. Even so, with the speed they had been moving, the force with which she had hit the ground had been sufficient enough to knock her back to consciousness. Her mind was a hazy mess for the first ten seconds as she slowly stood, and she was confused as to why Ryoga was looking at her in concern, or why those girls from the other dimension were there. Even more confusing was that Azula girl, who she had a bit of a mixed opinion on, was now trying to help her back up to her feet.

"What's going on?" the redhead asked as she panned her eyes across the scene.

"It will take some time to explain the whole thing," said Azula as she grabbed Ranko's hand, "but for now, I'll just say that an old friend of mine, who isn't really welcome around here anymore, decided that she wanted to take you for herself. Needless to say, your mother would be very much upset if that happened."

When Azula tried to pull her down the road, the Saotome girl slipped from her grip, and ran over to the downed boy.

"Ryoga, are you okay?" she asked, she gave him a once over as she notice he was having a hard time standing.

Her hand was comfortingly placed on his shoulder and Ryoga tried not to show how pained he was by giving her a strained smile. He nodded in affirmation, but the pigtailed girl would not be fooled by his machismo, and lifted him into her strong arms.

"Aw, that's sweet. However, there is an obsessive nutjob after us, and I would very much like to get you away from her."

*****

Mihoshi let out a shrill squeak as the human-like drone measured her most intimate areas. The analogue means which it used were far less accurate, but far more invasive than what she was used to.

"Please, mister drone, that's not a spot you should be touching!" she cried.

It was if they were programmed to do their jobs in the most suggestive and teasing way possible. The space detective was struggling to stay focused on her mission as the caressing touch of the drone moved over her body, until it touched a ticklish spot on her, and her leg struck out and hit the device.

It was from here that Mihoshi's biased luck took over, as her heel found a devastating weak spot in the drone's design, crushing a bundle of wires which in turn shorted the primary computer, freeing her. She dropped to the floor and took a few seconds to catch her breath before she turned to the other girls and slowly moved to investigate, and see if they were in any trouble.

*****

"So, what is ghee best way to deal with you wizards? Not all of us have magic to work with." Ranma's question caused the others to pause for a moment before Hermione answered.

"If you can get their wands away from them, they would be unable to cast anything. Also, most spells require direct line of sight to work."

"So, keep moving and take their sticks away before they can hocus pocus me. Got it." Ranma gave the bushy haired witch a thumbs up as he refocused on staying on his mount.

"When we get there, our group will use the optical camouflage watches to become virtually invisible to the eye," Washu explained to everyone. "We will tail you guys and keep an eye out for anything. If we do this right, we should nab them all before the night's over."

The rest of the flight over was filled with a restless silence as they hardened their resolve to fight, and prepared for the worst. Of course, there was also an awkwardness as well. Ron, who had chosen to ride with Hermione, was having some very conflicting feelings. She had yet to engage her device and her broad back filled hours vision as her robe did little to hide the rippling muscle underneath. From his spot behind her, he could see the a hint of side boob whenever she moved her thickly muscled arm. His hormone riddled teenage body was warring with the knowledge that he may be facing down people who would think nothing of killing him if it meant their plan succeeded. So he was forced to ride with a fear boner that he hoped to god his friend wouldn't notice.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.title: Ranko snaps out of it the hard way

Ranko wants to explore more shops once they are done.
Ranko is concerned about Ryoga's injuries and they return to the gym.
Back to Mihoshi's investigation.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
"Wait, Shampoo is in trouble," Ryoga said. Ranko looked at her tiny guy.

"What do you mean? Did that bitch get her too?" Ranko growled. She didn't know exactly what happened, but she suspected it involved that woman from before things went all hazy.

"Uh, I wouldn't call the worker that. She just needs to be paid for the clothes Shampoo likes," Ryoga said.

"We don't have time for-" Azula said as she saw Kodachi a block away. She looked at the establishment and smirked. "We can go in here."

"Thank you," Ranko said with some unease. What was this girl's game plan? She walked in with the mutants.

"Wow, look at this stuff," Kitty said.

"I didn't think they would have bras for these boulders," Rogue said. Kurt chuckled nervously as this was his first time in a place like this.

"Why are you so fine being in here?" Jean asked Azula as they were the last in.

"They have a decal in their window that tells me something," Azula smirked. She watched as sales attendants swarmed to the group, the women drawn in by Ranko's potent charm. Azula felt the tug, but it wasn't as bad as learning to cope with Nodoka's power. She watched as Ranko spoke with one attendant who was with a large purple-haired girl in some store merchandise. Ranko pulled out some money and paid for it and handed the unlucky boy to her. Ranko put her forehead against the other mammoth girl when the door to the establishment was ripped off.

"You foul fire-flinging former friend! How dare you-" Kodachi screamed.

"Ladies, we have a code 31 for a person already banished from the gym and other establishments," Azula said calmly to one woman behind the main counter. The woman tapped the code into a keypad below the counter. Kodachi lunged forward when Jean slowed her advance with her mind as the mutant ladies moved to fight.

"Wait, don't intervene!" one worker said as a metallic tendril shot from behind Kodachi. It wrapped around and around her body and pulled her out of the building. Ranko and the others moved to the entrance and watched as a Kodachi was being carried away by two flying drones in the shape of saucers with Washu's head on them.

"What was that?" Rogue asked.

"This place has Washu's decal in the corner. For helping provide services to the gym, Washu extends security protection," Azula said.

"We offer a 10% membership discount," one worker said.

"You no offer that to Shampoo," Shampoo noted.

"You didn't present your membership card and you tried leaving without paying," the woman replied back. Shampoo looked down.

"What will happen to her?" Jean asked. Ranko was speaking with the blue-haired boy in the background and her eyes widened.

"That's for Nodoka to decide," Azula said. She turned as Ranko moved closer to her.

"So, she drugged me and you saved me?" Ranko asked. Azula nodded once. "I want to give you my thanks and ..." Before Azula could respond, Ranko turned Azula's cheek to her and kissed it softly. Azula's heart beat quickly. She tenderly touched her cheek as Ranko went and kissed the imp-boy on the cheek for his part.

"Ahem, so, are you all members of the gym?" one worker asked.

"You could say that. I'm actually Nodoka's daughter," Ranko said. She pulled from the wallet her mother gave her an identification card. It would open some of the doors in the gym and was told it would be useful outside the gym.

"Well, we are sorry we had to escalate to injuring your friend, but-"

"I understand you gotta protect your business," Ranko said.

"Shampoo sorry for damaging name of goddess in this place," Shampoo said.

"Well, we hope you continue shopping with us," the another worker said.

"Hey, you girls need some new clothing too?" Ranko asked the X-women. "You to Azula. It's all my treat."

"I could always use a new clothing item," Azula said.

"We also have a selection for members who aren't quite as large as other women," one worker said to Jean.

"Look, we can't-" Jean said.

"You helped save me," Ranko said to the older but shorter young woman. "I owe ya." Jean nodded.

--------

"Hello," Mihoshi said. "I am Officer Mihoshi. I would like to know if any of you need help too." The boy-bots continued to swarm about the women measuring every digit and orafice.

"If-" Allura started but the robot started checking her teeth sizes.

"We are being punished for-" Ty Lee started. She started laughing as the robot measured her feet.

"We messed around with the owner's kid. Got a bit too personal," Toph said. "We are being punished."

"That isn't right. You shouldn't be tortured just for that," Mihoshi said. She reached for her blaster.

"No! If you break them, more will come and it will make things worse," Polt said.

"Nabiki, how much longer do we have?" Allura called, her mouth free.

"One, maybe two more tests," came a voice on the intercom.

"I appreciate your concern Officer, but we do not need the assistance here," Allura said. Mihoshi nodded.

"Then can you answer some questions about this place?" she asked, oblivious to the exasperated looks on the women's faces.

-------------

The team landed in front of the visitor entrance to the Ministry of Magic. Harry slid off his Threstral and was joined by Ginny. He felt good in how he ignored her large body hugging him on the ride. Her thick arms and large-

"We have a worker entrance around the corner," Dolores said. "I fear we won't be able to all enter the box here."

"Lead on," Nodoka said. The once vile woman smiled brightly. Washu started tinkering with the watch she wore before she vanished.

"Ah, that's the code," came her voice from no where. She reappeared and went through cloaking everyone including Dolores. Only the Hogwarts students remained but now all looking quite normal.

"You know, I can't wait to show Fred and George my new size," Ginny giggled.

"My parents will likely faint," Hermione said. They followed the footsteps and then a door opened before them.

"Ladies to the right, men to the left," the professor said. "Stand in the toilet bowl and flush."

"If she wasn't under that Nodoka's spell, I would think she's playing us," Ron whispered to Harry.

"She would do a lot worse than making us stand in a toilet," Harry reminded Ron.

---------

A quick flush for all of them later, and they were in the foyer to the Ministry of Magic. "This way children, don't get lost," Dolores said from her invisible spot.

"I think you should be quiet. We don't want to make someone realize the kids aren't alone," Washu said.

"She has a point," Nodoka added. Dolores nodded, though it wasn't seen.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.title: Reward

choices: At the Department of Mysteries
Mihoshi continues to investigate
Ranko and Azula try on some new underwear
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
As they infiltrated further into the Ministry of Magic the foreboding atmosphere that had slowly appeared rendered everyone silent. The only noises that could be heard was the breathing and footsteps of the Hogwarts students as they navigated the long corridors of the government building. They descended down to level 9, the floor which their quarry would most assuredly be. It was clear that Voldemort intended to use Harry to procure whatever weapon or device he so desperately wanted, and when they found it, they would find their would-be ambush.

Washu had taken the liberty of releasing several tiny spy drones once they reached their desired floor, all undetectable, and relaying everything they saw back to their creator. Even though Nodoka had asked her not to snoop too much, Washu couldn't see the harm in doing a bit of passive probing while on the look out for would-be attackers.

The reached the entrance room, a place with twelve identical doors, and even their guide was at a lose on which way to go. It would be a bit of a scavenger hunt from there on out, and it was going to take some doing to find their destination. If they were going to get where they were needed, they would have to split up and search in teams.

*****

Ranko cast her eyes on the group around her, and then back towards Azula and Ryoga. So many people had helped her that day, and let it not be said that Ranko Saotome didn't return a favor she owed.

"As a way of thanks, why don't I use some of the money mom gave me to get you a gift," Ranko proposed as she turned to Azula and the others. "Ryoga, was there some good stuff in that store you and Shampoo went into before?" The young woman was still in a bit of a daze after coming to her senses, and had decided to rely on her new friend.

Ryoga thought about the fun he had with Shampoo in their, and a mysterious smile spread across his face at the question. A smile which Ranko took to mean that there was some very good things in the store.

"Alright, I'll get you guys something from the store over here." Ranko declared innocently. She grabbed Azula by the hand and pulled her along as they entered the shop. They took a few steps in, when the redhead's facing burst out into a massive blush as she realized the kind of things that were sold there.

"Awfully bold to offer to buy me something from here so soon," Azula smirked as the revelation dawned on her companion.

*****

As they drew further into the department, the Hogwarts students and Nodoka's group split up to cover more ground. So far, they had found no signs of their expected greeters, and the department itself was a bit maze like. Even the knowledge of Umbridge was limited in regard to where anything was after they entered the DoM proper. Ranma, Raven, and Minako had all gone one way with Harry, hidden by Washu's technology.

The young Saotome kept close to Harry, the most likely target for a sneak attack by the enemy. The room they had chosen had a massive tank filled with what looked to be preserved brains, a disturbing prospect that caused them all to give a reflexive shudder. However, their did not appear to be anything that Harry had described to them from his vision, and they soon left through the door they had come from, back to the main atrium. They found the others had done the same, none of them had found what they were looking for, and Washu was smiling like the cat that ate the canary, much to Nodoka's chagrin.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.title: The search begins at the DoM

choices: Azula and Ranko share a changing room as they put on the clothes.
Harry and company spring the trap set by the Death Eaters.
One invisble team runs into some invisble Death Eaters.
Back to Mihoshi's investigation.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
"Look, time magic. That is some serious stuff," Washu said. "I need to look at their research."

"No Washu," Nodoka said. "Do you want your budget cut?" Washu bit her lip.

"Fine. Fine," Washu said in a defeated manner. Nodoka nodded and took a deep breath. She watched as Harry tried opening one door that wouldn't budge.

"Lady Nodoka, you just glowed," Akane said.

"What?" Nodoka asked as others turned to the woman.

"She is right. You had this wonderful light coming from around you," Luna said.

"What were you doing mom?" Ranma asked.

"I was just thinking of a technique your father taught me to focus my power," Nodoka said.

"Yeah, I know what you're talking about. Pops did it once and said it was really advanced stuff," Ranma said.

"Are you using magic?" Hermione asked.

"I don't think so. My husband isn't a wizard by any means," Nodoka said.

"Look, what they call magic could be another thing in our world. If you give me some time," Washu said. Nodoka held up a hand.

"Some time for you could be three months and a neighborhood-size blackout," Nodoka replied. Washu nodded but tapped a command to a drone to watch Nodoka.

"Can you get the door open?" Raven asked Harry.

"No, it is really stuck," Harry said. Raven touched her hand to the door.

"Do you sense anything?" Nodoka asked.

"Yes. There are powerful emotions behind this door. It feels like love," Raven said.

"I believe that chamber is sealed and unlockable only by the Minister of Mysteries," Umbridge offered. "It is kept sealed and any unauthorized entry would result in many alarms."

"Unlike what we have experienced so far in this place," Akane noted. How could this top secret place have such bad security?

"It's possible if this is a trap, someone helped them disable those measures," Ginny said.

"There was a man who was a Death Eater and was a Ministry spy, Rockwood I believe," Dolores offered.

"He escaped in that breakout too," Neville said darkly.

"If we can't open this one, we should try another door," Hermione said. "Let's all go together this time." Harry nodded and the group recloaked. He went to the next door.

The door opened to a long corridor. There were shelves upon shelves leading down the path. On the nearest shelf were crystal orbs with mist inside of them and ornate writing on a gold band on the equator.

"This is the room. This is where Sirius is," Harry said with excitement. He smiled as they walked down the corridor to reach the numbers he needed.

"What are in these orbs?" Hermione wondered as she paused to giggle.

"Hermione, what's so funny?" Ron asked.

"I was just thinking how with my new height, I can reach the top bookshelves really easily," Hermione said.

"You would think of that," Ron said in a warm way.

"The shelves go for about twenty feet before a break allowing people to move between rows without having to come all the way back here," Washu reported from her drones.

"See any enemies?" Nodoka asked.

"Nope, but then I don't know what frequency any cloaking magic would work under," Washu said. Nodoka nodded.

The group made it to the corridor from Harry's false vision. The Hogwarts students went down it and were trailed by Raven and Ranma. Akane, Minako, and Washu went down the row after this one, and Nodoka and Dolores went down the prior one. If there was a trap, they could find more people hiding around the spot the area Harry was to take them.

------------

"Oh yeah," Ranko said nervously.

"Is this your first time being in this type of store?" one clerk asked. Ranko nodded.

"I never had the chance traveling with pops," Ranko said.

"Well, let's get your measurements," she said. She pulled out the extra long tape measure for the gym users. Kitty and Rogue joined Ranko in getting measured. It was a quick, efficient, and professional experience.

"Miss, do you want to get another set of lingerie?" the woman who stopped Shampoo before asked.

"Shampoo want another one, but will wait to earn money," Shampoo replied.

"Look at this material," Jean said as she touched the inside of one bra meant for a woman of Ranko's size. Kitty pulled it up to her chest.

"And I will still need help putting this on," Kitty said.

"You might need a strong pair of hands too," a clerk said. "They are designed for women of significant strength and to hold together for active movements."

"Do you have any strapless ones?" Rogue asked.

Ranko looked at her measurements on this sheet of paper, and moved to one design of bras. Her fingers danced over the selection when she spotted a beautiful red colored one. She started pulling on it when she noticed another hand on the same one. She turned to see Azula wanting the same one.

"You like red too?" Ranko asked. She felt awkward in this spot.

"It's part of my heritage," Azula replied, not wanting to be too cutting in her remarks. Ranko was offering to buy her something.

"We do have more of that one in your sizes," a clerk said, fearing a confrontation might happen.

"Then I shall need one to try on," Azula said, letting go of the clothing item.

Shampoo watched Azula carefully as Ryoga sat next to her, still wincing a little from being hit.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.title: At the Department of Mysteries

choices: Azula and Ranko
The battle in the DoM
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
Once the clerk had retrieved another set of the red undergarments, Azula and Ranko went over to the changing rooms only to find all but one occupied by the others. The redhead looked around nervously, unsure of how what to do.

"Come on, it's not like either of us have anything to be ashamed of." Azula declared as she tugged the girl she had saved into the change room.

The intimate atmosphere of the changing area made it all the more awkward for Ranko as she watched the fiery girl remove her clothing without hesitation. Azula had not been lying when she said that she had nothing to be ashamed of. Her skin was an unblemished porcelain white, with a supple softness that came from special care. Beneath it was rippling muscles that bore a strength beyond what normal humans could hope to have. The ease of which she moved despite her bulk was on par with a highly skilled martial artist, a grace which came from uncountable hours of training.

Ranko could feel a bit of drool form at the corners of her mouth as the fire bender turned around and exposed her backside. Her glutes were shapely and firm, as if carved out of marble by a master artisan. The two beautiful orbs looked as if they could crack walnuts between them, a thought that caused a mixture of arousal and amusement to swirl about in Ranko's mind.

In her corner of the room, Azula was experiencing much of the same thing. She cast her golden eyes over the thickly muscled body of the redhead and absorbed every little detail she could. Oh yes, that was a physique that she could stare at all day. As the two changed into their respective lingerie, the Fire Nation royal watched closely as the panties slipped between the round buttocks of the girl. Her pillar-like legs twitched slightly in the chilled air of the store as it licked at the exposed skin, a sight which caused Azula to bite her lower lip hungrily. Ranko's thighs were wider than the torso of most men, and could outmatch most beasts of burden in power. It was truly a sight that she would happily burn into her memory forever.

*****

Harry led his friends and new allies towards the one row that had been in his vision, the exact spot he had seen Voldemort torturing Sirius. Only, there was no one there when they arrived, or even a sign that any sort of struggle had taken place. However, there was one thing that did catch his attention, something he had not expected. Out of the many murky orbs that rested on the shelving unit, there sat one, on a cushion like all the others, but the label beside it told the teenage wizard that this ball held the answers as to why they had come. Both his name and the Dark Lord's were present in the spidery text, something he pointed out to everyone else with him.

"Why is my name on this?" he asked to no one in particular as he reached a out to touch it. His hand grasped the dusty sphere and lifted it off its perch, looking in wonder at what this meant.

"Well done, Potter," came a voice from out behind them. "Now be a good boy and hand the prophecy to me."

The snide wording and arrogant tone, it was a voice that could only belong to someone of the Malfoy family. Lucius Malfoy, his wand up and at the ready, gave the gathered students a sinister grin, so sure of his advantage. Behind him stood multitude of other Death Eaters, each with the same expression as the platinum blond pure blood who had alerted the Hogwarts group to their presence.

While the smarmy bastard began to explain how they had fooled Harry into coming there, Nodoka's group began to edge their way slowly closer. The light bending camouflage provided by Washu's invention had given them a chance to turn the ambush in their favor, as long as they didn't alert the villains to their presence before they were ready. Raven had raised her hands, ready to begin throwing her powers around when the signal was given, and Minako did the same. As for Nodoka and Ranma, their hands had balled up into fists that would sent the unlucky people that were hit by them flying through the air. They just had to get a tiny bit closer, and they could strike.

*****

Mihoshi had decided to stay until she met with the one behind all the amazing machines that permeated the building. From what she could gather from the girls she had met, and it was quite a helpful amount, the most likely reason for the energy fluctuations that had brought her to the planet was a resident who was away on a trip at the moment. Someone by the name of Washu if they were to be believed. Although it didn't seem like she was a bad person from what she had been told, it was still her duty as a first class detective to follow this lead to the end.

"Thank you for your cooperation," Mihoshi said as she tucked her notepad away and bowed in gratitude.

The four girls were unable to answer, their brains now addled by the combination of Washu's machinations and just dealing with the ditzy detective. They would likely be out of it for the next hour or two, which was probably for the best, and thankfully the testing equipment had finally given it a rest.
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.title: Things heat up in the changing room, and the DoM

choices: Stay with clothes shop group.

1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
"Yeah, his mother was a witch but his dad was a muggle — or has he been telling you lot he's pureblood?"" Harry cut in. This earned a snarl from one crazy looking woman. As Ranma observed, he realized she was the only woman in this group. The young man named Neville was pulsing with fury once she came into view.

"You dare speak his name?" Bellatrix screeched. "You filthy half-blood!"

---

"Oh, they are racial purists. Of course they are. I hate them most," Washu muttered softly as she moved behind the group of Death Eaters.

-----

Bellatrix lifted up her wand as a chant was heard from no where. "Azaroth! Matrion! Zinthos!" the whisper came out. Bellatrix watched as darkness envoloped her wand and snatched it away. The Death Eaters were shocked as the wand flew into Hermione's hand.

"Give that back mudblood!" Bellatrix screamed before Hermione snapped it.

"You evil people will pay for what you have done," Hermione said, stepping forward. Bellatrix drew a knife and thrusted it at Hermione. Hermione caught Bellatrix by the wrist and held her with ease.

While the Death Eaters were distracted by the sight before them, the ones on the back of the group turned to see a woman tower over them. Her long brown hair was in a tight bun.

"Giants!" one man cried out before being slammed hard. The sounds of breaking bones was heard with Nodoka's punch.

"Wonderful mistress!" Dolores cheered. Chaos befell the Death Eaters as Hermione snapped Bellatrix's wrist, but was hit by a stunning spell and released her. Raven tried snatching more wands but couldn't focus in the chaos. The outnumbered and overpowered Death Eaters, unsure of where these titans of feminine muscle came from tried to escape by some of the side routes. Bellatrix picked up the wand of a fallen comrade and retreated like the rest of them.

"Akane, head them off. They are going to the entrance we came in at," Washu said. Akane nodded and charged like a bull down the path. She came out of the row in time to slam into the smarmy bastard man who first taunted Harry. His smaller body flew and hit the stone wall. Bellatrix and another two Death Eaters looked on at Akane in fear as she turned to them. They ran away, with Bellatrix firing more stunning spells at Akane. They struck but weren't completely disabling.

Harry and Ranma got out of the fray with Neville as they pursued Bellatrix and her allies.

They went though one door and found themselves in a large square room. There was an unassuming arch with a fluttering cloth. It unnerved Ranma as he looked at it from the distance. His attention turned to the fleeing Death Eaters as they went to another door. He saw two there and gasped as he jumped to the side, taking Harry to the floor as Neville was hit from behind with a stunning spell. The confident Death Eater smiled from his hiding spot behind the door when Nodoka and Ginny came through. The man blasted another stunning spell at Nodoka, but her aura flared up, deflecting it.

"I didn't know your mother could do that," Harry said as they continued pursuit.

"Neither did I," Ranma said when two of the other entrances opened. "Great. They have friends." In through the doors ran other adults, but Harry smiled.

"It's the Order. They're friends," Harry explained. Bellatrix screamed as she started dueling one of the men with long black hair. A tall man with shabby clothes rushed to Harry's side while a crippled man was handing the remaining Death Eater his ass. Nodoka looked at the smaller man as he stared at Nodoka.

"Harry, who is this?" Lupin asked cautiously.

"Professor, this is Nodoka and her son Ranma. They're friends we met tonight," Harry said. Two more remaining Death Eaters arrived, injured but fighting and started attacking the other newcomers.

"Well, I wish we could have met under better times," Lupin said cordially. He watched as from one door a small flying thing flew in. He blasted it down with a spell. Ranma and Nodoka winched as they heard Washu yell about a drone being taken out.

"Likewise," Nodoka said. She turned and watched as the crazed Bellatrix fire spell after spell on her opponent. One struck and he fell close to the archway. His head clipped the side and he fell just out of it. Bellatrix screamed in joy as she ran through the chaos.

"Sirius!" Harry screamed as he bolted after Bellatrix. Ranma gave chase as well.

"Ranma!" "Harry!" came the voices of Nodoka and Lupin. The boys didn't hear them as they pursued Bellatrix.

-----------

Shampoo saw her husband in pain and lifted him to her lap. He was surprised but relaxed as she started rubbing his back with her expansive hand.

"Husband, should we tell Ranko about your curse?" Shampoo whispered.

"Um, I don't want to. It's a bit of a shock after all," Ryoga said. Shampoo nodded. She didn't want to deceive Ranko, but she loved Ryoga and wanted to respect his opinion on this matter.

Ryoga closed his eyes and leaned back, his head resting against Shampoo's breasts. Shampoo smiled at the sight of her sleeping beloved.

With Ranko's group
1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
Harry and Ranma sprinted through the winding hallways of the ministry, hot on the tail of the female Death Eater that tried to evade them. With her wrist broken she could not properly use her wand, and struggled to fire spells from her off hand to delay her pursuers. The two teenagers were tenacious as hounds, with Ranma being skilled in dodging and evading incoming spells while keeping track of the target. The gave chase until they arrived back in the main atrium, the Fountain of Magical Brethren coming into view when Ranma made his move.

During the chaos in the Department of Mysteries, Ranma had managed to tuck away some of the debris and pulled a chunk of stone masonry from his pants. He took careful aim, and threw it hard. It sped forth like a missile, impacting the ground right where Bellatrix's next step would have been, shattering the tile and sending the witch sprawling across the floor, her back slamming against the hard base of the water fixture. Her wand was sent hurtling through the air and landed several feet away from her.

"Give it up, lady! Your pinned down and your magic stick is gone." Ranma demanded as he slowly approached the downed woman, his guard ready to receive any surprise attacks from her.

"He's right! Just surrender and cooperate," Harry added, a tinge of barely contained anger in his voice. "It's over. Voldemort has obviously abandoned you..."

"I wouldn't be so sure, Potter," came a chilling voice from the shadows. The sound of it caused Harry to become fixed in place as his mind immediately confirmed the voice's owner. A stream of magic blasted the floor in front of them, giving them barely enough time to react as Harry put up a shielding spell and Ranma dodged the shrapnel.

Where the destructive magic had struck now stood the wight like form of Voldemort, his snake like face bearing a superior sneer that caused the two boys to shiver uncomfortably. His wand pointed at them, ready to unleash any number of unholy magics upon them.

"Is this that Voldewhatsit guy?" Ranma asked his new friend in a whisper, his eyes never leaving the snake-like humanoid in front of him.

"Voldemort, yes. We need to do something fast, because he isn't going to give us a chance to plan."

Harry's words proved true, as Dark Lord sent a devastating spell at them while Harry's head was turned. His wand pointed towards the ground and released a powerful Bombara Maxima at the ground, intending to obliterate the two in one fell swoop.

Ranma noticed the delay in Harry's reaction, and grabbed the wizard boy by the harm before thrusting him back across the room. In the short moment before the spell detonated, he raised his arms before him, and flared his aura like he had seen his mother do, making it visible to all present as it formed around him. As the blast hit him, he tensed his body and held the ki shell surrounding him for as long as he could, the unfamiliar move draining his reserves as he fought off what felt like dynamite detonating in his face.

Harry, still startled by the sudden attack, saw Bellatrix go for her wand, and unleashed a stunner at her, sending her back to the ground, rendered still by the spell.

When it finally died down, the floor was in shambles, and Ranma had exhausted his ki reserves, falling to his knee. Everything hurt, as he had been unable to completely nullify the shock of the blast, but he would not allow himself to lose consciousness. He knew that if he did so here, death was all but assured. He could barely keep his arms up to guard, and he only had one good jump left in him before his legs collapsed beneath him.

"You made a foolish choice, boy. But I won't let you suffer too long for it." The evil wizard lifted his wand for the final blow on Ranma when the remnants of one of the statues landed before him to take the blow.

"I think, Tom, that is far enough," said a gentle, yet strong voice. Ranma turned his eyes and caught sight of a tall, bearded figure who, if he remembered the description he had heard on the flight over was correct, was probably the man called Dumbledore. If what Harry had told him was true, this was a man that could handle the battle from here.

What came next was a battle between the most skilled magic users of the age, as spells, counterspells, curses, and jinxes were rapidly volleyed by the two masterful magic users. The atrium was rendered a disaster zone, as the fountain was reduced to rubble, and parts were burnt by fire, or drenched in water. It would have continued further if not for the timely arrival of those who worked in the building.

"We will finish this later," Voldemort said as he apparated away, along with some, but not all of the Death Eaters who had been there.

Ranma, now sure the battle was over, allowed himself to rest, remaining awake just long enough to see a pair of thickly muscled, pale arms wrap around him, lifting him from the ground.

*****

Once the four girls were released from their testing, at least for the time being, Mihoshi continued her questions.

"So, what relation do you have with the people who own this building?"

The four girls began to spill their guts, as the odd, yet very effective interrogation techniques of the detective pressed them for every little bit of information. This continued until they came upon the subject of Ranma. The way each of the quartet described him perked Mihoshi's interest. She urged them for more detail, as her curiosity began to flare.

The way they spoke of the young man, he seemed to be a rambunctious yet honorable person, and he became another reason for the chocolate skinned blonde to stay put.

1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
Ranma woke slowly as he felt a familiar warmth and firmness beneath him. He looked up to see the powerful body of Akane Tendo above him. Standing by was Minako. The other adults Harry said they were allies were talking with the Hogwarts girls, who each one stood taller than the adults.

His mother was standing with Raven, Washu, and Umbridge talking to Dumbledore and a man Ranma's father would see as a fool to be tricked easily. The insane woman who Harry and he caught was bound by Raven's magic inside a special circle. Dumbledore picked up some rubble and held his wand at it. Harry approached, touched it and vanished,

"Wow. Where did he go?" Ranma muttered.

"Oh Ranma, you're awake," Akane said with concern.

"Yeah, but I hurt like hell," Ranma replied.

"Don't move. Raven said you overexerted your spiritual strength," Minako said. "Rest and recovery is what you need right now."

Ranma grunted. He wanted to protest but he hurt too much to do so. "What's happening?"

"That's what your mom and the old man are talking about," Akane said. Ranma looked back and now Dumbledore was talking privately with Nodoka as Umbridge talked with the fool. The fool looked like he was going to piss and shit himself.

"I normally don't like getting involved in wars in other realms, but if your school ever needs an evacuation place, or some students want to visit on break for fun, I will have Washu set up a communication rig with your school," Nodoka said.

"That would be most appreciative," Dumbledore said. "It would seem you helped save many lives tonight from a mistake of my own making." He bowed his head to the towering Nodoka. "You have my thanks."

"I will also take that Bellatrix. Based on what Dolores said, your prison system isn't adequate enough to hold her," Nodoka said.

"Will you do to her what you did to Dolores?" Dumbledore asked.

"Not at the moment. But any information she might provide we will send to you," Nodoka said. The old wizard looked at the towering woman.

"I would be cautious. Bellatrix doesn't love, but gets fiercely possessive of things," Dumbledore said.

"With my aura, I have had my fair share of such people becoming attached to me," Nodoka said. "I can respect that warning." They reached Ranm'as spot as another man appeared.

A man with shaggy hair and unkempt appearance reached down and shook the weary Ranma's hand. "I understand you saved my godson's life. Thank you," he said warmly.

"Thanks," Ranma said, feeling a warmth from the words. Nodoka lifted her watch to her hand.

"Nabiki, are you ready? We are bringing back Ranma, three maidens, myself, and one prisoner," Nodoka stated.

"Yeah. I got the parameters set in. And by the way, there is a law enforcement officer from the Galactic Police Force looking to ask questions," Nabiki replied. Nodoka bit her lip.

"Aunty, there's a Galactic Police?" Akane asked.

"Yes, but I never encountered them personally. Well, let's see what's going on," Nodoka said.

"I'll be back in a few hours once we get the rest of Dolores' things for transport," Washu communicated over the watch.

A blue-black portal opened up and Ranma felt Akane shift him and carry him as though he were a baby.

"When we imprison her, I should be able to help you out," Raven said as she walked over. The bound Bellatrix continued to fight in vain. Ranma nodded. He watched as his mother, Raven, and Bellatrix went in first.

-------------

Mihoshi was impressed by these women. Though they were just stressed out by that strange testing, they were each ready to fight as each one carried a stun gun. When told they would be receiving a prisoner from another reality, she got her own weapon ready. The grip net was designed to ensnare any foe and drag them to the police officer.

The young woman working the computer signaled to the maidens to be ready as the portal opened. Mihoshi wasn't surprised when two more mammoth women walked through, but one was spectacularly beautiful. The pale mammoth one shook her head a little and the bound woman lifted her hands up, causing a wave of energy. It disabled her bindings and she fell to the ground. The other women fired at her as Mihoshi shot her net.

Mihoshi missed the woman, who was struck by the others in the room. No, Mihoshi hit the mammoth beauty. The net wrapped around her torso but the sheer mass and Mihoshi not having tethered herself to anything, meant she wasn't dragging the woman to her, but she was now flying towards the woman.

Mihoshi's lips struck Nodoka's as a powerful warmth filled her.

No one noticed the arrival of the second group of women and a comparatively small man.

---------

Ranko was excited when Nabiki rang the store to pass on the message her mom and brother were coming back. She bought the red outfit she tried on with Azula and she walked out of the store. Shampoo was on her right side and Azula was on the left. The X-women and Kurt followed as well. Their stomachs were stating they needed food and so were returning to the gym first to see what food would be served there.

1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
Raven let cut loose with her powers, binding the attempted escapee with her usual dark aura, rendering the prisoner motionless and unable to speak. She would have to keep Bellatrix like this until they could safely deposit her in the holding area Washu had suggested.

Their lips were pressed intensely against each other, and with the sudden appearance of Mihoshi, the Saotome matriarch was too stunned to pull away. If it hadn't been for the advanced technology that made up her uniform, the space detective would have been completely nude before all of those people.

Mihoshi was finally pushed away, but she had maintained lip contact long enough to increase her muscle size significantly. Her once thin, yet toned arms now were thickly muscled, with enough strength to easily lift a car over her head.

"Oh my! This is a surprise!" Mihoshi stated, the transformation seeming to have little effect on her. "But where are my manners. Good day, ma'am. My name is Mihoshi Kuramitsu, and I'm an officer for the Galaxy Police. I am here to investigate some very strange energy readings that I discovered were coming from this building. If you would be so kind as to lend your cooperation, I would greatly appreciate it."

Nodoka stood in silence for a moment, as the ditzy woman in front of her seemed to shake off her sudden physical change effortlessly, and showed no hint of being charmed.

"Akane, Raven. After you get our prisoner into her cell, I want you to escort Ranma to the rest area. I will be dealing with our new arrival here." Nodoka could already feel a headache coming on as she pinched her nose.

*****

Kodachi, after being thrown out of the area surrounding the gym, made her way to an abandoned storage warehouse on the edge of the town. Her family owned the run down building, and as it wasn't currently being used for anything, she had been allowed to use it for her own nefarious purposes. Her anger was raging inside, but she tried to keep herself composed until she entered her destination.

After the door slammed closed behind her, the furious Kuno woman stomped over to an intricately designed mahogany desk. She leaned against the sturdy wooden frame, the furniture creaked as the weight settled upon it. The veins on her powerful arms throbbed wrathfully as she looked out towards the unseen occupants of the room.

"Where is the one who was in charge of the information gathering for today's plan?" Kodachi demanded as a group of people appeared before her desk, all of them trembling before her.

A shivering slip of a man in his mid-twenties stepped forward from the collective. "That would be me, m...miss," he stuttered out. "I'm sure we collected all relevant information you should have needed to capture one Nabiki Tendo."

Kodachi's thickly muscled fingers gripped him by the collar and lifted him off the ground. His legs kicked at the air, struggling to breath as the fabric of his shirt cinched around his throat.

"Then why did you fail to mention that there was another like Nodoka Saotome? Or would you care to explain how you missed the additional girls that allowed her to escape? Because of your failure, I missed out on the chance to take Nabiki Tendo's strength for my own!"

"I am sorry, miss!" he choked out. "That must have happened within the last few days. Please forgive me!"

Kodachi let the man fall to his knees and her cold eyes stared down harshly at his quivering form.

"There is no room for incompetence in my plans. I was this close to draining that mercenary woman's strength for my own, and because of this oversight I lost my chance!" Kodachi said as she leaned back down, her strong muscles gearing up to do something terrible to the bungling fool before her.

*****

The holding area Washu had recommended for their magical prisoner was quite a piece of work. Originally it was a sub-space area she had created for her more volatile experiments (the ones that could leave a crater the size of downtown Tokyo if something went wrong) and was little more than an empty space with only a small living area. A bed and bathroom were provided, as well as some food from storage, but there was little else for the wicked witch to use beyond that.

Raven had taken the liberty to tranquilize Bellatrix after she had been recaptured, and, after sending her through the gate to her prison, locked it down so the entrance could only be opened on their end. Once that was done, she, along with Akane, continued on to the recovery area.

Halfway there, the trio, with an exhausted Ranma now asleep in Akane's arms, ran into one of their comrades.

"A happy welcome home to you, my friends!" Starfire called happily as her bulky form floated before them. The alien heroine's excitement was infectious and quickly lightened the two girls' mood. "How was your trip across dimensions?"

"Let's just say it was an eventful one, Star. Right now, though, we need to get Ranma to the recovery room so he can get some rest," Raven answered. Starfire picked up on the frustration in her voice and did not pursue the question further, they could talk of that later. For now, it seemed as if her friends were in need of some relaxation.

"Than allow me to escort you there, friends!" Starfire declared as she floated over and landed at their side. Calmly, the three of them continued on their way, the young man still sleeping in Akane's cradling arms.

"Once we've got him settled into a proper bed, I'm going to go check in with my sisters, I hope you two will be okay watching him," Akane said quietly so as not to wake her passenger.

"It would be a pleasure, Akane!" Starfire answered in an excited whisper.

1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
This building was sure impressive, Mihoshi thought as they walked from the lab to the main offices of the owner. Many doors were sliders and had bio-metric features. It was certainly more advanced than the other places on this planet. Nodoka walked into the office and sat in a lounge chair meant for her mammoth weight. Mihoshi sat across from her, notepad at the ready to collect more information. Nodoka turned on a recording device in secret so Washu could watch this later.

Galactic Police. Nodoka remembered Washu mentioned them once and were a reason the woman decided to travel to other dimensions rather than off-world. She said she didn't want undo attention from some busybody bureaucrats who got scared by a few things.

After a few moments of silence, Nodoka spoke first. "Why are you looking into this energy that might or might not be coming from my building?"

Mihoshi smiled. "I was doing a routine survey of this world when I picked up some strange energy readings. The means to create this energy isn't capable with what your planet currently has available, or so originally thought," Mihoshi said.

"What do you mean?" Nodoka asked, guessing the cloak shield needed adjustments or fixing if this is why Mihoshi is here.

"The technology I found here is amazing. Well beyond what Earth is documented for. I would say even on par if not better than my people's," Mihoshi said.

"I just have a smart tinkerer who is a bit insane but otherwise good at finding things the other people haven't noticed. It is a bit magic too," Nodoka said. Washu would balk at her tech being called "magic" but Nodoka didn't want to get into the details of what Washu could do.

"Well, you have matter-energy transport by portals. That is well beyond anything we have," Mihoshi said. "When I file my report, there could be other inquiries made and offers for the technology." That didn't sit well with the matriarch. She considered her options.

"I think you are getting ahead of yourself there," Nodoka replied. She smiled at Mihoshi, who wasn't affected by it at all. This meant either she was resistant to the charm or her body was still recovering from Dolores and the transport.

"What do you mean?"

"You need to follow certain rules, correct? Due process and such?"

"Of course. I am sworn to uphold the laws of even the lands I visit," Mihoshi said.

"Now, you invaded my home. Do you have a warrant of any sort?"

"Um, no," Mihoshi said.

"No," Nodoka said, tapping a pad by her chair. A screen lowered and security footage showed Mihoshi breaking into the private area of the gym. "So, you illegally entered my home, my place of business, interrogated people without advising them of their rights, and you discharged your weapon and hit a civilian."

"Um, when you put it like that . . ." Her voice was weak now and filled with uncertainty. Mihoshi felt very small compared to this woman. Nodoka rose up to her feet and stared at the Mihoshi and she felt even smaller.

"I mean it very much like that," Nodoka said. "You conducted an illegal search. All information from that is not usable. Until my legal representative gets back, I ask you leave the private area and stay in the confines of the public gym. We will be discussing if your conduct needs to be reported to your superiors."

"Yes ma'am," Mihoshi said.

"Now, follow me as I escort you to that area," Nodoka said. Mihoshi nodded.

---------

Washu finished up her duties in this magical world. Dolores had tendered her resignations to both Hogwarts and the Ministry, gathered her things from her local London home, and then they arrived outside the gates of the school by some magical means called disapparating. She held onto the slave's hand and it was quite disorienting.

Most of her things she was bringing along were sentimental, which Washu was fine with. She had plenty of space to give Dolores. She could fit all of Tokyo inside the gym with what she did to the place.

A small man with hate-filled eyes was waiting at the gates. "Professor," the man said, looking at the disguised Umbridge. He noticed the watch on her wrist which wasn't there ever before.

"Mr. Filch, I believe the Headmaster alerted you to my arrival. I have tendered my resignation and am here to gather my things," Dolores said. Washu watched as the man nodded and opened the gates. Tears were in his eyes.
"You . . . You were one of the best teachers this place ever had," the man said softly.

"My dear Argus, my actions were horrible and I should have been stopped," Dolores said sweetly. "My new employer has educated me to this fact." Filch looked shocked at this admission, not noticing Washu bringing out a scanner. While Dolores was getting her things, a few more scans and things to study wouldn't hurt. Besides, Nodoka would never find out.

She started with this older man. The readings were strange. Other adult male wizards she scanned at the Ministry had different flows of magic. This man's was muted by some means.

1553322222111222211212121111212121212111.content:
Once more in sleeps loving embrace, Ranma's mind wandered yet again his dream world. He laid upon a plush mattress with his naked body exposed to the world, and surrounded by muscular silhouettes. The figures stood still for a moment, hushed voices murmuring among themselves while he tried to discern who they were. Eventually, the beings began to move closer, their features becoming more defined the closer they got.

One of them finally came fully into view, and he saw something quite odd. Her face was stark white with the exception of her lips, which were painted with a black lipstick. She wore a jester's cap on her head and a domino mask around her eyes. It should have looked ridiculous, but instead it only served to increase her allure. Her powerful arms bulged as she placed her hands on her head provocatively, her biceps swelled until they were bigger than his two legs combined.

"I hope you're ready to get freaky, puddin'," the muscular beauty declared as she got in close enough so her breasts hung just in front of his nose. The striations on her massive pectorals deepened as she flexed them. making the orbs dance hypnotically. "Because us bad girls are going to ride your cute little ass until your pelvis is dust."

The powerful fingers on her hand grasped his sack in a tender grip, playfully massaging his balls with a smile.

*****

Ranma moaned as Akane placed his sleeping form onto a bed. A blanket was draped over him to keep him and a pillow slipped beneath his head, and, once she was sure that he was comfortable, the Tendo girl excused herself to go meet her sisters.

"I'm gonna go to meet with my sisters, seems like something interesting happened while we were gone."

Now alone, Raven and Starfire sat themselves in some cushy chairs that were bedside. The half-demoness pulled a book from her cloak and began to read.

*****

The gym's proprietress led the intrusive detective along by the hand, finding it necessary to keep the ditz from going off to cause trouble. "Oh, she can lift the log we fight on!" Shampoo called. Her voice sounded giddy as a child. Genma gulped and knew time was of the essence.

"Um, I was thinking of a great boulder we passed on the way in," Ranma said as she heard the translation. "Such a heavy stone not only hefted by these arms, but crushed to dust by my punches with the least effort!" The women nodded and seemed eager. "Let's . . . go . . . get it, panda." She said the last through clenched teeth.

"Right. Don't move, we'll be right back," Genma signed with a smile. She waded through the crowd with her father after the translation was given. Genma didn't dare look back at the crowd, he didn't want confirmation that tiny old woman was watching them like hawks.

As they walked through the gate, they weren't six feet from it before they bolted down the road. Ranma was still amazed. Before when chasing her pops, she was too angry to notice how swiftly she could move despite the huge mass she carried on this body. Her stamina was incredible as she felt herself get into stride and barely changed her breathing habit. She glanced at her father, his panda body moving at pace with her.

----------

Cologne and Shampoo had trailed the pair to the edge of the town and watched them bolt. Shampoo gritted her teeth. "My goddess! She cannot leave us!" Cologne looked at Shampoo.

She didn't know how to describe it, but there was some pull about that redhead. Something was drawing her kin and fellow Amazons to admire that stranger. As she thought back over the past, what was it, ten minutes since that stranger walked into town, even she, a woman trained in various magical and martial arts, had been gently seduced by her power.

The redhead named Ranma had to be studied and if possible brought back here. She looked at the infuriated Shampoo, chomping at the bit to go after the pair. "Go child. Bring her back," Cologne ordered. Shampoo nodded and rushed after the pair. She chuckled at their easy trail. Strong as her goddess was, her wonderful feet left large impressions in the soft ground
155332222212221.title: Escaping the Tried and True Way

choices: Genma and Ranma's hike through China
Ranma arrives at the Tendos'
1553322222122211.content:
If there was one ability of Genma's that rivaled his martial skill, it was his skill at escape. As soon as they were outside of the village border, he led Ranma into the shadows of the surrounding forest.

Run faster boy! We need to get out of here as soon as possible! Genma signed to his progeny as his chubby panda body moved like lightning across the terrain. They cleared a distance of miles in short order before the transformed panda let them stop at the edge of a river. It was there that the older Saotome removed a thermos from somewhere despite having no pockets, and waded into the water, and Ranma followed in after him.

The riverbed was shallow, but it would do to cover their tracks. After another kilometer long run, the two stepped onto a rocky shore, and dumped the contents of the thermos over their heads, and shifted back to their original bodies.

"That should throw her off our trail for now," Genma said with a sigh.

"What happened back there, pop? Why were they all so....needy?"

"Couldn't tell you, boy. We'd better get going though, I've had my fill of Chinese weirdness to last me a lifetime. Besides, I thinks it's time to head home to Japan anyway."

Ranma couldn't argue with his father on that. In the short time they had been in the mainland, he had seen some odd stuff, but nothing could compare to the last few days of insanity. Home sounded like an excellent idea.

*****

The amazon search party had tracked the two outsiders all the way to the riverside, where they crossed into the water, but left no evidence of having left it in either direction. It had been nearly a day since the mysterious girl with muscles that were now the ambition of the whole village had ran from them, and they could not find any clue as to her whereabouts.

"It doesn't make any sense," Shampoo said in her native tongue as she and her amazon sisters scoured the ground and river for any sign of their quarry. "How did she and the fat panda just disappear without a trace."

The frustration built inside her as she never had this much trouble tracking down anything or anyone before, except for, perhaps, her great-grandmother, and every second meant the woman she aspired to emulate grew further away.

"Do not worry, child," came the grizzled voice of her ancient grandmother, "no one has managed to avoid one of our hunting teams for long. Rest assured, we will find her in time. Besides, I think you are overlooking one key detail on this hunt, and that is who was with those two when they arrived."

Shampoo answered with a small, hopeful smile, and returned to her search with a renewed vigor.
1553322222122211.title: They escape, but for how long?

choices: Nabiki went in order to steer this guy to one of her sisters.
Akane went and fell back in shock at the sight of Ranma.
15533222221222112.content:
It took about two weeks to arrive at the Tendo household. In that time, Ranma figured somethings out about her new body. One was it was as strong as it looked. She helped save a man's life when he was trapped in an upside-down car accident in Beijing by flipping the car over with ease. Second, her body seemed impervious to pain or minor wounds. Because of hose much damage he put into his shoes when he first transformed, along with his stretched clothes, he opeted to go barefoot when walking in female form. It was mildly disgusting but he didn't suffer any pain from walking on hard stone. And lastly, and perhaps most importantly, women were drawn to it more than men. Thankfully no response was as strong as those from that village, but he could tell when he was in female form, pretty much every woman and girl was looking at him. It resulted in them carrying around a few thermoses of hot water to change him back to keep from getting too many crowds after them. More than once, he was certain he spotted that purple-haired girl. She glared about, asking people who had seen his other form, but Ranma and Genma would slip away quickly when she was found.

Genma walked with Ranma down the empty street in Nerima.The hot summer sun beat down on them after a quick summer shower doused them with cold water. As a result, Genma walked in Ranma's shadow to get some relief. "You really think your friend can help me control this freaky power?" Ranma asked her pops.

"Tendo is a good man. It's probably our best option," the sign said. Genma watched as Ranma nodded and trudged along the road. It was a lie. Tendo-san never met Nodoka, didn't really know or believe Genma when he when he told her the muscular woman had some cult about her. But it seemed like a better excuse to tell Ranma than here would be a girl he was meant to marry. The house was in sight.

-----------

Akane punched at the air, keeping her form exact and controlled. Her body was covered in a light sweat. The only other noise besides her steps on the floor was some heavy grunting. "Hey" came a voice. Akane turned and looked at her elder sister. The blue-haired girl looked at her light-brown haired sister. "I want to go heavier after this warm up. Can you spot me?"

"Sure Nabiki," Akane said with a smile. It was weird two years ago when she went to that two-week business camp on a college campus for young people who were interested in going into business when they graduated high school. They would meet with various entrepreneurs and business owners from all over Tokyo. They would gain connections and learn about running businesses. She paid for it herself and the lithe young maiden came back looking like she had taken up martial arts. Using some more of her own money (actually blackmail and money from selling photos) she helped their father cover some weightlifting equipment and turned part of the dojo into a weight section.

As Akane would regularly help Nabiki by spotting her, it meant Akane had a front row seat to watching her sister go from a mildly athletic body to a thick muscular body. Akane didn't use the weights too much for buffing out like Nabiki, instead she used them for conditioning her body. She did enjoy the company and it gave them a nice place to bond. Some sisters did each other's make-up and hair. They did fitness. This morning, like so many others, they did a good jog together.
