"So, will you compete finally?" Akane asked as she loaded up each side with fifteen pounds.

"I think so. I finally have a body that can win," Nabiki said before she lifted the weights off the holder.

"Ladies," came a third voice. Nabiki grunted and Akane helped her reset. Kasumi wouldn't interrupt without a good reason. "We have visitors coming. Father wants to meet with us." Nabiki growled but didn't openly object. She slid off the bench and walked with Akane out of the dojo.

-----

"What?" Akane yelled as her father dropped the bombshell.

"Father, could you have told us sooner?" Kasumi asked.

Nabiki said nothing, but inwardly was happy. She didn't have the body of a typical Japanese woman. She was probably the one least likely to be picked. He would want someone thin and kind. Kasumi could be that and Akane could pass for that when it suited her. Nabiki couldn't pretend to be small if her life depended on it.

"I know it is sudden, but I only recently got the letter from my old friend. He said, barring no delays, they should arrive today. The front bell rang. "Now, would one of you kindly get the door?"

"Dinner might burn if I go," Kasumi said quickly. Nabiki looked at Akane.
15533222221222112.title: Ranma's New Fiance

choices: Ranma gets engaged to Akane like normal
Ranma somehow gets engaged to Nabiki
155332222212221121.content:
They two Saotomes stopped at the front door of their destination before Ranma took a look at her current state, and decided that it was probably best that she not stay in the cursed form while they were making introductions. Luckily they still had a thermos full of hot water left that they hadn't bothered to use until now. If there was one thing the two had learned about their curses, it was that they would activate at the worst possible times. Whether it be from a quick rain storm, or someone watering their flowerbed, they would get hit with cold water. Now, though, they were under an overhang and away from the road, with no one on in the yard, and it was the best time to change. A quick dousing later and the two human males readjusted their clothing, as the elder pushed the doorbell.

While they waited, Ranma had a chance to look around the neighborhood, and the household of his father's friend. The house was of a traditional Japanese build, with a large yard, and a side building which could only be a dojo. The yard itself was big at least, which made it perfect for the early morning spars that his father would jump him with. However, the presence of a koi pond was a little disconcerting considering their curses.

"You sure this is a good idea, old man? Don't you think finding a cure would be a better plan than this?" Ranma asked while they waited for an answer.

"It's our best option right now. This way, we have a place to stay while you learn how to control what you can do." Genma said nothing more as the door finally opened, and one of the occupants stepped into the threshold.

*****

The middle Tendo sister volunteered to answer the door in hopes that just the sight of her body would dissuade their potential fiance from choosing her. Nabiki hadn't even bothered to change out of her workout clothes so he got as good a look as possible at her musculature. She wasn't going to be forced into a lifelong relationship against her will, no matter what her father had planned. With a smirk on her lips, she threw open the door, flexed an arm, and waited for the response.

*****

The sight of a young woman with a body not unlike his own female form was not what Ranma had expected to find when they arrived. It was probably the last thing he would have thought to see, but there she was, with a look that she had just finished a workout. Perhaps his father was right when he said that this was a better plan than finding a cure.

As for Genma, the moment he saw the girl, he could feel his wife's influence at work here, especially considering that the particular shirt she was wearing featured the logo of her gym. This may be more risky than he thought, but he would need to take that chance if Ranma was to wed one of Soun's daughters.

"So you're one of Soun's girls, eh? At least you look like he hasn't let you grow weak. Could you take us to your father?"

The muscular brunette merely nodded and led them inside.

*****

Whatever reaction she had been expecting, the lack of one was not it. Nabiki was used to guys giving her space when she walked down the halls and none of them even tried to interact with her, but this nonchalance was something different. She could only hope that this was them being polite and that her efforts to stave off the engagement had worked.

They entered the main living area of the home where her father waited with her two sisters. The mustachioed man seemed to have more energy than she had seen in a long time, and rushed over to the fat, bald visitor to give him a hug.

"Welcome, Genma! It is so good to see you old friend."

"You as well, Tendo. I see that you have a strapping young woman for a daughter."

"Oh yes, she's been obsessed with getting stronger for a couple years now. But never mind that, let us get to the reason you're here."
155332222212221121.title: Meeting Nabiki and the rest

choices: Ranma aptly dodges and is panicked by her actions.
Ranma gets hit.  Nabiki sees Ranma's other form.
1553322222122211212.content:
Ranma wondered what this man knew about the curse and his powerful female form. "So, Ranma, which of my girls do you want to marry?" Soun asked. Ranma's eyes narrowed and he stared at his father.

"Married? You want me to-" Ranma seethed. "That's why we are here?"

"A good strong woman could help your ... condition," Genma said gently. Ranma clenched his hands tightly. He was so going to pummel him later. He might even look for some cold water to make it really hurt.

-------

Akane was still fuming at the thought of this stranger potentially becoming her husband. She had enough trouble at school with those guys wanting to date her. Why did father have to do this? It wasn't right or fair.

---------

Nabiki watched as this strange guy who had no reaction get hit with the news of pending nuptuals. So he didn't know about this either? He also had some condition he needed to be fixed. Could he be gay? Oh couldn't it be funny if she set him up with Kuno-kun? Nabiki always suspected he was just repressing his natural urges.

----------

Kasumi watched with a calm face. While she appreciated this young man's feeling about being forced to wed, she disliked the thought of marrying someone who is likely five years her younger. She considered his father's words and glanced at her sisters. Nabiki was staring intently at him. Was it an infatuation or her calculating mind at work? Looking further to Akane, the young lady wasn't interested and definitely angry about this.

Akane glanced towards Nabiki and Kasumi. This boy's father's words came to mind. He wanted a strong woman to be with him. While Akane knew she was a good fighter, in terms of sheer strength her sister was her equal. If anything, the fact she got that strong in such a short time showed better potential than Akane, she could admit to herself.

"I think it's obvious," Akane said. "Nabiki is the strongest of us. She should marry him."

"Agreed," Kasumi chimed in. Nabiki whipped her head about two seconds later.

"Wait, what?" she demanded.

"That is a good idea," Soun said. Genma grunted softly. He had a bad feeling in his gut. The youngest one would have been his selection.

"What?" Rama added in. "I don't want to marry her!"

"And I don't want to marry you," Nabiki said. Her mind raced quickly. "I only would date a guy who can out lift me! And a stringy-armed guy like you certainly can't!" She really hoped she wasn't putting her money on a bad bet. She watched as Ranma's eyes lit up.

"Saying I'm weak?" he demanded.

"You might be an excellent martial artist, no question there. But there is a difference between throwing punches and sheer lifting strength," Nabiki said. Her arms caressed her powerful arms. "If you are like my sister, you probably can do well but not match my endurance in lifting." Akane felt a little sting at her words but said nothing because they were pretty much true. In a spar with grapples and holds, she could beat Nabiki. If Nabiki caught her with her powerful body, though, it was all over. Her bear hugs were killer.

"You're on," Ranma declared. "You got some weights in here?" Nabiki smirked and rose.

"Follow me Ranma," she said with her absolute confidence.

-----------

Ranma looked over the equipment. He never really lifted like this, but he wasn't going to admit to that. He turned to Nabiki who was stretching a little. "Scared?" she asked. She walked over and pulled some weight off the bar. She moved it closer to her warmup weight.

"Could say the same. You look nervous . . . Nabiki, right?" Nabiki nodded in response.

"Just making sure I don't blow out an arm muscle or anything," she said confidently. She dropped to do some pushups and showed off her strength as well as get the blood flowing. "You want to go first?"

"No. You're the one who has to set the bar," Ranma said. Besides it would give him a chance to observe a good lifting workout. He was always good at learning techniques from pops by watching them once. Nabiki nodded and got back on her bench. She layed down.

"Spot me." She looked at Ranma's upside-down confused face. She sighed. "Come over here and help me get my bar off the hold and keep watch in case I start to falter so it doesn't hurt me."

"Right," Ranma said. He moved towards her and saw how much weight was on here. "200lbs?"

"Yep. I go five of these then you match. If you can, I increase it by ten pounds and we repeat," Nabiki said. Ranma nodded. He could handle this competition.

He stood and helped Nabiki lifted the bar off the hold and watched as the young woman slowly and carefully lowered and then lifted the weight. It was really impressive, he had no question there. This girl was really strong. She was lifting his pops pretty much.

At the fifth lift, she pushed all the way up and he helped get it on the rack. "You're turn," she said with a smirk. Ranma nodded and swapped roles. He looked up at Nabiki, her musky workout scent filled the air now. He didn't think about what it might be stirring in him. He had a competition to win. He temporarily forgot if he won it meant that he would marry her.

Despite an uneasy start, he adjusted his form and lifted the weight five times. It was draining, far more than he anticipated. Nabiki watched as this young man just did a heavy lift with little prep or stretching. Despite his obvious lack of experience in lifting, he did well for so much weight. She handed him a dry towel to take care of his sweat.

As he dried himself, she added five pounds to each side and took out her cold water bottle. She could feel the ice inside it still. She drank some water. "So, when are we going to get to the heavy stuff?" Ranma asked confidently. Nabiki glared at his cockiness and pointed her bottle at him. Her hand squeezed hard and water jettisoned out and at Ranma.
1553322222122211212.title: Deep Thoughts

choices: Nabiki wins
Ranma wins
15533222221222112121.content:
After receiving his curse, Ranma had gained a wariness of water, especially in front of people, and the second the girl brought her water bottle to bear he had started to dodge. In a motion too fast for normal humans to see, the pigtailed young man ducked to the side of the stream and rolled away.

"What's the big idea!" Ranma shouted as he got up and gave her a glare.

"Oh, I'm sorry, I thought the tough guy who thinks he can keep up with my lifting could handle a little water," was Nabiki's mocking reply. Of course his aversion to the sudden water attack was something she made note of, and would definitely look into later, bet her competitive side wanted to show this boy just who was stronger then and there.

She approached the bench, rolled her large shoulders, and got into position. Her thick fingers curled around the steel pole as she checked to make sure he was ready to spot her before she began. Her pecs bulged as she eased the barbell off the stand, then she took a breath, and lowered it to her chest.

*****

Akane and Kasumi peeked into the dojo through the partially closed door. Neither of them wanted to miss the outcome of the challenge their sister had started. This kind of thing had happened multiple times since the middle Tendo girl had started bodybuilding, and each time was the same. Usually, some guy would scoff at the thought of her being stronger than them, and would end when Nabiki, a smirk on her face, would lift the barbell off their chests.

As Nabiki started her next set, the two siblings whispered a conversation,

"No way can this guy out lift Nabiki. I mean, sure, he's a martial artist, but so am I, and Nab's can outlast me and can lift more than I ever could. There's not a guy at school who can match her either."

"Maybe," Kasumi whispered back, "but I get the feeling he's going to do much better than those silly boys at your school. I wouldn't count him out just yet."

*****

While their children were off playing, both masters of the two pillars of Anything Goes spoke, specifically about what befell the two Saotomes in China.

"Surely you jest, Saotome. You mean to tell me that your son turns into a girl with muscles as big as my Nabiki's?"

"If not bigger. I would not joke about a matter like this, Tendo. This could either make or break our marriage plan. Ranma is just like his mother in that form, and he may get your daughters under his sway in that form. We must tread lightly."

The two fathers planned for what was to come, and hoped for the best.

*****

No one had managed to last this long against her as he had, and she didn't know if she was more excited or frustrated by that fact. They were now on their fifth set, and the weight was now at 240 pounds, and both of them were going strong. There was a never say quit attitude that pushed the two of them to keep pushing, but it was only a matter of time before one of them would give.
15533222221222112121.title: Ranma dodges and the contest continues

choices: Now Nabiki and Ranma need to get clean from their tough competition.
Ranma and Nabiki first tell the others the lie.
155332222212221121212.content:
Nabiki took a deep breath and readied herself as she laid down. Ranma's sweaty scent filled the air around her and it was nice. Real nice. To her, it told her this guy worked out hard. But that enjoyment wouldn't make her stop pushing hard. She had to win.

----

Ranma watched as this woman a few years his senior showed off more strength than he guessed she could do. He never thought women should be weak or anything like that, but a man's job was to protect a woman. He knew Nabiki had been working out before this matchup. He knew what it would be like to push too hard on a weary body. He moved to the spotting position. "Look," he said awkwardly, "Don't push yourself too hard, okay?" He wanted to look away, but needed to be ready for Nabiki to start.

----

Nabiki looked up at the sweaty mug of her competition, but maybe it was the fatigue getting to her, or just the enjoyment of lifting she discovered, but his words stirred in her memories. She lifted the bar off the rack and lowered it to her chest. "One," she whispered as it ascended up.

Years ago when she stood in line to meet her business mentor, having drawn the lot to some fitness center, she was surprised by the size of the woman who came to greet her. Lady Nodoka, as she was called, was both informative and wise in running her business. She also helped Nabiki get into lifting. On her first day of lifting, she pushed herself too hard.

The bar went down and up a second time. "Two."

Nodoka looked at her with a concerned look, one worried she was about to bite off more than she could chew. And maybe it was the fatigue hitting her, but looking at Ranma from upside down, she could swear she could see Nodoka's face on Ranma's. "Good. Nice work," Ranma encouraged. The same words Nodoka used.

Her mind faltered as she began to push up. Her arms didn't hold the weight evenly. She could feel the weight begin to fall loose from her grip. But Ranma was quick to grab the bar and helped her recover and set the bar back on the stool.

"You okay?" Ranma asked.

-------

"She just dropped the bar? I haven't seen her do that in a while," Akane said.

"She has been pushing hard. These endurance lifts are always draining," Kasumi said.

Akane nodded. "I could maybe make it to 230 if I hadn't been working out that day. I wonder what happened?"

------

"Fine," Nabiki grumbled as she slid off the bench. How stupid was she? How could she let her mind wander from the lift at hand? Golden rule of lifting was nothing mattered but the lift when you are lifting. She wanted to call a do over, but her pride kept her mouth shut as she dried herself off. She added the wet towel to the basket. Kasumi would have a lot of them to do today.

"So, I just got to get to three and I win," Ranma said as he assumed the position. Nabiki moved tot he spotting position and nodded. "Ready Nabiki."

"Go for it," she replied. Ranma hefted the bar off the hold and carefully did the first press. Nabiki watched with angry eyes. He was going to do it. He would beat her. The first guy to really beat her since she got into the heavy weights.

The weights ascended and began to drop. It came back up and Ranma paused, his breathing hard. He had one more in him. Carefully, he controlled the descent, not wanting to be fatigued like Nabiki had gotten. He touched his chest and pushed it up and up. He finished the lift and set the bar back on the hold with Nabiki's help. He smirked at her.

"That would be three. One more than you," he said with a hint of arrogance. Not bad considering he never did this before.

"Yeah, great. Now I got to marry you," Nabiki said. Ranma's eyes widened. In the thrill of the competition he forgot why he did this competition to begin with. He glanced about, but Akane and Kasumi ducked away the moment his head began to turn. They had seen him beat Nabiki.

"Look, no one saw this but us. What if we say we tied?" Ranma asked. Nabiki started cleaning off the equipment. She looked at Ranma.

"You mean we lie. You want me to deceive my father and sisters?" she asked.

"Um, when you put it that way," Ranma said.

"Fine. Let's do it. We can have a rematch in a few days. And there I will win," Nabiki said. Ranma smirked back.

"Don't count on it," he said.

"It's a date," Nabiki said firmly.

----

Outside the room, Kasumi smiled. She didn't know what was said right after Ranma won, but it sounded like Nabiki was good with this lose. She and Ranma were even going to have a date so soon. Akane smiled too, happy for Nabiki.
155332222212221121212.title: Win By a Face

choices: The water heater is broken, and Ranma changes
Nabiki talks to her sisters about the competition
1553322222122211212121.content:
Sweat poured down the bodies of the two competitors, and the smell that came off them certainly reflected that. After she saw what they looked like, Nabiki went over to the corner of the room to fetch some towels and water.

Nabiki had to admit, it was nice to have someone who could rival her strength and endurance in the gym. She had never felt so tired, or so motivated since she had started to lift. She could see that this would only drive her to get bigger, as she flexed an arm and imagined just how much bigger they could be.

"Here," she said, and offered a dry towel to the pigtailed boy, "We're both sweaty messes, and you should wipe yourself off at least before leaving. I'm sure Kasumi already has the bath ready."

Outside the dojo, Kasumi hustled away to prepare the bath for her sister and their guest. Akane followed behind, not wanting to be caught by the two and ruining their hope of calling their match a draw. She couldn't bear to ruin the newly earned respect the two had for each other by calling out their little fib.

*****

The two competitors walked out of the dojo, a new understanding forged between them would make the days to come much easier for the both of them. They crossed through the living room where their fathers sat before a shogi board.

"Nabiki! Ranma! The bath is ready!" Kasumi called from across the house.

"Why don't you go first," Nabiki offered.

"Thanks, I could use a quick wash," Ranma replied, and went to his bag to get his bathing supplies and a change of clothes.
1553322222122211212121.title: Now Nabiki and Ranma need to get clean from the...

choices: Nabiki rushes off before an explanation can be given.
"My room.  Five minutes Ranma," Nabiki said before leaving.
15533222221222112121211.content:
The water was pouring into the tub. The warm water filled the room with some light steam. Kasumi walked out of the bath as Ranma was approaching with some curiosity. "The bath is ready Ranma," Kasumi said. "Please enjoy yourself."

"Thanks," Ranma said as he walked into the room. He shut the door and walked to the cleaning station and turned on the water. Nice hot water hit him and he smiled. A decent bath would be so nice.

--------

As Kasumi walked away, some clanking was heard from the small area near the back. She looked in and saw their old water heater puttering about. She would need to look into calling a repairman over. This old heater was on its last legs. She gasped as she realized she forgot to warn Ranma the water could turn cold quickly.

--------

Ranma scrubbed down his body hard as he cleaned himself. With soap in his eyes, he filled the dump bucket. He didn't notice he water was colder than before. The water dumped onto his chest, he felt the chilled water and screamed in shock.

The familiar shift in size and weight came over him as Ranma became the bulky behemoth. Suds still covered her eyes as she reached blindly towards the faucet. How could she have been stupid to fill the bucket with cold water? Under her tight backside, the stool broke under the new weight and a heavy thump was made. She grumbled to herself as she tried finding the faucet.

---------

The scream drew Nabiki's attention as she waited for Ranma to finish. Nabiki listened as Ranma's voice now sounded a lot different. What was that thump she heard too?

She wasn't a pervert, she assured herself. This wasn't about looking at his hot, fit form. This was about looking in on a guest (and her possible fiance). She cracked the door just slightly and gasped. The hunk of a guy wasn't sitting naked. Instead a red-headed maiden with a body of her dreams sat there. How could she be there? Where was Ranma? She had the same ponytail as Ranma. She wanted to go in. To talk with her. To know who this mysterious woman was.

"Stupid Pops. Stupid curse," the behemoth muttered. Her thick hands gripped the faucet and pulled too hard. The pipe came out from the ground, cracking the pipe and spraying the room with hot water.

In the blink of an eye, the behemoth maiden of her dreams was gone. In her place, the smaller, but still well-built Ranma-kun was crying in pain from the hot water spraying from the broken pipes. He turned off the spraying water and thankfully it stopped.

With his eyes cleaned, and slightly burned, he reached for a towel and saw Nabiki staring at him. Naked, manhood on full display.

What did she see? Ranma wondered. Did he dare speak? Did he try to explain how the pipes were partially ripped from the ground?
15533222221222112121211.title: Tendo Maintenance

choices: Nabiki tries to get Ranma to talk, but keeps getting worshipful
Nabiki demands to know what is going on with Ranma
155332222212221121212112.content:
This was not going to end well. That was the thought that ran through Ranma's head as she trudged towards Nabiki's room. The Saotome progeny had hoped to be able to explain this properly with some preparation to avoid this scenario. There were two possible outcomes to this, and neither of them were preferable. Nabiki was either going to fawn over her just like the amazons in China, or she was going to see her as a rival and demand to know her secret. She had managed to dry herself and change without drawing the attention of anyone else, and now stood outside the door of the girl she had previously managed to win over in her male form.

Ranma reached forward, and softly tapped on the door a knuckle.

*****

Inside her room, Nabiki contemplated what she had seen. Just the thought that someone had managed to beat her in the one physical activity she was absolutely confident she couldn't lose, and the fact that the same person had a female form that looked far stronger than his male side, and even more muscular than herself jarred her. It caused a conflict between the feeling of respect she had for the boy who beat her, and an bit of anger that he didn't appear to go full out to begin with. A familiar feeling also surfaced, one she hadn't felt since just before she started to lift, back when she met the person who placed her on this path.

One thing was for sure, she was going to figure out what was going on with this boy, if he truly was one, before she or her family got any more involved with the Saotomes.
155332222212221121212112.title: My room. Five minutes Ranma

choices: Nabiki remains herself.  She finds the urge to fawn but resists it.
Nabiki finds herself fawning over this demigoddess of muscle.
1553322222122211212121122.content:
Nabiki closed her eyes and focused. This would be just like a set. She couldn't let her emotions over nostalgia affect her. Saotome was potentially dangerous to her family. That took precedence. She pushed away her feelings, anger and curiosity. and more. She made herself cold, detached. She became the ice queen once more.

Her piercing eyes looked back at her from the mirror and she opened the door. "Come in," she said curtly. She walked to her desk and sat down, facing Ranma, who closed the door behind him. He remained standing as he was dressed. He looked worried, deeply concerned about something.

Ranma watched her harsh gaze and felt some worry. He didn't want to draw Nabiki into liking his female side because of whatever curse was on it. "What did you see?" Ranma asked.

"I saw a giant red-head with muscles that make me look tiny turn into a guy," Nabiki said. "So, what are you?"

"Cursed," Ranma said. Nabiki tilted her head to one side.

"Magic doesn't exist," Nabiki answered.

"Oh it does," Ranma said. "Pops and I were training in China and I fell into this pool. I was a normal guy. Now I become that giant girl you saw."

"Alright then. Show me," Nabiki said. "Transform. Do some dance and call on your power, curse, or whatever."

"It don't like that. I only change when I get hit by water. Cold water turns me into a girl and hot turns me back," Ranma said. Nabiki considered the bathroom scene and nodded.

"Is your father cursed?" Nabiki asked.

"Besides with stupidity? Yeah. He becomes a panda," Ranma said. Nabiki tried not to smile at his snark.

"So, why don't you spend more time in your female form? It looks stronger," Nabiki asked.

"The curse isn't becoming a girl, it's . . ." Ranma said. He looked at her stoic face. "What happens if I don't tell ya?"

"I'll tell my father you pushed yourself on me, thinking winning in our lifting match gave you the right to have me anyway you want, even against my permission. I would scream and he would come running," Nabiki curtly replied. "You and your father would be cast out of this home regardless of what friendship your father might have with mine." Nabiki also considered that should word of that tale get to her gym, the ladies there would hunt Ranma down like a dog.

Ranma stood silently. He didn't want another girl fawning over him. But she didn't seem as affected as other, not like that Chinese girl. "The curse is I draw women to me. Women notice me and seem to want to get close. Soon after I got cursed, I went to this village of female fighters. They became really enamored with me. Pops and I had to run away because of how they were acting."

"So, you are saying I would become some love struck fan girl if I saw your other form too much?" Nabiki asked.

"Yeah. It's why I dodged your water in the dojo. I don't want to be followed like that," Ranma said. He looked and sounded uncomfortable talking about this.

"I see," Nabiki said, as she felt a strike to her pride. This guy thought she was that weak emotionally? Next to her desk, outside of Ranma's view, was her gym bag she would take to school or the professional gym. Inside was a cool water bottle. Maybe she should blast him and prove him wrong. He looked down, away from her. Reaching back, she grabbed the bottle and drew it like a gun and squirted Ranma.

The martial artist sensed the attack too late and was hit by the water once more. His clothing stretched out to its familiar limits as the behemoth's weight made the floor creak ever so slightly. "No, don't do this," Ranma said, quickly. She looked at the door and window, but the former was too small to easily escape through and the window could fit her, if she took out both panes of glass.

Nabiki looked up and up at the redhead muscle maiden, her form hunched from being nearly as tall as the room.
1553322222122211212121122.title: Ice Queen

choices: Kasumi walks in and catches sight of Ranma's female form
Ranma and Nabiki continue to talk alone
15533222221222112121211221.content:
The influence she was feeling just by looking at the gender bent redhead told Nabiki that there was at least some truth to what the Saotome youth had claimed. It was a compulsion, though faint, that asked her to worship and aspire to be like the girl before her. If it were not for her strong willpower, the Tendo girl may have been swayed by it, like many had been before. Just looking at the other girl's slightly flexed, and beefy arm was enough to send these thoughts through her mind.

"Well, I have to say that you weren't lying about the effect you have on women, but I don't think it's as strong as you said, or at least the effect isn't that potent on me."

"You mean you don't feel like pawing all over my body, and telling me how much you wish to follow me anywhere?" Ranma asked, quite surprised, yet happy, at the different reaction she had received from her host.

"I certainly don't feel like doing the second part, but I could do the first part for you if you asked really nicely," Nabiki answered, her teasing comment met with a laugh from the redhead.

"Don't worry, I won't until we at least get to know each other better."

The two shared a laugh as the tension between them began to ease once more, as it had after their competition in the weight room. While the fact that Nabiki was still put out by the blunt display of some kind of magic, or the fact that magic was real, was still very much a thing, but the two of them moved on despite that fact. If anything, it would make for a much more interesting relationship with the Saotome youth, whatever it may turn out to be between the two of them.

"Still, I have to admit, I am a little jealous that you have such muscles that dwarf mine, and with a definition I couldn't hope to match as I am now."

"Yeah, they are pretty big, huh?" Ranma agreed, and went into a double bicep pose which caused muscles the size of large melons to swell up on her arms.
15533222221222112121211221.title: Nabiki remains herself.  She finds the urge to ...

choices: Kasumi is still gentle and Nabiki can move her outside the room with some words.
Kasumi refuses to leave Ranma's sight. Does Nabiki dare to leave her alone?
155332222212221121212112211.content:
"So, have you tested your limits?" Nabiki asked. Ranma shook her head.

"No. Pops and I never really took the time. I always felt the eyes of girls and ladies being drawn to me when I was on the street like this," Ranma said. "Even if I didn't draw them in, that one girl was hunting me down."

"Other girl? From the Chinese village?" Nabiki asked.

"Yeah. From some Amazons or something," Ranma said. Nabiki's eyes perked up. She had read about the women of Greek myths. Were these women like that?

"They big like you?" Nabiki asked.

"Nah. They were normal size, but I guess they were warriors. This one won some competition when pops and I arrived there. We were hungry and didn't know the food on the table was for the victor of some tournament," Ranma said. Nabiki nodded. "When she confronted us, her anger went away and she became different. She started looking at me in an uneasy way."

"Like you were scared I would become?" Nabiki asked. Ranma nodded. "Well, we got to prove I am stronger than that Chinese girl." She rose from her seat and walked to the behemoth. Ranma didn't back away.

"A new contest. I want to see if touching you makes me some crazy fan," Nabiki said. Her hand touched the right arm. She felt Ranma flinch from the touch as Nabiki's hand pressed into the flesh.

Dear God, there were muscles on this arm. The hard steel force beneath this layer of soft baby flesh, which added a level of cuteness to Ranma, was just amazing. She felt her heart pick up pace. Was it this curse? This muscular siren's song or her own admiration for a strong female body that caused it to happen?

She pulled her hand away and smirked up at Ranma.

"Looks like I'm stronger than that girl," Nabiki said confidently. The urge to touch more, to hug her lingered, but she suppressed it.

A quick knock came from the door and it soon opened. "Nabiki, dinner will be ready soo-" Kasumi said as her voice trailed off. Nabiki walked around Ranma to see what was going on. Kasumi's eyes were wide as she stared at Ranma. "Who is this?" Kasumi whispered.

"Kasumi, this is Ranma. He has a curse on him," Nabiki said, watching her sister closely.

"Ranma? Oh, she is wonderful. Look at . . . that strong body," Kasumi said. "I never quite understood why you lifted until now, Nabiki." Kasumi gulped as Nabiki's heart raced for a second time. This time fear fell inside of her.

"Look, don't touch me. Don't think about me," Ranma said, backing away. Kasumi walked into the bedroom, her eyes never leaving Ranma's powerful body. She took in the entirety of it, drinking it up like a starving man inhales food.

"How can I not?" Kasumi asked softly. "The beauty in your strength is truly ladylike."

"See what I mean?" Ranma asked, looking at Nabiki. "Get me some hot water, or get her out of here!" Nabiki nodded.
155332222212221121212112211.title: The Touch, The Feel of Muscles

choices: Kasumi tells everyone she wants to be Ranma's fiancee
Kasumi sneaks into Ranma's bed with a glass of cold water
1553322222122211212121122112.content:
"Hot water? Why do you need hot water, Ranma?" Kasumi asked as she closed in on the redheaded tower of feminine muscle.

"Hot water changes me back to a guy, and cold water changes me the other way," Ranma blurted out as Kasumi closed the distance between them, and was mere inches from the redhead. Nabiki moved to pull her sister away, but was too late, and the older sister latched on to the arm of their new guest.

Kasumi cooed as she began to stroke the diamond hard musculature of Ranma gave a squeeze to her bicep only to find that the muscle would not yield. She swooned as her fingers found the well defined abs from under their clothe prison, and massaged her way up to the younger girl's pecs.

Ranma was in full panic mode, and tried to find a way of escape that wouldn't hurt the young woman that was feeling up her body. She could only turn to Nabiki and hope her friend would remove her sister.

"C'mon, Kasumi, you need to make dinner still," Nabiki said as she clapped a hand on her sister shoulder.

"But Nabiki, how could I leave this muscular beauty alone with no one to attend to her every need? What kind of hostess would I be if I did that?"

Ranma flinched at the already servile girl's statement, and tried to tug her arm away.

"Don't worry, sis, I'll help her for now, but she IS going to be wanting dinner soon, and we can't keep her waiting."

"But...but," Kasumi stuttered as she tried to argue against Nabiki's point, "but...you're right. I'll go get dinner ready," she finished, dejected.

Kasumi finally released her grip, though reluctantly, and sadly left the room to prepare the evening meal.

"Thanks Nabiki, now could I please some hot water before dinner starts?"

"Sure," Nabiki replied.
1553322222122211212121122112.title: Kasumi refuses to leave Ranma's sight. Does...

choices: the fathers accept the offer and make Kasumi his fiance.
Nabiki injects quickly. Is it to protect Kasumi, or her own developing feelings?
15533222221222112121211221121.content:
Kasumi hummed softly as she made final preparations on cooking dinner. Things needed to be perfect for Ranma. Her beautiful temple of muscles deserved nothing but the best. She needed a solidly healthy meal to help her make those fierce arms even larger. Kasumi quivered and felt a pain at leaving Ranma just a few minutes before.

She wanted her with her always. To dote upon that behemoth. She wouldn't have to go to school. Just stay here. With Kasumi. Forever. She licked her lips as she came up with a plan.

----------

One cup of hot water later, Ranma reoriented himself to the smaller form. Nabiki stared at the nearly eye-level boy. Correction, young man. She felt calm before him now as she analyzed the situation at hand. Not only did he become a behemoth of muscle, but his concerns about seducing people was accurate too. If she hadn't seen what Kasumi was like when watching Ranma, she might not have believed it.

Kasumi was never that interested in strength or muscles. Once or twice when Nabiki would watch lifting competitions did Kasumi join her, but mostly the dutiful sister cleaned the house. Her behavior before girl Ranma was . . . unreal.

Would Akane be as resistant as Nabiki or fawn over the powerhouse like Kasumi? Nabiki didn't know. In the end, would she consider Ranma a threat to her family, a tool to exploit, or someone to help? She didn't know the answer to that one either. What did she think of Ranma as a person?

She stopped there and wiped her eyes. "Look, what's going to happen with Kasumi? Will she be gaga over you forever?" Nabiki asked.

"I don't know. I never stuck around to see what might happen," Ranma said. "I just want to learn to control it so I don't hurt anyone unintentionally."

"I can respect that," Nabiki said, as she looked at her own powerful muscles. "Still, that could be an amazing weapon if done right." She glanced at the clock. "Come on, let's go eat." Ranma nodded and followed.

-----------

Akane watched as Ranma and Nabiki came down the stairs together and smiled. She walked to the kitchen. "Can I help carry things out?" Akane asked.

"Yes Akane, you may" Kasumi said. She handed a salad to Akane as she gathered the main course.

"So, I saw Ranma and Nabiki coming down the stairs together. They seem to really hit it off," Akane said, oblivious to Kasumi and her tightening back.

"They seem that way?" Kasumi whispered.

"Yeah. I'm really happy for them," Akane said.

"I'm sure you are. I'm sure you are," Kasumi said. Nabiki was close to Ranma? Well, Ranma did deign her with the sight of her majestic body first. So it made some sense, Kasumi realized as she felt a twinge of pain.

Never had she been jealous of her siblings. Never had she really coveted what they might have. Until now that is. She couldn't let them become closer. She wouldn't let it happen.

She carried out the meal with Akane behind her. Her father, Mr. Saotome was sitting there. Akane sat next to father as Ranma an open seat. Nabiki took one side and that left her to Ranma's left side. She smiled and sat down.

Food was past between them as they slowly ate their meals. About midway into the meal, Soun looked at Ranma. "So, did you win against my daughter?" Soun asked.

"What? O, it was a draw. After the long walk here and Nabiki was worn from her workout, we got pretty fsr but decided to start fresh another day," Ranma rambled out quickly. The fathers nodded. They had been busy drinking, so they didn't know it wasn't true.

Kasumi had been glancing at the male arm and longed for it to be his female arm, to touch the bulging powerful muscles. Her eyes looked up at the lie Ranma told.

It was an opportunity to cut in! "Father," Kasumi injected. Eyes were drawn to her. "After watching Ranma for a short time, I think my earlier response wasn't the correct one. I would be honored to have her as my spouse. Him. Have him as my spouse," Kasumi said, her face flush and speech slightly stammered. She looked down at Ranma.

"What?" Ranma asked.

"Would you have me?" Kasumi asked.

"Uh," Ranma replied as he felt his panic growing. Before he could properly answer . . .
15533222221222112121211221121.title: Unexpected Rival

choices: Akane returns to see the transformed Ranma
Ranma managed to change back in time
155332222212221121212112211211.content:
"Kasumi, I had no idea you were so enthusiastic about the engagement," Soun said at his daughter's surprising declaration, startled that his usually meek daughter had actually made such a request. "I am so proud of you, my beautiful daughter, that you would put our family's honor in such high regard truly fills me with pride," the Tendo patriarch finished.

"You've certainly raised a dutiful daughter, my friend, but are you certain she will be a good choice?" Genma asked.

"You have no reason to fear, Genma. Kasumi is a wonderful girl with a great sense of family duty. Not to mention her cooking is first rate. She is a fine choice for our agreement."

"I guess you've got a point, her food was incredible, haven't had a proper meal that delicious in years. She's perfect in my book. Very well. Boy! Kasumi's your new fiancee."

Ranma was gobsmacked, unable to get a single word out of his mouth. Everything had happened so fast, and his poor brain couldn't keep up with the situation.

"Oh, thank you father! I will do my best to uphold our family name." Kasumi said as she latched on to a dazed Ranma's arm, and hugged it to her chest.

The sudden warmth, and softness of Kasumi's breasts around his arm snapped Ranma back to reality. His mind found footing and his mouth finally started to move.

"Wait, you can't just go deciding this without me, old man!" Ranma snapped, his fists clenched tightly.

"Oh, don't be so picky boy, Soun's girl is wonderful, and beautiful. Be happy you have such a girl."

"Are you saying my daughter isn't good enough for you boy," Soun growled at the young man.

"No, no. I ain't saying that," Ranma quickly said.

"Then there's no problem, boy. Come Soun, ol' buddy, let's get celebrating!"

The two fathers went outside, intent on finding a bar to drink the night away in celebration, and left their children to their own devices.

Kasumi still clung to Ranma's arm, her smile was almost infectious to the young man, if not for the fact he had just been railroaded into an engagement with her. The other Tendo girls had reacted to the news in their own way, Akane said she needed to go for a run to clear her head, while Nabiki closed in on the two, and tried to pry her sister off the boy. This little tug of war lasted for a good ten minutes before Nabiki gave up, and tried to reason with her sister.

"C'mon, Kasumi, we need to talk this out. You aren't thinking clearly."

"She's right, Kasumi, you're only acting like this because you saw my cursed form, and it ain't only a curse because of the body change, but because it has an effect on girls I can't control," Ranma stated.

"How could such a wonderful body be bad in any way, Ranma. I love your physique in that form, it is like looking at a goddess. I don't understand why you don't stay in that form. In fact, why don't you change now, it would be better if the whole house saw you so you can explain the curse to them."

Kasumi's hand shot out and grabbed a glass of water, and splashed the boy in his face, her other arm still wrapped around his. She felt the shift as it happened, as the slim, but muscular arm of the young man transformed into the massive, powerful muscles of the redheaded amazon. Her other hand joined its twin, and once again she began to feel the contours of her biceps and triceps.

"I'm back," Akane's voice said at the front door.

"Nabiki, get me a glass of hot water quick!" Ranma said in panic.
155332222212221121212112211211.title: Kasumi is Ranma's new fiancee

choices: Ranma and Nabiki start giving a more coherent explaination.
Inside Kasumi finds the hot water no longer working. Cuz Ranma broke it earlier.
1553322222122211212121122112111.content:
Nabiki nodded and turned away from Ranma and Kasumi. It felt difficult to do, like looking away from Ranma was wrong. Nabiki pushed back that feeling and raced to the kitchen. She turned on the faucet and hot water slowly started to pour out. She gathered some in the first thing she could grad, in this case a pot and hurried back.

----

Ranma looked at the young woman still clinging to her thick arm like a child with a new toy at Christmas. "Please let go," Ranma said. Kasumi stared at Ranma with her deep eyes.

"Never," Kasumi replied as they heard a gasp.

"Who are you?" came Akane's voice. Ranma turned to look at her. "R-Ranma?" She took a few steps to the side, right as Nabiki ran out. The two collided together as hot water fell on the floor and themselves. The pot clanged on the floor.

"Girls?!" Kasumi called out, her eyes whipping from Ranma. They disentablged from each other.

"Watch out Akane. I'm trying to save you!" Nabiki growled, grabbing the empty pot.

"Save me? From what?" Akane asked, before turning back to Ranma. "What is going on here?"

"Ranma is cursed to become that when hit with cold water. Some girls become love dovey at the sight of him- I mean her," Nabiki said, pushing Akane's head away from Ranma. She didn't need both her sisters fawning over Ranma.

"Lovey dovey? She looks good. I mean really good, but . . . Kasumi!" Akane turned her head back, looking at Kasumi as she remained attatched to Ranma. "What have you done to my sister?"

"It's not my fault. I've got a curse!" Ranma yelled.

"More like a blessing," Kasumi said. "I never want to see you change back." She rubbed her hand against the muscle. "I think you could even carry me on one arm."

"Let go of my sister!" Akane yelled. She raced forward and punched Ranma on the other arm.

Ranma felt mixed emotions right now. First, some curiosity on that attack. Was that meant to be a strong punch because it didn't faze her at all. Second, she was happy. No one had attacked her once they saw this form. No girl anyway. They had been stopped cold and just stared at her.

Akane held her fist pressed against Ranma's thick arm. Pain slowly reached her head as it felt like the first time she broke bricks and hit them the wrong way. "Ow-ow-ow-ow!" Akane yelled, pulling her hand back. She shook her hand in pain.

"Akane, I should admonish you for striking my goddess, but it seems you learned from your folly," Kasumi said when some hot water hit her cheek. More importantly most hit Ranma, who shifted back to his normal size. Kasumi's eyes widened in shock. Nabiki set down the pot.

"Akane, help me get her off of him,' Nabiki said, gripping one side of Kasumi. She felt her sister grip harder.

"No! I won't leave Ranma!" Kasumi yelled as Akane grabbed the other arm. Despite her valiant effort, Kasumi's struggle against two strong women was in vain. The younger sisters pulled enough to allow Ranma to free his arm and he scooted away.

"Thanks," Ranma said.

"Please change back," Kasumi said. "Please change!"

"Kasumi, no! You can't!" Akane cried, strugging to hold her sister. She didn't want to hurt her. Nabiki considered her words carefully.

"Kasumi, you aren't right for Ranma," Nabiki said. Kasumi looked at her sister with a dark, very uncharacteristic, look.

"You don't know what you mean!" Kasumi whispered.

"I do. Ranma told me he can't control his other form's strength yet. You could be hurt if she tries to shower you with affection," Nabiki said. "Look, even a strong girl like Akane hurt herself because of Ranma's strength." Kasumi relented and stared at Nabiki and then Ranma.

"I . . . I need to become stronger for her?" Kasumi asked. No one was sure of the answer but she took silence as an affirmative. "I need to become stronger." Her voice was more confident now. She would need to start building her muscles like Nabiki does. And perhaps if she does well, she could wash Ranma's back in the bath.

"Right, but first, let's clean up after dinner," Akane said. Kasumi nodded.

"Goddess, I'll clean up. If I do well, would you at least let me see your heavenly form?" Kasumi asked Ranma.

"Um, I don't think it is a good idea," Ranma said. He saw some pain in the older woman's eyes. She nodded and went about cleaning up. Nabiki sighed and looked at Ranma.

"Akane, let's go outside to talk, okay? Ranma and I will answer your questions there," Nabiki said. Akane nodded and the three walked to the backyard.
1553322222122211212121122112111.title: Middle Ground

choices: Kasumi tries to get Ranma to change again that night
Ranma's first day at school
15533222221222112121211221121111.content:
While Kasumi cleaned the dining area, the two younger sisters and their guest were busy talking in by the koi pond in the yard. Akane stared expectantly at the two who had promised her answers about what was going on with the young man who had come to stay with them.

"Alright. Answers. Now!" Akane demanded, her arms crossed and her eyes narrowed.

"It's kinda a long story," Ranma started, not sure of how to word what had happened to him.

"Well, I've got all night, so start explaining," Akane answered snarkily.

"Well, it all started when my pops dragged us to an old training ground in China, even though he didn't know a single word of Chinese..."

*****

To the west, across the sea, was the village of warrior women that the Saotomes had managed to evade all the way back to Japan. The two may have escaped them, but only for a while, and the village elders had made plans to bring that redheaded girl back to them, so as to further strengthen their people.

In a newly constructed building, the Chinese warriors had set up gym, complete with free weights, and a full length mirror; a room in which one of their best of the younger generation was on her back, with a barbell pressed across her broad chest. Her spotter looked on from behind her, awestruck at the amount of weight being lifted by her compatriot, and feeling quite useless as the other girl made the lift look effortless. The young woman's fleshy pecs rippled as the heavy bar was moved up and down with fluid grace, not once did it stop or dip until it was racked up by the amazon.

"You can go now, I am done for today," the purple haired girl said with a wave of the hand as she approached the mirror. The other girl did as told, handed her tribe sister a towel, and dismissed herself.

Shampoo had used the months following the encounter to build her own physique, and, with the help of the ancient techniques of her people, had managed to sculpt a body that could almost compare to that of the vision of perfection who had graced the tribe for less than a day. Now, as she stopped before the reflection of her new and improved body, she could only think of when she would find the redhead once more, and thank her for the example she had set. Shampoo drank in the sight of her perfectly sculpted legs, her mountainous biceps, and her thick pectorals.

The Chinese girl moved into a double bicep pose, and smiled at the results of her hard work. It was time to continue the search for her muscular idol.

*****

Kasumi put away the last of the plates, and washed her hands before she left the kitchen. The entire time she had been thinking about what her sister had said to her. About the need to be stronger so that she may at last enjoy the touch of her gorgeous Ranma. It was certainly lucky that they already had the equipment to achieve this goal, and Nabiki would be a wealth of information in order to succeed. The eldest Tendo resolved herself to start as soon as possible.

*****

"...and when I got out of the pool, I had transformed into the form you saw before. I don't know why, because the guide said that I shoulda changed into what I would've looked like if I was a girl, but I do think my old man knows more about it than he's telling. Anyway, a couple days later we got to this village filled with women fighters, and apparently they were holding a tournament the same day. We were really hungry, and saw a table full of food, and started to eat while we watched,"

Akane listened closely as the events of the young man's life leading up to his arrival at their doorstep enthralled her. She would never have believed half of it if not for having seen the transformation for herself.

"...and so their champion demanded that I give her advice on how to be as big as my girl form in exchange for eating her victory feast, and then all the girls their got really weird and started to swarm me and it was like they were hypnotized or something. We got outta there really quick after that, but no matter where we were, whenever I changed into my girl form, girls seem to have the same reaction to seeing me. And that's how its been until we got here."

It was silent for several minutes as Akane digested the information, but she now had a better understanding of why the young man was so nervous in his other form, and judging by how her older sister had acted, it was not without reason. She gave a nod of understanding and opened her mouth to speak, but did not get a word out as the two fathers arrived outside the gate, slightly drunk.

"It's nice to see that you're gettin' to know our hosts, m'boy," Genma slurred as he walked by, "but don' forget to show yer fiancee some attention too. After all, you'll only get to see her in the mornins and evenings, 'cause you gotta go to school tomorrow."

"WHAT!?" Ranma cried into the night sky.
15533222221222112121211221121111.title: Ranma gives Akane a long explanation

choices: Stay with Ranma at school.  Does he get splashed?
A week passes and Kasumi is sure building muscles quickly.
155332222212221121212112211211112.content:
Ranma had a restless night sleeping. First his father rolled about, making resting hard. Second, he was sure Kasumi had been outside waiting to splash him with water. She had promised to not disturb him while he slept, but that didn't mean she wouldn't try something else.

So he moved outside and onto the roof. The clear sky above helped him relax. The stars always looked nice and helped him rest peacefully.

------------

Morning came to Nerima and Ranma jumped down to the ground with ease. He felt nature's urges and went to the bathroom. He turned and saw Nabiki and Akane staring at him.

----

Nabiki was awake and going for a morning workout as Akane readied herself to join Nabiki. Both noticed a small glass of water resting on a crude contraption above Ranma's door. They took it down quietly.

"Kasumi is . . . scaring me," Akane confessed as they walked to the dojo.

"Tell me about it. At least we have clear heads about the matter," Nabiki said. She glanced at Akane. She was sure she had one at any rate. She wasn't sure about her sister.

Ranma landed not far from them. "Were you on the roof?" Akane asked.

"Pops rolls around," Ranma said.

"That is probably the least weird thing about you right now," Nabiki said. "Kasumi's in the kitchen. I would advise staying away if you don't want to be splashed." Ranma nodded and went to the bathroom.

----

Eating breakfast was hard, Ranma found, when one arm was being held by Kasumi. She had made a hearty meal that was filled with protein and other things meant to build a strong body. She had remained silent through much of it. This was some relief to Ranma.

"Well, it's time to get to school," Akane said.

"Yeah, I'll get a bag," Ranma said. Kasumi turned to Ranma.

"You're leaving me?" she asked softly.

"Um, I do need to go to school," Ranma said, but her face looked like this wasn't enough of a reason to leave her.

"Kasumi, Ranma needs to train his mind to be a good spouse," Nabiki injected. Kasumi nodded.

"Then I will make sure you do all your lessons tonight, Ranma. I did very well in school myself," Kasumi said. "We can help each other become better." She let go of Ranma's arm, if reluctantly, and Ranma rushed to leave with the other Tendo sisters.

What did she mean by that? Ranma wondered.

---------

Ranma found himself on a jog with Akane and Nabiki. The girls were fit and showed off their strength as they ran to school.

"Akane, make it under one minute and I'll win big," Nabiki said.

"Nabiki, I told you not to make betting pools!" Akane yelled at her sister.

"Um, what's going on?" Ranma asked.

"You'll find out," Nabiki said with a smile. The gates to the school approached and soon it was blocked by a horde of teenage boys in sporting equipment. Nabiki peeled off to the side as Akane met the group head on. Ranma, not understanding what was going on, followed Akane.

Before he could ask more, someone threw a punch at him, yelling about being so close to Akane. Not really understanding the reason, Ranma did understand he was being assaulted and quickly defended himself. In the chaos around them, Ranma aptly defended himself and disabled his attackers. Soon it was just Ranma and Akane.

Then from behind a tree walked a tall young man in a blue kimono. He bore a wooden sword on his side. "Who are you, to fight with Akane?" the young man demanded.

"Um, Ranma," Ranma replied. "And who the hell are you, and what's going on?"

"They think if they beat me, they can date me, because that guy said so," Akane seethed, glaring at Kuno.

-------

In the span it took Ranma to leave and reach school, Kasumi had finished cleaning up breakfast. She walked to her father, reading the paper and sat by him. "Kasumi, do you need money for groceries?" he asked. Mister Saotome was looking at a shogi board.

"Not yet father," Kasumi said. "I need your help in the dojo."

"Did your sisters leave it a mess?" he asked. Kasumi shook her head.

"I want you to help me start lifting. I need someone to train me," Kasumi said. Genma's eyes flashed to Kasumi. His heart raced. Did she see Ranma's other side and no one told them? It might explain her quick turn around in her affection for Ranma.

-----------

"Indeed. Akane shall only be wed to the strongest male at our school. And what is your relationship to this fair maiden?" Kuno demanded. His eyes glinted with anger.

"Um," Ranma said.

"He's my sister's betrothed," Nabiki said as she walked by. Kuno's hands clenched. "My elder sister's betrothed. He is arranged to marry Kasumi. He's our brother-in-law Kuno baby." Kuno seemed to pause for a moment and nodded.

"Defending one's family is an honorable act. I will forgive you this day's trespasses. From now on, though, do not fight us again," Kuno said.

"Or what?" Ranma asked, not liking the challenge.

"Or you shall face me," Kuno said confidently.

"Bring it on, pretty boy," Ranma said, smirking. Kuno stared and readied himself. It was over in a flash. Kuno was on the ground.

"Ow," Kuno breathed out.

"Listen, I don't mind you guys trying to date Akane," Ranma said.

"Don't get involved in my life!" Akane yelled, but Ranma ignored her.

"But she's someone I respect. Treat her that way and don't attack her, and we are good," Ranma said. Kuno considered these words.

Ranma, betrothed to Kasumi, most likely to become heir to Kasumi's (and thus Akane's) family. He will have considerable clout to decide if a marriage is suitable for Akane. He has just set the bar for suitors to Akane. Kuno nodded.

"I will accept your terms," Kuno said, rising. "I will seek to court Lady Akane another way." He walked off, not caring how bruised his face was.

-------

Soun showed Kasumi what he knew and they found Nabiki's beginner's guide to lifting that showed them good techniques. He smiled as he helped Kasumi begin to lift.
155332222212221121212112211211112.title: Some Things Do Change

choices: Ranma manages to change back with no one noticing
A group of girls walks by while Ranma is his female form
1553322222122211212121122112111121.content:
Kasumi began her first ever lifting workout with some small free weights. It consisted of some bicep curls and tricep extensions with light weights as she was just starting out, but she was determined to make herself bigger and stronger so that she could be with her Ranma. Her father stood nearby, book in hand, and would make sure to correct her if her form slipped or if she started to use the wrong muscle groups.

"You're doing great so far, Kasumi. Just a few more reps and we'll move on to the next one."

The new workout had already started to tire her arms. While the eldest Tendo girl was by no means out of shape, most of her athletics were simple calisthenics that helped her keep her trim figure. The weights were a different thing all together, but, with a small grunt, she managed to complete her final two reps, and set the dumb bells to down.

"Well done! Now go get a drink, and we'll move on after you rest for a minute."

Kasumi smiled to herself, while it was something completely new to her, the thought of getting closer to the person she idolized filled Kasumi with purpose, and she was not going to let a little soreness stop her

*****

School was much like Ranma remembered back before his father had taken him to China. Especially the punishments for tardiness. Due to events of his first morning at Furinkan High, he had failed to reach his homeroom in time to beat the late bell, and was forced to stand in the hall with two buckets filled with water while the class proceeded without him. It didn't help that he had to be on guard against Kasumi the night before and barely got more than a few hours sleep. His eyelids drooped and his shoulders slumped down as the weariness washed over him again and again until he was on the verge of sleep. Finally, he couldn't stop himself, and started to doze off in the hall, only to jerk awake again, and splash with water from his buckets in the process. The change was quick as always, and the sudden difference in perspective woke him immediately. Just in time for the end of the first class of the day.
1553322222122211212121122112111121.title: Ranma holding water buckets, what could go wrong?

choices: Ranma is late again.  Outside with buckets!  Again!
Skip to lunch where Ranma talks with the Tendos.
15533222221222112121211221121111212.content:
A short time before Ranma's accident.

Keiko sat in homeroom not far from Nabiki Tendo. The young captain of the rhythmic gymnastics program was in a bind. It would be one month until their bout against St. Bacchus' academy and Kodachi Kuno was once again attacking her competition. Her friend and rival Misa of Tokyo Central had a sprained knee from some mysterious assailant attacking her on the way home. Tokyo Central's bout was the next day against Kodachi's team. If she didn't get someone on her team able to beat the crap out of that woman, then her team would either be too injured to even compete.

Her eyes turned to Nabiki Tendo, the young weightlifting lady. Time and again, she refused to help, requesting cash to be part of the team, cash the team lacked. Nabiki turned her head and looked at Keiko.

Nabiki too heard about the recent attack on that other school's team. It irked her sense of fair competition. At the same time, she wasn't a fighter. "Try my sister Akane," Nabiki said under her mouth. Keiko's eyes lit up. She forgot about the younger Tendo and nodded. She would find her after this period with her five classmates who were part of the team.

-----------

Back to the present

Ranma moved swiftly down the hall. Past the stairs would be the bathroom where she could get some hot water. As she reached the stairs, a gaggle of girls rushing down ran into the powerhouse of muscle. Ranma stopped and felt her heart drop as the girls steadied themselves and looked at her.

The eyes of many of them changed. Shock and curiosity gave way to admiration and hope. ""Who are you?" the leader of the group asked.

"Um . . ." Ranma stuttered. She didn't need some groupies in her school. Life was hard enough with Kasumi under her charm!

"Are you a student here?" Keiko asked, her a lit with hope and a hint of ruthlessness.

"Just transferred in," Ranma said, backing away. More people would be out in the halls and then it would be ten times worse.

"We need your help then," Keiko said.

"We need more than that!" one girl said, her eyes like Kasumi's and that Chinese girl's. Ranma turned and ran down the hall. The girls gave chase after her, but because of her sheer size and power, Ranma was able to make a clear distance between them. She ducked into the school cafeteria where the food was being prepped. No one was there, so she found the hot water and sprayed herself.

Thinking quickly, Ranma grabbed a bucket of soup and was holding it when the girls rushed in. "Careful, the floor's wet," Ranma called, acting concerned. The girls whipped their heads about, like hunting dogs trying to find the elusive scent.

"Did you see a big redhead come through here?" Keiko asked.

"Yeah, she nearly made me spill this! She went out the backdoor," Ranma said. The girls save Keiko gave immediate chase. Keiko stared at Ranma and the baggy clothes he wore.

"You new here?" Keiko asked.

"Um, yep. I just started today," Ranma said. Keiko nodded.

"I saw you from my classroom earlier. You came with Akane Tendo. You know her well?" Keiko asked.

"Not really. I just moved into her neighborhood," Ranma said. He really wanted to get out of this situation. He didn't want her to realize he is the redhead. Keiko nodded and ran after her teammates.

Ranma sighed and set down the pot. He hurried off to get to his next class.
15533222221222112121211221121111212.title: Rhythmic Problems

choices: Ranma agrees to it
Ranma requires more persuading
155332222212221121212112211211112122.content:
The first half of the school day felt like an eternity, and the accidental discovery of his cursed form to a few of the school's girls made it even more stressful. When the teacher finally dismissed them for lunch, the pigtailed boy was more than happy to leave the classroom as soon as possible, find a nice tree to sit in, and eat. The meal Kasumi had made for him was massive and filled with so much delicious food it almost made up for the frustration he had felt since that morning. As he reclined peacefully on the branch he had claimed as his seat, he noticed two familiar figures neared him. The bulky form of Nabiki approached with Akane close behind and both of them looked like they wanted to a word.

"So Ranma, I heard you're better half ran in to one of the girls from school already," Nabiki said snidely as she leaned against the trunk just below him, her hands on her hips and her lats spread so wide they looked like they would burst through the uniform, "Not even here for half a day and you're already starting a following, Saotome. Better hope it doesn't get out of control and causes problems, or you may not be able to keep your secret for very long."

"Not my fault the teacher made me hold pails of water in the hall. There was almost no chance of me staying dry for the entire period!" He said with a huff, and crossed his arms in frustration.

"Yeah, well now I've got the girls' gymnastics team on my case about whether or not I know where to find your better half. Tell me why I shouldn't let them know about your condition."

"C'mon, Nabiki, leave the guy alone. It's only his first day and from what I can see, it's been frustrating enough for him already," Akane said. She knew how her sister could make anyone's school life a pain in the ass from first hand experience, and although she didn't really know much about Ranma yet, she still didn't think he deserved to have his secret outed so abruptly.

Nabiki pondered her sister's words for a moment before she spoke again, "Yeah, I suppose I can cut you a break, provided you help me out and compensate me for my generous nature. You see, the girl you ran into today was looking for a replacement gymnast for the teams upcoming match against a rather notorious individual, and requested that I join as a substitute. Obvious why they would do so," Nabiki proceeded to flex her arms, her muscles strained against the uniform as they swelled upward and outward, "However, I don't really want to do it, so they asked if I could get Akane to do it instead. But...my little sister can be as graceful as a bull wearing rollerskates, and they offered to pay quite well for a replacement..."

"Uh huh," growled Akane as she attempted to glare a hole into her sisters forehead, "so let me guess, you want Ranma's girl form to be the substitute instead, right..." she finished with a deadpan stare.

"Yup. So what do you say Ranma, want to volunteer your services?"
155332222212221121212112211211112122.title: Skip to lunch where Ranma talks with the Tendos.

choices: Ranma fights Kodachi in his male form.
A freak rain comes in, changing Ranma right before the first punch.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222.content:
Ranma glared at Nabiki. "If I fight in my girl form, I could turn every girl watching me into some fanatic like Kasumi," Ranma said.

"Actually, the girls here aren't that different from the boys, and you saw how they wanted to date Akane. So my sister would be quite tame to them," Nabiki noted. Ranma glanced at Akane, who nodded in agreement.

"Another reason to say no," Ranma said. "I ain't doing it."

"Ranma, if that's how you feel, I'll stop pressing the matter," Nabiki said. "Enjoy Kasumi's lunch." Akane glanced down.

"Hey, you got hamburger! That was meant for this weekend's dinner!" Akane yelled.

"Um, I didn't ask her for it," Ranma said quickly. Akane glared at Ranma before leaving with Nabiki.

"We need to find a way to free Kasumi from his other form's charm," Akane said, as part of her wanted to see that glorious muscular form once again.

"Working on that along with a few other things," Nabiki said. "First is getting Ranma to help my classmates."

"I got to say, this is nice of you . . . how much are they paying you to hunt Ranma down?" Akane asked.

"Less than it would cost me to actually fight," Nabiki said. "I got my own competitions coming up. I am not ruining my chances to win this tournament just because I got injured doing gymnastics." Akane nodded. That sounded like her sister.

"So, how will you convince him?" Akane asked. Nabiki smiled at Akane, which made Akane feel uneasy.

------------

Lunch ended and Ranma went back to class. It was a stressful few hours once more. Every whisper about him made him fear someone knew about his secret, that someone would splash him and half the class would become enamored with him and half the boys would get erections.

With the final bell, Ranma got up and bolted from the school, not even waiting for Akane and Nabiki. But his race didn't go far. Kasumi was waiting for him outside the school grounds. He looked at her and felt she didn't seem quite right. It was her clothes, Ranma realized. She wasn't wearing a dress like she had the day before or in any of the photos he saw of her around the house. She was wearing baggy clothes too big for her frame.

"Wife," Kasumi said softly with a smile. "I mean, Husband." She bowed her head.

"Um, hi Kasumi," Ranma said.

"Are you going for a run?" Kasumi asked.

"Just home. Why?" Ranma asked.

"Nabiki was correct in saying I needed to become stronger. I am not the most fit person. Would you mind if I joined you?" Kasumi asked.

"Um, not at all," Ranma said, "You know the streets better than me." Kasumi smiled and led Ranma away from the school.

-----------

Nabiki watched from the distance as she spoke with friends. Kasumi was with Ranma. Well, that could change how things go, but the die was already cast. She couldn't stop it if she tried.

------------

Kodachi Kuno fumed at the letter sent to her. The Furinkan Rhythmic Gymnastics team sent her a letter saying her opponent would be a person named Saotome and more than a match for her frail body. These commoners dare think she, Kodachi Kuno, would be bested by a commoner? They would be mistaken.

"Saotome would be wearing a red Chinese-style shirt and have a pigtail" the letter read. She watched from a distance as this boy-looking girl met with another woman and they jogged off together. Kodachi followed along. They were moving into the park. An excellent place to ambush her.

------------

Kasumi was happy with herself. She was sweating but running felt good. Her leg muscles pushed hard against the ground as Ranma kept pace. That was one benefit, she supposed of the smaller male form. Her muscular goddess would have been practically walking to keep pace with Kasumi's run speed.

"Hey Kasumi, question for ya," Ranma said.

"Anything, Ranma," Kasumi said, between breaths.

"Nabiki, when she wants someone to do something, what would she do to make it happen?" Ranma asked.

"Oh, anything from bribery, to threatening with physical force, to taking inappropriate photos of them," Kasumi said. She stopped, and so did Ranma, and looked down at Ranma. "Is she threatening you?" Ranma looked away. He didn't know what to say. He didn't want Kasumi fighting his fights. He was also sure because of his curse, she would side with him no matter what.

Kasumi watched as her betrothed looked unsure about his dilemma. She heard a soft rustle and turned to see some roses on the ground in a bouquet. They weren't there before. Reaching down, a gas blasted out from them. She gasped in shock, accidentally inhaling some of the fumes.

"Kasumi!" Ranma yelled as he heard her gasp. He pulled her away from the flowers and looked about.

"It would seem I missed my target," came a voice. Ranma watched as a woman in a black leotard came from the shadows. "No matter, I will dispense of you personally." Ranma felt her eyes scan him. "You really are quite the flat-chested young woman. Are you sure you are a high schooler?" She laughed in a mocking way. Ranma clenched his hands.

He didn't mind enemy attacks on him. He could defend himself just fine. But Kasumi wasn't a fighter. "You're going to pay for this."

"I doubt a girl like you could beat me," Kodachi replied in the same tone. "Try to lay one punch on me." Ranma glanced to make sure Kasumi was breathing fine. She seemed in pain, but was not in serious harm. He turned to Kodachi ans ran at her.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222.title: Not Helping in Keeping a Low Profile

choices: Kodachi lands, and puts together a new plan to defeat her opponent
Kasumi gets a little handsy on their way home
15533222221222112121211221121111212222.content:
High above the heads of the pigtailed martial artist and the side ponytail wearing gymnast, dark clouds began to gather, as if summoned. Five minutes prior, the sky was clear and blue, but now cumulonimbus clouds, fat with water, converged on Nerima. Heeding the call of an unknown power, the liquid laden veil released its payload on the small, three block radius of its target.

When the first droplets of water hit Ranma's skin, he was struggling with his urge to not punch the sinister young woman before him, and each second of her mocking laughter made it more difficult to control. Then, the change happened, as a familiar numb tingle prickled through his body as his form shifted and he became a hulking, muscular she.

"Wha...what has happened to you?" Kodachi gasped as she began to back away.

"I don't know who you are, but I don't like it when psychos attack me for no reason, and I especially don't like it when they involve bystanders," Ranma growled as she looked over her shoulder to check on Kasumi, who was on the ground and not moving. The Saotome girl snarled, and made a show of cracking her knuckles as she closed the gap between herself and the much smaller teenager. The redhead's muscles twitched as she got them ready to put Kodachi in a world of hurt.

Kodachi felt fear creep into the back of her mind as she stared into the deep blue eyes of the pissed off amazon. This was mixed with an odd sense of wonder and awe that the scarlet haired bodybuilder created in the Kuno heiress.

*****

Across the narrow sea which separated Japan from the mainland, a purple haired warrior woman finished with her extensive workout. After meeting the mysterious redhead months ago, Shampoo and some of her fellow tribeswomen had begun to try and emulate the physique of the godly stranger. They had waited until they could proudly stand before her with bodies built following her example.

Shampoo wiped the sweat from her face with a towel, a smile on her face as she looked over her transformed body in a full length mirror. No longer was she a lithe beauty, she was now a shining example of strength throughout her village, with muscles that were built with the help of the ancient supplements and elixirs from her village's 3,000 year history. Now she felt confident enough to search for the incredible woman who changed her life, even if her great grandmother wanted her to take a couple more of her amazonian sisters with her.

*****

Kasumi's eyes were transfixed on the wondrous visage of her intended, watching as the burly woman she had fallen for was about to defend her from an attacker, just like a fairy tale knight in shining armor. Of course, she couldn't move from where she was, as whatever was in the gas she had been hit with had some sort of paralysis effect that rendered her whole body numb. She watched as Ranma closed the distance to Kodachi, and the two began their violent exchange.

Kodachi took a leap back, and brought her trusty ribbon to bear. With a flick of her wrist, he entangled the wide forearm of the girl who would dare oppose her, and pulled it taut.

"I have you now, you ogre of a woman," the gymnast laughed as she held her ribbon tightly in her hand.

This smug confidence, however, did not last three seconds. Ranma, angry beyond speech, took hold of the piece of clothe that was ensnared around her arm. With a hard yank, she rocketed Kodachi off her feet, and began to spin her overhead like a helicopter rotor. The Kuno girl quickly became a blur of motion, and indiscernible cries. With one last, mighty heave she sent the attacker towards the horizon, and out of sight.

With the threat gone, Ranma turned back to the downed Kasumi, and checked her over with worried hands to see if she had suffered any injuries.

"It's okay Ranma, dear, I'm fine," Kasumi reassured the larger girl, though she did enjoy the attention. Kodachi's poison, while fast acting, appeared to be just as quick to ebb.

"Well, I still want to make sure you get home okay, so for now..." Ranma explained, as she leaned down, and gathered the young woman in her arms into a princess carry. Kasumi was stunned into stillness for a few seconds, but overcame it fast, and snuggled into the muscular pec of her beloved redhead. She spent the walk home in blissful silence.
15533222221222112121211221121111212222.title: Kodachi meets Ranma's bigger half

choices: Kasumi and Ranma kiss.  Kasumi feels a rush as she grows much larger.
Genma stops the kiss before the lips meet.  He is obviously scared.
155332222212221121212112211211112122221.content:
