Kodachi tumbled in the sky as she flew. She didn't know where she was exactly, but she kept on going and going. The metal of Tokyo city was gone as she descended into a deep forest. She hit the first branch hard, but it slowed her down a little. She crashed through about three dozen more before she landed. Her body ached as she laid on the ground. Her leotard was ripped in several places. She crefully moved each limb. Nothing felt broken. She sighed in relief that this could have been a lot worse. She carefully stood up on her feet and tried to get her bearings, but with the sun behind her, all she knew was the ogre woman threw her to the west.

Kodachi felt an odd surge of emotions. One was a fury that that ogre dare not to have the courtesy of being defeated. The other emotion was an admiration for the ogre. She was Powerful, Kodachi respected that fact now. She wasn't some weakling like Kodachi bested before. Once the maiden was enraged, she became that . . . that . . . . ogre. To fight that monstrosity, one would need to become a monster. She would need power to match that beast.

And she only had a month to gain that level of strength.

She started her slow trek home.

-------------

Ranma felt awkward as she carried Kasumi. The shorter woman's hands rubbed against Ranma's arms and chest, while Kasumi's face was nestling against her large breast. Ranma wanted her to stop, to not do that, but she couldn't bring herself to say the words. First, Kasumi had been injured because of Ranma, that left her some guilt about the situation. If Kasumi touching her helped pay back that, that was fine. Second . . . she didn't mind it right now. Maybe because she knew Kasumi it wasn't as bad as it was with that crazy Amazon girl. Kasumi's gentle loving of her body didn't make Ranma uneasy like before.

Sure, some people on the street were watching her and seeing her, possibly becoming enamored, but Ranma was moving at a good fast walk for her size, which would be a dead run in her guy form. So people keeping up was unlikely.

"Ranma, do you have to change back?" Kasumi asked.

"Yeah. I don't want to be stuck in this form forever. It is hard to get inside places," Ranma said.

"But you are so beautiful," Kasumi said. "I want a body like this one so badly."

"Ya do?"

"Oh yes. You are a symbol of beauty and power. Plus, with a body like this one, you wouldn't ever have to fear hurting me in bed," Kasumi said. Ranma's face went deep red as she came to the Tendo estate. Her heart raced at the thought of having sex with Kasumi.

----------

Nabiki sat at her bedroom desk. She worked on the math problems before her. Ranma and Kasumi weren't back yet. Part of her didn't like baiting Kodachi with that letter, but based on what she knew of Ranma, the guy didn't like a direct challenge. If Kodachi gave him one, he would have to agree to compete.

Glancing out the window, she spotted Ranma coming down the street. The muscular behemoth's head was higher than the wall. As she turned into the gate, Nabiki saw Kasumi in Ranma's arms.

"What happened?" Nabiki muttered as she kept watching.

--------

"C-C-Can you stand?" Ranma asked, trying to forget that last comment.

"Hmm. Let's see," Kasumi said. Ranma nodded and lowered Kasumi down. She slid off Ranma's moist arms from the rain and found herself steady on the ground. "Thank you Ranma."

"It wasn't any trouble," Ranma said, as she started to move back.

"No, wait," Kasumi said firmly. Ranma paused. "You saved me, Ranma. You deserve a reward."

"I d-do?" Ranma asked. "Well, you gave me the hamburger meat for lunch." Kasumi shook her head.

"You are like a knight in shining armor," Kasumi said, moving closer. "And I am your princess. It is customary to give one's knight a kiss." Ranma's face went deep red. Kasumi leaned her head up to grace her beloved's lip with her own.
155332222212221121212112211211112122221.title: Luck and Rewards

choices: Kasumi is rather cold to his guy side, almost like he was a different person
Kasumi is equally as devoted to his male side
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
Kasumi set her lips to those of the shocked pigtailed girl, and her body was immediately filled with an overwhelming heat that ran from the crown of her head to the tips of her fingers and toes. It was as if she had been submerged in molten steel, but instead of excruciating pain, the young woman was awash with mind blowing pleasure. Her eyes blurred as her body was bombarded by the intense sensations that flowed into her through the other woman's lips. Kasumi's fingers gripped the sides of Ranma's face tightly as she tried to deepen the kiss as much as possible. Her tongue managed to slip through and greet her goddess'. where the two entwined.

The chestnut haired homemaker was too engrossed in the incomparable pleasure she was feeling to notice the incredible metamorphosis she had undergone. Ranma had not noticed either, as her vision was filled with Kasumi's face. Nabiki, on the other hand, saw the whole thing. While the two of them were lip-locked, Kasumi's body grew with each second that passed. Her once gentle curves became more sculpted, her once flat stomach rose in the form of a tight set of abs, and her arms and legs ballooned with muscle until they shredded the clothes that covered them. Soon, the older sister was in nothing but her panties and bra, the latter of which had snapped and was only held in place by gravity and sweat.

Another change occurred at the same time, inside Kasumi's mind. Before, the Tendo daughter had kept her in high regard, like one would a professor, but now it was multiplied many times over, She saw Ranma as a true goddess, and she was her devoted servant.

The sudden increase in the weight of the woman she held in her arms was the first thing that alerted Ranma that something was amiss. Once the enamored Kasumi finally pulled out of their deep kiss, Ranma saw for herself what had occurred. Gone was the gentle looking woman she had known, replaced by a muscular amazon with a body that was only surpassed by Ranma's own. In a matter of moments she had gained a physique that was buffer than Nabiki's by a considerable amount.

"I ain't a pervert," came a voice. Ryoga and Akane turned to see the behemoth Ranma walk into the room. Akane felt her heart skip a beat, but her rage beat down that desire to touch Ranma. Ranma turned her gaze to the new young woman not three feet from her. "Who are you?"

"Ranma, I don't want to talk with you right now," Akane said. Ryoga turned from Ranma to Akane, and back to Ranma. She snarled.

"You? You! You were the one who did this!" Ryoga yelled. "Die Ranma!" Ryoga raced forward and punched Ranma in the hard abs. If it hurt Ryoga, she didn't show it. She kept punching the abs without relenting.

Ranma took the hits as they felt like nothing to her strong body. "Wait, Ryoga?" Ranma said, recognizing the clothing now. She reached down and lifted up the cursed girl with ease until she was eye-level. "What happened to you?"

Ryoga glared hatefully as she tried opening Ranma's hand but failed. She was as strong, if not stronger than Kasumi. "You ran into me in China. You smacked me into a cursed pool of water!"

"And now you become a girl when you get wet?" Ranma asked.

"Obviously," Ryoga said.

"I knew there was more to my size than those waters," Ranma said. Ryoga began to calm down as she looked deep into Ranma's eyes. It wasn't so bad being held up like this. Or being cursed. She was close with Akane now. Akane was a great friend. And being near someone powerful like Ranma wouldn't be bad either. Having them as allies over enemies would be smart.

-------------

Nabiki figured what was going to happen and slowly moved upstairs with her book. She started at the first page, reading the work slowly and carefully. Sometimes books would give warnings only after the ritual or spell.

The first spells of transformation were rather simple. They involved changing one's hair color. "What would I look like with platinum blonde hair?" Nabiki muttered as she past Kasumi's door. It wasn't fully closed.

"Now my pet, lick my biceps," she heard Kasumi say in a commanding tone. Nabiki paused and looked inside. There on Kasumi's right arm was a tiny figure with long black hair. "Now now. Do you want me to take your thimble, Kodachi-chan?" Nabiki's eyes narrowed and realized the tiny figure was in fact a tiny Kodachi Kuno.

Nabiki moved away from the door and nodded. "Well, that explains where this came from. Something must have backfired," Nabiki said. She smiled. A tiny Koadhi meant these spells and rituals and potions weren't just for show. But something happened to make Kodachi shrink. Obviously that wasn't her intention. Nabiki would need to read more of this book before trying anything.

----------

Akane watched as Ryoga's face began to change. It was softening. Her heart began to race. What would happen if Ryoga became enamored with Ranma like Kasumi? Would Ryoga still feel that way in his guy form? She had to stop them from looking at each other. But how?
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.title: Cursed Ranma meet Cursed Ryoga

choices: The next day
Akane and Ryoga talk that night, and Kasumi finally makes progress with Kodachi
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
The fear of losing her new friend to the powerful charms of her new housemate, Akane moved fast, and tossed the steaming water at the both of them. The two cursed individuals screamed in stereo as the near boiling liquid splashed them, and they reverted back to their male selves. Ranma was practically swimming in the clothing he wore, and Ryoga expression was back to a death glare once more.

"Let go of me, Ranma," the lost boy snarled, as he tore the hands from his body. "You'll pay manhandling me like that!"

"You're the one who attacked me, idiot." Ranma shot back. "Look, I don't have time for this right now, Ryoga. I need to change my clothes, again, and think. Can we save this whole petty feud for another day? It's too late for this right now."

"Don't you dare make light of my grudge! But you have a point. We'll settle this another time, Ranma."

The Saotome boy left for the guest bedroom, and Akane and Ryoga wear alone once more.

"It's getting late, and I should probably get going." Ryoga stated as he went to grab his bag, only to be stopped by Akane's hand.

"You don't have to leave if you don't want to. It is still pouring rain out there, and I'm sure you don't want to change back so quickly. You can sleep in the living room if you want." the girl offered with a shy smile.

"Ummm...are you sure that's okay?" the lost boy asked.

"It's fine. You might get lost if you leave now. We can have something like a sleepover. I'm sure daddy won't mind."

A blushing, but happy smile on his face, Ryoga gave a small nod of acceptance before he followed Akane to a room to change into one of his spare sets of clothing.

*****

Nabiki thoroughly read the first section of the book, and did so twice more after she finished. This was magic she was dealing with, after all, and only a fool would use it without knowing all the risks involved beforehand. The most important thing she learned was that the book was also the source of the magic power needed to cast its spells, and that none of them would work without physical contact with it. After she was sure that she had the knowledge she needed to safely test a spell, the mercenary girl did just that.

The spell she chose was small in scale, and one with the least chance of a horrible backfire. If successful, it would alter the color of a piece of cloth to one of her choosing. She had a cute, pink shirt, "borrowed" from Akane, hanging in her closet, and with a small chant and discharge of mystic energy, she changed it to green. Nabiki then learned how important visualization would be, as instead of basic green like she thought, it turned to a disgusting green one would see in vomit. Just one more thing she would need to keep in mind if she continued with her little experiment.

*****

In another part of Tokyo, in a large, well maintained estate, Nodoka Saotome stood in her home office. Her body was of unprecedented muscle mass, and only the specially tailored kimono she wore could bear the strain of her flexed muscles. Before her were two smaller, but still muscular, women who each wore business suits and held a clipboard. The broad body of Nodoka blotted out the setting sun's light and covered them in her shadow.

"So, have you managed to locate my son and husband after you lost them in China?" asked the Saotome matriarch.

"While we don't know what the did in China, our team has managed to piece together some clues, and have determined that they have arrived back in Japan." a chestnut haired teenager answered.

"Have they managed to determine where,exactly, they entered the country, Ukyo?" Nodoka asked.

"Not yet, mistress, but given a few more weeks, and we should be able to narrow it down.

Ukyo Kuonji was very proud to serve the woman Nodoka Saotome. If not for her finding the young girl after Ranma and Genma had left with her father's cart, she would have been doomed to live life as a boy until she either killed Ranma, or married him. When Nodoka heard of this, she had a short, but intense talk with the Kuonji father, and the matter was settled quickly, with a new cart being given as recompense for her husband's actions. It was then she extended the invitation to Ukyo, who had become enraptured by the beauty and strength of Nodoka.

"Let me know as soon as you find anything." were the last orders Nodoka gave for the day.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.title: Akane intervenes again, and Nabiki experiments

choices: It's Akane and Nabiki.
It's either Shampoo or her crew, or Ukyo.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
Kasumi's alarm trilled softly. Her massive hand slapped down on it. She blinked slowly as the pre-dawn sky was still outside her window. She couldn't remember why she set her alarm so early for a moment. But her mind rebooted and she knew. She had to atone for her sin yesterday. Her love for her goddess swayed her from her duties to her family and her goddess. She failed to make dinner.

Now she would make a hearty breakfast for everyone there. She pulled on some still tight clothes and opened the box cover of her pet's home. Kodachi slept curled up under a handkerchief Kasumi let her use as a blanket. Poor pet worked hard cleaning her master's body. She seemed into it by the end.

She recovered the box and left her room as quietly as possible.

----------

Ryoga opened his eyes and was scared. He was in an unfamiliar place. Something heavy was moving by him and his instincts warned him of danger. In the low light from the hall, he saw a towering muscular figure and soon recognized her as Kasumi. He rubbed his neck in fear. Some urges called his attention and he found the rope Akane had tied to the dining room table. He took hold and followed it to the bathroom. He laughed at the idea of it, but it was very useful to not getting lost.

-------------

About a half-hour later, Ranma slowly opened his eyes. Something was off. He wasn't in girl form. He was on his futon. It was his father. Or the lack there of. Dad never came back the previous night. That was odd and out of character. He would always come back to whatever house they were renting, or in some cases squatting at. He looked out the window to see the sun's rays beating back the night. It was probably around six am.

-----------

Akane and Nabiki both awoke and got dressed for their typical morning workout routines. They found Ranma-kun slouching his way to the stairs. "Morning," Nabiki said with a smile. "Your face looks a bit red."

"Blame Akane. She doused me with scaling water last night," Ranma said.

"You were about to kiss Ryoga. Did you want another person like Kasumi fawning over you?" Akane asked. "Especially if he kept it up in his real form?" Ranma shuddered.

"Wait, Ryoga can turn into a girl?" Nabiki asked.

"Yeah. But he doesn't become a muscular giant," Ranma said. "And Pops ain't here to answer questions either." Nabiki moved down past the stairs and looked in one room.

"Dad didn't come home either," Nabiki said.

"That's not like him at all," Akane said in a worried tone.

"Let's do our run. We can talk later," Nabiki said as the smell of cooked food wafted upstairs.

--------

The three soon entered the kitchen. Ryoga was standing there in female form whipping up some eggs in a large bowl. Kasumi was at the stove preparing some rice.

"Ryoga, what happened?" Akane asked.

"I forgot to turn on the hot water when I splashed my face in the bathroom," Ryoga said.

"Actually, I think we ran out of hot water and we need to get some piping and boiler repaired," Kasumi said. Nabiki turned her eyes to Ranma. He shifted uncomfortably in a guilty way.

"Well, we're going for our run Kasumi," Akane said. The enhanced sister nodded.

"Breakfast will be ready in about thirty minutes," Kasumi said. She had a glass of water she was drinking from near her. Nabiki walked to her sister's side.

"If you splash Ranma, you might lose her," Nabiki said softly. Kasumi's body tensed up. Her hand gripped the pan handle and started to deform it. She looked down at her sister with dark eyes. "Ranma almost kissed Ryoga last night. You don't want competition for him, do you?" Kasumi said nothing for a moment. In an equally soft voice she replied.

"I can't tell if you are sincere in your actions or trying to manipulate me." Nabiki said nothing as she slid away. She and Akane soon went out for a run.

-----------

Ukyo smiled as she jogged. Six miles she had been running each morning for quite a while now. With her powerful body, it was an easy time. She enjoyed thinking how her destiny always led her to Nodoka. Had she joined Ranma and Genma on their trip, she would have met the beautiful matriarch. Even with them running off, she still found her and was blessed by her.

Life was good for her.

----------

Shampoo and her crew made port and passed through the customs agents without issue. Though, it was fun to see the 5'5" guards try to pat them down. "Remember, look for either form of the goddess and her valet," Shampoo said to her comrade. She held up cursed and uncursed pictures of the pair. The Jusenkyo tour guide was so helpful. He normally is quite tight lip about others who were cursed, but Shampoo convinced him otherwise. Her comrades nodded and departed. They spread out into the streets of Nerima.

----------

Genma and Soun walked slowly back to the Tendo estate. Both had severe hangovers. But his survival instincts were still going strong. He felt an ominous change in the winds. Something was going to happen soon.

The hairs on his neck raised up as he felt someone was running towards them. His heart quickened and turned to look.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.title: Day Three at the Tendos

choices: The fathers arrive and breakfast begins
What is Nodoka up to
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
It was an peculiar contrast to see Soun's two youngest daughters running side by side was Genma's first thought as he saw the pair run towards them. That was forgotten as he saw Nabiki's eyes lock onto their position and her body began to move faster towards the two fathers. Before they could react, the muscular girl was already within arm's reach of the two, her eyes slightly narrowed in accusation.

"Good morning father, Mr. Saotome. Didn't see you last night." Nabiki started, her snide words caused the two to flinch. Her nose twitched as she caught the unmistakable stench of alcohol on the fathers, "Out having fun, were you?"

"G...good morning, Nabiki. So nice to see you..." Soun said nervously as sweat formed on his face. Akane pulled alongside her sister, and watched the exchange silently.

"Save it, dad. There are a lot of answers I think Mr. Saotome owes us about Ranma's girl side, and I better see the both of you at breakfast so you can give us some of them, or I will make your life very unpleasant until you do." Nabiki threatened.

Soun swallowed hard,as he knew that his daughter had both the means and know how to follow through on her words if he pissed her off, and nodded, defeated.

"Come along, Saotome, old friend, we...we best get home before we miss out on Kasumi's wonderful breakfast."

"But Tendo..." Genma started, before Soun's frantic head shakes told him that this was not a battle they could win.

The two fathers turned towards home, and walked, shoulders slouched and feet dragging behind them, as the dread what was to come.

*****

Back at the Tendo home, Ranma and Ryoga sat silently across from each other as the sounds of Kasumi's cooking filtered in from the kitchen. The lost boy's face was locked in a quiet snarl as he tried to stare a hole through his rival's skull.

"Look, Ryoga," Ranma sighed, "I know you think it's my fault that all that stuff happened to you while you were looking for me, and I'm sorry if I knocked you into Jusenkyo, but I was kinda in a panic at the time, and didn't see you there. You can be mad at me if you want, but I think it'll be better for everyone if we at least act nice to each other in the house."

"Why should I act nice with you at all, Ranma. I've seen hell because of you." was Ryoga's growled rebuttal.

"Because Kasumi gets upset when you aren't, and Akane gets upset when Kasumi is." Ranma explained.

"I...guess you have a point." Ryoga admitted, "but I won't forgive you so easy, Ranma. You ran out on our fight, and I will get my revenge, even if we can't fight here."

The silence resumed, as the two patiently waited for their first meal of the day.

*****

Kodachi yawned and stretched her pained muscles as she woke. At first, she couldn't remember where she was or why she wasn't in her bed, but then the memories came flooding back. She could still taste the Tendo girl's flesh and sweat on her tongue, and it was a reminder of the humiliation she suffered. At some point her memories got fuzzy, and she could have sworn she started to enjoy it slightly, but she fiercely denied that she was capable of liking such treatment.

She examined her surroundings, and saw that she was once again inside the box, except this time she could hear the clatter of plates, and a strong smell of fried eggs wafted through the air holes of her container. She was shocked out of her thoughts when the lid of her prison was lifted and the giant face of her captor filled her vision.

"I thought that you could use some food after how much work you did last night," Kasumi said, and placed a tea cup saucer with bits of toast, and bacon into the box. "Clear your plate, and we can move on to the next part of your training," the Tendo girl finished with a smile.

Kodachi wanted so much not to eat the offered food, but her stomach would not let her pass up on the meal, not after all the energy she used the night before. Soon, she was inhaling her food as a satisfied Kasumi watched.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.title: It's Akane and Nabiki.

choices: Ranma is too flustered & trying to appease Kasumi to continue questioning Genma
Ranma quells Kasumi's fears and returns his focus to Genma.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
Akane, Nabiki, and the fathers arrived as Kasumi brought down a cleared plate from upstairs. "Good morning father," Kasumi said brightly before she walked to the kitchen.

"My sweet Kasumi," Soun muttered and resolved himself. He too wanted more answers from his dear old friend.

The four walked into the dining area and Akane sat next to Ryoga. "Akane," Soun said, standing still, "Who is this boy?" Ryoga broke away from glaring at Ranma and held his breath.

"He's my friend., father. He had no place to stay last night," Akane said. Soun's mustache twitched in agitation.

"Don't worry. Ryoga stayed on the couch all night," Nabiki said as Kasumi brought in the breakfast platter before sitting next to Ranma. Ranma didn't notice as he was silently staring at his father.

"Now, let's eat," Kasumi said. Soun nodded and sat on Ranma's other side. Genma sat on Ryoga's other side if only because he wanted to have some distance between him and his son. Plates were filled and a few bites were enjoyed in peace and calm before the inevitable storm.

"So pops, do you know why Kasumi grew so big?" Ranma asked. Genma glared at his son, but felt a threatening presence from right next to Ranma. Both Soun and Kasumi were watching him intently. He knew if he wanted to stay here rent free, he would have to talk. Genma shook his head.

"It's because of your mother," Genma said. "She has a body just like your cursed form."

"Go on," Akane said firmly.

"She never knew why, but if she kissed another girl, they would balloon up with muscle. She also somehow encouraged women to get stronger," Genma said.

"You mean like a motivational speaker?" Ryoga asked, very happy Akane saved him from being kissed by Ranma last night.

"No. Her presence caused women to develop muscles quickly. It also led them to be enamored with her," Genma said.

Nabiki ate her meal quietly and listened. Her stoic face contained her excitement and wonder. Was that appearance just a fluke? Could Ranma be related to Nodoka? Her Nodoka?

"Is there any way to reverse it?" Ranma asked Kasumi turned her head towards Ranma.

"You . . . don't want my body?" she whispered. Tears came to her eyes.

"Look at what you did boy!" Genma yellled, sensing a means of ending this conversation.

-----------

Nodoka sat at her heavy oak desk. Yesterday's gym earnings reports sat there for review. She looked past them at the photos of her beloved husband and son. She had kept her word to not directly interfere with Genma's raising of Ranma. That wasn't to say she was ignorant of their adventures. She regularly had someone watching, taking photos of the pair. There Ranma was in his previous school's uniform. It sat next to other moments she could only watch from afar. The oldest photo on her desk was her in a traditional wedding kimono, holding up her beloved Genma in the typical bridal carry means.

She smiled and touched that picture. She loved her husband and son. With Ranma now sixteen years old and practically an adult, she hoped they would return to her home.

She paused for a moment. "There was someone in one part of Tokyo. A close friend from his training days," Nodoka recalled. "Son Tenshin, was it? Oh. I don't remember. What district could he be living in? Would Genma go there?" She considered the possibility. If there was a chance for a free place to stay, Genma would sleep practically anywhere.

--------

"Kasumi, it isn't that I don't like your body . . ." Ranma said, blushing and looking at the people staring at him before returning to looking at his gigantic fiance. Her hurt face staring down at him.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.title: Breakfast Talks

choices: Genma continues with his explanation
Genma is saved by a school day
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
The sight of a girl crying was one thing Ranma just couldn't handle, and it showed as her tried to clumsily explain what he meant to quell her sadness.

"All I meant was...was that I was worried about the effect I was having on your mind. Pops said that women would become enamored with my mom, and I was afraid that I was causing you to like me against your will," Ranma explained as best he could. "Of course I like you with all those muscles, I just didn't want you to like me because something out of my control forced you to."

"Really?" Kasumi sniffed as she wiped the tears from her eyes.

"Yes, I love your body as is." Ranma confirmed.

"Thank you, Ranma. I really needed to hear that. And don't worry about the other thing, I know I would have loved you regardless of your other form."

Ranma smiled, but was still unconvinced by the girl's words, but chose not to say otherwise lest she start to cry once more. Instead, he turned back to his father, and stared down the old man before he asked his next question.

"So, why didn't you tell me about this when I first got cursed."

*****

Shampoo and her troop had been quick to find out which direction the muscular maiden had gone once they started their search in earnest. While there had been a few distractions, as a couple of her sisters had gotten distracted by the culture of their host country, Shampoo had managed to move them along, and was sure that they were within a single day of tracking down their mysterious quarry.

"It seems that the two of them passed through here heading towards a a place called Nerima," one of Shampoo's companions said, "I overheard someone say they saw a massive red-haired girl and a panda walk through here in that direction."

The Chinese warrior women gathered what little else they could, and turned towards the district.

*****

"Soun Tendo"

After a good deal of thought, the kimono clad woman had finally managed to recall the name of Genma's closest friend. Once Nodoka had remembered her husband's friend, and his actual name, it didn't take her long to put the rest of the pieces together. She recalled that the two of them were disciples under the same man, and that Genma claimed they suffered many hardships together under their horrid master. It was a sure bet that if he was back in Japan, he would head for his old friend's home, looking for a place to stay for no charge.

It was one of Genma's shortcomings that she had learned of after he left on the training journey with their son. He would swindle people in any way he could, be it for food, or a place to stay, and had used their son as a bargaining chip many times. There were a great many girls in Japan that were almost betrothed to her son if not for her timely interventions. Well, most of them were now happy members of her gym, and couldn't hold it against her husband too much, as he was trying to get through the journey without any financial assistance from her.

Nodoka grabbed her office phone, it looked tiny her her large hand, and dialed one of her assistants to inform them of the new lead she had, and requested the current location of the man who had trained beside her husband.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.title: Ranma quells Kasumi's fears and continues

choices: Follow Nabiki as she makes her phone call to Nodoka.
Follow Ranma, or back Kasumi as she tends to her pet.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
"I trained you to expect the unexpected boy. You obviously need more training," Genma said. Ryoga chuckled at the comment.

"How was I supposed to expect I would look like my mother if I got turned into a girl?" Ranma asked back.

"Actually, that does make some sense." Nabiki injected. "I mean the whole looking like the other parent. If one of us were a turned into a guy, we could look a little more like dad."

"Nabiki, don't inject to another conversation," Kasumi said softly.

"Well, he never showed me photos of her except head shots," Ranma said. "I didn't know she had a muscular body."

"I am a man who appreciates a strong woman, one who I wouldn't have to fear being alone if some predator was about," Genma said.

"How big is mom?" Ranma asked.

"Probably a half-foot to foot taller than your other form," Genma said.

"Only the deranged would attack someone that big," Akane said.

"Well, while this is good. We need to head to school," Nabiki said. She walked away from the table.

"Okay. I propose we table this conversation until dinner," Soun said. Kasumi turned to Ranma.

"I wo't make a mistake and forget your dinner again," she promised. Ryoga looked worried at Akane.

"Um, what should I do?" Ryoga asked, as Soun glared at the boy.

"Dad, Ryoga gets lost easily. Can he spend the day here?" Akane asked her father. Soun glared some more.

"I could use the help cleaning father. Wonderful as my body is, the tiny details are hard for me to work on," Kasumi said. She turned to look at Ryoga. Soun looked at his mammoth daughter.

"Well, if you think you can keep watch over him, I won't object he stays. You will help with cleaning, won't you boy?" Soun asked. Ryoga nodded.

"Yes sir," Ryoga said. Akane smiled and went to get changed herself.

-----------

Nabiki pulled out of her dresser a business card. Nodoka had given it to her after her mentorship ended. "Call me anytime if you want to get into business or more lifting." she said.

"I might just do that from a school phone," Nabiki said with a smile. She didn't want to be overheard on the house line.

She finished changing.

-------------

Tatewaki Kuno looked about his house. "Sasuke," he called. The imp-like man appeared. "Where is my sister? She usually leaves by now."

"I believe she had an important meeting sir, and couldn't wait to say goodbye as she typically does," Sasuke lied. Tatewaki nodded.

"Alright. You look tired. Is your futon serving you well?"

"Oh, it is a fine futon sir. Thank you for it," Sasuke said. Tatewaki nodded and left.

Sasuke sighed. He didn't like lying to his master, but telling his the mistress had been kidnapped after being shrunk was something he was sure he would be fired for.

No, he best correct this mistake first. That is why he spend all night reading the other magical texts Kodachi owned, but none would have worked to reverse shrinking. That would need the book the mistress had and lost last night.

Did Sasuke dare try to sneak into the Tendo house to save the mistress and book? How long could he keep up the charade hiding his failures?

-----------

The two Tendos and Ranma raced to school once again. "Now Ranma, don't go kissing any girls here. I don't think the desks can take their weight," Nabiki said with a smirk.

"Nabiki, lay off," Ranma said.

"Ranma, we should find your mother. Maybe she knows a way to free Kasumi from your perverted clutches," Akane said.

"Akane, it's not like I wanted this to happen!" Ranma replied.

"It's still your fault," Akane said.

"Maybe I should kiss you to keep you quiet," Ranma said.

"I'll never let you turn me into your slave," Akane said before swinging her bag at Ranma. He dodged easily as the school came into view.

"Now if you two will excuse me, I have some business to attend to," Nabiki said, pulling ahead as they entered.

"Probably more blackmail," Akane said softly as she anticipated the horde once again.

But no one arrived to combat her. She and Ranma reached the entrance without conflict. As they entered, they saw Nabiki stepping into the entrance office.

"What could she need in there?" Akane wondered.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.title: Genma's BS (And not his Education)

choices: Back at Furinkan
At the Tendos
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
Nabiki walked through the halls of the school until she reached the main office. The students of Furinkan High parted for her as she moved, none wished to become the focus of the large mercenary's displeasure. Once in the office, she shooed the secretary out with little problem, picked up the the phone, and dialed.

It had been ages since she last spoke with Nodoka, the woman had such a busy schedule that it didn't feel right to call for just chit-chat. She was trying to run a business, after all, and that was something Nabiki knew better than to interfere with. This time, however, she felt that it was her duty to inform her icon of what had occurred in her home recently.

As she phone rang, Nabiki had to calm herself. The excitement of being able to talk to Lady Nodoka again made her heart pounded so hard in her chest it was almost audible. She wanted to keep a professional front up, it wasn't the time to go all worshipful on her like that.

"Hello, you have reached the office of Nodoka Saotome. Who, may I ask, is calling?" came the all to familiar voice on the other line. Nabiki almost swooned right there, it had been so long since she had talked to her.

"Good morning, Lady Nodoka, this is Nabiki Tendo. We met at the job fair at Furinkan High a while ago."

"Oh yes! I remember you. You showed so much promise in the business world. How are things coming for you ?"

"Things are going well, but that's not why I called. You wouldn't happen to have a husband and son by the names of Genma and Ranma Saotome?"

"Why do you ask," her idol asked with a bit of an edge to her voice.

"Because they are currently staying at my house, you have the same last name, and Genma's description of his wife sounded exactly like you."

"You don't say. My dear, would you mind if I were to visit you later this evening so that I may meet them?" Nodoka requested.

"Oh, of course I don't mind. I would be delighted!" Nabiki said excitedly. "I can even give you directions if you wish."

*****

A shiver of fear resonated from Genma's very core. He dropped his game piece because of the tremor, and missed his chance to move three more of his pieces while his friend was distracted. He didn't know what the specifics were, but only Nodoka had ever inspired such a reaction from his danger sense.

This day was going to be terrible, he could feel it.

*****

The final plate had been scrubbed clean and put away, and Ryoga was all the happier for it. He had been made to help wash the dishes with Kasumi, and she still hadn't forgiven him for trying to hit Ranma, and the glares she gave him had become unnerving. Due to the issues with the house's plumbing, only cold water was available, and Ryoga had been splashed immediately after they had started. With a sigh, the female Hibiki plodded through the rest of the dishes and once the last dish was done, she followed the larger woman out of the kitchen, and took a seat in the living room, where she would spend most of her day thinking about what she had learned about Ranma and his mother.

Ryoga had promised to remain in the living room unless he asked someone to lead him if he wanted to go somewhere else. So there Ryoga sat, still a girl, as she waited for Kasumi to return. Ranma's fiancée had promised to bring him some hot water after she had finished the rest of her chores for the morning. She could only watch television for now, and wait for her host to give her their next task.

*****

Kasumi had returned to the kitchen to retrieve her little pet's box and take it back to her room. Even though she still had a few more chores to take care of before her sisters and beloved Ranma returned home, she could not afford to slack on Kodachi's training. Her father and his friend were busy playing a game, and Ryoga had been told not to leave the living room without someone leading him, so for now she was free to take make sure the tiny girl was more obedient and respectful.

Once inside her room, she placed the box on her bed and started the next phase of Kodachi's training. She would show the girl just how painful being disobedient would be, and how pleasant doing as she was told was.

*****

Nodoka had gathered her attendants, and hailed her driver after she dressed her finest kimono for her reunion with her husband and son. Unfortunately, Ukyo had to attend school, and wouldn't be able to join them until much later. For now, though, she was attended by two of her closest associates, who had received the gift of her kiss. They had been the biggest help to her since Genma's absence, and helped her deal with her needs since he could not. After all, she could never cheat on Genma with another man.

It would be a short ride to the Tendo residence, and after she arrived, she could finally see the two biggest loves of her life. She couldn't wait.

choices: Genma tries booking it.  But Hinata has been watching with her Byakugan.
Genma shows some courage and goes to meet his wife.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
Nabuki left the school office and made it to the class before the bell rung. She was so excited. With luck Lady Nodoka would be there when she got home. She had to keep her mouth shut to not ruin the surprise for Ranma.

"Nabiki. Hey Nabiki," came a voice near her as she sat down. She turned to see Keiko, the captain of the Rhythmic Gymnastic team. "You okay?"

"I've never been better. Why?" Nabiki asked.

"Because you are smiling in a weird way. Are you dating someone?" Keiko asked. Nabiki lifted her hand to her face. She was smiling. Not a smirk. Not a compulsatory facial expression. It felt like a genuine smile.

"No," Nabiki said, "I'm not." She did realize how excited she was to see Lady Nodoka once again. Her heart jumped a beat. Nabiki's eyes widened. "But I might be infatuated with someone."

"Ah. Lucky guy," Keiko replied.

"Yeah. You could say that. Look," Nabiki's joyous smile vanished and the shark smirk emerged. Her voice lowered to just a whisper. "Your rhythmic problem is handled. She likely won't be a problem for you anymore."

"You beat her up?" Keiko asked.

"No. I will say she is someone else's problem now," Nabiki said.

--------------

Sakura Haruno walked behind her mistress. Her pink hair cascaded down her neck to the small of her back. Her enlarged muscles were contained in specially made clothing. She looked ahead at the one leading their procession. Hinata Hyuga looked equally strong as she wore sunglasses to cover her unique eyes. Her hair was cut close to the shoulders. Just like he liked it.

She thought back to all those years ago. Soon after the great Shinobi War ended, Sakura and Hinata were in a communal bath. Sakura and Hinata had been talking about the men they loved. Sakura was soon going to leave Konoha to follow Sasuke and Hinata was about to date Naruto. It was going to be a good life.

But all that changed when some light surrounded them and they appeared, still naked in front of a tiny old man who was leering at them and cackling. He hadn't expected the attack from them. The seasoned veterans didn't waste a moment before landing in this world and attacking the one person who might be able to help them.

When the imp saw Sakura's fist shatter the ground and make a sizable crater, he fled..

Lost and confused, they spent the next week getting their bearings and learning the local language. It wasn't too dissimilar from their own tongue. Needing employment to research a way home, and with little understanding of these different technologies around them, they found an advertisement for trainers to help at a gym for women.

They went there and found .. . her. Lady Nodoka. A woman both would become close to and eternally devoted. While they still missed their loved ones home in Konoha, they hadn't been able to find a way home. And so they served their new Kage with absolute devotion.

They reached their car. A special make, like so much else these ladies needed, that was large enough to fit their massive 7ft plus frames. inside without issue.

Sakura took the front passenger seat as Hinata sat behind the wheel. With her ability to see all around her, it made Hinata an excellent driver.

"Hinata, please don't speed this time. I don't want to risk a ticket," Nodoka said.

"Yes Mistress," Hinata said softly. She revved the engine and pulled out of the parking spot.

------------

Kodachi felt strange. She felt both wonderful and degraded. Because she ate all her meal, and didn't try to escape, Kausmi decided to give her a few kisses as thanks. The size difference meant each kiss encompassed much of the tiny gymnast. The warm soft lips touched both breasts and groin. To say it was stimulating would be more accurate than she wished to acknowledge.

Kasumi stopped and leaned back on her bed. "I want you to understand my pet," Kasumi said as she brought Kodachi close to her breasts again. "I dn't want to harm you. You make me harm you." Kodachi said nothing back as she listened to this swill. "I want you to feel the warmth of my body and know I will always care about you, my pet." She pressed Kodachi gently into her right breast.

A warmth passed through her as Kodachi was caught between the flesh of breast and flesh of hand. The scent of Kasumi's breast was very . . . very appealing. If she let herself, she could truly relax on this soft but firm flesh.

But the front bell began to ring. Kasumi sighed in frustration. "I am sorry, my pet. I have to go," Kasumi said. She pulled Kodachi away. The captured girl felt so confused right now as she was put into her box. On one hand, she should hate Kasumi and this indignation she suffered. But Kasumi was so hard to hate. She was so lovely and kind.

It stirred memories of her own mother from long ago. To be held close and loved.

------------

Kasumi walked down the stairs and to the front gate. She opened it and blinked in surprise. She didn't think she would find three women whose bodies surpassed her own. They would have to duck under the the door frame to enter, though just barely. The tallest and strongest of them had a face like Kasumi's own goddess.

"Hello, who are you?" Kasumi asked. The leader looked confused. Nabiki said there would be a big surprise at the home when Nodoka arrived. This young woman before her looked like one who had either spent years around Nodoka, or if Ranma had been born a girl, or been kissed by Nodoka or a female Ranma. But no where in Ranma's life did he cause women to grow larger. Then again, this is Nabiki's home. She could have encouraged her sisters to workout. Maybe this maiden was already athletically inclined. Time to turn on the charm.

"I am Nodoka Saotome. I am here to see my husband and son. That is a fine body you have," Nodoka said. Kasumi smiled and nodded in thanks, but there wasn't the blush of embarrassment Nodoka typically received when charming a new person.

"My Ranma is away at school," Kasumi said neutrally. She considered what her goddess would want. She want answers and if this woman is her mother, Kasumi should find out what she can. But Mr. Saotome was a guest in the house first. Protocol dictated she inform him before letting these newcomers in. "I will be right back." Kasumi closed the door on their faces.

She walked to her father and Mr. Saotome. "Excuse me father. Mr. Saotome, I believe your wife is here to see you," Kasumi injected on their game. Genma jerked his head to Kasumi. His heart raced.

1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
Genma's fight or flight instincts were screaming at him to run as fast as he could in any direction, as long as he got away from here, but his higher brain functions told him if he did, it would not end well for him. No, it was best to just take what was coming to him like a man, and hopefully it wouldn't end with him being turned into a human pretzel. Besides, where Nodoka went, those two women were sure to follow, and they both possessed abilities that would make his running away ultimately fruitless, as they would catch him within seconds. It was one of the reasons he chose to swim to China instead of taking a boat, it was the only way he could give them the slip.

"Very good, Kasumi. Let her in, and we will meet in the living room," was Soun's response to his daughter.

Dejected, Genma stood from his place on the floor, and followed Kasumi to the front entrance, Soun right behind him. At least he could take solace in the fact that his best friend would be joining him in whatever happened next. Just like the good old days under the master., he thought as they marched to what he hoped wasn't doom.

*****

From her spot in front of the television, Ryoga could here a lot of movement in, and around the house, and wondered what was happening. Kasumi had passed through twice, and she had been followed by her father and Ranma's old man who took a seat on the couch near him while the muscular woman continued out of sight. Soun seemed almost eager for whatever was going on, but later had a look on his face that she could only describe as defeat. Ryoga said nothing, and chose to observe, she couldn't leave the living room without someone leading her anyway, so why bother.

Kasumi returned once more, with new people following her into the room. Ryoga's eyes almost popped out of their sockets at the sight of them. Each one was easily bigger than Kasumi, with the auburn haired one being the largest woman she had ever seen. Ryoga's heart was doing a percussion solo in her chest, and her face went to atomic red so fast it was a surprise it didn't catch fire. Time slowed down, and her world narrowed until all she saw was the god-like visage of the woman before her. The reaction she had to Ranma's female side was nothing compared to the tsunami of awe she had been hit with just then.

The four massive women joined them, with the otherworldly beauty lifting Genma like a child, and seating him in her lap

*****

The school day had been rather uneventful, thankfully, and there had been no incidents with his girl side this time. While the lessons were just as quick to put him to sleep, the classes seemed to zoom by and he was all the gladder for it. When the dismissal bell rang its beautiful cry, Ranma was out of the building within seconds, and only stopped at the front gate to wait for Nabiki and Akane, who joined him minutes later.

The smile on the middle daughter's face still hadn't disappeared since the start of the day, if anything, it may have grown. It was a smile that made Akane and Ranma uncomfortable, and they both wanted to get to the bottom of it.

"So, Nabiki...why are you so...happy...today?" Akane asked nervously as they made their journey home.

Nabiki gave a gleeful chuckle, and said, "You'll just have to wait and see, my dear sister. All will be revealed when we get home."

The tension the other two felt from that answer was thick enough to stop a bullet. Whatever this was, they could only hope they made it through today unscathed.

1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
As Ranma walked with Akane and Nabiki, they came by a puddle from the previous night's rain. A ringing of a bike bell caused the three athletes to jump away as an inconsiderate biker rode by and through the puddle.

"Hey you jerk! Watch where you're going!" Akane yelled as mud got on her school uniform.

"You have got to be kidding me!" Ranma yelled as he was now a she. Her tight clothes clung to her body.

"Don't worry, sister-in-law, I'm sure Kasumi has some tea going in anticipation of your arrival," Nabiki said the same smile. Ranma grumbled but said nothing else. Akane walked a little closer to the beautifully strong woman.

--------

Ling-ling loved this new country their goddess had hidden herself in. The modern conveniences and food that was all around her. She also enjoyed being so tall now. She towered over the men in this country (and her own for that matter) by a good foot. But a flash of red in the corner of her eyes caused her to stop. She spun and looked down an alleyway between homes. Something called to her. She moved down the alleyway and looked down the street. Her heart raced as she saw her goddess walking away. There she was, the pinnacle of muscular beauty and strength. A form no one could surpass.

And next to her were two other young women. She spoke so casually to them. Were they disciples? Did they mean to take the goddess from the Amazons who found her first? That would be intolerable. She would need to prove herself to the goddess.

But maybe she should wait for someone else to show up. Her twing Lung-Lung was close-by, as was Lady Shampoo. Either would be useful in making this a fair fight, or if both showed up, a very good fight for the Amazons.

------------

Genma was shocked and aroused. His wife's muscular form was never a detraction to him. He loved her strength and beauty deeply. But he knew her wrath could be great as he recalled some unfortunate mugger who attacked them. So being hugged, lifted as a child, and now sitting on her lap, hs head resting against her breasts as she held him close was not how he imagined his reunion.

He observed as idle chat filled much of the hours they waited for Ranma and the others to return. Nodoka and her attendants spoke a little about themselves. Sakura and Hinata were from a foreign land who Nodoka saved and helped. Kasumi introduced herself as Ranma's fiance. That Ryoga-boy just stared dumbly at Nodoka, a usual reaction for a first meeting. As no one really talked with her, she didn't say anything.

Nodoka did seem interested in Kasumi's muscular size and the lack of fawning the eldest daughter of Tendo had towards her. But Kasumi didn't mention Ranma's curse either. Genma knew it would be a true shock to his wife.

"Husband-mine," Nodoka said softly, "Be so kind and show me the bathroom."

"Of course dear," Genma said. Nodoka rose, carrying Genma in her arms as he pointed the way. She left the room, with Ryoga watching her until she was finally gone.

"Amazing," Ryoga finally breathed out.

"She is that," Sakura said.

---------

Genma and Nodoka were in the bathroom when she lifted her husband to eye-level. Her eyes smouldered with a sexual desire that filled many of his happier dreams. She leaned in and kissed her husband with a passion. After a minute or two, she broke away "Tonight, you are returning to my home, husband-mine," Nodoka said. There was no opening for debate in her tone. And honestly, Genma couldn't say he wasn't interested.

"Yes my wife," Genma said.

"Good. Now tell me, has our son consumated his relationship with Kasumi?"

"What? No. He better not have," Genma said. His wife nodded as her eyes hardened slightly.

"Then how has she grown so large? No photo of her in the house shows her being that large," Nodoka said. "She moves cautiously, like this strength is still new to her." Genma gulped and blinked. "Genma, what do you know?"

1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
Genma tried to back away from his imposing wife, as much as he could while he dangled from her grip. His legs hit the sink as Nodoka closed the gape between them, until her face was inches from his.

"About that, my dear wife...um...uh...what happend was..." Genma fumbled as he tried to think of words that would explain the situation in a way that wouldn't end with him being put through the bathroom wall, as well as the wall behind it. His feet flailed about in a vain attempt to find some kind of foothold until one struck the knob for the faucet, and cold water gushed out onto his leg.

Nodoka gaped as the transformation occurred, and her husband went from his pudgy human form to a fur covered mass of black and white. This was certainly new to her, as none of the reports leading up to their departure to China had mentioned such a change.

"Tell me, husband, would you care to explain this to me?"

The thing about that is... Genma said with a signboard he pulled from somewhere. He knew that there was no getting out of this now.

*****

Ling Ling decided to observe for now, as any aggressive move she made had just as much chance of pissing off her goddess instead of endearing her to the amazons. She sent up a signal rocket to summon her tribeswoman to her location, and kept her eyes on the group as the moved.

"What did you find?" Shampoo asked as she appeared behind the younger girl silently. Even with her newfound muscles, Shampoo stilled managed to move as quite as a cat, another reason Ling Ling looked up to the girl.

"Our goddess is just up ahead, but there are two girls with her, and I did not wish to go alone. One already looks as though she is a follower, and the other may be someone who has just joined her."

"I see, this makes matters complicated. We may need to be a little bit diplomatic here. We cannot risk her anger by trying to drive off the others. I shall go introduce myself instead. Perhaps I can convince her to return with us." Shampoo said before she took after their quarry.

*****

Kasumi placed her tray down, and began to server their guests tea. Even with her new body, she was still a good host that would not allow herself to forget proper manners in situations such as this. The two women, Hinata and Sakura she recalled, had sat down and not said much as they waited for the two Saotomes to return from the bathroom. Not one to leave an uncomfortable silence in her home, the muscular hostess attempted to engage in small talk,

"So, how did you to meet Ranma's mother?" Kasumi asked politely.

"That is a long, complicated story," Sakura responded gruffly. "For now, let's just say that she helped us out of a tight spot when we were younger, and we both owe her a debt of gratitude."

The silence resumed, and for the first time today, Kasumi hoped Ranma would return soon for a reason other than her missing him.

Ranma looked down at Nabiki and worried what she could possibly know. But then a voice from her nightmares emerged from behind them. "Goddess!" Ranma, Akane, and Nabiki stopped. They turned and Ranma's mouth opened up.

That purple haired girl who first fawned over him stood in a long Chinese dress that barely contained her bulging muscles. She was shorter than Kasumi now, but bulkier. She was in the short six-foot range. "Y-y-you!" Ranma yelled.

"Goddess remembers me. Shampoo is honored," Shampoo said with a bow.

"So this is the first gir who saw you? She seems . . . larger than you described her," Akane said. She looked up at the towering woman.

"Yes, Shampoo worked hard to emulate her goddess," Shampoo said.

"Look, I ain't your goddess," Ranma said.

"But you are. You brought a change to Shampoo's village. We were stagnant, stuck in old ways and traditions. Goddess Ranma showed us new ways to be powerful," Shampoo said. She looked at Akane and Nabiki. "Do you follow Ranma too?"

"Hah. Nope. She's just my sister-in-law," Nabiki said. She watched as the forigner's eyes narrowed. She looked at Akane, but shook her head.

"Gentleman the Goddess chose would be welcomed as well," Shampoo said. She didn't want her goddess to be her enemy. To accept her beloved would be best. After all, Shampoo wasn't a guy. Well, not if she couldn't that one cursed spring.

"And I don't follow her. She is just an annoying person who has disrupted our lives," Akane fumed. Shampoo's hand clenched. She dare insult the goddess? It was almost enough to make her react, but she controlled herself.

---

"Excuse me," Ryoga piped up. Saukra and Hinata looked at the young woman. "Is it possible to get a body like yours?" They smiled.

"With a strong determination and devotion to Nodoka, anything is possible," Hinata said.

"She can bring you blessings you never considered before," Sakura said. Kasumi listened and nodded. She suspected now these two might have kissed Ranma's mother. Or whatever charm Ranma feared she had, her mother had too. Ryoga was obviously enamored with Nodoka. Why wasn't she? Maybe it was because her love for Ranma was pure, it prevented her from being charmed by another.

Like those stories of couples in love, sex monsters couldn't separate or charm.

----

Ranma watched as she saw Shampoo become very still and very angry. Akane just pissed her off big time with the insult. "Akane, ya might want to hold off on insulting me. She is kind of like Kasumi," Ranma said. Akane turned to Ranma.

"You kissed her too?" Akane asked.

"What? No!" Ranma said. "But she is clearly pissed about you insulting me. So it would be smart if you didn't."

"Don't tell me what to do," Akane said softly.

"Goddess kissed a girl, who now follows Goddess," Shampoo repeated as she understood most of the conversation before her. Perhaps a kiss on the lips was a sign of devotion to the goddess? If that was the case, she could easily go with kissing her goddess.

She took a silent step forward, unnoticed by the goddess or the shortest girl. The other girl turned an eye towards her but remained silent.

Shampoo grabbed the redhead's head and turned it towards her and brought her lips to the perfect, pillowy ones of her goddess. Even her already large dress had to strain to hold together, as Shampoo's already impressive set of muscles expanded to even greater sizes. Shampoo basked in the lingering feeling of the kiss, her muscles practically sang with happiness at their new size and it was only the shaking of her shoulders that brought her out of the euphoria.

"Nice going, Saotome. You got another girl addicted to you." Nabiki deadpanned and continued to walk home, not wanting to keep her Lady Nodoka waiting. "Come on, let's get going, bring your new girl along too if you need to, just hurry up."

Ranma, Akane, and Shampoo just blinked dumbly, before the former two followed, with the third not far behind. Shampoo caught up to her beloved goddess, and captured her arm in a loving hug.

She remembered babysitting the little boy, and how he cuddled up to her when she held him in her muscular arms. She quietly laughed to herself as she thought about their reunion, just a short time away.

*****

Ranma was getting annoyed at the constant clinging of the purple-haired amazon who clung to her arm like a child would a security blanket. It was time to put a stop to it, and the only way she could think of was to change back into a guy. Luckily, there was a small restaurant on the way that he could get some hot water to change.

"Look, Shampoo was it? There's something I need to show you. Akane, Nabiki, could we stop here for a minute? I have to get something from inside," Ranma said as she pointed at the restaurant.

The restaurant owner was shocked to see the large redhead walk through his front door, and when she requested a glass of hot water, he wordlessly handed her a paper cup of it to her and said nothing when she left.

Once she rejoined the group, Ranma requested Shampoo's attention for what she was about to do.

Nodoka didn't let her husband down as he finished explaining how things had come to pass. She scratched him behind the ears and felt his leg kick reflexively. Her son had been cursed now to become a young woman with a powerful body, just like Nodoka. But unlike her, she had no experience with that body. What are you thinking about doing now? Genma asked by sign.

Do you wat him to leave with us tonight? Genma asked.

"This one. You don't mind? You don't think it's freaky?"

Hot water was obtained as Nodoka and Genma returned to the others, thanks to Kasumi. They explained about the curses now afflicting Ranma and Genma, how Ranma could become an amazonian beauty in her own right. "He kissed you, didn't he?" Nodoka asked Kasumi.

Akane fumed silently as Shampoo walked behind them. Her large steps were slow and heavy not because of her weight, but so she could stay close to Ranma. "We are not bringing home another person to stay there," Akane said firmly.

"You're right. We already have your boyfriend there. We can have much room for other people," Nabiki said.

"Shampoo will follow Goddess everywhere, but if this home not large enough, perhaps Goddess could move to a village Goddess will always be welcomed and adored?" Shampoo injected.

"Look, call me Ranma, okay?" Ranma said, looking up at her. "I ain't a goddess." Shampoo stared for a moment.

"Fine. That's pretty much what Kasumi agreed to anyway," Ranma said as they came to the Tendo estate. Nabiki quickly pushed the doors open. She was giggling excitedly. All three were weary of this action.

"That is a big car," Akane observed, looking at the vehicle parked down the street. Ranma nodded.

"Kasumi, we're home," Nabiki called upon entering. "We have another guest." Nabiki slipped off her shoes when a large form appeared in the entryway. She was massive. She filled up the entire hallway. Nabiki was sure she had gotten bigger since they last saw each other.

"Nabiki Tendo, it's been too long," the mammoth woman of muscle said in a warm tone. Nabiki smiled broadly and brought her hands to her face. Ranma turned back to the woman and saw a mirror of what his face looked like in the other form. His heart raced as she looked at him.

Akane felt like a truck hit her. Her breath was out and she couldn't recover. This woman was . . . amazing. Her naturally flexed arms, her thick legs that could carry her frame. The flicker she felt towards Ranma was nothing to the fiery passion she felt now.

Shampoo looked at the woman and was impressed by her strength. She listened carefully as Ranma croaked out, "Mom?" The woman smiled a dazzling warm smile and moved closer.
