"I didn't mean to. I'm here to rescue someone. Please change me back," the intruder asked. Nabiki clicked her tongue. She knew there was a reversal spell in the tome, but it was more complicated than the actual shrinking spell. Besides, until she learned more, why change him back?

Rescue who?" Nabiki asked. The intruder paused.

"Do you know the great red-headed goddess?"

"I do," Nabiki replied. So this guy was likely someone from China, based on clothing, what she could see of his face, and considering Ranma a goddess.

"Are you one of her followers?" the intruder asked.

"No." It was an honest answer. Nabiki understood now how the greater-goddess has captured her love and devotion long before the child had arrived.

"I want to free a person from her clutches. My beloved Shampoo," the intruder said. Nabiki nodded.

"Big purple haired girl?" Nabiki asked. she knew this was likely her, but feigning ignorance and attempt to help seemed like fun. The intruder nodded. Nabiki lowered her hand. "Step on. I'll put you some place safe and get Shampoo." The tiny man walked onto her thick palm. The skin thick from years of workouts. Nabiki carefully lifted the tiny man and walked to her dresser. After a moment of consideration, she opened the shirt drawer and dropped the young man into it.

"Wait! What are you-" the intruder called, but Nabiki closed the drawer all but a crack.

"Mess up my clothes and I will break your legs," Nabiki said. She turned and picked up his glasses once more. She turned and walked out of the room.

---------

Nodoka smiled as she could feel her child's aura pushing out. It wasn't strong as her own, but Ranma was doing well for one so young and new to this power. Both Akane and Ryoga-chan were smiling from the warmth of it.

"Nope, still like your mom better," Akane said.

"Shampoo love Ranma best, always," Shampoo said.

"Buffing peopleup without needing to work out. That could cut into your gym business," Nabiki said as she entered.

"Prolonged exposure takes a lot of effort on my part. Quick demonstrations are easier," Nodoka said. "Care to join us?"

"No, but I did have a few questions for Shampoo," Nabiki said, looking up at the muscular Chinese girl.

"Yes?" Shampoo asked.

"You want to join our school so you can be with Ranma?" Nabiki asked. Shampoo smiled a little as this conversation broke Ranma's concentration.

"What?" Ranma asked.

"Being with Ranma longer would make Shampoo happy," Shampoo said. "Does Shampoo need to do some paperwork?" Nabiki nodded.

"Follow me, if you will," Nabiki said. Shampoo turned once to look at Ranma before walking away with Nabiki.

"Will this take long?" Shampoo asked as they entered the house.

"Not really. And I lied about the school thing," Nabiki said. She turned to find a glaring Shampoo.

"Shampoo no like deceit," Shampoo said. Nabiki smirked and held up the glasses. Shampoo turned to glance and her heart quickened. "Where you get those?"

"From a guy who broke into my room looking for you," Nabiki said.

"You defeat Mousse in combat?" Shampoo asked.

"You could say that," Nabiki said.

"Take me to Mouse now," Shampoo said softly. Her hands clenched and popped with strength.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.title: Another Small Problem

choices: Back with Nabiki as she contemplates what to do with Mousse
What's Kasumi up to?
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
Nabiki led the Chinese girl up to her room, and closed the door behind them after they entered. Shampoo stood by the bed as middle Tendo daughter walked to her dresser. Her hand slipped into one of the drawers, and removed something from inside, holding it in a closed fist.

"I believe you know this little guy," Nabiki said nonchalantly as she extended her hand towards the other girl's face, and opened her fingers. In the center of her palm sat Shampoo's long time annoying suitor and childhood friend.

"Mousse? What happen to you?" The purple haired amazon asked, not sure she believed what was before her eyes.

"He decided to try and sneak into my room in what seems like an obsessive search for you. I did...something...to him, and now he's the size of a doll."

Nabiki grabbed her guest's hand, and deposited her little captive into it.

"I'll just return him to you then," Nabiki said.

"You can keep," Shampoo stated with slight disgust, "Mousse lose to you, and according to village law he now belong to you. Mousse now your slave."

"But my darling Shampoo, I only came to free you from the allure of that red-haired temptress!" Mousse pleaded as he clutched his body to her thumb.

"Get off Shampoo. You expelled from village now," Shampoo yanked the tiny man from her thumb and gave him right back to Nabiki. "Shampoo suggest you keep him this size, and get good cage so he no bother anyone."

Her peace said, the Chinese girl left the room, leaving Nabiki alone with her new possession. It wasn't often that it happened, but the girl had be struck dumb for a brief period. That was certainly not what she expected to hear when she showed Shampoo the young man she had shrunk. Finally, her brain rebooted, and she started on a new train of thought.

"So I guess you're mine now, huh?" Nabiki commented. "I guess we'll have to find something to make you useful."

*****

Ranma could honestly say that she hadn't been this tired from training in a long time. Just emitting the aura was difficult enough, but trying to hold it for a single minute winded her more than sprinting full speed for an hour. Sweat dripped down her thick neck, and her breathing had become hitched, as even catching her breath was becoming difficult.

"Keep it up, Ranma. You have already improved so much since this morning. Once you get the hang of this you need not fear attracting unwanted attention from every woman around you." Nodoka stated.

With a grunt of determination, Ranma pushed her all into the golden gleam of the energy surrounding her. Her arms swelled, veins throbbing angrily. She almost seemed to grow larger as every muscle in her body flexed in concentration, all in an effort to maintain and control her aura for as long as possible.

Nodoka smiled proudly as she watched her child progress further along in the training. She had thought it would take weeks to get to this point, but her son/daughter's talent was truly brilliant. She happily continued to guide Ranma's training.

*****

Nearby, HInata and Sakura held a conversation on another matter. Since the two of them had first arrived in this world, they had put most of their spare time into developing a way back. Since they were still able to utilize their chakra, and jutsu because of this, they had invested every moment they could into the creation of a space/time jutsu that could take them home, and now it as almost complete. Finally, after all their experimenting and long nights of hard effort, they had put together a potential solution.

They would let their Lady know that night, and would make their first real attempt to perform it right after.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.title: Nabiki learns about the Joketsuzoku and losing

choices: Nabiki goes to see Kasumi and Kodachi.
Ranma awaits the visitors to the house.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
"Look, let me go. I have to rescue Shampoo," Mousse pleaded. Nabiki shook her head.

"You heard her. You're banished from the town. According to them, you are mine," Nabiki said. She moved to her bed and sat down. She placed Mousse on her lap.

"This . . . This can't be happening," Mousse said. His head hung low.

"Look, it won't be so bad. I won't treat you too badly, provided you behave," Nabiki said. "Be honest, did she ever really like you?" Mousse shuddered.

"I always wanted to get stronger . . . for her . . . to prove myself . . . for her," Mousse said as the deep realizations of his new lot in life were hitting him. Shampoo would certainly write home and inform them of this disgrace. His own mother would stand by the laws.

"Well, I think you are pretty strong," Nabiki said with a soft tone. Mousse looked up at Nabiki. She smiled at him. This was a lie. Such basic manipulations, but this foreign boy was so depressed, she might be able to turn his devotion to that Shampoo into devotion for herself.

"What?" Mousse asked.

"You came to a whole other country to save your friend. That takes a lot of courage and inner strength," Nabiki said. She patted him with one finger. "I'd be honored if I had someone willing to do that."

"But . . . but Shampoo doesn't want to be saved. She just wants that red-headed goddess," Mousse said. "Her and the rest of the girls here." Nabiki held her facade at this new revelation. There were other Amazon girls here.

"There is a charm about her not all can resist," Nabiki said. "But I don't follow her." Mousse looked up at Nabiki.

"You don't? How are you not under her spell?" Mousse asked.

"Don't know," Nabiki answered falsely. But best to add some truth to this so I am believed. "What I do know is I want to avoid being kissed by that goddess."

"Kissed? Is that why Shampoo is so much larger now?" Mousse cried out.

"Yep. A few seconds and she grew big," Nabiki said.

"Do you know any magic which could break this enchantment?" Mousse asked.

"The tome I have doesn't include mind magic," Nabiki said. "It is one of a set, though, based on the title page." Maybe she could convince Kasumi to help her get the other tomes from Kodachi.

-------------

"Ya sure about this?" Ranma asked as she followed her mother and Akane.

"Ranma, we need fresh people. Akane, sweet girl she is, already has mixed feelings towards both of us. Not feeling your aura is hard as she knows it is there," Nodoka said. "Only two people who haven't met you, or at least had prolonged contact, can be trusted to give a fair assessment."

"Yeah, but if I fail, I'll have two more followers," Ranma said. Shampoo listened impassively. She would speak with Ranma-goddess about school later, or maybe other big girl would be wise. The one who claimed Mousse was too much of a mercenary.

Akane picked up the phone and called one number. "Yuka, it's Akane. Can you come over? I have someone I want you to meet." Her face scrunched up. "No, I'm not setting you up on a date with a guy. It's my sister's fiance. You really didn't get to know him at school." Akane smiled and hung up.

"Yes dear?" Nodoka asked.

"She is going to get Sayuri and come over," Akane said.

"Wonderful," Ranma said.

"Scared you'll lose?" Ryoga asked with a smirk. Ranma glared at the shorter woman.

"No. I just don't want to kiss anyone else," Ranma said. If he kept growing or ensnaring each girl, a simple life would be hard to find.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.title: Nabiki's Control

choices: Ranma's efforts pay off
Ranma fails to control her power
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
Ranma's stomach was in knots and her skin glistened with nervous sweat, as the hurdle that the Saotome heir would need to overcome that day had just arrived at the Tendo home. The gender swapping teenager could do without another two worshipful followers, thank you very much, and could only hope that the effort that had been put into controlling the special abilities inherited from her mother would not go to waste.

They had decided to remove all variables from the room that could otherwise alter the results of the experiment, so Nodoka, and everyone else besides Ranma and Akane had left the living room.

“Nervous?” Akane asked as she prepared to greet her friends. It was a big risk they were taking, and she felt a little guilty about tricking her friends like this, but she hoped that Ranma could say something that would relieve her doubts, if even a little.

“Me? Nervous don’t be ridiculous! I’m Ranma Saotome, and I’m not about to let my own power get the best of me!” The redhead’s boastful confidence would have been more believable if sweat wasn’t streaming down her forehead.

“Just, please try your best to not make my friends your drooling fangirls,” Akane chided as she heard the doorbell chime, announcing the arrival of their test subjects, as much as the Tendo girl didn’t want to think of them as such.

*****

Yuka and Sayuri strolled up to the front door of their good friend’s home, curious and eager to find out why Akane had called them over. They knew it had something to do with her sister’s fiancé, but besides that, they were completely in the dark. The pair approached entered the property, which was almost distractingly silent, and alerted those in the house to their presence. Once they rang the doorbell, they were ushered in by a nervous looking Akane.

“So what did you want to show us, Akane?” Sayuri asked, flipping her ponytail excitedly.

“If you two will follow me, I’ll show you something that you won’t believe,” Akane prompted, and corralled them towards the living room.

Whatever the two of them were expecting, an enormous redhead with arms almost as big as they were was obviously not it.

*****

Nabiki leafed through the book of magic once more, the shrunken Chinese boy now on the back-burner of her mind. The spell that she had used to change the young man to the size of a doll was definitely something to earmark for later reference, but for now she wanted to see if there were any other useful enchantments that she could find, and any troublesome ones that were best avoided if there was no counter spell listed.

The tiny Mousse had been relegated to a small shoe-box on the top of Nabiki’s dresser, with an old shirt made into a cushion, as if he was a mouse. The Tendo girl had told him to stay put, and stressed the consequences if he chose to disobey or annoy her while she studied her new hobby. The humiliation of his present circumstance was almost too much for the amazon male to bear with. Now, not only was his darling Shampoo forever out of his reach, but he was little more than a glorified pet to a greedy amateur witch.

*****

Ranma cringed as Akane’s two schoolgirl friends caught sight of her, but did not relax her concentration on her aura. She raised a shaky hand in greeting, careful not to let her control slip.

“Hey, you must be Akane’s friends. Yuka and Sayuri, right?” Ranma said nervously.

The pigtailed bodybuilder barley heard the two girls’ responses, as her mind was preoccupied with her still imprecise control. It was like trying to bottle up fireworks, and each second that passed was another firecracker going off and another crack in the vessel.

“This is Ranma,” Akane introduced, “and yes, it is the same Ranma as Kasumi’s fiancé.”

By this point, sweat poured down Ranma’s body, a ring of it formed around her shirt collar, which now clung to her sizeable breasts. She couldn’t tell yet whether or not the two girls had been affected by her inherited ability, but they seemed to be in control of themselves, which was promising. To truly make sure that she had improved control, Ranma opened her blue eyes, and stared at her unwitting practice partners.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.title: Akane's friends arrive

choices: Does Shampoo's sudden arrival break Ranma's focus?
Back to Nabiki or Kasumi.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
"You're huge!" Sayuri said

"I've never seen a girl this big," Yuka agreed. "What happened?"

"And you were a guy yesterday," Sayuri added. Ranma chuckled nervously.

"I was on a training trip with my pops. I was knocked into this cursed water," Ranma said. "It turned me into this."

"Wow. Just wow," Sayuri said as she watched swat pouring from the mammoth young woman. "Why are you so nervous?" Ranma's heart raced but she kept control.

"I . . . I don't want to hurt people," Ranma explained. It was the truth, making people her servants wasn't something she wanted in life. "I am still getting used to this body."

"So, we're test subjects?" Yuka asked, looking at Akane. "Normal strength girls unlike Akane or Nabiki."

"Akane, this was a mean trick," Sayuri said. "We would have come over without the pretense."

Look, I'm sorry," Akane said, feigning sadness. "I just didn't want you guys to freak out and reject Ranma. She needs some good friends."

"Does your sister know?" Yuka asked.

"Oh, Kasumi is aware of Ranma's cursed form. She doesn't mind at all," Akane said.

"It . . kind of made her grow an appreciation for strong bodies," Ranma said. Yuka and Sayuri turned to her, noticing her sweat-covered shirt made her bountiful breasts all the more pronounced. Akane glared at Ranma for that snark.

"You know who you should meet? Kodachi Kuno," Yuka said.

"Yeah. Hey, if Akane won't do Rhythmic Gymnastics, will you join the team in this form?" Sayuri asked.

"Actually, I was already drafted for that. And ..." Ranma stopped. It was best to not admit Kodachi's true fate. "Kodachi did try attacking me and Kasumi yesterday. I beat her up and sent her flying. Haven't seen her since."

"Oh, I wish I could have seen that," Yuka said.

----------

Kasumi watched as Kodachi punched and kicked Kasumi's giant foot. The tiny girl was sweating up a storm, but the massage felt very nice. "Kodachi," Kasumi said. The girl stopped and turned to her mistress. "What is your family situation like?"

"My idiot brother and servant are all who await for me my old home. I don't care to think about them Mistress," Kodachi said.

"Well, I do. If my sister vanished, I would be looking for her," Kasumi said.

"You are a nicer person than my brother," Kodachi mumbled softly. But given her body language, Kasumi guessed what was said.

"We will need to right a letter or make a message for him explaining your vanishing. We don't want people to take you from us, do we?" Kasumi asked. Kodachi hugged the foot.

"No! Please don't take me from you!" Kodachi pleaded.

"I'll ask Sakura or Hinata if they have a video camera we could use," Kasumi said. Kodachi smiled. "Now, the other foot." Kodachi nodded and rushed to attack the other foot.

-------------

Nodoka listened to her daughter talk with the girls from the kitchen. She could tell these girls weren't under any charm based on the tone of their voice. Shampoo studied the small kitchen. She was an excellent cook. Maybe she could win the goddess back with cooking.

Ryoga sat on a chair facing Nodoka. Though back in male form, he found himself taking in the curves of Ranma's mother. A kiss from either Nodoka or Ranma would blow up a female form into a temple of muscular power. But it wasn't his own female form growing larger that he was envisioning.

It was Akane becoming as large or larger than Shampoo. To be hugged by those tree trunk arms and rest against the form like Ryoga did last night. He adjusted his legs to hide his erection.

"Ranma doing very good," Shampoo said finally.

"Yes. But we need to add some stress. An unexpected moment to see if she can keep her concentration," Nodoka said. She turned her eyes to the Amazon. "Would you be against rushing in and hugging Ranma?" Shampoo's eyes lit up.

"I would be honored," Shampoo said.

"But if this goes bad, it might upset Akane," Ryoga said.

"It's for the best in the long run," Nodoka decided. Shampoo nodded and went on her quest.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.title: Keeping Control

choices: Stay with Kasumi, Hinata and Sakura
Does Ranma's effort bare fruit?
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
Shampoo sped towards her target like a bullet, her arms spread and ready to embrace the gender bent Saotome. The startled redhead practically leapt through the living room ceiling when the Chinese girl wrapped her up into a loving bearhug from behind.

“GAH! What the hell?!” Ranma screamed in midair. She landed with a thud between Akane and her friends, while Shampoo clung to her wide back like a monkey.

“Who the heck is that?!” Sayuri asked as she and her friends regained their composure from the sudden appearance of yet another mountain of muscle.

“That would be Shampoo…” Akane grumbled as she shook her head, hoping that Nodoka knew what she was doing sending the bubbly amazon to them to cause this chaos. It wouldn’t sit well with her if this distraction caused Ranma’s focus to slip and her power to ensnare Yuka and Sayuri.

*****

Kasumi let the shrunken girl finish the work on her foot before she picked her up into the palm of her hand. She let Kodachi get comfortable before she stroked her with an affectionate finger. The tiny girl shivered as the thick digit ran up her nude body, touching everything from her foot to her head.

“We should go see if we can borrow a camera from someone so we can let your family know that you are fine and not to worry. I saw Hinata and Sakura in the backyard, I’m sure that they can lend us a camera.”

The young woman placed her tiny compatriot in the vast expanse of her muscular cleavage, where the tiny Kodachi nestled into a comfortable position. Kasumi then made herself presentable before she left to ask her new acquaintances for a favor.

*****

Hinata once more ran through the series of complex hand seals that would allow the two displaced kunoichi to travel to their original world. One wrong move could send them spiraling into a lifeless void, or an alternate version of their reality.

“I think we’ve got the hang of this now,” Sakura said as she mirrored the hand movements of her longtime friend. They two of them had spent the majority of their time at the Tendo residence diligently running through their plan, practicing every single detail that they could before the time to execute their jutsu arrived.

“Yes, but we should still perform a smaller scale trial run before we do it at full size. We need to make sure that the technique won’t lose stability and split us in half before we reach our destination,” Hinata stated as she finished her final run through of the hand seals.

It was quickly agreed by the two that the test run would help troubleshoot the process. If something was going to go wrong, it was best to minimize the possible damage to as small an area as possible. The two began to run through the complicated hand signs in synch as each let a trickle of chakra out to power the technique on as small a scale as possible.

“Miss Hinata, Miss Sakura!” a voice said as they reached a critical point of their jutsu, a hand reached out and touched the unsuspecting Hinata from behind.

The started byakugan wielder let out an eep, and let her control slip, powering the technique far more than intended. The domino effect continued as Sakura messed up the final hand seal. With a burst of light and a boisterous wind, the jutsu activated, and quickly ended as it deposited a figure on the grass. There was a moment of absolute silence, which quickly ebbed as the background sounds of the neighborhood flooded back.

“Oh my! Is this a bad time?” Kasumi asked worriedly.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.title: A startled Ranma tries to stay focused

choices: Shampoo talks about kissing Ranma.  Yuka and Sayuri don't believe it.
Akane or Ranma stops Shampoo from blabbing.
Kasumi walks into the room.  "Are we having two more over for dinner?"
Back out in the back yard.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
The portal went away with the swiftness it was summoned. A young maiden with short dark hair and lithe body moaned softly on the ground.

"Where am I?" the girl muttered as she thought about what just happened.

---------

Opal crushed the letter in her hands. Bolin wasn't coming to see her in Republic City. Kuvira needed him on another important mission. The young Airbender took in a deep breath and let out. The blast ruffled the bushes around her. She heard footsteps near her and she turned to see Master Jinora. Her hair had just started to grow back on her head. The younger girl had hair shorter than Opal's.

"Opal, what's wrong?" Jinora asked. She tilted her head to one side.

I'm just frustrated. Bolin is helping Kuvira, but I wanted to see him too," Opal said. Jinora nodded.

"Well, maybe you should take the Walk?" Jinora suggested.

"The Walk? To where?" Opal asked.

"No where. Dad told me about it once. When an Air nomad was conflicted about an earthly bond and meditation didn't help, sometimes traveling to new places helped. The Nomad would take nothing but the clothes on his back and maybe some food, and just set off in any direction," Jinora said. "There isn't some destination in mind, but rather take the time to think on the walk and consider things from new perspectives." Opal nodded.

"That sounds good. Would you guys mind if I went for a month?" Opal asked.

"Not at all," Jinora said. Opal smiled and hugged her friend and teacher.

"I think I'll head out soon then," Opal said. "If my mom calls, please tell her what I've done." Jinora nodded. Within the hour, Opal left Air Nomad Island, with little on her, not even her loyal Air Bison following her. She was going to walk her own path. Find a new part of herself she never knew she had before.

And then before her a bright light appeared and drew her into it.

The universe. Never giving a person what they desired, but always giving what they wished for.

-----------

"Is this the Spirit realm?" Opal asked as she looked up. The building looked similar to ones in Republic City. But as her eyes looked around, she saw this wasn't home.

Home didn't have women of this size in muscle and height. One with strange eyes was kneeling to one side of her, and the other with pink hair had her hands out.

"No, it is Japan," the strange eyed girl said.

"Does that name mean anything for you?" the pink haired girl asked.

"No, it doesn't," Opal said. Her stomach lurched and she bent over. What little food she had in her stomach was expelled.

"Yeah, we did the same thing," the pink haired one said.

-----------

Despite Shampoo hugging her massive body and kissing it, Ranma kept control over the power inside of her. Shampoo moved her face to kiss Ranma on the lips once more but the Saotome heir placed a hand on the Amazon's face and pushed her hard down.

"No. No more kissing," Ranma said firmly. Shampoo looke hurt but obeyed. She wanted the goddess' favor and love, so they could return home to the village. Disobeying would hurt that goal.

Akane looked at her friends. "So, what are you thinking?" Akane asked in a neutral tone.

"Ranma, your body is really amazing," Yuka said. "Even when Shampoo shocked you, you didn't move close to us and risk us being injured."

"I wish I had some of that water here and now," Sayuri said.

"Huh? What water?" Akane asked.

"The water which turned his body into this amazing form," Sayuri said. "Did Shampoo fall into the same water?"

"What water?" Shampoo asked.

"The water which turned Ranma so large," Sayuri said.

"Sayuri, are you alright?" Yuka asked. Ranma looked at Sayuri and saw it. The glint of what got into Kasumi, Shampoo, and the others. Sayuri shook her head and the glint subsided.

"Yeah. I guess it's just amazing being in front of Ranma right now. You really are an amazing and unique person," Sayuri said.

Ranma blushed. "Thanks," Ranma said as she felt in control once more. Just as long as there weren't anymore shocks.

"So, Shampoo, I'm Yuka, and this is Sayuri," Yuka said to the stranger. Shampoo nodded to both smaller girls.

"I feel small next to you two," Sayuri said. Shampoo nodded.

"Good. Shampoo like being large and strong. And Shampoo didn't take in cursed water. Shampoo. . . ." Shampoo started.
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.title: Not Anywhere Near Home

choices: Opal bursts into the living room, trips, and falls face first into Ranma
Hinata and Sakura catch her before she gets too far inside
1553322222122211212121122112111121222211.content:
Ranma’s hands clamped around Shampoo’s mouth as the startled teenage girls jumped at the sudden movement. The panicked redhead causing a sound like a thunderclap as her hands slapped together in front of the purple-haired girl’s lips. A nervous laugh escaped from the pigtailed girl as she held her fellow amazon’s mouth shut.

“What she means is that it wasn’t water that made us big like this,” Ranma chattered quickly, her eyes looking over to Akane, pleading for help. “Our bodies changed because of something else.”

“Ye…yeah!” Akane joined in, “they don’t know the specific reason they’re like this, they just are!”

Both of them hoped that their half-assed explanation would be enough to sate the curiosity of the two girls.

“Oh, really?” Yuka and Sayuri responded together, both buying the hastily crafted answer.

“But it would’ve been sooo awesome to have a body like your’s,” Yuka whined, her eyes held the familiar worshipfulness that Ranma had come to dread.

The muscular redhead took a deep breath, reining in her emotions once more to regain control of herself. She didn’t need to more entranced girls clinging to her like needy puppies. She had enough of that with Shampoo and Kasumi, and there was only so much attention she could stand.

Slowly, the eyes of Akane’s friends cleared, and the enamored feeling they had gotten from Ranma returned to acceptable levels of curiosity and excitement. With a sigh, the pigtailed girl released Shampoo from her steel grip and slid the girl off her lap with some difficulty. While she may have slipped up some, it wasn’t a mistake that couldn’t be corrected.

*****

Nodoka smiled proudly as she watched her child regain control over her abilities. It was a tricky move, trying to distract her with Shampoo, but the risk had been worth the reward to see Ranma maintain her discipline. With any luck, a situation like this wouldn’t even cause a momentary lapse again, although she wouldn’t push it.

*****

Opal had emptied the entirety of her stomach contents until she was left with dry heaves. It was a case of motion sickness that could not be compared to anything before experienced by a human, and after five straight minutes of it, the airbender finally had her stomach settle.

“Finally done? Feeling better?” asked the kind voice of the muscular brunette with the weird eyes.

“Uh huh…” the airbender groaned out as she started to stand, helped along by the powerfully muscled arm of the woman with the strange pink hair.

“Okay, well I guess the first thing you will want is an explanation as to what happened to you, but I think some introductions are in order,” the pinkette said as she placed a large hand on her chest, “My name is Sakura,” she motions over to the two amazons beside her, “and these two are Hinata and Kasumi. What’s your name?”

15533222222111.content:
It was another day in the tendo household for our main boy Ranma.

Nabiki was scheming, His father was lazing about, Kasumi was cooking, Suon was reading a newspaper, ryoga was in his pig form and Akane was trying to bash his head in with large Mallet.... Emphasis on trying.

A pretty normal day for Ranma saotome as he dodge the angered youngst daughter of his father Friend "Jeez! what the hell did I do you damn Gorilla Girl!?" Ranma cursed out, jumping away as the spot he was once on was splintered and destroyed, curtsey of the large heavy mallet that smashed into it.

"Get back here you cross dresser!" Akane cried out, giving chase to our hero, she didn't need a reason to try and beat him up because everything about him seemed to set her off, she was a walking power keg that just by sneezing wrong would lit her up.

'Ugh! I can't take anymore i'm off.' he internally sighed out as he jumped over the walls of the Tendo grounds and ran away to get as far way from the mad woman that was suppose to be one of his future brides that his father suckered, or promised him to.

Ranma needed some time away from the chaotic den of his family, as he walked around the town aimlessly he began to reminisce about the comedic battle that was his life as he had deal with every threat to his existence that was caused by either his father, his bethroved family or some stupid nonsense that has no means of being linked to him but does in fact become his problem for as long as he lives.

as he was deep in thought he failed to notice that he was walking through a narrow alley or that he was about to walk over a large object "Woah!?" and trip.

Grumbling in anger he picked himself up and turned around to see what had caused him to fall forward on his face, all the anger on his face was washed away as confusion and curiosity took over "What's this?" he asked, looking at the object that turned out be a fancy red themed scroll, picking it up he looked around in case anyone was watching before opening up.

his eye's popped open in awe as the various secret technique were beheld to him, they all seemed to be focused on one thing... Possession.

Yes these techniques were all designed on allowing the user to possess the body of any being he targets.

such methods caused an insidious smile to cross his face as Ranma was began to plot ways of using this techniques for either Revenge, his own perverted desire's or just plain shits and giggles.

as he rolls up the scroll and promptly hides it in his shirt, he wonders who should be his first victim?

who is Ranma going after?
15533222222111.title: forbidden Technique

info.brief_description: Twist the cast of Ranma in tons of ways from shrinking to Female muscle growth.
info.description:
In this interactive you can make the Ranma cast change in lots of ways, but there are rules.

1:Good spelling and grammar, I don't expect perfect grammar and spelling but with in limits.
2:No single line entry unless it is a choice chapter.
3:I can not stress this enough NO guy on guy, I dislike yoai with a passion and any add with that in it will be removed. Girl on girl is fine with me.
4:If you have a shrink/giantess add have only women grow or have the shrunken character only interact with women.
5:No toilet fedishes that means no pissing/shitting/farting on someone in any form, that does not mean you can't have things like ass play or face sitting just no using a person as a toilet.

Other then those rules go wild have fun and add.
